hotel.name: Morris House Hotel
hotel.description:
This national historic landmark, renovated into a luxury boutique hotel, offers cozy accommodations and elegantly combines 18th century charm with all of today's modern conveniences.
The Morris House Hotel offers uniquely decorated rooms, complete with charming views of the private garden or city. Free Wi-Fi is included.
Guests at the hotel can enjoy a delicious continental breakfast every morning and afternoon tea with homemade cookies. M Restaurant, located on site, features French-inspired cuisine and a garden patio.
Only a short distance from the Morris House are some of Philadelphia's main attractions. Independence Hall and the Liberty Bell are moments away. A number of world-renowned restaurants, shops and theaters are also within walking distance.
hotel.airportsDesc: Philadelphia International Airport.

facility.title: Amenities
facility.desc: Concierge:WiFi

facility.title: Large Suite
facility.desc: A spacious extended suite with a separate living room and bedroom. This cozy suite is modernly designed with hardwood floors in the living room area. Bedroom area offers queen size bed, bedside tables, large closet and a plasma TV. The bedroom door opens to the living room connecting to the kitchen and dining area. Living room is garlanded with a comfortable couch, cocktail table and guest chairs. Large bathroom is connected to the bedroom and separated by door. This gorgeous, marble bathroom has a Jacuzzi bathtub and a separate shower.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The Morris House, built in 1787, is located in the historic district of Philadelphia known as Society Hill, just two blocks from some of nation's most important landmarks such as Independence Hall and the Liberty Bell. The Convention Centre is just a 10 - minute walk.

facility.title: Luxury Room
facility.desc: The room offers 1 Queen size bed with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathrobe, Bathroom amenities, Cable/Satellite TV, Color TV,Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Heating, Internet access, Iron/Ironing board, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Room service, Telephone.

hotel.name: Omni Scottsdale Resort and Spa at Montelucia
hotel.description: Embrace Mediterranean charm as you enter Omni Scottsdale Resort and Spa at Montelucia and be captivated on your private patio or balcony by scenes of our most famous landmark. Camelback Mountain is complemented by majestic resort pools and the intriguing desert landscape of Arizona. All rooms and suites at this Scottsdale resort are inspired by the Andalusia region of Spain and luxuriously appointed with old world touches. They are highlighted by rich hues and dark woods and custom Divine beds by Joya Spa.
hotel.airportsDesc: Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, (PHX), 9.00, MI, S;

Embrace Mediterranean charm as you enter Omni Scottsdale Resort and Spa at Montelucia and be captivated on your private patio or balcony by scenes of our most famous landmark. Camelback Mountain is complemented by majestic resort pools and the intriguing desert landscape of Arizona. All rooms and suites at this Scottsdale resort are inspired by the Andalusia region of Spain and luxuriously appointed with old world touches. They are highlighted by rich hues and dark woods and custom Divine beds by Joya Spa.

facility.title: Prado
facility.desc: Discover an intimate atmosphere located in the heart of the Omni Scottsdale Resort and Spa at Montelucia. Filled with international flavor as well as character and elegant ambiance inspired by Old World Europe Prado is comprised of simplicity and the freshest ingredients in Arizona.

facility.title: Mbar at Prado
facility.desc: Tease your taste buds with sumptuous dishes at Mbar lounge at Prado which features Mediterranean-inspired tapas and a comprehensive selection of 100 percent agave tequilas and many other delightfully fresh beverages.

facility.title: CENTRO
facility.desc: CENTRO is the center of campus gathering spot for our sophisticated and high-energy crowd. Guests will enjoy music and media as they lounge in the modern and posh space as they sip on classic and signature libations. Open daily from 1100-2000 hours.

facility.title: Joya Terrace
facility.desc: Joya Terrace is located on the roof-top of Joya Spa and offers guests stunning views of Camelback Mountain and a tempting menu of satisfying meals. The culinary team designed the menu to include dishes that not only please the palate but are beneficial for the body as well. Open daily from 0830-1900 hours.

facility.title: Crave Cafe
facility.desc: Serves delicious Lavazza coffee drinks and house-made gelato and pastries plus to-go food items and wines as well as gourmet foods and retail. Also features an outdoor patio with limited seating for those who would like to sit outside and take in the majestic surroundings. Open daily from 0600-1900 hours.

hotel.name: The Palms Hotel and Villas a 3 Palms Hotel
hotel.description: The Palms Hotel and Villas located 1.5 miles from the magic of the Walt Disney World Resort Area and minutes to everything Orlando-Kissimmee has to offer. The Palms Hotel and Villas features beautiful One Bedroom Suites are appointed with fully equipped kitchen, two burner stove, microwave oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, toaster, coffee/tea maker, plus cooking and eating utensils, making it easier to stretch your dining budget. The Palms Hotel and Villas is a 100% NON-SMOKING Hotel.We offer the ultimate in convenience, comfort of home, and value. Amenities include large swimming pools, whirlpool, kiddie pool, sports court, game room, guest laundry facilities, beautiful gazebo area, with picnic tables and gas grills. Enjoy our Deluxe Continental Breakfast and sit back and relax on our shuttle to the Walt Disney World Resort Area. The Palms Hotel and Villas will make your Orlando-Kissimmee visit a memorable one. Enjoy our hot breakfast buffet and hi speed wireless internet access is available in the lobby. Pets under 60 lbs are allowed surcharge). Must be 21 or older to check in.
hotel.airportsDesc: Orlando International Airport 30 mi NE; Tampa International Airport 70 mi W

facility.title: Hotel Villa
facility.desc: The best value for your family! These interior corridor non-smoking villas offer private bedroom and living areas. All villas have 585 sq feet of space with 2 double beds in the master bedroom, plus a queen size sofa sleeper in the living room. Amenities include full size kitchen with two burner stove, full size refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, coffeemaker, dishes, glassware, silverware, pot and pans, two Televisions with deluxe cable channels, Iron and Ironing Board, Hair dryer, and two in-room telephones. Our One Bedroom Villa can accommodate up to 6 people.

facility.desc: Located 1.5 miles from the Main Entrance of the Walt Disney World Resort Complex. The property is located just off Highway 192 which is the Irlo Bronson Memorial Highway just on Parkway Boulevard just behind Arabian Knights which is approximately one half of a mile from the Walt Disney World Resorts Area.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Valencia Inn
hotel.description:
Stay at this Valencia, California hotel -near Six Flags® Magic Mountain and Hurricane Harbor.
The BEST WESTERN Valencia Inn is located in beautiful Valencia, California, gateway to Southern California. Hotel guests looking to stay close to the excitement will be minutes from Six Flags® Magic Mountain and Six Flags® Hurricane Harbor Water Park. This hotel places travelers near Universal Studios® and Disneyland®. Travelers will enjoy the many local festivals including Cowboy Poetry and Music and Loose Goose Wine Festival. Outdoor enthusiasts will be only minutes from beaches, fishing and golfing.
As a valued guest, this hotel offers inviting guest rooms, each complete with cable satellite television with HBO® and free wireless Internet access. This resort style hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, and free parking with ample room for buses and trucks. Pets are welcome for a small fee.
For superior customer service and a convenient location, make a reservation at the BEST WESTERN Valencia Inn!

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN PLUS French Quarter Landmark Hotel
hotel.description:
Whether you're here for a cruise or a Courtyard wedding, our New Orleans hotel is in the perfect location for guests to get to know the real French Quarter.
New Orleans, Louisiana is a mecca of great food, culture, music and history. Our French Quarter location is the main reason many guests choose us, but we offer more than an unbeatable location. Our tropical courtyard features an outdoor swimming pool, the perfect place to cool down after a day of adventure or Mardi Gras festivities. A free hot breakfast is our staple, and it includes waffles, fresh fruits and pastries, choice cereals and yogurts, along with 100% Arabica coffee and juices.
Many guests are here for Mardi Gras or Saints Football games, but we cater to all guests at our New Orleans hotel. Enjoy the local festivals like Jazz Fest, the Essence Festival, the French Quarter Fest or Voo-Doo Fest. Bourbon Street is steps away, and favorites like Brennan's are right around the corner. Sample jambalaya, turtle soup, bananas foster and gumbo in the region where it was born.
Our fabulous staff is committed to making your stay at our New Orleans hotel special. We offer bus parking and are a favorite of Mahalia Jackson Theatre tour groups. Check out Mardi Gras World to see the floats and grab a piece of King Cake. Indulge in a hurricane or sip your favorite cocktail at the oldest pub in the world. Nearby swamp tours are a must.
At our New Orleans hotel, we also welcome medical employees and non-profit groups. If you're lucky enough to be here on business, make sure you try the local po' boy sandwiches and try your luck at the casinos. There's always something happening in NOLA, and we're proud to host you during your stay.
Reserve your comfortable room at BEST WESTERN PLUS French Quarter Landmark Hotel today!

hotel.name: Gershwin Hotel New York
hotel.description: The Gershwin is located in midtown Manhattan in the Flatiron District and is one block from the shopping on world famous Fifth Avenue. The Gershwin features art pieces from Andy Warhol and Stefan Lindfors. The Gershwin is within a 5 minutes of Madison Square Park. The Empire State Building is within a 10 minutes of the hotel. 24-hour guest reception, Birch Coffee, Wireless Internet Access, Cable Television, Telephone with Voicemail, 24-hour Valet Parking, Room Service, Multi-lingual Staff, Great Neighborhood, Concierge, Airport Shuttle, Laundry Service, In-room Safes. Art hike trail - free. THIS IS A NON-SMOKING HOTEL.
hotel.airportsDesc: Newark Liberty International Airport - 9 miles from New York. John F. Kennedy International Airport - 13 miles from New York.

facility.title: Property
facility.desc: The Gershwin is located in midtown Manhattan in the Flatiron District and is one block from the shopping on world famous Fifth Avenue. The Gershwin features art pieces from Andy Warhol and Stefan Lindfors. The Gershwin is within a 5 minutes of Madison Square Park. The Empire State Building is within a 10 minutes of the hotel. 24-hour guest reception, Birch Coffee, Wireless Internet Access, Cable Television, Telephone with Voicemail, 24-hour Valet Parking, Room Service, Multi-lingual Staff, Great Neighborhood, Concierge, Airport Shuttle, Laundry Service, In-room Safes. Art hike trail - free. THIS IS A NON-SMOKING HOTEL.

facility.desc: New York City.

facility.title: Superior Queen
facility.desc: The Superior Queen Guestrooms at The Gershwin New York are non-smoking; feature unique design elements reminiscent of pre-war New York decor, focusing on natural simplicity and comfort. Queen bed dressed with Frette linens and wood floors. Stay connected during your stay with our complementary wireless internet service. Bath products made by legendary New York apothecary C.O. Bigelow. Flat screen TV's, in-room safes, hairdryers, iron and ironing boards. Room accommodates maximum up to 2 people.

hotel.name: Byblos Niagara Resort and Spa
hotel.description: Get away to the areas only island resort. Equal distance from Niagara Falls and Buffalo, the Byblos Niagara Resort and Spa (formerly the Holiday Inn) Grand Island is ideal for business and leisure travel alike. Located on the Upper Niagara River, were just minutes from Niagara Falls famous sights and attractions. Try your Lady Luck at the nearby Seneca Niagara Casino. As home port of the Grand Lady dinner cruises, take a sunset cruise of the Niagara River.

Whether traveling for leisure or pleasure guests staying at our Highland Beach hotel will appreciate the convenient access to nearby attractions shopping destinations and restaurants. Just four miles north of Boca Raton FL our Highland Beach hotel features Beachfront access 24-hour fitness center On-site meeting facilities High-speed wireless Internet access Outdoor pool Business center On-site Latitudes Ocean Grille. With an exceptional location thoughtful on-site amenities and comfortable hotel rooms the Delray Sands Beach Resort is the perfect place to stay when visiting nearby Boca Raton or Delray Beach.

hotel.name: La Quinta Inn Corpus Christi South
hotel.description:
NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
Located just minutes from the beaches on the beautiful Texas coast, the newly renovated La Quinta Inn Corpus Christi South is only blocks from downtown and the Corpus Christi Bay. With your spacious room as home base, visit the Texas State Aquarium, USS Lexington, Padre Island, and Mustang Island State Park. Enjoy several local restaurants and the shopping venues at Staples Center and Sunrise Malls.
The friendly staff at the La Quinta Inn Corpus Christi South invites you to our wide-open lobby every morning for a tasty Free Bright Side Breakfast. Afterward, relax on the sundeck around our sparkling outdoor pool and enjoy the day. Rooms come with many useful amenities including free high-speed Internet access, a coffee maker, hair dryer, and more. Take I-37 to Padre Island Drive (Route 358). Convenient for visitors to area Colleges and Universities, and the Corpus Christi Naval Air Station.
hotel.airportsDesc: Corpus Christi Intl Airport, (CRP), 10.00, MI, E;

hotel.name: Sheraton Suites Orlando Airport
hotel.description:
Stay in the middle of the magic at the Sheraton Suites Orlando Airport. We are just a mile by complimentary shuttle from Orlando International Airport, available 24 hours a day. We are the ideal Orlando Airport hotel and we are proud to be a 100% smoke-free hotel.

Our all-suite hotel will greet you with comfort and warmth as you settle in and start to explore nearby Orlando including SeaWorld, Universal Studios, and Walt Disney World. A warm, cozy atmosphere fills each spacious suite. Spend a quiet evening surfing the net using the High Speed Internet Access or relaxing beneath the crisp sheets and soft blankets of your Sheraton Sweet Sleeper(SM) Bed.

Let us help you plan a successful meeting in our eight charming meeting rooms, which can be tailored for your event. After a long day of meetings, travel, and adventure, connect with colleagues or family over delicious dishes at the Mahogany Grille and Lounge.

Enjoy personalized service and the comforts of home at Sheraton Suites Orlando Airport. You dont just stay, here you belong.
hotel.airportsDesc: Orlando International Airport, (MCO), 1.00, MI;

hotel.name: The Westin Atlanta Perimeter North
hotel.description:
The Westin Atlanta Perimeter North is less than 30 minutes from downtown Atlanta and its major attractions, including the world's largest aquarium, the new Georgia Aquarium, as well as Atlanta's new retail and entertainment district, Atlantic Station. Situated on a private lake, guests will be sure to enjoy this tranquil retreat from the city.

Refresh in our outdoor pool, or reinvigorate at the adjacent Concourse Athletic Club, the fourth largest health facility in the nation. Host an event in our flexible 20,000 square feet of newly renovated, flexible meeting and banquet facilities featuring an amphitheater style learning center and boardroom.

Enjoy a beautiful lake view from one of our 371 spacious guest rooms and suites. Each room is renovated and features our signature Heavenly Bed, for a wonderful night's sleep, as well as the Heavenly Bath, for ultimate relaxation.
hotel.airportsDesc: Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, (ATL), 30.00, MI; DeKalb-Peachtree Airport, (PDK), 7.00, MI;

hotel.name: Park Hyatt New York
hotel.description:
Luxury is personal at Park Hyatt New York. Designed by world-renowned, Pritzker Prize-winning architect Christian de Portzamparc, as well as interior design firm Yabu Pushelberg, guests enter an uncommon space where sophisticated and enriching experiences are in store. Situated in the heart of midtown, Park Hyatt New York, will be located at 153 West 57th street between Avenue of the Americas and Seventh Avenue, across from Carnegie Hall and one block from Central Park.
The hotel will feature 210 generously sized guest rooms including 92 suites. Its guest rooms are among the largest in the city, starting from 475 square feet or 44 square meters. The hotel will be part of a 90-story mixed-use tower that will also feature 94 Thomas Juul-Hansen-designed luxury condominiums.
The world-class hotel will reflect Park Hyatts intimate and modern elegance, providing an ideal place to stay for discerning business and leisure travelers. Guests will choose Park Hyatt for the most personal of reasons: the service at Park Hyatt New York will make every individual feel welcome, like a sanctuary from the outside world. Normally cumbersome registration and arrival transactions will turn into pleasurable acquaintances that inform the entire quality of a visit.
Entering the rooms or public spaces, a visitor recognizes the artistic codes of mid-century-modern New York, but updated in a timeless welcome. Says Glenn Pushelberg, "the room design is modern in its architectural bones, but with a slight nod to the past. The mix of furniture and furnishings suggests an eclectic and residential mood which transcends strict modernity."
Beyond featuring museum-quality artwork, timeless designs and refined furnishings, a spectacular culinary experience and the most luxurious spa treatments will impress even the most savvy New Yorker. The hotel will feature a world-class restaurant befitting the New York culinary scene, lobby tea lounge, a destination bar featuring a mixologists inn
hotel.airportsDesc: John F. Kennedy Intl Airport, (JFK), 18.00, MI, SE; La Guardia Airport, (LGA), 10.00, MI, E; Newark Intl Airport, (EWR), 17.00, MI, SW;

hotel.name: Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel
hotel.description: Located directly across from the Washington Convention Center, Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel is ideal for experiencing the history and culture of the nation's capital. Our downtown Washington, DC hotel is conveniently situated in the Penn Quarter district, near DC City Center, Capitol Hill and the White House. Guests are close to shopping, the Verizon Center, the Spy Museum, Chinatown, National Portrait Gallery and world-famous National Mall monuments. Discover profound comfort in our luxury hotel in downtown Washington, DC - from plush, well-dressed beds and spacious desks to high-speed Internet. Look to our hotel to customize your next meeting - with 64,000 square feet of flexible meeting and event space, 36 meeting rooms, and premier planning services. Our newly renovated hotel offers five dining options, including a Starbucks Café, an onsite spa and Vida fitness center. Uncover the best of DC with Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel, with the perfect balance of style and substance.

hotel.name: Hotel Verite
hotel.description: Conveniently located just a few blocks from historic Union Square Hotel Verite is within walking distance to a wide variety of restaurants trendy shops and sophisticated bars. Our hotel boasts the best location for business entertainment and nightlife. The hotel is accessible to art galleries theaters museums and many historic landmarks. Nearby neighborhoods include Union Square East Village Little Italy and Soho. This Sophisticated boutique hotel opened in Spring 2011 and is designed with a modern style that will make any guest feel comfortable and at home. The rooms located on 4 floors will pamper guests with quality amenities luxury custom lines down bedding custom designed showers. Each room is equipped with individual climate control custom toiletries a 40 inch HDTV with free HBO complimentary wireless HighSpeed internet hair dryer and an iPod deck sound system. The relaxing lobby provides a comfortable meeting place and contains a restaurant and barlounge.

hotel.name: The Driskill
hotel.description: The Driskill remains a landmark of legendary Texas hospitality. Located on Sixth Street in the heart of downtown Austin, the luxurious, historic hotel is convenient to all that the city has to offer, including the Texas State Capitol, convention center, opera, symphony, fine dining, shopping, and Austin's 6th Street music scene. Known as the "Live Music Capital of the World,®" Austin is home to nearly 200 music venues, many within walking distance of The Driskill. Restored to its original opulence, The Driskill sets the standard for elegance in Austin, Texas. From the magnificent columned lobby with its marble floors and stained-glass dome to the classic décor of the 189 guestrooms and suites, The Driskill ensures that every stay is a memorable one. As a member of The Historic Hotels of America, The Driskill is among the world's finest hotels, offering an unforgettable level of luxury and service.

hotel.name: The Pelham Hotel
hotel.description:
The Pelham is a unique -stylish boutique hotel in the very heart of South Kensington
Each and every room has been individually designed by Kit Kemp -blending the enchantment of English style with modern colours and flair - The Pelham has been described as one of Londons finest townhouse hotels
The wood panelled drawing room and library -together with the 51 individually designed rooms make a truly stylish base to explore what has been described as the 21st arrondissement of Paris - South Kensington is awash with boutiques -bars and bistros not to mention our own Bistro Fifteen and BAR 15
Minutes from the Victoria and Albert and Natural History Museums -Harrods -Hyde Park and The Royal Albert Hall - The Pelham really is the perfect foundation for your sophisticated stay in London

hotel.name: Revere Hotel Boston Common
hotel.description: The Revere Hotel Boston Common is an independent luxury boutique hotel located in the heart of Downtown Boston. The property offers a heated pool along with a sundeck looking over the city. They also offer on-site parking in public parking garage. Each room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, a 37-inch flat screen HDTV and balconies with uninterrupted views of Boston. Guests are encouraged to visit business center and fitness center throughout their stay.
hotel.airportsDesc: Boston Logan International Airport.
hotel.areaServed: Boston, Charlestown, Brookline, Back Bay, Boston Common

facility.title: Emerald Lounge
facility.desc: Whimsical by day and energized by night, dynamic ultra lounge is a sophisticated place to spend an evening. An allusion to Boston's sprawling Emerald Necklace, our lounge features 6,000 square feet of space capable of transforming from a casual cocktail scene to a private event venue. Looking for something a bit more unexpected? Explore every corner of Emerald Lounge to find an exotic hideaway.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: When planning meetings in Downtown Boston, look no further than Revere Hotel. Offering a combined total of 35,000 square feet of versatile event space, we can set the stage for any type of event. From board meetings in the Carver Ballroom to client presentations in Theatre 1 to brainstorming sessions at Gallery, we have a unique meeting venue in Downtown Boston to match any type of occasion. Take advantage of an array of meeting services as well as attentive business amenities for guests.

facility.title: Superior Guest Room-2 Queens
facility.desc: 353 sqft 2 queen beds balconies w-impressive city views complimentary wireless internet. The guestrooms at Revere hotel offer spacious, comfortable and livable glamour. These stylish guestrooms offer 2 Queen Beds, an over-sized workspace with easy-to-access outlets, complimentary internet access, a 42" LG HDTV and JBL iPad Speaker System. The Skyline views are breathtaking as you step out onto your balcony (featured in all guestrooms). Your every comfort has been taken into consideration as guestrooms also offer our guests 2 sets of Frette robes and slippers, coffee and tea, complimentary USA Today delivered to your room.

facility.title: Premiere Guest Room-King
facility.desc: 353 sqft Top three floors w-uncompromising views and patio deck. The eclectic decor is memorable and caters to everyone's needs and with 353 Square Feet of stylish space, your experience promises to be beyond all expectations. Step onto your balcony with a patio deck,and have a unforgettable night's sleep in one of our luxurious king beds, enjoy the use of the included wet bar. Relax at the over-sized desk with easy-to-access outlets and utilize the complimentary wireless internet. Before your day starts enjoy your complimentary copy of USA Today. After a long day relax and unwind in one of the two sets of Frette robes and slippers provided, while watching your favorite program on the 42" LG HDTV or listen to your favorite music using the JBL iPad Speaker System.

facility.title: Rustic Kitchen Bistro & Bar
facility.desc:
With Executive Chef Michael Kelley at the helm, dining at Rustic Kitchen is nothing less than inspired. Home to "The Cooking Show", Rustic Kitchen has hosted over 500 performances to date in its one-of-a-kind television broadcast kitchen studio, taped every Friday evening.
Featuring Italian-Mediterranean cuisine in a bistro-style setting, Rustic Kitchen sets the bar for engaging dining. Focusing on local ingredients, the menu features favorites such as Cider-Glazed Salmon, Filet Mignon and hand-crafted pasta made fresh daily, as well as gourmet pizza selections cooked in a wood-burning pizza oven, all complemented by an inimitable wine list. If you are in the mood for something a bit more casual, stop by The Atrium for a glass of wine with a view.
Rustic Kitchen also offers private dining options for up to 40 guests

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc:
Located in the heart of Bostons Theatre District, less than fifteen minutes away from most landmarks in the city.
The property is situated walking distance to Bostons MBTA Green Line stations as well as major Amtrak stations. Parking Costs: $40/day self park and $46/night for valet with in and out privileges.

facility.title: Superior Guest Room-King
facility.desc: 353 sqft King bed 42 LG HDTV Balconies with impressive city views The guestrooms at Revere hotel offer spacious, comfortable and livable glamour.These stylish guestrooms offer 1 king bed, an over-sized workspace with easy-to-access outlets, complimentary internet access, a 42" LG HDTV and JBL iPad Speaker System. The skyline views are breathtaking as you step out onto your balcony (featured in all guestrooms). Your every comfort has been taken into consideration as guestrooms also offer our guests 2 sets of Frette robes and slippers, coffee and tea, complimentary USA Today delivered to your room. For your convenience this room also has a refrigerator.

facility.title: Deluxe Guest Room-King
facility.desc: Epitomes of livable glamour, our guestrooms are the perfect hub for any Boston experience. Echoing the stunning skyline views out the window, the details in each room are thoughtful and carefully curated. From hardwood entryways to easy-to-reach outlets, the elements of our guestrooms seamlessly blend form and function. Harnessing the true spirit of the city, our Downtown Boston hotel rooms are ideal for anyone with a passion for experiencing the good things in life.

facility.title: Deluxe Guest Room-2 Queens
facility.desc: Epitomes of livable glamour, our guestrooms are the perfect hub for any Boston experience. Echoing the stunning skyline views out the window, the details in each room are thoughtful and carefully curated. From hardwood entryways to easy-to-reach outlets, the elements of our guestrooms seamlessly blend form and function. Harnessing the true spirit of the city, our Downtown Boston hotel rooms are ideal for anyone with a passion for experiencing the good things in life.

facility.title: Deluxe Guest Room-Jr. Suite
facility.desc: Our signature hotel suites in Downtown Boston immerse you in an experience that is equal parts dynamic and refined. Eclectic yet polished, each of our luxury suites in Boston has its own distinct personality. Toss your keys on the table as you walk in the door and settle into the couch to peruse the selection on your Kindle. Whether you are returning from a stimulating brainstorming session or a night out on the town, our suites are always ready to welcome you home

facility.title: Rooftop at Revere
facility.desc: This brand new rooftop bar in Boston, situated seven stories above street level, serves refreshing cocktails and seasonal snacks on 16,000 square feet of al fresco space.

hotel.name: La Quinta Inn & Suites San Antonio Airport
hotel.description:
The La Quinta Inn & Suites San Antonio Airport was recently named a 2013 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence award winner!
NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
The La Quinta Inn & Suites San Antonio Airport is less than a mile south of San Antonio International. With easy freeway access, you are only minutes from all downtown attractions, including The Alamo, Riverwalk, Six Flags Fiesta Texas, Sea World, SBC Center, the Alamo Dome, Brackenridge Park, Alamo Heights TX, and the San Antonio Zoo. It's a mile to North Star Mall, and the Quarry Golf Course.
The beautiful La Quinta Inn & Suites San Antonio Airport has lots to offer. All spacious standard rooms come with free wireless high-speed Internet access, a microwave, and refrigerator. King and Suite guest rooms also have a cordless phone with two lines, and a high back chair for the large work desk.
We have 2,500 square feet of versatile meeting space that can accommodate 100 people. Enjoy our well-equipped fitness center, relaxing outdoor swimming pool, and sundeck with a separate courtyard where you can relax among the vibrant landscaping. Our Free Bright Side Breakfast® is served each morning in the lobby.
Located in North Central San Antonio on the southwest corner of I-410 and US 281, we have a free shuttle to the airport, malls, restaurants and other venues within two miles of the hotel.
We are also convenient for visitors of Clear Channel, HEB, and Valero Corporate Headquarters.
hotel.airportsDesc: San Antonio Intl Airport, (SAT), 1.00, MI, SE;

hotel.name: Marco Island Marriott Beach Resort, Golf Club & Spa
hotel.description: Explore a world of utter paradise at Marco Island Marriott Beach Resort, Golf Club & Spa. Our world-class resort on Florida's Gulf Coast offers an exhilarating retreat from the ordinary and an unforgettable experience. We feature a lavish spa with Balinese-influenced treatments, two private 18-hole championship golf courses and spacious accommodations with premier amenities, technology upgrades and breathtaking views of Marco Island. Plus, you can always depend on caring service from our staff. Our Florida resort's amenities also offer an idyllic getaway just miles from Naples and Fort Myers. Nearby, you can enjoy water sports, parasailing, shelling cruises and sightseeing adventures along our gorgeous beaches. Afterward, return to our resort for a soothing massage, tropical cocktails or delectable dishes at one of our eight terrific restaurants. Relax your cares away at the Marco Island Marriott Beach Resort, Golf Club & Spa. We look forward to your next visit to our Gulf Coast resort hotel on Marco Island.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Hospitality House
hotel.description:
A spacious New York City hotel with all the comforts of home and a location in the heart of the city that never sleeps, is a dream come true.
Expansive apartment-style suites feature fully outfitted kitchens with a stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher and kitchenware for up to six people. The BEST WESTERN PLUS Hospitality house dishes up complimentary breakfast daily. Enjoy piping hot eggs and waffles, cereals and yogurts, fruits, pastries, juices and 100% Arabica coffee.
Your BEST WESTERN Hospitality House has you covered. No other New York City hotel can compete with these oversized rooms and great location. We're located within walking distance of Times Square, Grand Central Station and numerous transportation hubs. Free Wi-Fi/High-speed Internet access and a fitness center keep you connected and up with your fitness routine.
The unique apartment suites at Hospitality House are just the beginning. Enjoy easy access to the Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center®, United Nations and Chrysler Building. Business travelers enjoy a homey environment complete with friendly staff. This New York City hotel regularly hosts employees of embassies, consulates, and numerous Fortune 500 companies' headquarters.
This property is designed to be a home away from home. Oak floors and 11-foot ceilings are a warm welcome. Choose from one bedroom apartments or suites that offer four bedrooms for your stay. Only Simmons® Beautyrest® Pillowtop mattresses are offered to guests of this New York City hotel.
Free newspapers, magazines, and tea or coffee throughout the day are a few perks. Dozens of free classes like yoga, kettlebell, and pilates are on deck. A basketball court, a sauna steam room, and two inviting swimming pools are right downstairs. Bath & Body Works® treats await you in your bathroom.
Book your room at BEST WESTERN PLUS Hospitality House today!
A 5-Story building adjacent to the hotel will begin demolition on or around June 1st for approximately 10

Expansive apartment-style suites feature fully outfitted kitchens with a stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher and kitchenware for up to six people. The BEST WESTERN PLUS Hospitality house dishes up complimentary breakfast daily. Enjoy piping hot eggs and waffles, cereals and yogurts, fruits, pastries, juices and 100% Arabica coffee.
Your BEST WESTERN Hospitality House has you covered. No other New York City hotel can compete with these oversized rooms and great location. We're located within walking distance of Times Square, Grand Central Station and numerous transportation hubs. Free Wi-Fi/High-speed Internet access and a fitness center keep you connected and up with your fitness routine.
The unique apartment suites at Hospitality House are just the beginning. Enjoy easy access to the Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center®, United Nations and Chrysler Building. Business travelers enjoy a homey environment complete with friendly staff. This New York City hotel regularly hosts employees of embassies, consulates, and numerous Fortune 500 companies' headquarters.
This property is designed to be a home away from home. Oak floors and 11-foot ceilings are a warm welcome. Choose from one bedroom apartments or suites that offer four bedrooms for your stay. Only Simmons® Beautyrest® Pillowtop mattresses are offered to guests of this New York City hotel.
Free newspapers, magazines, and tea or coffee throughout the day are a few perks. Dozens of free classes like yoga, kettlebell, and pilates are on deck. A basketball court, a sauna steam room, and two inviting swimming pools are right downstairs. Bath & Body Works® treats await you in your bathroom.
Book your room at BEST WESTERN PLUS Hospitality House today!
A 5-Story building adjacent to the hotel will begin demolition on or around June 1st for approximately 10

hotel.name: Tropicana Las Vegas - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
hotel.description: Experience the excitement of Las Vegas at the casually elegant new Tropicana Las Vegas – a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel. With acclaimed restaurants, premier entertainment options and unsurpassed service, this unique resort on the Las Vegas Strip has a distinctive South Beach rhythm and vibe. Be warmly welcomed at this Las Vegas hotel with a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie before settling into a stylish, residential-style guest room that evokes the atmosphere of a breezy beach getaway. Decorated in a sunset palette of warm shades, each room of our Las Vegas hotel features custom designed furnishings, a 42-inch LCD TV and Serta Perfect Sleeper beds with 300-thread-count linens. Choose the Paradise Tower to be seconds from the casino floor or the Club Tower for a guest room near the conference center. From glamorous weddings to business meetings of all sizes, the flexible 60,000 sq. ft. conference center is the perfect venue for any event.Try your luck in our 50,000 sq. ft. casino and choose from table games and slots, or raise the stakes in our high limit area. Enjoy world-class entertainment at Laugh Factory comedy club and the Mob Attraction, or a signature treatment at Glow®, a Mandara Spa, which also features a modern fitness center overlooking our award-winning pool and garde

hotel.name: Howard Johnson Inn Clifton NJ
hotel.description: Find many fun-filled family adventures near this Howard Johnson Inn Clifton NJ conveniently located near the New Jersey Turnpike and Garden State Parkway. Cheer for the New York Giants at Giants Stadium, or see concerts at the MetLife Stadium less than 15 minutes away. Take a trip to New York City less than a half hour away to see the Empire State Building or the Radio City Music Hall. Find a meal for the whole family at Tick Tock Diner less than two miles away. The friendly 24-hour front desk staff is available to help plan your day, and you can research attractions on the complimentary wireless Internet access. Energize in the fitness center, and enjoy complimentary car and large-vehicle parking. Stay productive in the meeting rooms and business center. Comfortable guest rooms include microwave, refrigerator, coffee-maker and hairdryer. Smoke-free and handicapped-accessible rooms are also available. There is no charge for children 17 and under with an adult.

hotel.name: The Normandy Hotel
hotel.description:
Like the embassies in the elegant streets and avenues around it, The Normandy Hotel (formerly Jurys Normandy Inn) offers guests a corner of the city they can call their own. Welcoming and intimate, The Normandy Hotel is a haven of comfort and convenience for both business and leisure travellers.
The major business districts are located nearby and the city's A-list attractions, such as the White House, the Vietnam Memorial, the Pentagon and Georgetown, are just minutes away by taxi or the Metro.

The hotel's 75 rooms include cable TV, voice mail, work desks and lamps, coffee-makers, hairdryers and complimentary high-speed Internet access.

hotel.name: Dolphin Beach Resort
hotel.description:
The Dolphin Beach Resort is located directly on the St Pete Beach and the Gulf of Mexico. Hotel offers 173 spacious rooms with microwave oven, fridge and coffeemaker. Swimming Pool, Parasailing, watersports and volleyball are all availbale on site. The hotel offers numerous dining options including Boca Sands Grille, Flipper's Beach Bar and Lobby Lounge. Fishing Charters and Golf are located nearby and the Doplhin Beach Resort is also on the trolley route that travels the length of the beach and also the downtown area.
Conference and reception facilities of approximately 10,000 square ft. are available and complete catering services provided by professional staff.
Additional amemities include: Free Parking, Coin Laundry and room service on site. Complimentary Wireless access is available in the Lobby.

Please note that parking is complimentary, however only 1 parking permit per room will be issued
Please note guests will not have access to the hotel pool on Monday July 26, 2010 We apologize for any inconvenience and short notice. We needed to take advantage of the availability of the pool company and their schedule. The pool re-open for guest use on Tuesday the 27, 2010
hotel.airportsDesc: Tampa International Airport is 38 miles from hotel. St. Pete Clearwater Airport is 20 miles away. Super Shuttle provides transportation at modest fees.

hotel.name: TWELVE Atlantic Station
hotel.description:
This is the one - Midtown Atlanta's boutique hotel gem. Situated in Atlantic Station, Atlanta's premier live, work, play community, and minutes from everything the city has to offer. Their expansive designer suites provide the amenities of home, while their discreet, professional staff is effortlessly accessible, but never overbearing.
Effective January 31, 2014 valet parking fee's will increase to $28.00 per vehicle per day.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Host your next important event within their exceptional Atlanta meeting space and count on their expert concierges, event planners and caterers to provide a refreshing escape from the conventional. 6,200 square foot Ballroom at TWELVE Atlantic Station 2,500 square feet of pre-function space, including two lush, outdoor terraces Professional event planning and creative catering services. State-of-the-art technology and lighting, Private catering kitchen. Delicious dining at LOBBY at TWELVE restaurant

facility.title: Standard Suite
facility.desc: Each suite at TWELVE offers the casual comforts of home: a full-size kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, separate dining and living room areas, and expansive one bedroom options. Standard Suite offers one king bed or 2 Queen beds.

facility.title: Deluxe Suite
facility.desc: Each Suite offers a full-size kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, separate dining and living room areas, and expansive one or two bedroom options. Convertible sofas are available in select suites. Whether you are visiting for a short business trip, extended stay or traveling with family for a special occasion, they offer a suite to meet your needs. Their Deluxe One Bedroom Suites are located on higher floors and offer a private balcony. Deluxe Suite offers one king bed or 2 Queen beds.

facility.title: Lobby
facility.desc: Recognized among the best Atlanta restaurants by Atlanta Magazine and Access Atlanta. Sample a tantalizing menu of American brasserie fare with a contemporary twist. Dine on the freshest seafood, steaks and chops, and game selections.The desserts at this charming bistro have been named among the city's "Top 50 Best Desserts" by The Atlanta Journal-Constitution. Serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner, with brunch on Saturday and Sunday. Winner of "Best Hotel Dining" by Atlanta Magazine. Named one of the "Top 50 Restaurants in Atlanta " by The Atlanta Journal Constitution. Awarded Three Stars by Creative Loafing Media & Arts Guide.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: TWELVE Atlantic Station is one of the best locations in all of Atlanta. Consult their professional 24-hour concierge for tickets and access to events and sites in the area for things to do in Atlanta. Business travelers enjoy effortless access to prestigious corporations and government offices, including Coca Cola, BB&T, and Nelson, Mullins, Riley, & Scarborough, LLP. Whether traveling for work or play, TWELVE offers a truly exclusive address among Atlanta Georgia hotels. It is Atlanta's premier live, work, play community, and minutes from everything the city has to offers.

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village
hotel.description: Perfect for business and leisure travelers, the Courtyard Lake Buena Vista, Florida hotel features desirable amenities and an exceptional location. Just 1 mile from Walt Disney World Resort, this hotel in Lake Buena Vista offers shuttle service to all Disney theme parks. Guests will enjoy access to the newly renovated lobby, with an open layout, GoBoard, free Wi-Fi, The Market and The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect. Guests can quickly check flight information, Lake Buena Vista and Disney events, weather reports and more via the GoBoard. For quick snacks, The Market has grab-and-go food items available 24/7. Lake Buena Vista hotel guests looking for a full meal will enjoy dining at The Bistro, serving an American style menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner, Starbucks coffee and cocktail service in the evening. Unwind poolside with our walk up bar and enjoy your getaway at the Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village, where you can relax while we take care of the rest.

hotel.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Clearwater Downtown
hotel.description: Residence Inn by Marriott Clearwater Downtown is Clearwater's brand new gem. It is the all-suites hotel that helps you feel connected while away from home and maintain a balance of work and life. We are perfectly positioned for you to easily access all that the Bay area has to offer. Minutes from Tampa International Airport, St. Pete/Clearwater Airport, Downtown Tampa, Centro Ybor, Channelside, Westshore Business District, International Mall, Ruth Eckerd Hall, and St. Pete Times forum. For the sports enthusiast visit Raymond James Stadium, Tropicana Field, Brighthouse Stadium and Yankees Stadium. You and your family can take advantage of numerous area attractions such as Busch Gardens, Adventure Island, Dali Museum, Florida Aquarium, Lowery Park Zoo, and our beautiful Florida beaches. We are in the middle of all of the action. We are also minutes from several local businesses.

Stay connected at your home away from home in Clearwater, FL. The Residence Inn by Marriott Clearwater Downtown is Clearwater's premier extended stay hotel. Our spacious suites feature a full kitchen, as well as a separate living area. Start your day with a delicious complimentary breakfast, and enjoy free wireless Internet throughout the hotel. We are perfectly positioned for you to easily access all that Clearwater, FL and the Tampa Bay area has to offer - we're close to Tampa International Airport, St. Pete/Clearwater Airport, Downtown Tampa, Centro Ybor and and St. Pete Times forum. Visit nearby Raymond James Stadium, Tropicana Field and Brighthouse Stadium, as well as family-friendly attractions like Busch Gardens, Adventure Island, Florida Aquarium, Lowry Park Zoo, and our beautiful Florida beaches. Our hotel near the beach in Clearwater is also near several local businesses. Book your stay today, and discover the difference at the Residence Inn by Marriott Clearwater Downtown hotel.

hotel.name: Embassy Suites Dallas - Love Field
hotel.description: Relax with more space and amenities at the Embassy Suites Dallas Love-Field hotel. Located just two miles from Dallas Love Field Airport (DAL), this all-suite hotel offers complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport and to Northpark shopping mall. Situated north of the city, the hotel is seven miles from the attractions of downtown Dallas.Enjoy the setting of this Dallas hotel, with an array of indoor and outdoor activities and services. Sip a cold drink in our quiet patio or take a run around the 4.5-mile greenbelt jogging trail leading to Bachman Creek Park. Work out in the fitness center or swim in the indoor pool. Catch the game at Belmont's Lounge, or enjoy all-American food at Café on Bachman Creek overlooking the atrium.Start your day with a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and in the evenings join us for a drink at the Complimentary Evening Reception*. To support Dallas business travelers, we have a fully equipped BusinessLink™ Business Center and event space for 9-225 guests.Eight floors of guest rooms and one- and two-bedroom suites surround the atrium with more space for work, rest and play. Amenities have been carefully thought through with your flexibility in mind. We provide microwaves, mini-refrigerators, workspace, high-speed internet access, and comfortable beds and seating areas for you to create your own experiences in our Dallas Love Field hotel.*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking a

hotel.name: Polynesian Isles Resort
hotel.description:
Polynesian Isles offers luxurious condominiums surrounded by an exotic tropical setting including a beautiful waterfall and lush vegetation. The resort has two swimming pools, four outdoor spas, tennis courts, a basketball court, shuffle board courts, a fitness center, barbeque grills, children's playground, a game room, business center and putting green.
The resort is located minutes from the many theme parks, including Walt Disney's Magic Kingdom, MGM Studios, EPCOT and Animal Kingdom, as well as Universal Studios and Sea World. There are dinner shows, water parks, and nightly entertainment at Pleasure Island and City Walk. Other activities in the area to keep you busy are boating, fishing, golfing, sailing, water skiing, and shopping for all budgets.
Accommodations offer separate sleeping, dining and living areas, plus the convenience of a fully equipped kitchen. In addition, the condo includes a private patio or balcony, ceiling fans, cable television with VCR, hairdryer and a washer and dryer. ALL of our resorts will require a Major credit card ONLY deposit for all guests. No cash or debit cards allowed. The deposit will be $250 US and shall be returned when the rooms have been inspected and no damage has been done or items are not missing. If there is damage or items missing the guest will be charged. Check-in time is 4pm and Check-out time is 10am.
Please note that this property does not have daily maid service. There are no elevators on property.
Guest must be 21 years of age to check in to the resort. Room assignment is not guarenteed.
No pets allowed

hotel.name: Windmill All Suites in Surprise
hotel.description: This Southwest style all-suite- all non-smoking- hotel offers spacious accommodations- blending luxury with genuine affordability and valuable amenities. Join us for our free generous continental breakfast or choose to have our Windmill Inn Good Morning featuring fresh Belgian waffles- bagels and cream cheese- Danishes- fruit- cereal and an assortment of beverages. Windmill Inn offers free wireless high speed Internet access in all rooms. Pets are welcome at no additional charge. Children under 18 stay free with adult. All guestrooms include microwaves and refrigerators and standard guestroom amenities- including iron and board- hair dryer- modem- free local calls and cable TV with free premium movie channel. Voted the Sun Cities Favorite Hotel by the local community- the hotel is prized for its lush courtyard landscape complete with heated outdoor pool and whirlpool. Each true two-room suite includes a kitchen equipped with wet bar- microwave and refrigerator. The bedroom is separated from the living room with French doors and the living room includes a desk/work area and pull-out sleeper sofa. Guests will enjoy the spectacular mountain views of Arizonas beautiful White Tank and Bradshaw Mountain ranges while taking time for a ride on one of our complimentary bicycles or relaxing with a book from our Best Seller lending library. Our staff is committed to our 110pct Hospitality Guarantee. We invite you to stay where the focus is, YOU! Please note that the property requires advanced notification if you are bringing a pet to the hotel.
hotel.airportsDesc: Serviced by Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) 33 miles.
hotel.areaServed: Located in Surprise (Sun City West) we serve the Northwest Valley and the Phoenix area.

hotel.name: SunDestin Beach by Wyndham Vacation Rentals
hotel.description:
The SunDestin Resort is on the beach in the heart of the vibrant Destin resort complex within easy walking distance of restaurants, shops, the Big Kahuna Waterpark, golfing, and more. The resort is approximately seven miles from Okaloosa County airport. Hotel amenities include the two pools, one is indoor and heated seasonally, hot tub, fitness room, massage therapist, bar and grill, lounge, shuffleboard, barbecue grills, activities for children, convenience store, video game room, and 24-hour front desk service. All units have full kitchens, cable TV, VCRs, free video rentals, and walkout balconies or patios. Beach service is available upon request with a fee- includes 2 beach chairs and umbrella setup. Complimentary Wi-Fi Internet is available in unit. Check-in service is located on site, and the front desk is open 24 hours.
Please note that a USD 134.03 cleaning fee will be collected at booking.
Persons booking unit must be over 25 and occupy unit for entire rental period. No singles under 25 w/o guardian. The front desk is open 24 hours a day. Housekeeping is available between 10am-4pm.
All no-shows are non-refundable and subject to 100 percent cancellation fee and there will be no refunds for early departures or late arrivals. Cancellations made on the day of arrival will be considered no-shows and incur a 100 percent cancellation fee. Cancellations made prior to the day of arrival are subject to a penalty of the first night room plus applicable taxes and fees.

hotel.name: Hotel Capitol Park Atlanta
hotel.description: Discover all that beautiful Downtown Atlanta has to offer at the convenient and comfortable Holiday Inn Atlanta Capitol Conference Center. With our location only 10 minutes from the Hartsfield Jackson International Airport (ATL), you will spend more time doing what you came to Atlanta to do and less time in traffic. We are a beautiful and elite AAA Diamond hotel located at the crossroads of all major interstates (I-20 and I-75/85). You are only minutes away from everything, including shopping, dining, entertainment, and the arts. We offer a complimentary shuttle to Centennial Olympic Park, Georgia Pacific, Georgia State Capital, Georgia World Congress Center, Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola, Martin Luther King Jr. Center, and other major business icons. There is also neighboring shopping at Atlantic Station, Lenox Mall, Phipps Plaza, and Underground Atlanta. We are just steps away from the home of the Atlanta Braves at Turner Field. Amenities such as high-speed Internet access, a state-of-the-art business center, an outdoor pool with gorgeous skyline views, marble and granite bathrooms, plush towels and luxurious bedding mean every night is a great night and every day starts right. Whether you are coming to Atlanta for business or just for fun, your room at the Holiday Inn Atlanta Capitol Conference Center will be your personal retreat. This hotel is committed to providing accessible facilities under the American Disabilities Act. If your accessibility needs are not met, please contact the Hotel Manager on Duty. Should you require additional information regarding accessible facilities for guests with disabilities, please call 1-800-Holiday (U.S. and Canada) or contact the hotel directly. For the hearing impaired, TDD service is available at 1-800-238-5544 within the U.S. and Canada.
hotel.airportsDesc: ATL

facility.title: Property
facility.desc:
Welcome to Hotel Capitol Park Atlanta. With its towering skyscrapers, professional sports teams and world-class dining, Atlanta is the quintessential big city, offering plenty of excitement and adventure with a touch of Southern Hospitality.

The perfect home away from home, Hotel Capitol Park Atlanta, lets you escape the busy streets of downtown and relax during your trip to Atlanta! Sophisticated shopping, museum and family fun - it all awaits our hotels' guests in downtown Atlanta, Georgia. All around, Atlanta's largest companies and universities take root: Coca Cola headquarters, Georgia Tech, AT, Emory, and Georgia State. Also near to the hotel are Atlanta's biggest tourist attractions - The Georgia Aquarium, The Georgia Dome, World of Coca Cola, Philips Arena, The FOX Theatre, Turner Field and Centennial Olympic Park, The King Center and The Carter Presidential Library.

If you are in town on business, you might like to know that we are across from the Capitol building and just a mile from the Georgia World Congress Center. Looking for event space in Atlanta, Georgia? The hotel also serves as the perfect backdrop for business meetings, conventions and special events with 24,000 square feet of flexible space, including the Piedmont Ballroom, which has a built-in stage. There's free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel, and the 24-hour Business Center lets you work on your own schedule.

A leader among hotels in downtown Atlanta, GA, we offer the best in amenities, such as an on-site restaurant and lounge, a brand new Fitness Center and free shuttle service within a three-mile radius. Our outdoor pool boasts incredible views of the skyline, too! We look forward to serving you soon.

Note: Parking is $18 a day.

Fees: Hotel will charge $25 per night standard incidental authorization hold for all guests checking into the hotel. This will be charged to guests credit/debit card at check-in. After check-out if there are no damages or food/beverage/Miscellaneous charges on the guest room the authorization will be released. Standard credit cards release the hold within approximately 24-48 business hours after departure date. Debit cards release 7-10 business days pending customers bank release policy. Guests may opt to use cash as a form of payment for the authorization hold. All cash deposits are $150 and will be returned in cash upon check out pending no additional charges or damages to the room.

facility.title: Rockfish Grille
facility.desc: On property, the Rockfish Grille offers Traditional Southern Fare that Meets a Contemporary Dining Experience ... Good things happen around food and drink - that's where we take the time to get to know each other and put life back into perspective. Hotel Capitol Park Atlanta makes it easy to do just that. Our on-site restaurant and our lounge invite you to unwind, forget your worries and share the stories of the day. Rockfish Grille, a contemporary American bistro-style restaurant, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

hotel.name: aloft Denver International Airport
hotel.description: Aloft hotels are the new twist in travel from Starwood Hotels & Resorts. A vision of W Hotels, the Aloft Denver International Airport is a bold, fresh, and fun new hotel featuring loft-inspired design and always-abuzz public spaces. Perfectly positioned for an easy breezy travel experience to the Mile-High City, with easy airport access thanks to our free shuttle! Zip around to nearby businesses mere minutes away, including Fitzsimons Army Medical Center, the Medical Center of Aurora, and offices of Invesco, Coors, and Pepsi. Dash into downtown Denver in a jiffy for sightseeing and family fun. And of course, in Colorado the great outdoors always beckons! So head high into the hills for some Rocky Mountain scenic splendor. Rise and shine in our bright and modern Aloft rooms, featuring plush platform beds, walk-in showers, custom amenities by Bliss® Spa and more. Recharge all your gadgets with the plug & play docking station, which also links your laptop or tunes to the 42 LCD TV. Meet and mingle at our w xyz(SM) bar, grab a snack at the 24/7 re:fuel by Aloft(SM) gourmet pantry, or work and play at our re:mix(SM) lounge. Plenty of perks include free hotel-wide Wi-Fi, our always-open re:charge(SM) gym, stylish splash pool, and more!
hotel.airportsDesc: Denver International Airport, (DEN), 8.13, MI;

hotel.name: TWELVE Centennial Park
hotel.description:
Discover the intriguing blend of innovation and sophistication that makes TWELVE Centennial Park the unique address in downtown Atlanta. Personally design every detail of your stay with the groundbreaking, in-suite GHOSTSM desktop application. Simple and readily accessible, it means you never have to pick up a phone during your stay.

Effective January 31, 2014 valet parking fee's will increase to $28.00 per vehicle per day.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Twelve Centennial Park is located in Downtown Atlanta, in the heart of the city, providing an upscale urban experience in a spacious setting that feels like home. Enjoy easy access to the downtown Atlanta attractions at TWELVE Centennial Park. From the energetic buzz of CNN Studios to the bright, bubbly World of Coca Cola and high adventure of Six Flags Over Georgia, the exceptional Atlanta Georgia hotel offers an exclusive gateway to a dazzling world of attractions.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Leave behind the stuffy conference centers and boring old hotel meeting rooms. TWELVE Centennial Park is a stylish alternative to the same tired venues you, your clients and coworkers have been before. The event space offers the amenities of a luxury hotel with the exclusivity of a boutique. Whether hosting an executive off-site or an industry event, TWELVE offers Atlanta's most exciting special event space. Boardroom 446 square feet Centennial Room 1472 square feet Park Room 1472 square feet TWELVE Lounge 1100 square feet Pre Function Area 770 square feet

facility.title: Standard Suite
facility.desc: The room offers one king bed or two queen bed. Each downtown Atlanta hotel suite at TWELVE offers the casual comforts of home: a full-size kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, separate dining and living room areas, and expansive one or two bedroom options. Convertible sofas are available in select suites. Whether you are visiting for a short business trip, extended stay or traveling with family for a special occasion, the hotel offer a suite to meet your needs.

facility.title: Deluxe Suite
facility.desc: The room offers one king bed or two queen bed. Each downtown Atlanta hotel suite at TWELVE offers the casual comforts of home: a full-size kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, separate dining and living room areas, and expansive one or two bedroom options. Convertible sofas are available in all suites. Whether you are visiting for a short business trip, extended stay or traveling with family for a special occasion, the hotel offers a suite to meet your needs. All the Deluxe One Bedroom Suites are located on the higher floors

facility.title: ROOM at TWELVE
facility.desc: Experience a dining masterpiece at ROOM at TWELVE. Delight in the cool, cosmopolitan ambiance as you sip a cocktail in what has quickly become one of Atlanta'spremier restaurants. Featuring an alluring outdoor terrace and an intimate dining room, this sensational destination offers a dynamic alternative to typical downtown Atlanta restaurant dining. Serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and Saturday and Sunday brunch Room service available 24-hours Named "Best Downtown Hotel Restaurant" by Atlanta Magazine Featured in City Search's "Top Ten New Restaurants"

hotel.name: Hyatt Boston Harbor
hotel.description: Immerse yourself in dramatic views of historic Boston at Hyatt Boston Harbor. This luxurious Boston airport hotel is an ideal base for travelers, offering 270 luxurious guestrooms including seven suites and premier service. Choose our stunning hotel for your next Boston conference and take advantage of our newly renovated meeting space. Enjoy captivating water views, fine dining and harbor cruises. Guests of our hotel near Boston airport delight in celebrated architectural details such as an inlaid marble floor map, ornate dome ceiling and exterior lighthouse and beacon accents. Reward yourself with deluxe guest services including a business center and fitness center. Gain easy access to city attractions with a water taxi or take our complimentary 24-hour shuttle to airport terminals. Soak up Boston's famed culture and recreation or visit the financial district, all minutes from our hotel at Logan Airport, Massachusetts.

hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Bethesda
hotel.description:
Hyatt Regency Bethesda is located in the heart of downtown Bethesda, directly above the Bethesda Metro Station. The 12-story marble atrium hotel is a focal point of the Bethesda community, featuring 390 deluxe guestrooms and over 20,000 square feet of versatile meeting space. The spacious guestrooms showcase the Hyatt Grand Bed, a true statement of comfort and luxury, and afford large workstations to provide functionality in your home away from home.

Hyatt Regency Bethesda provides amenities to fit every guests needs. From high end dining at Mortons Steakhouse to classic casual fare at the Daily Grill, or grab and go at the Concours Lounge, Hyatt Regency Bethesda has it all. An indoor roof top pool and state of the art fitness center, featuring Hyatt Stay Fit equipment and Yoga Away, Hyatt Regency Bethesda provides guests the opportunity to warm up or cool down and to maintain energy levels while on the road.

The amenities continue outside of the hotel with over 200 restaurants, shops, and entertainment options all within walking distance of the hotel. Downtown Washington, DC is just a short Metro ride away, as the hotel sits directly atop the Bethesda Metro Station. Whether it's the National Zoo, the Bethesda Theater, or a stroll through Bethesda's quaint streets, Hyatt Regency Bethesda is the perfect location for either business or pleasure.
hotel.airportsDesc: Reagan National Airport, (DCA), 15.00, MI, N; Washington Dulles Intl Airport, (IAD), 24.00, MI, NE; Baltimore/Washington Intl Airport, (BWI), 34.00, MI, SW;

The 12-story marble atrium hotel is a focal point of the Bethesda community, featuring 390 deluxe guestrooms and over 20,000 square feet of versatile meeting space. The spacious guestrooms showcase the Hyatt Grand Bed, a true statement of comfort and luxury, and afford large workstations and new desk chairs to provide functionality in your home away from home.
Hyatt Regency Bethesda provides amenities to fit every guests' needs. From high-end dining at Morton's Steakhouse to classic casual fare at the Daily Grill, or grab and go at the Concours Lounge, Hyatt Regency Bethesda has it all.
The Hotel has a newly renovated 24/7 complimentary StayFit Health Club, featuring Hyatt Stay Fit equipment and Yoga Away. In addition, the Hotel has an indoor pool adjacent to the Health Club. Hyatt Regency Bethesda provides guests the opportunity to warm up or cool down and to maintain energy levels while on the road.
The amenities continue outside of the hotel with over 200 restaurants, shops, and entertainment options all within walking distance of the hotel. Downtown Washington, DC is just a short Metro ride away, as the hotel sits directly atop the Bethesda Metro Station. The hotel is just 1 Metro stop from both the National Institutes of Health and the National Naval Medical Center.
Whether it's the National Zoo, the Bethesda Theater, or a stroll through Bethesda's quaint streets, Hyatt Regency Bethesda is the perfect location for either business or pleasure.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Airport Inn
hotel.description:
Welcome to BEST WESTERN Airport Inn!
BEST WESTERN Airport Inn is the ideal venue for the business or leisure traveler to Phoenix. We are conveniently located 1 mile south of Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport and 1 mile away from the Car Rental Center. Our proximity to Sky Harbor Airport and the neighboring car rental center is a big reason many guests choose our Phoenix hotel. Are you tired of paying for parking while you are away on your trip? Take advantage now of our Sleep, Ride and Fly package and save time and money!
Here are a few additional reasons to choose our hotel:
• 24-Hour shuttle to and from Sky Harbor Airport (1 mile) • Free shuttle to Sky Train/Light Rail Connection at Sky Harbor Airport • 14 days of free parking with a one night stay • Full service restaurant on site, serving breakfast (fees apply), lunch and dinner • Swimming pool and hot tub • Free Wi-Fi in all guest rooms • Complimentary business center • Complimentary Grab-n-go coffee, bananas and crackers from 3am-noon
Nearby attractions include shopping, restaurants,the Phoenix Convention Center, Downtown Phoenix, Downtown Tempe, Arizona State University, the University of Phoenix, the Desert Botanical Garden, the Phoenix Zoo, Chase Field and the US Airways Center.
Come stay with us and stay with people who care!

hotel.name: Outrigger Beach Resort
hotel.description:
The Outrigger Beach Resort is a casual property located on a white-sand beach directly on the Gulf of Mexico; it is across the street from the Beach Movie Theatre, two miles from Lovers Key State Park, four miles from Times Square in the center of Fort Myers Beach, and five miles from the Key West Express Catamaran.The beach Trollee can provide transportation to most of Fort Myers Beach attractions.

An outdoor pool overlooking the water, an open-air bar, and a sand volleyball court are on site. Bicycles can be rented on the property.

Outrigger Beach Resort provides a variety of water sports and has an outdoor pool and sundeck that face the Gulf of Mexico. Childrens activities are offered. Beach volleyball is also available on the grounds and bicycles can be rented through the hotel. Trolley service (50 cents) is available to Fort Myers Beach

Parasailing, jet skiing, catamaran sailing, and boating are available on the beach. The Bay Beach Golf Club is about a mile away.


This Fort Myers Beach hotel offers 144 guestrooms in four buildings of varying levels; access is via exterior corridors.


Amenities include cable TV and in-room safes. Coffeemakers and refrigerators are complimentary in Standard rooms; microwaves are available (surcharge) in Standard rooms but complimentary in efficiency units. Efficiencies also have a range/stove and toaster.
Smoking is permitted only outside the rooms--chairs and ash trays are provided.

Guests must be at least 25 years old to check-in

facility.title: Resort View Guest Room
facility.desc: This guestroom has two queen-sized beds and a combination shower/tub unit. The amenities include a dorm-size refrigerator, remote control TV, window air-conditioner, complimentary safe and a coffee maker with daily coffee. It offers a view of the Office and a side view of the Sundeck. There are two deck chairs outside the room on the shared walkway. This room type is located either on a second or third floor, with unassigned under-building parking provided on the first. This unit measures 365 square feet

facility.title: Charleys Boat House Grill
facility.desc: Dining at Charley's Boathouse Grill is an experience of salad delight! Cruise through our 50 item salad bar before devouring that first bite of Certified Black Angus NY Strip or that fresh caught Mahi Mahi. Lean back and take a breath then dig into a slice of "Death by Chocolate." Life is good!

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Movie theater, mini golf, boat rentals, deep sea fishing, golf, tennis, shopping, edison Winter Estates, Sanibel Shell Museum, Babcock Wilderness Adventure, nearby.

facility.title: Efficiency
facility.desc: This unit is one of our one-room efficiency units that includes, a fully equipped kitchen with stove, refrigerator, coffee maker, microwave, toaster, pans, cooking utensils and table service for 5. The room features a shower stall, remote control TV, room air-conditioner and a complimentary safe. There are two deck chairs outside the room on the shared walkway. This efficiency overlooks the office area and some units have unassigned parking directly in front. We have first and second floor units, measuring 328 square feet each. There is no elevator at this building. Bedding type varies in this room

facility.title: Standard
facility.desc: With two double beds and a dorm-sized refrigerator, our cozy Standard Guest Rooms are located on the second and third floors. Overlooking the Garden Efficiencies and the picnic area, a comfortable Standard Guest Room provides a true value for guests who don't mind a few steps to get to the beach.

facility.desc: The Deckside Cafe is a casual American style cafe serving the resort's guests from 7:00 am until 9:00 pm

hotel.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New York - Times Square South
hotel.description:
Times Square, Madison Square Garden, Rockefeller Center, and the Empire State Building are landmarks that are synonymous with New York City. They are also only a short walk from the newly developed Wyndham Garden Midtown Convention Center Hotel. Other area attractions include; The Jacob Javits Convention Center, Broadway theaters and distinguished shopping havens such as Macys, Bloomingdales and Lord & Taylor.

Whether you are traveling to Manhattan for business or pleasure our 224 smartly designed rooms include; Mark David designed furniture, complimentary high spreed wireless and wired internet access, 32 inch flat screen TV as well as Beyond Room Service and well appointed concierge guest rooms and services.

We feature The Greenhouse Cafe & Bar, 3,500 feet of flexible meeting space, including a 1,500 square foot terrace, a fitness facility and a 24 hour virtual gift shop. Transportation centers such as Penn Station, Grand Central Terminal and The Port Authority are all only a few minutes away. Please note a credit card is required and must be presented at time of check in.

hotel.description:
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Houston Bush Intercontinental Airport (IAH) South was recently named a 2014 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence award winner!
NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
The interior corridor, 5-story La Quinta Inn & Suites Bush Intercontinental Airport South is just 1 mile south of the airport on John F Kennedy Blvd. From Sam Houston Tollway, exit John F. Kennedy Blvd and head north. We offer free shuttle service to our hotel guests to and from the airport. The shuttle runs from 5am to 11pm daily. Guests must call from airport for pickup.
There are an extensive list of neighboring businesses such as: Ceva Logistics, Baker Hughes, United/Continental Airlines, Exxon Mobil, Halliburton, GE Energy, Intec, US Foodservice and SWN.
Loosen up in the seasonal outdoor pool and hot tub, and work out the kinks in our fitness center. We have meeting facilities, wireless Internet access throughout the hotel, a barbeque grill on property, and there are plenty of restaurants in the area.
Rooms at the La Quinta Inn & Suites Bush Intercontinental Airport South are spacious, comfortable, and include free high-speed Internet access. King and two room suites are equipped with microwaves and refrigerators, while our rooms with two doubles have them available upon request.
No need to request our free Bright Side Breakfast, served by our couteous staff each morning.
Stay and Go Package packaged rates available.
hotel.airportsDesc: George Bush Intercontinental Airport, (IAH), 1.00, MI, S; William P. Hobby Airport, (HOU), 30.00, MI, S;

hotel.name: The Georgian Terrace Hotel
hotel.description:
Since 1911, The Georgian Terrace Hotel has been a landmark in midtown Atlanta. Today, this "Grand Dame" of Atlanta hotels combines luxury accommodations with leading edge conference technology. Fully restored to its original opulence in 2001, the hotel features 308 elegant suites, upscale leisure amenities, exceptional restaurants, and more than 16,000 square feet of meeting space. With its rich history and central location at the intersection of Peachtree Street and Ponce de Leon Avenue, the hotel is near Buckhead, The Fox Theatre, and other Atlanta attractions. The Georgian Terrace Hotel is a premier urban destination for vacation travel, weddings, group events and business meetings.

The property offers Valet and Self Parking options for a daily fee.

"Celebrating 100 years, be part of the history"
hotel.airportsDesc: Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport
