facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: The elegantly appointed suites at The Georgian Terrace Hotel set the standard for luxury with antique-style furnishings, "Dream" beds with European-style duvet covers, large bathrooms, full kitchens, over-sized windows, and all of the amenities such as ironing boards, hair dryers, coffee makers, microwave oven, full-size refrigerator, electric range/oven and much more. In addition, many of the suites feature walk-in closets and balconies with sliding glass doors. The property has a health club, handicapped access, a pool, business center, restaurant, room service, and concierge.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: The conference center is Atlanta's newest and most prestigious conference center, located on the ground level of The Georgian Terrace Hotel. The conference center and each meeting room combines an elegant, state-of-the-art meeting environment with a complete meeting package of food and services for your convenience.

facility.title: One Bedroom Suite
facility.desc: One Bedroom Suite with one queen bed (755 sq ft). Room includes complimentary high-speed internet access. Telephone with voicemail. Cable/satellite TV with pay/per/view movies. Complimentary weekday newspaper. Coffee/tea maker. Hair dryer, iron/ironing board.

facility.title: Luxury Double
facility.desc: Oversized Luxury Double room with 2 Queen beds (570 sq ft). Room includes complimentary high-speed internet access. Telephone with voicemail. Cable/satellite TV with pay/per/view movies. Complimentary weekday newspaper. Coffee/tea maker. Hair dryer, iron/ironing board. Kitchen with full-size refrigerator, double sink, garbage disposal, electrice range/oven, microwave. Walk-in closet with washer/dryer

facility.title: Cafe MIMS
facility.desc: Midtown Atlanta's Fresh New Cafe Make Cafe Mims your regular morning coffee stop. Come back for lunch on the terrace or for a bite to go for a picnic in Piedmont Park. Fresh, simple and portable with an emphasis on local foods that, in short, is Cafe Mims. Enjoy freshly brewed teas and coffee drinks, house-made pastries, and light, tasty gourmet items served morning, noon and night and late night, say after a show at The Fox.

facility.title: Two Bedroom/Two Bath
facility.desc: Two bedroom/Two Bath (1,290 sq ft), with one queen bed in each bedroom. Separate living room with dining area. Kitchen with full-sized refrigerator, microwave, stove, coffee maker and washer/dryer area. Complimentary high-speed internet access, two dual-line phones with voicemail a system, remote-control cable television in master bedroom, hairdryer, and iron/board.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc:
Many guests choose to spend their days in Midtown, enjoying nice weather at Piedmont Park, exploring museums, attending theater productions and concerts, or savoring cuisine at one of the areas many restaurants. See Exploring Midtown for more information on Midtown area activities.
Downtown Atlanta offers something for everyone; history buffs enjoy the wide variety of world-class history centers and museums throughout the area; cultural coinsurers attend a variety of concerts and theatrical performances; families visit zoos and amusement parks; and sports fans choose from baseball, football, basketball and hockey in the Sports Capital of the World. See Exploring Atlanta for more information on Atlanta area activities.

facility.title: Petite Standard
facility.desc: Standard room with one double bed (160 sq ft). Free high-speed internet access, dual-line phone with data port, remote-control cable television, coffee maker, hairdryer, iron/board and voicemail system.

facility.title: Two Bedroom/One Bath
facility.desc: Two Bedroom/One Bath (970 sq ft), with one queen bed in each bedroom. Separate living room with dining area. Kitchen with full-sized refrigerator, microwave, stove, coffee maker and washer/dryer area. Complimentary high-speed internet access, two dual-line phones with voicemail a system, remote-control cable television in master bedroom, hairdryer, and iron/board.

facility.title: Livingston Restaurant + Bar
facility.desc: Midtown Atlanta's Favorite Restaurant. With its fresh, innovative American cooking and it sleek modern dcor, Livingston Restaurant and Bar couldn't be more contemporary, yet its soul is fed by the same classic architecture and early 20th-century glamour that makes the Georgian Terrace a Midtown icon. Livingston Restaurant and Bar is the place where Atlantans come to be social, to eat and drink and celebrate. The executive chef, Gary Mennie offers up the liveliest local flavors in Georgia. Theatre plans? Reserve a table on the terrace and enjoy dinner and drinks in the glow of the Fox Theatre marquee before and after a show.

facility.title: Proof and Provision
facility.desc: Underneath one of Atlanta's most historic landmarks lies a new kind of watering hole. Bold flavor combinations, masterfully created cocktails and sophisticated, industrial-style decor sets Proof and Provision apart from the rest. The low ceiling,exposed brick walls and concrete floors create an intimate ambiance built upon social gathering, conversation and drink-making. Executive Chef Zeb Stevenson believes in no-nonsense delivery, thus classic flavour combinations and delivers sophisticated, yet approachable snack fare. The carefully constructed menu includes small signature acquisition, unusual finds and local producers. The restaurant gives its own spin to American favorites like deviled eggs, hot pretzels, grilled cheese and pigs in a blanket without stealing its traditional glory. Skilled mixologists deliver high quality drinks that stray away from the mainstream. From barrel-aged crafted cocktails to artisan-style beers.

hotel.name: Colonnade Boston Copley Square Back Bay
hotel.description:
Located in Boston's fashionable Back Bay neighborhood, The Colonnade recently completed a comprehensive $25 million reinvention. With thoughtful, relevant amenities the redesigned hotel appeals to the discriminating business and leisure traveler. All guest rooms have been re-engineered to provide a sophisticated, residential feel with state-of-the-art features. Our new innovative rooms reflect an ongoing commitment to provide our guests with a memorable experience worth repeating. Home to the city's only roof top pool and the award-winning restaurant Brasserie JO, The Colonnade is within walking distance of many of city's finest shops, museums, galleries, and landmarks including Symphony Hall and Fenway Park.
Boston's Only Roof Top Pool is open 8AM to 8PM, weather permitting. There is no admission fee for registered hotel guests during their stay. 5pm to 10pm No cover and open to the public
The fee for outside guests Monday through Friday is $40 per person 8am - 5pm.

The roof top pool may be closed to hotel guests during occasions when there are private functions. Indoor Parking is $38.00 per day.

facility.title: Premier Luxe Rooms
facility.desc: Premier Luxe rooms have either King or 2 Double beds and are located on higher floors, with 370 SQF and floor-to-ceiling windows that open. A beautiful and unobstructed view of Bostons Skyline is another amenity these rooms provide. Contemporary furnishings, with warm earth tones, exemplify a sophisticated, residential design. A plush pillow top mattress, especially designed for The Colonnade Hotel, supported by luxurious down comforters and linens, invites you to a great nights sleep. In addition, 37 LCD High Definition TV's, DVD players, I-Pod and mp3 player alarm clocks, 100% true digital HD ETVi programming, in-room safe, 2 line cordless and hands free telephones, available high speed wired and wireless internet access, are available in every guestroom. Also, Thymes eucalyptus bath products, plush bathrobes, full-size hair dryers and shaving mirrors, Keurig gourmet coffee & tea brewers and mini-bar are some of the exceptional amenities we provide for your comfort.

facility.title: Parlor Suites
facility.desc: Our Parlor Suites have either King or 2 Double beds and are approximately 700 SQF with a separate living room and dining area that provides privacy for entertaining or business meetings along with a separate full size bathroom. Contemporary furnishings with warm earth tones add to the Boston sophisticated residential feel. With floor to ceiling windows that open, each living area features expansive city views. The bedroom offers a king size bed with plush pillow top mattress, luxurious down comforters and linens while each room features 37" LCD High Definition TV's, DVD players, i-Pod and mp3 player alarm clocks, 100% true digital HD ETVi programming, in-room safe, mini-bar, plush robes, 2 line cordless and hands free telephones, available high speed wired and wireless internet access, Thymes eucalyptus bath products, Keurig gourmet coffee & tea makers, full size hair dryers and shaving mirrors. This parlor area has a full size sofa bed.

facility.title: Luxury Suites

Contemporary furnishings with bold colors exemplify a sophisticated residential design. The bedroom offers plush pillow top mattresses and luxurious down comforters and linens along with a 37" LCD HDTV and DVD player while each room features floor to ceiling windows that open, i-Pod and mp3 player alarm clocks, 100% true digital HD ETVi programming, in-room safe, mini-bar, plush robes, 2 line cordless and hands free telephones, available high speed wired and wireless internet access, Thymes eucalyptus bath products, Keurig gourmet coffee & tea maker, full size hair dryers and shaving mirrors. This parlor area has a full size sofa bed.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Conveniently located in Boston's historic Back Bay, across the street from the Hynes Convention Center and the Shops at the Prudential Center. Walking distance to Boston's financial, cultural and retail districts, the Boston Common and Public Gardens.

facility.title: Brasserie Jo
facility.desc:
The Colonnade Hotel is home to Boston's most authentic brasserie, Brasserie Jo. Under the culinary direction of world-renowned Chef Jean Joho, owner of the acclaimed Everest and Brasserie Jo restaurants in Chicago and the Eiffel Tower Restaurant in Las Vegas, Brasserie Jo has the style and cuisine of classic brasseries throughout France.
Chef Joho's menu offers a variety of light snacks and full meals, with highlights including Uncle Hansi's Onion Tast, Hanger Steak, Pomme Frites, Coq au Vin, Croque Monsieur, and classic desserts like Profiteroles covered in Homemade Chocolate Sauce and Creme Brulee. Along with its extensive wine and beer lists, Brasserie Jo pulls in an eclectic crowd of Bostonians at cocktail time with an extensive selection of martinis and the restauarant's signature beer, Hopla, an authentic Alsace-style draft beer.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Featurning 13,000 square feet of function space, from our Executive Board Room to our new Grand Ballroom, accommodating up to 700 people.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: Fitness Room, CD Library, Rooftop Pool, Laundry Service, Guest Room Dining, Non-smoking floors, Full Service Concierge, Full Service Business Center, Customized VIP Suites, Indoor Parking. Parking is $38.00 per day.

facility.desc: Our Superior rooms have either King or 2 Double beds and are approximately 350 SQF, and feature floor-to-ceiling windows that open. The residential view affords a glimpse of Bostons historic South End. Contemporary furnishings with warm earth tones, exemplify a sophisticated, residential design. Contemporary furnishings with warm earth tones, exemplify a sophisticated, residential design. hotel.name: The Charles Hotel
hotel.description:
A most original luxury hotel, the newly renovated Charles Hotel combines classic New England design and sophisticated service. You can see our character in our signature quilts, bountiful regional cuisine, and thoughtful planning. The Charles Hotel is located in the heart of Harvard Square, just minutes from downtown Boston, Massachusetts.
The Charles Hotel, a AAA Four Diamond Hotel, offers the finest, most distinctive guest accommodations in the Boston area with 294 spacious guestrooms. Our renovated guest rooms include custom designed pieces, such as spacious cherry-wood desks, oversized clocks, Hi-Def LCD Plasma Televisions and hand-crafted quilts. Throughout the rooms are unique touches that celebrate The Charles' reputation as "Cambridge's most intellectual property," leading with the oversized black and white chalkboard drawing hanging in each room. Additionally, the rooms are furnished with a custom created professor's chair, and a hanging peg board that is reminiscent of a New England boarding school. Beginning in February 2007, guests will be able to take advantage of free local, national long distance, and 800 calls in their guest rooms. In addition, to the phone service, the hotel recently opened "Web Cubes" on each of its seven guest floors. The rooms serve as a mini work station for the executive on-the-go or as a convenience for the leisure guest who wants to send an email to the family back home. Open 24 hours a day, the Web Cubes include complimentary high-speed internet and printing. These are in addition to a complete business center on the first floor.
hotel.airportsDesc: BOS - Logan International

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: Health club, business center, handicapped access, restaurant, pool, room service, pets allowed ($50.00 fee per stay), concierge, spa. Self and valet parking available ($34.00 per day charge).Beginning in February 2007, guests will be able to take advantage of free local, national long distance, and 800 calls in their guest rooms. In addition, to the phone service, the hotel recently opened "Web Cubes" on each of its seven guest floors. The rooms serve as a mini work station for the executive on-the-go or as a convenience for the leisure guest who wants to send an email to the family back home. Open 24 hours a day, the Web Cubes include complimentary high-speed internet and printing. These are in addition to a complete business center on the first floor.

facility.title: Henrietta's Table
facility.desc: Henrietta's Table is comfort food, redefined. This means full, robust flavors using the freshest of ingredients obtained from local farmers and fishermen. In addition to serving the best breakfast in Boston (as chosen by Boston Magazine in 2000), a meal that attracts more Nobel Prize dinner following. For reservations call 617.661.5005.

facility.title: Rialto
facility.desc: Recently awarded one of the Top 50 Hotel Restaurants in America by Food and Wine Magazine in addition to four stars by The Boston Globe. Since it opened in 1994, Rialto is consistently chosen for fine dining by food critics and patrons, on both a local and national level. Chef Jody Adams, winner of the 1997 James Beard Award for Best Chef in the Northeast, invites you to delight in her unique cuisine inspired by the flavors of France. Italy and Spain, and enhanced with seasonal New England ingredients. For reservations call 617.661.5050.

facility.title: Regattabar
facility.desc: Regatta bar included in "Best of Boston" Hall of Fame. The Charles Hotel's Regatta bar brings to the hotel the most dynamic live jazz both national and international. Branford Marsalis, Joshua Redman, McCoy Tyner, Ruth Brown, Michael Brecker, and Elvin Jones and other luminaries are all Regatta bar regulars. For reservations and schedule of upcoming performances, call Concertix 617.876.7777.

facility.title: Deluxe Room
facility.desc: Deluxe room with king bed or 2 double beds. Our renovated guest rooms include custom designed pieces, such as spacious cherry-wood desks, oversized clocks, Hi-Def LCD Plasma Televisions and hand-crafted quilts. Additionally, the rooms are furnished with a custom created professor's chair, and a hanging peg board that is reminiscent of a New England boarding school. Decor combines shaker-inspired aesthetic with modern touches. All rooms have Bose Wave radios, DVD players, down comforters & pillows and aromatherapy bath products by Origins, size 273 sq ft. All rooms are non-smoking. A distinguishing guestroom attribute -- currently unique to The Charles -- is the hotel's installation of Seura televisions in every room. These innovative "in-mirror" LCD screens can be hooked up to cable, DVD, satellite, sound, or other systems, and are completely hidden when turned off.

facility.title: Noir
facility.desc: Noir is located in a discreet corner of The Charles Hotel's Lobby with street-level views of Harvard Square. A warm sophisticated bar serving classic cocktails, sweet and sultry signature drinks and a menu suited for a late afternoon or late night snack. Designed to reflect the intense decadent atmosphere of 1940's nightlife, Noir is the right place to meet friends after work, a date Noir is open seven days a week 4:00PM- 2:00AM. Food served until 1:00AM.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: The Charles Hotel offers more than 13,000 square feet of meeting and special event space, including a 4,700 square foot ballroom, 8 private rooms and 3 executive boardrooms.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The charm, history and culture in Harvard Square Cambridge are unrivaled, Blending tradition education, and International diversity. Harvard Square's dynamic offering are just outside our front door. World-class performances at The American Repertory Theatre, Harvard's prestigious collection of museums, the best in ethnic dining and erudite cafes and unique shops all contribute to the area's legendary appeal. Minutes across the river, Boston proper offers its own unique environment that complements your experience at The Charles Hotel.

facility.title: Cambridge Suite
facility.desc: Spacious one bedroom suite with King bed and separate living room and dining area. Hi-Def LCD Plasma, Seura "in mirror" bathroom TV", Bose Wave radio, DVD player, down comforters & pillows, pull out sofa bed and EO products. Oversized Shower only. 475 square feet.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Pony Soldier Inn - Airport
hotel.description:
Welcome to BEST WESTERN Pony Soldier Inn—Airport! Many guests at our Portland hotel are corporate travelers looking to take advantage of our great proximity to the airport, light rail and downtown.
MAX, Portlands light rail system whisks guests directly into the heart of downtown. Were close to major freeways and the airport, so catching early morning flights or day trips around the Great Northwest are both possible. Were known for our stellar customer service, and the outdoor seasonal pool and year-round hot tub are perfect for relaxing. However, make sure you start every morning right with a full, free hot breakfast featuring waffles, fruits, cereal and 100% Arabica coffee.
Our location, just two miles from the airport, makes us an easy choice for frequent flyers. Our Portland hotel is a short drive from the beautiful landscaping of The Grotto, and boating on the Columbia River is a real treat. Whether youre in town for the legendary Rose Festival or touring the Columbia River Gorge, the location of our property makes it easy to get around the region.
Mount Hood, the Oregon Coast and some of the best dining in the northwest is all a short drive away. Duck into Voodoo Doughnuts 24/7 for a sweet treat like no other, or visit the countrys smallest park. The friendliness of our staff and cleanliness of the guest rooms make you feel right at home. Were located near I-205 and I-84 West and East for your convenience. Just across the river from Vancouver, Washington, the Portland Airport hotel is unlike any other in the country and nestled close to all the top attractions.
Business travelers with Concordia University, Altec® Corporation, Grocery Outlet and Boeing and Honda Factories often stay at our Portland hotel. Visit the Rose Garden for incredible views or take in a Portland Trailblazers game at the Rose Garden Arena. The Pearl District is a must for nightlife, and NW 23rd is a requisite for shoppers.
Book your BEST WESTERN Pony Soldier Inn -
hotel.areaServed: St. Helens, Wood Village, Hillsboro, Vancouver,, Hood River, Gresham, Camas,, Wilsonville, Troutdale, Beaverton

facility.desc: Heated Pool:Conference Facilities:No Smoking Rooms/Facilities:Ironing Board:Coffee Maker in Room:Elevators:Microwave:24 Hour Front Desk:Internet Access:Fitness Center or Spa:Hairdryer in Room:Audio Visual Equipment:AM/FM Alarm Clock:Copy Service:Steam Bath:Air Conditioned:Security:Accessible facilities:Meeting/Banquet Facilities:Pet friendly:Free Local Telephone Calls:In-Room Safe:Ice Machine:Free parking:High Speed Internet:Express Check In:Continental Breakfast:Data port Available:Guest Laundromat:Television with Cable:WiFi:Outdoor Pool:Exercise Gym:Lounge

Welcome to BEST WESTERN Pony Soldier Inn—Airport! Many guests at our Portland hotel are corporate travelers looking to take advantage of our great proximity to the airport, light rail and downtown.
MAX, Portlands light rail system whisks guests directly into the heart of downtown. Were close to major freeways and the airport, so catching early morning flights or day trips around the Great Northwest are both possible. Were known for our stellar customer service, and the outdoor seasonal pool and year-round hot tub are perfect for relaxing. However, make sure you start every morning right with a full, free hot breakfast featuring waffles, fruits, cereal and 100% Arabica coffee.
Our location, just two miles from the airport, makes us an easy choice for frequent flyers. Our Portland hotel is a short drive from the beautiful landscaping of The Grotto, and boating on the Columbia River is a real treat. Whether youre in town for the legendary Rose Festival or touring the Columbia River Gorge, the location of our property makes it easy to get around the region.
Mount Hood, the Oregon Coast and some of the best dining in the northwest is all a short drive away. Duck into Voodoo Doughnuts 24/7 for a sweet treat like no other, or visit the countrys smallest park. The friendliness of our staff and cleanliness of the guest rooms make you feel right at home. Were located near I-205 and I-84 West and East for your convenience. Just across the river from Vancouver, Washington, the Portland Airport hotel is unlike any other in the country and nestled close to all the top attractions.
Business travelers with Concordia University, Altec® Corporation, Grocery Outlet and Boeing and Honda Factories often stay at our Portland hotel. Visit the Rose Garden for incredible views or take in a Portland Trailblazers game at the Rose Garden Arena. The Pearl District is a must for nightlife, and NW 23rd is a requisite for shoppers.
Book your BEST WESTERN Pony Soldier Inn -
Airport

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Express FT. LAUDERDALE CRUISE-AIRPORT
hotel.description: Our Hotel's Ft. Lauderdale Property has a Great Location We are located just minutes from the airport and within walking distance of cruise port, our Holiday Inn Express® hotel is near everything in Ft. Lauderdale, FL. Stay with us on your next trip to the city and we'll make sure your visit is carefree. We've designed our contemporary hotel with the corporate traveler in mind, which is why we offer free high-speed, wireless Internet access, as well as a business center with copy and print services. In addition, we're just a block from the Broward County Convention Center and only 3.5 miles from the Fort Lauderdale Hollywood International Airport. Business and leisure guests can save time and money by taking advantage of our free, 24-hour shuttle to and from the airport. Leisure guests are glad to know that we're so close to the cruise terminal in Fort Lauderdale for Port Everglades. Our hotel's near great shopping, too, like the Galleria Mall and South Port Center. Want to explore outdoors? Patrons can take a tour of Ft. Lauderdale's Waterway or go for a stroll along one of the many beautiful beaches near our hotel's property. In Ft. Lauderdale, FL, our guests enjoy quality amenities at a price they can afford. We serve a complimentary, hot Express Start breakfast bar every morning which features delicious cinnamon rolls, meat, eggs, fruit, 100% Arabica bean coffee and much more.
hotel.airportsDesc: Fort Lauderdale -Hollywood International Airport, (FLL), 3.00, MI, NE; Miami International, (MIA), 28.00, MI, N;

facility.desc: Delicious burgers named after the famous Dolphins football coach, Don Shula. Enjoy salads, chicken, hot dogs and the best milk shakes in town. Beer and wine are also available. Located directly across the street from hotel.

hotel.name: aloft Chesapeake
hotel.description: Aloft hotels are the new twist in travel from Starwood Hotels & Resorts. A vision of W Hotels, the Aloft Chesapeake is a bold, fresh, and fun new hotel featuring loft-inspired design and always-abuzz public spaces. Perfectly positioned for an easy breezy travel experience in Virginia's Hampton Roads region, with easy airport access thanks to our free shuttle! Find fashion, food, and films five minutes up the road at Greenbrier Mall. Or explore the surrounding sights under an hour away, from nearby Norfolk's culture and commerce to Virginia Beach's boardwalk! Business visitors enjoy equally easy access to the area's maritime and military facilities. Rise and shine in our bright and modern Aloft rooms, featuring plush platform beds, walk-in showers, custom amenities by Bliss® Spa and more. Recharge all your gadgets with the plug & play docking station, which also links your laptop or tunes to the 42 LCD TV. Meet and mingle at our w xyz(SM) bar, grab a snack at the 24/7 re:fuel by Aloft(SM) gourmet pantry, or work and play at our re:mix(SM) lounge. Plenty of perks include free hotel-wide Wi-Fi, our always-open re:charge(SM) gym, stylish splash pool, and more!
hotel.airportsDesc: Norfolk International Airport, (ORF), 13.00, MI;

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Framingham
hotel.description:
Stay at this Framingham, Massachusetts hotel and enjoy comfortable accommodations convenient to Natick Mall, Shopper's World, Staples Corporation and TJX Corporation.
Whether traveling for business or for pleasure, the BEST WESTERN Framingham is committed to providing guests with all the amenities and services needed to ensure a comfortable stay. Guests staying at this Framingham hotel will enjoy spacious guest rooms featuring cable satellite television with HBO® and free wireless high-speed Internet access, some with balconies.
To help start the day off right, this Natick area hotel provides a complimentary continental breakfast and free newspaper every morning. The hotel's restaurant provides guests with a convenient and scrumptious dining option. To make traveling even more comfortable while staying at the BEST WESTERN Framingham, guests are welcome to take advantage of the on-site indoor heated swimming pool and sauna.
Traveling for business? The hotel's onsite business center and meeting facilities accommodating up to 35 people makes conducting business stress-free. Business travelers will especially appreciate the BEST WESTERN Framingham's proximity to corporate locations such as TJX Corporation and Staples Corporation.
Located in the heart of the famous Golden Mile area, the BEST WESTERN Framingham is close to where travelers want to be while visiting Framingham. Shopping enthusiasts will find a variety of brand name and unique shops at nearby Shopper's World and the Natick Mall. Take the family and spend an afternoon exploring the Franklin Zoo or the New England Aquarium.
Venture out for a 15 mile drive to downtown Boston to tour many historical sites and points of interest including Faneuil Hall Marketplace. The friendly, helpful staff at the BEST WESTERN Framingham is ready

hotel.name: Hollywood Beach Resort Cruise Port
hotel.description:
The Hollywood Beach Resort Cruise Port Hotel is a beachfront historical hotel located at the southern end of Port Everglades Cruise Port in Ft. Lauderdale/Hollywood Beach. Also referred to as the "Grand Lady", built in 1925 by the world renown Rubish and Hunter architects similar to the Mediterranean Revival Style popularized by Adison Mizner, the society architect of the famed Biltmore Hotel located in Miami, Florida. It sits right on Hollywood Beach, a family-friendly award-winning beach with the renovated Hollywood Broadwalk voted by Travel & Leisure as one of "America's Best Beach Boardwalk." The Broadwalk features more than two miles of auto-free walking, biking and rollerblading with a beautiful view of sparkling tropical water. Shops, cafes, and restaurants line the Broadwalk. Hollywood, Florida is a great destination for fun in the sun for families, singles and couples, and groups.

The historic Hollywood Beach Resort Hotel is located 15 minutes from the Ft. Lauderdale/Hollywood Airport (FLL). Nestled midway between the Ft. Lauderdale and Miami Beaches, the Hollywood Beach Resort is a 15 minute drive to Port Everglades Cruise Port, and is only 30 minutes from the famous Art Deco District in Miami's South Beach.

A Shuttle service is available to both Ft. Lauderdale/Hollywood Airport (FLL) and to Port Everglades Cruise Port for a nominal fee.

Resort Fee includes:Unlimited access to the Fitness center, Newspaper - USA Today, Wireless Internet throughout the Hotel,Pool side and Fitness towels, Unlimited use of Chairs, Chaise lounges on Pool deck, In room safe,Cable TV with Showtime,Local Calls,Incoming Fax service. Self Parking $15 per day. Valet Parking $18 per day.

You must be 21yrs or older to check in.

BOOK NOW.BETTER BEACHES.BETTER PORTS..BETTER FLIGHTS.BETTER PRICES
hotel.airportsDesc: FLL - Ft. Lauderdale International Airport MIA - Miami International Airport

hotel.name: Tidewater Beach Resort by Wyndham Vacation Rentals
hotel.description:
Two large Gulf front lagoon pools rest on either side of Tidewater Beach Resort, overlooking 636 feet of pristine private beachfront. A 4,300 sq. ft. beachfront fitness center offers a second heated indoor pool in addition to a Roman spa, steam room, sauna and top of the line Precor fitness equipment. A gift shop, video arcade game room, seasonal poolside Tiki bar, and the Endless Summer Grill casual restaurant are also located on site. The 5,000 square foot conference center, with a movie and media center, makes Tidewater an excellent choice for meetings, reunions and other group getaways. Each luxury Gulf-front condo at Tidewater features upscale interiors, a furnished private balcony with Gulf views, a fully equipped kitchen with upgraded appliances, washer and dryer in unit, complimentary wireless Internet access, and the option of one, two or three bedrooms. The resort schedules activities for children seasonally, which is an added bonus for vacationing families, and visitors also enjoy complimentary DVD rentals.
Please note that a USD 135.92 cleaning fee and 6 percent resort fee will be collected at booking.
Persons booking unit must be over 25 and occupy unit for entire rental period. No singles under 25 w/o guardian. This property is smoke-free. The front desk is open from 9am-5pm daily. Daily housekeeping is available between 9am-5pm.
All no-shows are non-refundable and subject to 100 percent cancellation fee and there will be no refunds for early departures or late arrivals. Cancellations made on the day of arrival will be considered no-shows and incur a 100 percent cancellation fee. Cancellations made prior to the day of arrival are subject to a penalty of the first night room plus applicable taxes and fees.

hotel.name: Seaport Boston Hotel
hotel.description: Seaports fresh and inviting surroundings reflect its rejuvenating location on Bostons historic waterfront. Stunning views, convenient location and gracious staff set this Four-Diamond hotel apart. Once inside, Seaport delights with unparalleled service, innovative amenities including a unique service-inclusive policy and technology that is always a step ahead. Conveniently located on the waterfront just a short water taxi ride from Logan International Airport and minutes from South Station, Seaport is also within walking distance of the new Institute of Contemporary Art, the Boston Childrens Museum, the New England Aquarium and the historic Freedom Trail. World-class shopping, gourmet dining and family fun are all within reach with Seaport as your hub. Relax in one of 428 newly-renovated non-smoking guest rooms offering stunning water and city views, luxurious linens, Bose Wave Music Systems, deluxe amenities, in-room coffee systems and complimentary wireless Internet. Guests also have the opportunity to participate in an in-room recycling program. Please note: From now through early April 2014 the Seaport Hotel will be undertaking an exciting renovation of our guest rooms. The renovation will not be visible to guests as it will take place on floors closed to the public. There may be some construction noise during business hours (8 a.m. until 5 p.m. Monday-Saturday). PET-FRIENDLY The Seaport Hotel is delighted to welcome your pet as long as it occupies the same room as it's owner, does not weigh more than 23 kilograms (50lbs) and is not left in the guest room without supervision. Additional conditions may apply. Self-Parking Nightly Rate = $32 Valet Parking Nightly Rate = $42
hotel.airportsDesc: BOS - Boston Logan International Airport.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc:
Seaport's dedicated meeting professionals work closely with each client to orchestrate every detail of their meeting or conference. With over 200,000 sq. ft. of flexible conference, meeting and exhibition space, as well as indoor and outdoor venues, the combined facility offers 41 functions rooms, as well as a 396-seat amphitheater; all feature high-speed internet access and complimentary wireless internet access.
Plan your next conference or meeting and benefit from 24-hour a day dedicated meeting planning support, a technical staff to assist in the production, and on-site audio/video production facilities by Projection Presentation Technology.

facility.title: Aura Restaurant
facility.desc:
Experience the award-winning Aura restaurant and savor the globally-influenced, contemporary American cuisine of Chef Rachel Klein.
AAA Award - for providing excellent service, exceptional fine cuisine and an elegant dining atmosphere
Wine Spectator's "Award of Excellence" - for breadth, depth and overall quality of the wine selections and the appropriateness of the wine list choices with the restaurant's cuisine
"Best Upscale Seafood Restaurant" in the 2003 Best of Boston edition of Boston magazine

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Seaport Hotel & Seaport World Trade Center has close proximity to Logan International Airport, Boston's financial district and Back Bay.

facility.title: Deluxe Guestroom
facility.desc: This guest room offers one king bed or 2 double beds. All of our guest rooms have been completely renovated - from handcrafted cherry furniture painstakingly restored to its original condition, to a vibrant color palette, comfortable pillow top mattresses and fresh, luxurious linens including 300 thread-count sheets, deluxe down pillows and a lofty, 20 oz. fill hypoallergenic down blanket. Bose Wave Radios,Melitta one cup coffee maker with its special pod brewing system, Large work desk, in-wall safe large enough for laptops, marble floors, designer bath amenities,thick terry robes and oversized bath towels,bathroom with fog-free mirrors and hair dryer.

facility.title: Tamo bar
facility.desc: In addition to a complete bar menu, guests enjoy the casual atmosphere and specialty martinis of Tamo Bar.

facility.title: Seaport Cafe
facility.desc: The Seaport Cafe serves up light breakfast and lunch fare including delicious breads, pastries, homemade sandwiches, soups and freshly-brewed Starbucks coffee.

facility.title: In-room dining
facility.desc: In-room dining is also available during specified hours.

facility.title: Harbor View King Guest Rooms
facility.desc: Relax in our comfortable Harbor View King and enjoy Boston waterfront views from this luxurious hotel room boasting handcrafted cherry wood furniture and a king size pillow-top bed. This water view room also has a Seaportal, an in room web portal, available for the duration of your stay.

hotel.name: Birmingham Marriott
hotel.description: The superior quality and location of our Birmingham hotel will make every trip a pleasure. Centrally located off I-459 and highway 280 and near the Summit outdoor plaza, we offer a complimentary shuttle service to local businesses and restaurants within a two mile radius. If it's family fun you want, Alabama Adventure Amusement Park and the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail are just minutes away, and our indoor pool is great for splashing with the kids. At the center of our hotel is the Marriott Greatroom; flexible seating and spaces with a contemporary style and design, a coffee bar proudly serving Starbucks® coffee, and a chef-crafted menu of small plates and pours. Guest rooms feature ultra comfortable bedding, flat screen LCD HDTVs, and ergonomic work spaces. For your important meeting or special occasion, our state-of-the-art event facilities, custom catering and certified wedding planner are perfect for a flawless event.
hotel.airportsDesc: Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport, (BHM), 12.00, MI, SE;

facility.title: RC Grille
facility.desc: RC Grille features small plates with unique flavors that appeal to a wide array of tastes, perfect to enjoy with your favorite beverage. The RC Grille menu also includes a variety of great steaks, fresh seafood, soups, salads, desserts, and more.

hotel.name: San Francisco Marriott Marquis
hotel.description: Discover the Downtown San Francisco Marriott Marquis Hotel which exudes an essence of modern luxury and the convenience of an extraordinary hotel in downtown San Francisco, CA. Just south of Market Street, this hotel in the SOMA district is next to the Moscone Convention Center and steps away from the Yerba Buena Gardens, renowned museums and cultural attractions, world-class shopping on Union Square, and AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. Enjoy inspiring penthouse views and cocktails at The View Lounge or the finest contemporary cuisine at Mission Grille before retiring to luxuriously appointed San Francisco, CA hotel rooms and suites. Renowned as a meeting hotel in San Francisco, this business hotel provides flexible and expansive event venues to accommodate both grand and intimate San Francisco hotel receptions. Whether in town for business or pleasure, experience San Francisco at the Marriott Marquis hotel in San Francisco, CA where you're sure to leave your heart.
hotel.airportsDesc: San Francisco International Airport, (SFO), 13.80, MI, NW; Oakland International Airport, (OAK), 20.00, MI, NW; Norman Y Mineta San Jose International Airport, (SJC), 45.00, MI, NW;

facility.title: Bin 55 Restaurant and Wine Bar
facility.desc: Our on-site downtown San Francisco restaurant is the place to see and be seen, serving craft beers and wines by the glass enjoyed over a quick lunch or casual dinner. Located on the Lobby Level, Open 7 days a week from 11am-11pm.

facility.title: The View Lounge
facility.desc: The iconic View Lounge, our own rooftop restaurant in San Francisco, is the ideal destination for business and leisure guests to enjoy hand crafted cocktails and locally inspired small plates accompanied by the best views the city has to offer.

facility.title: Mission Grille - Breakfast Buffet
facility.desc: Mission Grille serves breakfast daily offering a San Francisco-inspired buffet complete with an “eggs-to-order station.” Located on the Second Level. Open 7 days a week from 6:30am-10:00am.

facility.title: Starbucks®
facility.desc: Starbucks® is located on the Lobby Level. Open 7 days a week at 5:30am each morning. Enjoy breakfast sandwiches, fresh pastries and Bistro Boxes for the on-the-go individual.

hotel.name: Star Island Resort and Club
hotel.description:
Star Island Resort & Club is a luxurious Mediterranean style resort with 1 and 3 bedroom villas with a 2 person whirlpool tub in the master bedroom, marble foyers, private balconies, full kitchen, and separate dinning/living areas. Featuring a world class pool and spa, with single and packaged full service pampering. The resort is home of the Star Island Tennis College with 9 tennis courts for all levels of play. Additionally, this beautiful resort is located on Lake Cecile and 4 miles away from Walt Disney World Theme Parks.

The Spa at Star Island, Star Island Salon, Celebrity Fitness Center, Fishing, Recreation and Planned Activities Programs - 7 days a week. Minutes from Walt Disney World and Major Attractions, Tennis Courts, Game Room, Fitness Center, Laundry Room, Driving Range, Bicycle Rentals, Paddle Boats, Vending Machines, Basketball Court, Bounce House, Soda Machines Indoor/Outdoor Whirlpools,Children's Playground, Outdoor Pools (2).

Roll-away Beds are available for $10 per day.

Star Island Resort will require a $200 credit card authorization upon check in per unit. A $10 per room per day Resort Fee will be charged at checkout.

The resort is cash free and will no longer accept cash. Owners and guests may charge purchases to their credit card or charge purchases to their room with an authorized credit card on file.
hotel.airportsDesc: Orlando International Airport approximate driving time is 20 minutes and distance is 17 miles.

Featuring a master bedroom with two double beds, a den complete with a queen sleeper sofa and a kitchenette equipped with two stove top burners, coffee maker, microwave, dishwasher, mini refrigerator and utensils. 1 Bathroom. Complimentary premium channels. 600 square feet. Daily housekeeping services available for an additional surcharge. A refundable $200 Security Deposit is required at check in.

facility.title: Three Bedroom Villa
facility.desc: One king bed, two double beds and two queen sofa beds. Furnished balcony or patio. Kitchen with microwave, refrigerator, oven, stove, dishwasher, coffeemaker, blender, toaster, cookware and dinnerware. Dining table and chairs. CD player, VCR and complimentary premium channels. Two bathrooms including master bath with Jacuzzi, separate shower and dual vanities. Washer and dryer. 1,450 square feet. Daily housekeeping services available for an additional surcharge. A refundable $200 Security Deposit is required at check in.

facility.title: One Bedroom Deluxe
facility.desc: One king bed and one queen sofa bed. Furnished balcony or patio. 1 Bathroom. Kitchen with microwave, refrigerator, oven, stove, dishwasher, coffeemaker, blender, toaster, cookware and dinnerware. Dining table and chairs. CD player, VCR, and complimentary premium channels. Bathroom with jetted tub, separate shower and dual vanities. Washer and dryer. 850 square feet. Daily housekeeping services available for an additional surcharge. A refundable $200 Security Deposit is required at check in.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The Star Island Resort and Club in Kissimmee, Fla. is located 4 miles from Disney World and other attractions including beaches that Orlando has to offer. This Lake Cecile resort is 4 miles from Downtown Disney, 7 miles from the Orange County Convention Center, 7 miles from Sea World and 12 miles from Universal Studios.

hotel.name: Omphoy Ocean Resort
hotel.description:
With a private beachfront location, panoramic water views and an unpretentious air, The Omphoy Ocean Resort is set to create a new standard for boutique oceanfront luxury and sophisticated chic. As the first new hotel on the pristine shores of Palm Beach in over 18 years, The Omphoy will offer a fresh approach to the current Palm Beach hotel scene. The Omphoy boasts 134 guestrooms and suites, all of which offer a spacious balcony, terrace or large picture windows that open the rooms to spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean or the Intracoastal Waterway.
Each guestroom at The Omphoy features custom-designed furniture and beds that cocoon guests in crisp white sheeting.
Keeping consistent with the serene design scheme, porcelain bronze infused tiles will cover the floors of all guestrooms and bathrooms, bringing the energy of the earth inside.Complimentary wireless internet to hotel guests, Complimentary Beach/Pool Chairs (surcharges apply to umbrellas, cabanas and other equipment).

Please note:
Food and Beverage provided by outside /non-hotel sources are not permitted into the resort, Nightly parking fees apply at $25 per night, Pets are welcome at 20lbs and under, pet fee is $100.00


Property will be undergoing renovations from May through December. There will be some noise in the beginning Monday through Friday 9am to 6pm, nothing before or after and nothing on the weekends. The hotel will be fully functional and will not affect the property amenities. Guests will not be incovenienced.
hotel.airportsDesc: Palm Beach International, PBI. Miami International, MIA. Ft. Lauderdale Airport.
hotel.areaServed: Palm Beach, West Palm Beach, North Palm Beach, Singer Island, Riviera, Lake Worth, Delray, Boynton Beach.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Naperville Inn
hotel.description:
For a small city, Naperville, Illinois has no shortage of things to do - and the BEST WESTERN Naperville Inn is the perfect starting point for exploring all that the area has to offer!
While our convenient location along the I-88 business corridor appeals to corporate travelers visiting Alcatel-Lucent Technologies, Navistar®, Fermilab, Kraft Foods and other local corporations, we also offer easy access to Naperville's most popular attractions. Enjoy the thrill of collegiate sports at nearby North Central College, Wheaton College or Benedictine College, or score on designer duds at the Chicago Premium Outlet Mall. Indulge your inner culture buff with a performance at Wentz Concert Hall or spend hours strolling along picturesque paths and bridges through the Naperville Riverwalk, located just two miles away. This Naperville hotel is also a great spot to come home to after a day of finger-licking fun at the annual Ribfest, voted one of the country's best BBQ events.
Our top-notch customer service and affordable rates are only part of the appeal of this pet-friendly Naperville hotel. Guests enjoy modern and spacious rooms with features that include high-speed wired and wireless Internet access, cable television with HBO®, a microwave, refrigerator and a complimentary continental breakfast each morning. Additional hotel amenities include an exercise facility, dry sauna, meeting room and free parking.
Located just 25 miles from downtown Chicago and O'Hare International Airport, BEST WESTERN Naperville Inn makes it easy to enjoy Chicago and beyond. Book today and save!

hotel.name: Hyatt French Quarter
hotel.description: The Hyatt French Quarter is located in the French Quarter adjacent to Bourbon Street in New Orleans, Louisiana. This smoke-free hotel offers 254 guestrooms with 12 foot ceilings, completely renovated in 2012. Many rooms include balconies that overlook the French Quarter, courtyards or Bourbon Street. The property offers more than 10,660 square feet of customizable function space located in one central area of the hotel's first floor. The Hyatt French Quarter can accommodate meetings and/or events from 3 to 300 people with our 10 meeting rooms. The hotel is located within walking distance of the Audubon Aquarium, Bourbon Street, Jackson Square, Royal Street shopping, French Market, Streetcars and the New Orleans Superdome.
hotel.airportsDesc: Louis Armstrong New Orleans Intl. Airport, (MSY), 12.90, MI, S;

This smoke-free hotel offers 254 guestrooms with 12 foot ceilings, completely renovated in 2012. Many rooms include balconies that overlook the French Quarter, courtyards or Bourbon Street. The property offers more than 10,660 square feet of customizable function space located in one central area of the hotel's first floor. The Hyatt French Quarter can accommodate meetings and/or events from 3 to 300 people with our 10 meeting rooms. facility.title: Hard Rock Cafe
facility.desc: Hard Rock New Orleans is a haven for fans of music, food and great times. Whether you are down for a Legendary Burger, Live Music, a Classic Tee, or the latest Collectible pin, there's something for everyone.

facility.title: Powdered Sugar
facility.desc: Three meal market concept offering regional dishes, coffee program, grab and go selection, and retail/sundries. Will have a beverage program offering beer and wine. Counter service with limited table service.

facility.title: Red Fish Grill
facility.desc: Casual New Orleans seafood dominates a menu peppered with Big Easy favorites like Hickory Grilled Redfish, BBQ Oysters, Alligator Sausage and Seafood Gumbo and a wide variety of Gulf fish available every night.

hotel.name: Hotel Mazarin
hotel.description: The new Hotel Mazarin, formerly the Saint Louis Hotel, is a French Quarter diamond featuring 102 brilliant and spacious rooms and the French Quarter's most elegant courtyard with European style fountain as its centerpiece. Most guestrooms are thoughtfully appointed to cater to the modern traveler while preserving New Orleans' signature charm. Luxury Has a New Address Step outside and enjoy the jazz resonating in the streets and galleries and shops just a half block away on Royal Street. When you are in the mood to experience the lively nightlife and music New Orleans is known for, Bourbon Street is also just a half block away. Enjoy a nightcap at the only French Quarter wine bar, Patrick's Bar Vin, offering a selection of fine wines from around the world. Bespoke service is accompanied by complimentary amenities including wireless Internet, breakfast, local phone calls, in-room coffee, bottled water, newspaper, Egyptian cotton robe and slippers, safe, and cube coolers. In addition, hotel guests will enjoy our private courtyard setting with renaissance inspired fountain, a 24 hour fitness and business center. To complete the offerings, spa services by Spa Laje are available in the comfort and privacy of your room. Ideal Setting for Business Meetings or Special Events The Hotel Mazarin offers one of the most unique settings for New Orleans meetings and special events. Whether you are staging an intimate dinner for 20 guests, an executive business meeting for 40 guests or an elaborate theme party for 175 guests, our flexible indoor and outdoor banquet facilities ensure that space, and style, are never an issue. Our meeting rooms open onto our beautiful weather protected courtyard for meals and breaks. Hotel Mazarin is a member of the New Orleans Hotel Collection. We invite you to stay with us. French Quarter Accommodations Our 102 guestrooms offer comfortable beds; luxurious bathrooms with spacious vanity areas and walk-in showers. Egyptian waffle cotton robes and slippers are provided for your comfort. "Michelangelo" black porcelain tile and granite finishes and top of the line European inspired toiletries make this small, luxury boutique hotel a relaxing sanctuary for guests. 42 flat screen televisions, iPod/iPhone docking station clocks and complimentary WiFi are thoughtfully featured with the modern guest in mind. Added to these luxurious "bricks and mortar" refinements the hotel provides knowledgeable attendants to assist with every need, to assure your comfort, and to anticipate your desires. Our French Quarter accommodations offer a variety of room types including French Quarter balconies and three suites. Many of our spacious guest rooms overlook our French Quarter courtyard and feature a writing desk, beverage coolers, safes, complimentary local calls, daily newspaper, bottled water and in-room coffee. All rooms are non smoking. A $250.00 penalty fee applies.
hotel.airportsDesc: New Orleans International Airport.

hotel.name: The Anza - a Calabasas Hotel
hotel.description:
Reflecting the stylish and inviting ambiance of Calabasas itself, The Anza features modern design and contemporary decor with a casual vibe. While our personal attention to service creates a welcoming environment, not unlike what you would expect while staying with close friends, The Anza offers an entirely new hotel experience in Calabasas.
Casual but timeless, modern but comfortable. Enter the bright and airy lobby designed with areas to socialize and relax. With communal tables, lounge seating around a fireplace, and media den, its the perfect spot to gather with friends or meet new ones. Graze Bistro & Bar provides tempting farm-to-table favorites and refreshing beverages, while The Market offers grab-and-go snacks and other sundries. Enjoy a cabana at the pool or a brisk workout. Or simply retreat to your oversized guest room where a neutral color palette creates an inviting sense of calm and comfort and mindful amenities provide all the comforts of home. Please note: Parking will be $5 per night, per car beginning 2/3/2014.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc:
The Anza is located immediately off Hwy. 101, about 30 miles from Los Angeles International Airport and 20 miles from Bob Hope Airport in Burbank. Corporate travelers find our location convenient when visiting Pepperdine University and businesses in Malibu, Los Angeles, Woodland Hills, Agoura Hills, Thousand Oaks and the Warner Center corporate parks.
Vacation travelers also find The Anza central to their favorite attractions. Malibus amazing beaches, the Getty Museum, Universal Studios and Hollywood are all nearby. And during your stay dont miss the opportunity to experience quintessential Calabasas.

facility.title: DELUXE - ROOM
facility.desc:
Wrapped in warm decor and an abundance of space, our Deluxe Rooms are perfect for a quick overnight trip or weekend getaway. With over 350 square feet in size, they feature the following great amenities:

Plush beds featuring Simmons Beautyrest pillow top mattresses and fine linens, Spacious bathroom with extended vanity counter-top and walk-in shower with rain shower head, Flat screen LCD TV with cable and premium channels plus pay-per-view movies, Desk with ergonomic work chair, Coffeemaker with complimentary coffee, Microwave and refrigerator, Complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access, Voicemail and complimentary local telephone calls, Hair dryer and iron/ironing board, Blackout drapes.

facility.title: EXECUTIVE - ROOM
facility.desc:
Larger than our Deluxe Rooms at 400 square feet in size, Executive Rooms are ideal for business or group travelers, as well as families and feature the following great amenities:
Plush beds featuring Simmons Beautyrest pillow top mattresses and fine linens, Sofa Sleeper, Spacious bathroom with extended vanity counter-top and walk-in shower with rain shower head, Flat screen LCD TV with cable and premium channels plus pay-per-view movies, Desk with ergonomic work chair, Coffeemaker with complimentary coffee, Microwave and refrigerator, Complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access, Voicemail and complimentary local telephone calls, Hair dryer and iron/ironing board, Blackout drapes.

facility.title: EXECUTIVE - QUAD
facility.desc:
Larger than our Deluxe Rooms at 400 square feet in size, Executive Rooms are ideal for business or group travelers, as well as families and feature the following great amenities:
Plush beds featuring Simmons Beautyrest pillow top mattresses and fine linens, Spacious bathroom with extended vanity counter-top and walk-in shower with rain shower head, Flat screen LCD TV with cable and premium channels plus pay-per-view movies, Desk with ergonomic work chair, Coffeemaker with complimentary coffee, Microwave and refrigerator, Complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access, Voicemail and complimentary local telephone calls, Hair dryer and iron/ironing board, Blackout drapes.

hotel.name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Orleans Convention Cent
hotel.description: The Hampton Inn & Suites New Orleans-Convention Center hotel is located across the street from the New Orleans Convention Center and the Port of New Orleans in the Arts and Warehouse district and eight blocks from the French Quarter. Our hotel is near the Superdome, Sports Arena, Harrah's Casino, Riverwalk and within walking distance to several of the finest restaurants in New Orleans, Louisiana. Additional dining options include: Deannie's, Grill Room and the Praline Connection, all less than a mile from our hotel. We are the closest hotel to the Cruise Ship Terminal. Our Hampton Inn & Suites hotel in Louisiana features studio suites with mini-kitchens, hospitality suites with separate bedrooms, Jacuzzi rooms, phones with voicemail, complimentary wireless high-speed internet access, and outdoor pool. Each room is equipped with coffeemaker, hair dryer, and 27 inch TV with cable.In addition to our complimentary continental breakfast, we also offer connecting rooms, cribs, exercise gym, irons, catering, audio visual service, valet parking, and same day dry cleaning service (Monday-Saturday). Laundry/valet services, meeting/banquet facilities, audio visual equipment, valet parking, and rollaway beds are available for a nominal fee.We love having you here at the Hampton Inn & Suites New Orleans-Convention Center hotel in Louisiana!

hotel.name: Sheraton Columbia Town Center Hotel
hotel.description: Come experience a whole new feel at Sheraton Columbia Town Center Hotel. Our $12 million renovation project encompassed a fresh new lobby as well as 290 transformed guest rooms, offering calm, stylish décor and Sheraton Sweet Sleeper™ Beds plus sleek new bathrooms. Weve added and refurbished function spaces, moved and remodeled our sleek Lobby Lounge, ideal for enjoying light bites or cocktails, and renewed the fine, award-winning Waterside Restaurant, where carefully prepared and delicious local cuisine is served amidst crystal, fresh flowers and views of the lake. Connect with guests, work, or family at the new Link@Sheraton experienced with Microsoft, located on our lobby level. Centrally located between Baltimore's Inner Harbor and Washington D.C., the Sheraton Columbia Town Center Hotel has everything you need for work and for play. Stroll around our 12 wooded acres in Columbia, Maryland, overlooking the serene Lake Kittamaquandi. Shopping, sporting events, and more are all nearby. Complimentary garage and outdoor parking is available. When you return from a full day of meetings or sightseeing, youll feel brand new after experiencing our refreshing outdoor pool and 24-hour state of the art fitness facility. Create a memorable wedding in our renovated Lakeview and Terrace Ballrooms, each with views of the lake. Or, try one of our Executive Boardrooms featuring a flat screen TV/projector, speakerphones and wireless High Speed Internet Access. Well welcome you, making your stay as comfortable and convenient as possible while keeping you connected to the ones you love. You belong at the Sheraton Columbia Town Center Hotel.
hotel.airportsDesc: Baltimore Washington Intl, (BWI), 16.00, MI; Washington Dulles International, (IAD), 47.00, MI;

hotel.name: Valley Forge Casino Resort - Casino Tower
hotel.description:
The Hotel will have power shutdown on Sunday evening June 22, 2014 to complete necessary repairs to the main power supply to the facility. The power will be out for up to 6 hours. Valley Forge Casino Resort - Recent multimillion renovation located in heart of Valley Forge Business District. The Hotel is connected to the Convention Center and the Casino. Only 20 minutes from Philadelphia.
The casino is now open! The Valley Forge Casino Resort will be the region's only full-amenity gaming resort with live table games and all the latest and greatest slot machines. From the excitement, sound, decor, and vibe and of course a vast selection of games, you will immediately know you are some place special. Want table games? We'll have all your favorites. Blackjack, Craps, Roulette, Pai Gow Poker, and Mini and Midi Baccarat. Crave slots? We've got that covered too. All your favorite slots and denominations will be on hand just waiting for your winning touch. 600 slot machines and 50 table games.

2300 outdoor parking spaces available, sprinklers and smoke detectors in all areas, pets not allowed at hotel

Hotel overlooks Valley Forge National Park. It is less than 1 mile from King of Prussia Mall. The hotel has an extensive and large scale Fitness Center that includes large scale Fitness Center that includes top of the line equipment, certified massage therapists and more.

Seven new on-site restaurants, a casino, and a nightclub
The Valley Tavern, Nosh Deli, American Grill, Italian Market and Asian Noodle are now open. Viviano and Pacific Prime open in Spring.

Access to the casino is easy!
- Guests of the property (21 or older) who are attending a convention, meeting or a private function are granted access to the casino floor.
- Guests who spend a minimum of $10 in one of our dining, nightlife or retail outlets are granted access to the casino floor.
- Guest who Purchase a Resort Membership ($20) get unlimited access to the casino and more. What you get:
- Unlimited access to the casino floor for you and one guest for the term of the membership
- 10% off every meal
-Invitations to exclusive food and beverage events

Ask about our Dining and Entertainment Memberships!
hotel.airportsDesc: Philadelphia International Airport

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Driving direction from the airport: From Airport Exit, turn right on Industrial Hwy and continue on Penrose Ave. Turn left on S 26th St and follow signs to take I-76 west. Take Exit 328 (W Dekalb Pike/Rte 202 north) and follow signs toward Mall Blvd. Bear right onto N Gulph Rd, then turn right on 1st Ave. The hotel is on the left.

facility.title: Suites w/Free Wirless Internet
facility.desc: One king or 1 queen bed. Triple sheeting, duvet and oversized pillows. Floors 1-6. 350-4000 sqaure feet. Spearate master bedroom and sitting area. Two person soaking tub in bathroom. Sitting room has loveseat, armchair and L-shaped desk with ergonomic chair. Three multi-line phones, voice mail, in-room safe, cable/satellite TV with premium TV. Two TVs, pay movies, video games (surcharge). Coffee/tea maker, hair dryer, iron/ironing board.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Over 15,000 square feet of space and 28 meeting rooms. Meeting rooms include ISDN lines, 2 walls equipped with moveable track white boards, fully adjustable ergonomic flex chairs, hard surface work tables with modesty panels, acoustically designed space. All non-smoking.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: 160 guestrooms and two room suites offer triple-sheeted beds with oversize pillows, desks with ergonomic chairs, pay movies and video games. Complimentary wireless internet access, courtesy shuttle takes guests to King of Prussia Mall.

facility.title: Traditional /w Free Wireless Internet
facility.desc: One king or two queen beds. Triple sheeting, duvet and oversized pillows. Two multi-line phones, voice mail, in-room safe. Cable/satellite TV with premium channels. Video games (surcharge), pay movies, coffee/tea maker, hair dryer, iron/ironing board.

facility.title: The Valley Tavern
facility.desc: With touches of classic old world decor combined with a new world warm and friendly atmosphere, the Valley Tavern is the perfect spot to grab a pint of one of the several beers on tap. Choose from one of their several comfort food dishes, such as Shepherd's Pie or Fish & Chips. Be sure to catch live music on select nights.

facility.title: Nosh Deli
facility.desc: Open daily for breakfast and lunch, Nosh is the place to go for a quick bite on the go. With sandwiches piled high with delicious meats and cheeses, the oversized portions will be sure to satisfy your hunger.

facility.title: American Grill
facility.desc: Freshly prepared burgers, cheese steaks, hot dogs, fries and a variety of domestic draft beers are just some of the great American favorites you will find at American Grill.

facility.title: Italian Market
facility.desc: At this casual cafe-style Italian Market, you will find freshly prepared salads and pasta dishes, pizza, Stromboli, fresh focaccia and more. The market is open from breakfast until late night, welcoming diners throughout the day

facility.title: Asian Noodle
facility.desc: One of the micro-restaurants located just off the casino floor, Asianoodle is the perfect place to go for a quick bite. Serving traditional Asian fare such as noodle soups, dim sum, sushi and wok dishes.

hotel.name: Days Inn San Antonio/ATT Center
hotel.description:
San Antonio's Stock Show and Rodeo Hotel Welcomes You!
Step into Days Inn East an enjoy our newly renovated hotels San Antonio Style! Our friendly staff will make you feel right at home; comfortable, relaxed and ready to enjoy all San Antonio has to offer. Centrally located on I-10 just three miles east of downtown San Antonio and just 5 blocks from the AT&T Center, Days Inn East is close to everything! All of our newly renovated rooms include: FREE Daybreak Breakfast, FREE High-Speed Wireless Internet, FREE local calls and FREE USA Today paper.
We are only minutes from: The historic Alamo, the famed Riverwalk, Brackenridge Park, Hemisfair Park, the IMAX Theater, El Mercado, San Fernando Cathedral and other historic missions await you. There are also the Botanical Gardens, fun filled Splashtown, Sea World and Six Flags Fiesta Texas and much, much more!
We at Days Inn know that you have many choices when it comes to choosing a hotel that best fits your family's needs, we appreciate that you have chosen us to be your home away from home.

hotel.name: Chapel Hill University Inn
hotel.description:
The Chapel Hill University Inn is known as the Home of the Sports Experience and showcases UNC sports memorabilia throughout the hotel. Colorful ACC school team banners jerseys a baseball dugout a locker room and sports equipment adorn the lobby.
Located just 2 miles from the University of North Carolina campus and downtown Chapel Hill. 4 miles from UNC Hospitals including Memorial Hospital NC Womens and Childrens Hospital Neurosciences and Cancer Hospital. Within 5 minutes to any UNC sports venue. 7 miles from Duke University and downtown Durham.
On-site restaurant and sports bar. Open for breakfast and dinner. Room service available. 17 HDTVs pool tables nightly drink specials and video games. Outside covered patio area and 2 bars.
Guest Amenities include free wireless internet in guest rooms and public areas free local phone calls daily local shuttle service to designated stops seasonal outdoor pool business center guest laundry and complimentary gourmet coffee 247. Fitness center on site or guests have free access to Kinetix a brand new fitness facility. Pet Friendly rooms. -USD40 non-refundable pet fee applies- Beautiful Courtyard area offers gas grill picnic area and covered sitting area with Adirondack chairs. Bottled water and turn down service on arrival.
Rooms equipped with coffee maker ironboard hairdryer curved shower rods and voice mail system.
Walking distance to Trader Joes Starbucks SteinMart several restaurants shopping grocery and drug stores. On local free fare bus line. Free parking. Bus parking available.
2432 sq. feet of meeting and banquet facilities. Full catering menus available.
Hotel is two story exterior corridor property.

hotel.name: Sheraton Norfolk Waterside Hotel
hotel.description:
Norfolk's only waterfront hotel, Sheraton Norfolk Waterside Hotel offers a source of comfort and familiarity. A recent multi-million renovation has brought a fresh, new look and comforting touches to our 468 guest rooms, eight suites, hallways, meeting space, lobby, interior, and exterior.
Our downtown Norfolk neighborhood will immediately make you feel at ease. Waterside Marketplace, featuring over 100 specialty shops, restaurants, and entertainment venues, is just steps away. Or Town Point Park is a beautiful spot to enjoy panoramic river views while taking a jog or a relaxing stroll. Take a sunset cruise on the Spirit of Norfolk, or explore one of the many nearby museums and memorials, including the MacArthur Memorial, the USS Wisconsin Museum, and the Chrysler Museum of Art. History and culture await.
After a day of shopping and sightseeing, take a relaxing dip in our seasonal outdoor pool or re-energize in our complimentary fitness center. Then slip beneath the soft blanket, cozy duvet, and crisp sheets of our Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed for a relaxing end to your day. High Speed Internet Access will keep you connected to home, even when you're miles away.
Our friendly staff will anticipate your needs and help you plan a great event in our over 32,000 square feet of flexible space. Then, spend a pleasant evening with colleagues, family, or friends on the Norfolk waterfront at our City Dock Restaurant.
Come join us at Sheraton Norfolk Waterside Hotel and stay connected to what means most to you.
hotel.airportsDesc: Norfolk International Airport, (ORF), 10.00, MI;
hotel.areaServed: Chesapeake, Hampton, Newport News, Portsmouth, Suffolk, Virginia Beach, Williamsburg

Our recent multi-million renovation has brought a fresh style and comforting touches to our 468 guest rooms, eight suites, meeting space, hallways, lobby, interior, and exterior. The changes encompass new décor, upgraded lighting, stylish furnishings and the Sheraton Sweet Sleeper™ Bed with featherweight duvet and crisp white sheets in each guest room. High Speed Internet Access in all our guest rooms will keep you connected to home, even when youre miles away. From the moment you enter our redesigned lobby, you'll be struck by a clean and inviting feeling. Discover a whole new way to stay connected with Link@Sheraton experienced with Microsoft, featuring free wireless High Speed Internet Access plus printing and PC workstations. hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Orange County
hotel.description:
When it comes to hotels near Disneyland, Hyatt Regency Orange County is the ultimate destination for your getaway or vacation. Located just 1.4 miles from the Disneyland(R) Resort, our luxury hotel near Anaheim offers shuttle service to and from the parks, and is in close proximity to Angel Stadium, the Honda Center, world-famous beaches and many other Orange County attractions.
Relax and enjoy the utmost in comfort and convenience at Hyatt Regency Orange County. Each modern guestroom in our hotel near the Disneyland Resort in Anaheim, California features an oversized work desk, iHome Stereo with iPod(R) docking station, laptop safe and many other amenities. Treat yourself and your family to one of our spacious suites for a great value, which come equipped with multiple flat-screen TV's, microwave and refrigerator. Try one of our fun and unique Kids Suites with bunk beds for the children, and an adjoining private room for parents.
Enjoy elegant surroundings and spectacular food when you dine in one of our restaurants near Anaheim California. Savor creative Italian cuisine and a relaxing dining experience at TusCA restaurant, where kids 12 and under eat free for dinner with a paying adult. Stop in for coffee and pastries at Starbucks(TM) before boarding our shuttle to the Disneyland Resort, and end your day at OC Brewhouse to wind down and cheer on your favorite teams.
Our hotel's recreational facilities offer something for everyone, from two outdoor heated pools, 1hot tub located in the North Tower and full-sized tennis and basketball courts, to preferred tee times at premier golf courses and a 24-hour StayFit(TM) gym. Let our experienced concierge point you in the right direction for all the best attractions and fun things to do to make your Disneyland vacation everything that you dreamed of.

Treat yourself and your family to one of our spacious suites for a great value, which come equipped with multiple flat-screen TV's, microwave and refrigerator. Try one of our fun and unique Kids Suites with bunk beds for the children, and an adjoining private room for parents.
Enjoy elegant surroundings and spectacular food when you dine in one of our restaurants near Anaheim California. Savor creative Italian cuisine and a relaxing dining experience at TusCA restaurant, where kids 12 and under eat free for dinner with a paying adult. Stop in for coffee and pastries at Starbucks(TM) before boarding our shuttle to the Disneyland Resort, and end your day at OC Brewhouse to wind down and cheer on your favorite teams.
Our hotel's recreational facilities offer something for everyone, from two outdoor heated pools, 1hot tub located in the North Tower and full-sized tennis and basketball courts, to preferred tee times at premier golf courses and a 24-hour StayFit(TM) gym. Let our experienced concierge point you in the right direction for all the best attractions and fun things to do to make your Disneyland vacation everything that you dreamed of.
City Center

facility.title: Grande Deluxe Two-bedroom suite
facility.desc:
Grande Deluxe two-bedroom suite offers one king size bed in the Master Bedroom, One Queen Sized Bed in the second Bedroom and
one queen sized sofa bed in the large living room.This 1200 sq. ft. Two-bedroom suite sleeps a maximum of six people. Two
Full Bathrooms. Every unit has a Fully Equipped kitchen a separate dining area for six, a living room with queen-sized sofa
sleeper, and a whirlpool-style tub in the bath, which makes for a great romantic getaway. TVs are located in the living area
and both bedrooms. A washer and dryer are in each unit for your convenience. Kitchens include a coffee maker, full sized
refrigerator, dish washer, stove and microwave. These suites are ideal for guests traveling in family or a group of friends.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Just off U.S. Highway 192 in Kissimmee, Barefoot Hotel is set at the edge of a wooded area and lake that belies the hustle and bustle of the attraction corridor. Only 3 miles from Walt Disney World and minutes from all the local attractions including Universal Studios and SeaWorld. Walking distance to Old Town Shopping center and Fun Spot Entertainment Park.

facility.title: Grande Deluxe One-bedroom Suite
facility.desc:
Grande Deluxe one-bedroom Suite offers one queen size bed and one sofa bed. This Spacious 800 sq. ft one-bedroom Suite sleeps
a maximum of four people and offers a queen-sized bed. provides a fully-equipped kitchen with a separate dining area for four,
living room with queen-sized sofa-sleeper, and whirlpool style tub in the bath. TVs are located in the living area and bedroom
area. A washer and dryer are in each unit for your convenience. and a large Balcony with outdoor furniture.

hotel.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Birmingham Homewood
hotel.description: The Residence Birmingham Homewood, AL hotel provides impeccable service, a welcoming environment and the convenience and comfort you need, whether you're with us for a short or extended stay. Our hotel in Homewood, AL provides newly renovated suites that include a new sectional sofas, ergonomic desks, updated bathrooms and contemporary color scheme. Our new suites have been reimagined to give you the flexibility to work, connect or relax as you like. In the mornings, enjoy fresh coffee and a complimentary buffet breakfast and take a morning swim in our pool. Relax while watching TV or reading a complimentary daily newspaper in your room's spacious living area or mix and mingle during our hospitality hour while enjoying a beer or wine. Close to the University of Alabama at Birmingham, downtown Birmingham and cultural activities, our hotel is ideally located for both business and leisure travel. You'll feel right at home at our Residence Inn Birmingham hotel in Homewood, AL. Plan your stay today!
hotel.airportsDesc: Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport, (BHM), 13.00, MI, SW;

hotel.description: Flying out of Sea-Tac? Consider booking our Park & Jet Package online; Coming to Seattle? Save time and money by booking our Free of Fees Package OR consider one of many other great Seattle Hotel Packages Seattle Airport Parking Available The Doubletree Seattle Airport Hotel, next to SeaTac International Airport, has a great Seattle hotel location off the I-5 corridor, minutes from downtown Seattle and an easy drive to Federal Way or Tukwila, WA.The Best Choice among Seattle HotelsOur expansive, full-service Doubletree hotel boasts a resort-like setting with a full slate of amenities, such as:* Complimentary shuttle service - 24-hours a day at Airport Island 1 & 3 every 20 minutes * AAA and Senior rates available * US and Canadian Government rates and packages available * Transportation to Link Light Rail Station available upon request providing you with easy access to downtown Seattle, CenturyLink Field (formerly Qwest Field ) – Home of the Seattle Seahawks and Seattle Sounders* Outdoor pool - open seasonally and whirlpool - heated year round * Pet Friendly* Fitness by Precor® exercise equipment in our fitness centers * Concierge services * Wireless high-speed Internet in public areas with wired and wireless connection available in the guestrooms* The Golf Club at Doubletree * Excellent on-site hotel restaurant and loungeSeattle Meeting Space and Business AmenitiesWe have what you need from a copy job to planning a dinner for 500:* Meeting Incentives you won’t want to miss * Business center * Laundry service * 34,000 square feet of meeting space * Audio/visual equipment * Video conferencing available * eEvents booking - Ideal for booking less than 25 guest rooms or for booking space for an all-day business meeting, wedding, reunion or special event * On-line catering menus for your convenienceAttractions in Seattle, WAOnce you are ready to relax and enjoy everything Seattle, Washington has to offer here are just a few suggestions on where to get started:* The Seattle Waterfront on Puget Sound - Where you can catch a ferry, visit the Seattle Aquarium, find a great restaurant, shop till you drop or just enjoy the view * Pike Place Market - Where you might catch a glimpse of a “flying” fish * Ride the monorail from Downtown Seattle to Seattle Center where you can find the Space Needle and the Experience Music Project * Quest Stadium - Home of the Seattle Seahawks * Safeco Field - Home of the Seattle Mariners * University of Washington - a quick drive away up I-5 or I-405 * Shopping at Super Mall, Westfield South Center or SeaTac Mall * Seattle Shopping Package on-line* Mt Rainier Work or play, the Doubletree Hotel Seattle Airport is the perfect place to stay in Washington. Our warm and professional staff is waiting for you with our special, signature warm chocolate chip cookie at
