hotel.name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Plaza by the Green
hotel.description:
Discover this great Kent Washington hotel, 100% non-smoking near the ShoWare Center, Kent Station, King County Regional Justice Center and downtown Kent.
The BEST WESTERN PLUS Plaza by the Green offers great value to guests visiting Kent Washington. This hotel is rated number one by Trip Advisor for value and service. Visitors to the Seattle area will find this hotel's location convenient as well as the close proximity to other key area attractions.
The BEST WESTERN PLUS Plaza by the Green guest rooms feature a refrigerator, 37-inch flat screen TV and free wireless high-speed Internet access. Along with a complimentary full hot breakfast each morning, the hotel features a fitness center, sauna, hot tub, business center and shuttle service to Seattle/Tacoma International Airport from 4:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m.
The BEST WESTERN PLUS Plaza by the Green is located on the Riverbend Golf Course. Guests staying at the hotel will be close to the Hydroplane and Raceboat Museum, the Muckleshoot Casino, Emerald Downs racetrack and the Museum of Flight. Business travelers will find convenient access too many firm located in the Kent valley. Other nearby attractions include Old Fishing Hole Park and the Des Moines Waterfront Pier. The world-famous Pike Place Market in downtown Seattle is located just 19 miles away.
For superior customer service make a reservation at the BEST WESTERN PLUS Plaza by the Green!
The spa (hot tub and sauna) will be out of service during the month of July for renovations.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Denver Tech Center Hotel
hotel.description:
Just outside Colorado's bustling capital, this award-winning BEST WESTERN PLUS Denver Tech Center Hotel puts you in the perfect place to tackle business or take in the sites.
Located in the heart of the DTC, this Greenwood Village hotel allows convenient access to I-25 or our city's Lite-Rail station. From there, great food, museums, sporting events and entertainment awaits.
Our guests are always our priority, with a complimentary hot breakfast to start your day. Pillow top king and queen beds and comfortable rooms make it easy for business travelers and friends alike to get a good night's rest. Adjoining rooms and extended stays are available to make your trip easier.
Fun and affordable attractions lie just outside our doors. Fiddlers Green Amphitheater and it's neighboring top cuisine and shops are just blocks away.
Our Greenwood Village hotel is also close to the Aurora Sports Complex and Family Sports Center, Coors Field, Pepsi Center and theres nothing better than taking in a game, Denver Broncos Game is a must.
We welcome a number of medical tourists and healthcare professionals in town for Sky Ridge Hospital, and service men and women with Buckley Air Force Base and the Colorado National Guard call us their home away from home.
Reserve an affordable stay at the BEST WESTERN PLUS Denver Tech Center Hotel.

hotel.name: Travelodge Fort Lauderdale Beach
hotel.description:
The hotel is across the street from beautiful Fort Lauderdale Beach and 3 miles from downtown and Las Olas -Riverfront-. It features an outdoor pool, 3 patios, and serves a free deluxe continental breakfast every morning. Free newspapers, parking and Wi-Fi access are provided. All Rooms include refrigerators, micro, satellite TV, in room safe, clock radio, and hairdryers. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and laundry facilities are on site. Airport and port -cruise- shuttle available for fee. Business Center and free computer use in lobby. Restaurants, shopping, bank, grocery store, coffee shop, McDonalds and main bus stop is across the street.
PET-FRIENDLY HOTEL - 50 USD per week, per pet up to 50 lbs. Limited number of Non-smoking and Smoking Doubles available for pets.

hotel.description: The Ruskin Inn, a Ruskin-Sun City Center, interior corridor hotel is ideally located off of I-75, just 20 miles south of Tampa and 25 miles north of Sarasota. This hotel is close to area attractions like Apollo Beach, Florida State Fairgrounds and the Florida Aquarium. Enjoy a perfect golf getaway at the Golf Club at Cypress Creek, where fine dining and pristine surroundings await to greet you. All guests at hotel enjoy: FREE Continental Breakfast, FREE Local Calls, FREE Coffee in the lobby, FREE HBO, Outdoor Pool, Fax/Copy service for Corporate Traveler, Guest Laundry, Pet Friendly. Enjoy a perfect golf getaway at the Golf Club at Cypress Creek, where fine dining and pristine surroundings await to greet you. All guests at hotel enjoy: FREE Continental Breakfast, FREE Local Calls, FREE Coffee in the lobby, FREE HBO, Outdoor Pool, Fax/Copy service for Corporate Traveler, Guest Laundry, Pet Friendly. Amenities - Free Breakfast.

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites COON RAPIDS-BLAINE AREA
hotel.description: Enjoy Great Service and Accommodation Treat yourself to the comfortable, convenient stay you deserve at our inviting Holiday Inn Express® hotel in Coon Rapids. This hotel's location near Minneapolis benefits travelers visiting the local area, as well as businesses and attractions in the city. Business travelers save time on the road thanks to a location near Green Bay Packaging, Honeywell, Thermo Electron, Frito-Lay Inc. and other businesses in Coon Rapids. With our hotel's free high-speed, wireless Internet access, well-equipped boardroom and the services in the 24-hour business center, you're sure to have a productive stay. From The National Sports Center and Schwan Super ice-skating rink to Northtown Mall, a number of attractions are located just minutes from our hotel's property. Staying near downtown Minneapolis makes it easy to enjoy a night in the Warehouse entertainment district or to visit famous destinations like the Metrodome, Guthrie Theatre, Target Center and Mall of America. Our hotel's location near Minneapolis is just one of many perks you'll enjoy at the Holiday Inn Express® hotel of Coon Rapids - Blaine. Upon entering the hotel, you'll be warmly welcomed by our friendly staff. We invite you to join us each morning for the complimentary, hot Express Start Breakfast Bar. When you're not exploring Coon Rapids, our hotel's indoor, heated pool, whirlpool and 24-hour fitness center help you unwind and relax.
hotel.airportsDesc: Mpls/St. Paul International Airport, (MSP), 24.00, MI, NW;

hotel.name: Beachcomber Resort and Villas
hotel.description:
One of the few resort hotel properties in Greater Fort Lauderdale that is directly on the Atlantic ocean, the Beachcomber Resort is on 300 feet of pristine private sandy beach. The resort also has 2 pools surrounded by lush landscaping, a beach volleyball court and 2 shuffleboard courts. This 100% non-smoking hotel is located just 8 miles from the heart of Ft. Lauderdale, and is the best of both worlds where you can stay at a property with a tropical paradise island-like feel while still being nearby all of the destination's great shopping, attractions, dining and night life.
The resort is located 18 miles northeast of the Fort Lauderdale Airport and 14 miles northeast of the Fort Lauderdale (Port Everglades) Cruise Port.
Dine at our full service indoor air conditioned restaurant (for breakfast, lunch or dinner), cool off and have one of our famous frozen cocktails at our poolside Tiki Bar, work on your tan and dine outside at our poolside patio or on the beach where we offer our all day dining menu; room service, and children's menu is also available.
The Beachcomber Resort and Villas offers free parking, free Wi-Fi access, free poolside chaise lounges, free towel service, and complimentary passes to a fully equipped fitness gym a short drive away. Please note that we do not charge a resort fee, however charges do apply for beach equipment rentals such as chaise lounges, umbrellas and cabanas as well as massage services on the beach.
If a rollaway is requested, a $10/night fee + tax nightly will apply (based on availability). Children under 12 years old stay FREE if occupying same room with family. Guests must be at least 21 years old to check in.
General Disclaimer: Coolers, glass bottles and picnicking are not permitted in the hotel public areas, pool areas, or beach area; only food and beverage provided and served by the resort may be consumed in these areas. The resort cannot be held financially responsible for the behavior of others or noise complaints; we will have adequate security to respond, however there will be no refunds for noise complaints.
Memorial Day and 4th of July Week-Ends Policies:
Strict enforcement of number of persons per room room will be enforced.
No bottles, glass, or coolers on our pool area and beach and no food and beverage other than what is served will be permitted in public areas (including pool and beach areas).
Parking will be limited to 1 space per room and if available; additional charge for additional parking spaces if available will apply.
hotel.airportsDesc: Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood Airport (FLL). Miami International Airport (MIA). West Palm Beach (WPB)

Cozy no balcony and not water view. All rooms are non smoking.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: Hotel amenities include handicapped access, two outdoor pools, poolside Tiki Bar, full service restaurant, room service, and concierge services.

facility.title: Ocean View room - 1 king bed
facility.desc: With 1 king bed; located in the main hotel tower, with large semi private balcony, partial ocean view that overlooks main pool area, free high speed wireless access, microwave and mini refrigerator, coffee maker with complimentary coffee, safe, hairdryer, Flat screen cable TV, pay per view movies, alarm clock/radio, voice mail, iron and board. All rooms are non smoking.

facility.title: Tiki Bar
facility.desc: Poolside Tiki Bar serving your favorite tropical frozen specialty drinks in a casual laid back atmosphere

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Located on the beach; within walking distance of local bars, restaurants, and stores. Golf, Tennis, Deep-sea fishing, Scuba diving, and Snorkeling all nearby. Lauderdale-by-the Sea dining and entertainment district, The Isle Casino, Butterfly World, Museum of Art, Galleria Mall, Las Olas Boulevard Shops and Restaurant district, Major shopping malls, Movie Theaters, & a Bowling Alley all within reasonable driving distance. Only food & beverage served by the resort may be consummed around pool areas and our beach.

facility.title: Oceanfront Room - 2 double beds
facility.desc: With 2 double beds that directly faces the beach and ocean. Free high speed wireless internet access, microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker with complimentary coffee, Flat Screen cable T.V. with pay per view in room movies, hairdryer, & alarm clock/radio, iron/board. All rooms are non smoking.

facility.title: Ocean Grill Lounge
facility.desc: Warm and inviting atmosphere serving beer, wine, and full liquor bar. Open during high/winter seasonHappy hour 5-7 PM daily. During the high season, entertainment Thursday thru Saturday evenings.

facility.title: Ocean Grill
facility.desc: In door dining room with floor to ceiling windows with a vista of our lushly landscapped main pool area against a backdrop of the beach and ocean. Open at 7 AM for breakfast. For lunch and dinner we offer an all day dining menu featuring American fare; enjoy appitizers like conch fritters, smoked fish dip & chicken wings. We also make our own hand tossed pizza, freshly prepare salads, burgers, sandwiches and wraps and we offer nightly dinner specials. Full liquor bar service is available.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: We have a 1066 square foot meeting room that can be divided into 2 rooms. The combined space can accommodate meetings of up to 100 persons seated theater style or 60 persons for a seated meal funtion. We also can hold weddings on our beach and have a large outside courtyard for catered events that can seat 250 persons and can be tented.

facility.title: Ocean View room - 2 double beds
facility.desc: With 2 double beds; located in the main hotel tower, with large semi private balcony, partial ocean view that overlooks main pool area, free high speed wireless access, microwave and mini refrigerator, coffee maker with complimentary coffee, safe, hairdryer, Flat screen cable TV, pay per view movies, alarm clock/radio, voice mail, iron and board. All rooms are non smoking.

facility.title: Outside Patio Dining Area
facility.desc: We'll gladly serve your favorite drinks and/or anything featured the Ocean Grill's all day dining menu outside at our poolside patio dining area. We will also serve you while you lounge on our beach; just press the button on the Beach Butler that is strapped to your beach chaise lounge and one of our servers will come to place and deliver your order.

facility.title: Room Service
facility.desc: We will deliver anything you want from the menu we feature at the Ocean Grill to your room during the Ocean Grill's normal hours of operation.

hotel.name: Hyatt Regency OHare
hotel.description: In 2007 Hyatt Regency O'Hare unveiled Phase I of a $64 million transformation, in which all public spaces were revived. Exciting new dining choices, including O'H American Grill and Red Bar and Lounge, were introduced; and luxurious amenities from top to bottom now add welcoming touches throughout this O'Hare airport hotel. It's convenient location - with fast access to both downtown Chicago and O'Hare International airport - makes it ideal for every visitor. Phase II, completed in 2009, includes a complete redesign of all 1,100 guestrooms and suites, incorporating convivial energy, innovative design, and home-on-the-road comfort. We invite you to rediscover the O'Hare area's premier hotel.

hotel.description:
The Westin Los Angeles Airport, just four blocks from Los Angeles International Airport, offers easy access to major corporations, marvelous shopping, sunny beaches and fine restaurants. Our stylish dAAcor suits business and leisure travelers.

A heated pool, health club and sauna let you live the California lifestyle while you visit nearby Beverly Hills, the beaches, or shops and attractions. Our expansive meeting facilities and services will make any gathering a success.

Stylish design and light colors highlight our 740 spacious rooms. All feature the Westin Heavenly BathAA and Westin Heavenly BedAA. Layers of duvets and smooth cotton sheeting and blackout curtains create a soothing atmosphere for a good night's sleep.

hotel.name: Aloft Nashville West End
hotel.description:
Aloft hotels are the new twist in travel from Starwood Hotels & Resorts. A vision of W Hotels, the Aloft Nashville West End is a bold, fresh, and fun new hotel featuring loft-inspired design and always-abuzz public spaces. Perfectly positioned for an easy breezy travel experience in the pulsating heart of the citys entertainment industry on Music Row! Perched among the best and brightest recording studios and record labels just southwest of downtown Nashville, were also a short ride from BNA Airport and LP Field, home of the Tennessee Titans.
Rise and shine in our bright and modern Aloft rooms, featuring plush platform beds, walk-in showers, custom amenities by Bliss® Spa and more. Recharge all your gadgets with the plug & play docking station, which also links your laptop or tunes to the 42 LCD TV. Meet and mingle at our w xyz(SM) bar, grab a snack at the 24/7 re:fuel by Aloft(SM) gourmet pantry, or work and play at our re:mix(SM) lounge. Plenty of perks include fast + free hotel-wide Wi-Fi, our always-open re:charge(SM) gym, and more!
hotel.airportsDesc: Nashville Metropolitan Airport, (BNA), 7.00, MI;

hotel.name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Denver Tech Center
hotel.description:
The La Quinta Inn and Suites-Denver Tech Center was recently named a 2013 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence award winner!
NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
100% Non Smoking Hotel
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Denver Tech Center location is perfect for leisure and business travelers. The hotel is near Centennial Airport Private Jet Center, Lockheed Martin, and many other corporate destinations. We have 1500 square feet of meeting space and a wealth of amenities, including free high-speed Internet access. Located just 15 Miles South of Downtown Denver (Pepsi Center, Coors Field, and Six Flags Elitch Gardens), there are many great restaurants in the area and shopping at Park Meadows Mall. Family Sports Center, Chatfield State Reservoir, and Fiddler's Green Ampitheater are all nearby.
Access your spacious room at La Quinta Inn & Suites Denver Tech Center through an interior courtyard surrounding a heated pool (seasonal) and spa. Start each day with our Free Bright Side BreakfastTM served by our courteous and friendly staff. We are just east of I-25 between Dry Creek and Arapahoe Road next to Trail Dust Steakhouse and IHOP, not far from the Denver Broncos Training Facility.
hotel.airportsDesc: Denver Intl Airport, (DEN), 35.00, MI, NE;

hotel.name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village
hotel.description: Awarded with the 2009 Trip Advisor's Travelers' Choice Award as a Top 10 Family Hotel in the United States, this Orlando area family hotel is both playful and accommodating. As an Official Walt Disney World Good Neighbor Hotel, the Fairfield Inn boasts charming hospitality at a great value. Situated by top attractions, this Lake Buena Vista, Orlando hotel is near Walt Disney World, Universal Studios, SeaWorld, and Orlando Premium Outlets offering upscale shopping. Start your day with complimentary continental breakfast, then purchase your attraction tickets in the lobby and take advantage of convenient hotel shuttle to transport you to the destination of your choice. Featuring an array of dining options, the Food Court at this Walt Disney World Good Neighbor hotel includes pizza, deli sandwiches, ice cream, and Starbucks Coffee. Enjoy a convenient Orlando area hotel only one mile from the Walt Disney World® Resort and close to Universal Studios, SeaWorld® and upscale shopping at the Orlando Premium Outlets. hotel.name: Monaco Salt Lake City, a Kimpton Hotel
hotel.description:
Hotel Monaco invites you to indulge in guilty pleasures in the heart of downtown Salt Lake City. Our playful atmosphere is a favorite with business travelers and if a hotel thats perfect for a Utah ski vacation is what you have in mind our downtown Salt Lake City hotel sets you up in style.
Savvy service a hip vibe and unbeatable location make Hotel Monaco legendary among Salt Lake hotels. Our historic building adds unique character to the modern comforts that greet you in the center of the city. Walk to the City Creek Center Salt Palace Convention Center Gallivan Center Capitol Theatre and more. Just steps away a TRAX light rail makes for fast easy and eco-friendly travel throughout Salt Lake County from the University of Utah to Sandy.
The newly renovated 225 rooms and suites enliven guests senses with plush robes exclusive bath products and luxurious pillow top beds. Tall rooms with eight-foot beds and raised showerheads are available upon request. Hotel Monacos Guppy Love program offers guests the pleasure of having a goldfish companion in their rooms for their stay. Hotel staff cares for the goldfish leaving guests to simply enjoy their aquatic roommates. All guest rooms and suites are nonsmoking. At the Hotel Monaco Salt Lake City pets are welcomed with a treat and supplied with food and water dishes to use during their stay. Walking services are available. Hotel Monaco-Salt Lake City also features Kimptons Forgot It Weve Got It program where we offer toiletry items that you may have left at home. At the Hotel Monaco Salt Lake City pets are welcomed with a treat and supplied with food and water dishes to use during their stay. Walking services are available. Hotel Monaco-Salt Lake City also features Kimptons Forgot It Weve Got It program where we offer toiletry items that you may have left at home.

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites : VIRGINIA BEACH - NORTH BEACH
hotel.description:
Splash into 250,000 gallons of fun, enjoy a movie with your family and relax on your private balcony. The Holiday Inn & Suites North Beach features all new guestrooms including mini-refrigerator & microwave, flatscreenTV, iPod docking station, free Internet & private balcony to meet your family's needs. This unique Holiday Inn & Suites offers the Splish Splash Lagoon featuring an outdoor lazy river & two 12-foot waterslides. Float down the indoor Lay-Z-Rivah through rock & waterfalls or lounge in the sun while watching your family swim in the oceanfront outdoor pool. For entertainment, enjoy activities for your toddlers to tweens in our seasonal kids club Splash Kamp or unwind in our 48-seat Movie Theater. Keep your New Year's resolution in our state-of-the-art fitness center.

Enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner on the oceanfront patio cafe The Square Whale or dine for seasonal breakfast or lunch in our Greenery restaurant. Getaway for a romantic dinner in our Isle of Capri fine dining Italian restaurant located on the sixth floor with breathtaking views of the Atlantic. Our elegant ball room and conference center offers 8,000 square feet of meeting space; our professional & courteous staff is ready to help plan your special event! Whether you're coming to Virginia Beach for business or just for fun, your room at the Holiday Inn & Suites North Beach is your family's personal retreat.

Virginia Beach Oceanfront Hotel's Guests Have It All From a private, oceanfront balcony to 250,000 gallons of aquatic adventure, the Holiday Inn® & Suites Virginia Beach - North Beach hotel's guests enjoy the perfect beach vacation in Virginia Beach. The resort's oceanfront location is a perfect, relaxing family retreat as the hotel offers everything under the sun. Slide into our Splish Splash Lagoon, float along the indoor lay-Z-rivah or lounge with a favorite summer beverage at the oceanfront outdoor pool. The hotel's activity program, Splash Kamp, is the perfect place for your children. The arts and crafts, games and more will create unforgettable memories. Take a break from the sun and catch a quick flick in our 48-seat movie theatre. Schedule your next meeting in our conference center, which offers 8,000 sq ft of meeting space, and treat your associates and families to a mini-vacation in Virginia Beach. The resort's Office-on-the-Go and the free Wi-Fi access in the guest rooms help you stay connected and productive. Enjoy the best of the beach as the hotel's guest in Virginia Beach. Inspired by 50 years of family tradition, the Isle of Capri offers fine Italian dining and stunning views of the Atlantic. The Square Whale is the ideal spot to enjoy moderately-priced poolside specialties. Want a great start? The Greenery Cafe's funky candy-colored atmosphere serves a buffet of breakfast delights. We look forward to welcoming you!
Resort, resort

hotel.description: Located on the beach within South Carolina's Grand Strand between Myrtle Beach and Pawley's Island, this 157 room family owned and operated hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, meeting space, and on-site cafe. Whether your vacation includes taking in the areas attractions, theme parks and restaurants or relaxing on the white sandy beaches, this oceanfront hotel is an ideal location. Enjoy spectacular ocean views, white sandy beaches, a casual family atmosphere and the quiet serenity of Myrtle Beaches southern end.

facility.desc: Surfside Beach Resort is ideally situated in the center of Surfside Beach, South Carolina, and overlooks the beautiful Atlantic Ocean in the quiet serenity of Myrtle Beachs south end. Surfside Beach Resort is not only on the beach, but is also next door to the city pier. Also nearby are many activities including rentals for jet skis, pontoon boats and other water activities located in close proximity to the Surfside Beach Resort.

facility.desc: Our most popular room type offers the flexibility of two double beds while featuring the luxury of a balcony with chairs where one may admire beautiful Surfside Beach and enjoy the fresh sea breeze. This room provides guests with wireless internet access, cable TV, telephone, mini-fridge, microwave and the convenience of a vanity-sink area separate from the toilet and bathroom. Spacious closets and plentiful drawer space invite unpacking for a long vacation with the whole family.

hotel.description: Situated less than half a mile from William P. Hobby Airport in Houston, the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Houston Hobby Airport provides easy access to downtown Houston, George R. Brown and Pasadena Convention Centers, Johnson Space Center NASA, Reliant Park, Minute Maid Field and the Port of Houston Ship Channel.A warm welcome and a signature DoubleTree cookie at check-in helps make the beginning of your stay at this Houston Hobby Airport hotel stress-free. This Houston Hobby airport hotel offers 303 guest rooms and suites equipped with high-speed internet access, a large work desk with task lighting, an over-sized easy chair and an ottoman.Host a meeting or conference in some of this Houston airport hotel's 18,000 sq.ft. of flexible meeting and banquet space, which includes a 8,147 sq.ft. Grand Ballroom for up to 900 guests and many smaller rooms, ideal for private and boardroom meetings. Swim lengths in the hotel's beautiful outdoor swimming pool, or keep fit in the complimentary fitness center, which provides full access to weights and cardiovascular machines. Enjoy fine cuisine in one of the restaurants or bars at the DoubleTree by Hilton Houston Hobby Airport. Relish a breakfast or lunch buffet at the The Landing, a delicious evening meal in The Boardwalk Restaurant or sip cocktails in the relaxed and stylish surroundings of the Sundance Lounge.

hotel.name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Tucson Airport
hotel.description: Welcome to the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Tucson Airport. Step into and relax in the 25 ft. ceiling lobby complete with a signature fireplace centerpiece. The hotel is set near the Tucson International Airport (TUS) and just a short ride away from Downtown Tucson and the University of Arizona. Try your luck at the Desert Diamond Casino or indulge in some retail therapy at the Tucson Spectrum Shopping Mall.Enjoy a freshly baked DoubleTree cookie and let our staff show you to your guest suite. Our standard two-room suites all feature contemporary furnishings and decor, with modern amenities to make your stay more comfortable.Swim laps in the hotel's outdoor pool and relax in the whirlpool spa or unwind in our outdoor patio areas with beautiful water fountains. Stay fit in the hotel's fitness center with cardio machines and weights. Stay on top of work in the business center, fully equipped with top business amenities to make your stay successful. Host meetings in our 12,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space, and wind down after a long day in the hotel's signature restaurant, Finnegan's Restaurant and Bar, which offers bistro-style cuisine in a bright, modern setting.

hotel.name: Hilton North Raleigh/Midtown
hotel.description: Welcome to the Hilton North Raleigh/Midtown hotel. Located just minutes from downtown Raleigh, this North Raleigh, North Carolina hotel is within easy access to shopping, dining and attractions. Enjoy complimentary transportation to and from RDU airport and North Hills Shopping. Discover the state’s Capitol, Historic City Market, NC Museum of Arts, PNC Arena, Raleigh Convention Center and North Carolina State University from this hotel in Raleigh, NC.Enjoy the comfort and convenience of this 338-guest room Hilton North Raleigh/Midtown hotel when doing business within the Research Triangle Park area. Upgrade to an Executive Room on the sixth floor with private key access to enjoy exclusive use of the Executive Lounge, a complimentary deluxe continental breakfast and an evening reception with hot appetizers.Start your day with our Hilton breakfast and Starbucks® coffee at Lofton’s Corner. Enjoy lunch and dinner in a casual atmosphere at the Skybox Grill & Bar. In the evening, unwind with a cold beer and catch your favorite sporting events on large HD video projection screens and LCD televisions. Rejuvenate in the hotel’s 24-hour fitness center with an indoor pool and whirlpool. Our 24-hour business center is available for your convenience. This North Raleigh hotel offers 30,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space for corporate meetings, weddings and social

hotel.name: The Westin Peachtree Plaza, Atlanta
hotel.description:
This 73-story tower, topped by the revolving Sun Dial Restaurant, Bar & View, graces the heart of Atlanta. Connected to AmericasMart, The Westin Peachtree Plaza, is steps from CNN, Georgia Aquarium, Georgia World Congress Center and the Georgia Dome.

Our 53 breakouts, totaling 80,000 square feet, provide unparalleled flexibility in planning your meetings. When business is done, relax in our retractable-roof pool, health club or walk to downtown nightlife and attractions.

Renowned Atlanta architect John Portman designed the hotel, the Western Hemisphere's largest. All 1,068 rooms feature floor-to-ceiling glass windows, desks, High Speed Internet Access, the Westin HeavenlyAA Bed and marble Heavenly BathAA., Scenic Elevator Closure: September 10 - December 31, 2009 From September 10, 2008 to December 31, 2009, the scenic elevators will be undergoing a revitalization. Please see the ho

The Westin Peachtree Plaza, Atlanta - Atlanta's landmark hotel - offers an ideal location in the heart of the business and financial district. Outside the hotel, an international city awaits you. Inside, an attentive staff caters to your every need.
Amenities include concierge service as well as a business center and the WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio. For lunch or dinner, take the scenic glass elevators up 73 floors to the Sun Dial, a revolving restaurant known for its sinfully delicious cuisine and heavenly views of Atlanta.
We are within walking distance of Philips Arena, CNN Center, Centennial Olympic Park, and the new Georgia Aquarium - the world's largest aquarium. Atlanta's new retail and entertainment district, Atlantic Station, is also just minutes away.
The Westin Peachtree Plaza, Atlanta offers all the facilities you expect of a world-class hotel.

hotel.name: The Melrose Hotel
hotel.description:
In the heart of one of the DC's most notable neighborhoods is its newest luxury, upscale hotel, The Melrose Hotel, Washington, D.C. Just one block from Georgetown and the Foggy Bottom Metro station, The Melrose Hotel Washington, D.C. offers discerning business travelers and leisure visitors to the District a luxurious oasis in the heart of one of the world's fastest-paced cities. The Melrose Hotel, Washington, D.C. is conveniently located between the White House and Georgetown on Pennsylvania Avenue. A brief taxi ride from both Reagan National Airport and Dulles International Airport, the hotel is also easily accessible by Metro, with a short stroll from the Foggy Bottom Metro station to our front door. Guests can conveniently travel between the District's historical and cultural attractions as well as key business locations by taxicab, Metro or even on foot.

Disclaimer: Daily parking will be charge $38 plus tax.

facility.title: Deluxe King
facility.desc: This room has 1 king bed with pillowtop mattress. Private bathroom comes with shower/tub combination, hair dryer, and complimentary toiletries. For a surcharge, wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and television with satellite/cable channels and pay movies is provided for your entertainment. Desk, in-room safe, multi-line phone with voice mail, clock radio, and iron/ironing board are among the included amenities. Also available air conditioning, climate control, free newspapers, and daily housekeeping.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Located on Pennsylvania Avenue between the White House and historic Georgetown, The Melrose Hotel offers a convenient location for travelers visiting Washington, D.C. Located within walking distance are: The White House, Foggy Bottom Metro Station, Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, Smithsonian Museums, Shops and Restaurants of Georgetown, Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is 10 minutes away. Cab fare is approximately $15. Dulles International Airport is 30 minutes away. Cab fare is approximately $40.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: The Melrose Hotel, Washington D.C. is equipped to accommodate meetings of any style. With over 5,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, The Melrose Hotel offers a meeting room as intimate as a boardroom or as vast as our grand ballroom. A certified services manager is on-site to assist you with planning the perfect meeting.

facility.title: Amenity Info

facility.title: The Landmark Restaurant and The Library Bar
facility.desc: The Melrose Hotel is pleased to introduce The Landmark Restaurant and The Library Bar, two locations destined to be destinations for the sophisticated palate. Guests of the hotel and locals alike enjoy a diverse American menu with eclectic twists, and The Library Bar will be a "see and be seen" spot for in-the-know Washingtonians. During warmer seasons, enjoy outdoor seating at both The Landmark Restaurant and The Library Bar. Of course, room service is available and will feature a full menu and personal service for those guests who prefer to relax or work in their rooms.

hotel.name: Baymont Inn & Suites Houston- Sam Houston Parkway
hotel.description: Get a taste of southern hospitality at this Baymont Inn and Suites Houston-Sam Houston Parkway, just off Beltway 8 and convenient to George Bush Intercontinental Airport, Hardy Toll Road, downtown Houston and businesses such as Patterson Drilling, Varco, Schlumberger, RPC, Halliburton, Hewlett-Packard, Sysco and Continental Airlines. This smoke-free lodging offers complimentary wireless Internet and complimentary breakfast as well as an indoor-outdoor pool, exercise room, laundry facility, shuttle, complimentary parking for all vehicles and business center with presentation supplies and meeting rooms. Rooms come standard with a 32-inch flat-screen TV, and select suites have two rooms, ideal for longer stays. There is no charge for kids 17 and under when accompanied by an adult.

hotel.name: Congress Plaza Hotel at Grant Park
hotel.description:
The Congress Plaza Hotel & convention center is perfect for the value driven guest looking for a convenient downtown location with spectacular views of Grant Park, Buckingham Fountain and Lake Michigan. It is just short walk to the New Millennium Park, The Art Institute of Chicago, Museum Campus, Symphony Center, and the Sears Tower. The city business districts, shopping and restaurants, as well as downtown theaters and universities are also just minutes away. Chicago O'Hare International Airport (15 miles) and Midway Airport (11 miles) are easily accessible. The Congress Plaza Hotel & convention center was originally designed and built in 1893 to accommodate visitors to the Columbian World's Exposition. There are a total of 840 guest rooms, including 50 deluxe suites, many of which overlook the beautiful waters of Lake Michigan.
Valet Parking: $33.00/night Garage Parking: $28.00/night.

hotel.name: W Scottsdale
hotel.description:
Live it up in the center of it all. Surrounded by exhilarating arts, sophisticated shopping and championship golf, W Scottsdale is near Scottsdale Fashion Square and within walking distance of the Entertainment District and Old Town Scottsdale.
Savor modern Asian creations at Sushi Roku, then retreat to the fashionable Living Room for innovative cocktails. Mix and mingle at Shade Lounge as a DJ spins the hottest beats. Workout at FIT, de-stress at Bliss®, or get WET® at our beach-themed pool.
Our 230 rooms offer stunning desert views, signature W beds and fabulous entertainment. Luxurious style meets ultimate comfort in new suites on a private sixth-floor wing. Each boasts a separate living room, a high-tech kitchen and en-suite laundry.

hotel.name: Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham Nashville
hotel.description:
Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham Nashville - Enjoy a Quality Hotel Room at a Discount Hotel Price. Enjoy consistency, quality, reasonable prices and great service each time you stay with Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham. Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham is one of the fastest growing budget hotel chains in the US and the recipient of many awards and accolades over the years. Take it from those who know.
Now, Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham has added even greater value and convenience. We are pleased to be the first economy/budget hotel brand to offer guests free local and long distance calls within the continental United States and free high speed wireless Internet access in all of our hotel rooms. The availability of advance online check in and check out with unlimited access to online folio information is also a Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham first. These new amenities compliment our other standard amenities including in room remote controlled TVs with ESPN, CNN and one movie channel and complimentary daily, continental breakfast. Pets welcome for a fee of 25.00 USD per pet per night - Max weight of pet is 80 lbs.
All this, plus our new upgraded Dream Well bedding which features cozy down like comforters wrapped between two crisp white sheets, upgraded thread count linens and extra pillows, make Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham the best choice for your next hotel stay. Experience for yourself how Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham offers the best value and lowest rates for quality, discount hotel accommodations. We look forward to welcoming you at one of our hotels soon. Reserve your room online today.

hotel.name: Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham Atlanta/Perimeter Center
hotel.description:
Welcome to the Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham Atlanta/Perimeter Center, an Atlanta hotel near the Perimeter Mall. A Smoke Free Property. Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham Atlanta/Perimeter Center hotel is located in one of the hottest neighborhoods for prime dining, shopping and entertainment: the prestigious Dunwoody / Perimeter area. This Atlanta, GA hotel offers easy access to the Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, Six Flags Over Georgia theme park, the World of Coca-Cola museum, the Perimeter Mall and the Georgia Aquarium. The hotel is minutes from a variety of corporate centers, cultural centers, hospitals, and sporting venues like the Georgia Dome stadium - home of the Atlanta Falcons football team and Turner Field ballpark -home of the Atlanta Braves baseball club. Free high-speed Internet access Free local and long distance calls within the Continental U.S. Free weekday newspaper, Fitness room, Guest Laundry, Outdoor Pool and Meeting room.
This Atlanta, GA hotel also offers free continental breakfast, featuring freshly brewed coffee, hard boiled eggs, Muffins, Bagels, assorted pastries and juices. Guests will also enjoy the outdoor pool. Business travelers will appreciate the business center and access to copy and fax services.

hotel.name: Quality Inn & Suites Williamsburg North, Premium Outlets
hotel.description: The Quality Inn and Suites hotel Williamsburg North, Premium Outletsis located at Americas Historic Triangle of Williamsburg, Jamestown and Yorktown. This full service hotel offers banquet, restaurant and lounge facilities and has an outdoor seasonal pool, business center and fitness room. Nearby are Busch Gardens, Water Country USA, Colonial Williamsburg, Prime Outlets and the Pottery Factory. Adjacent to the hotel is Captain Georges Seafood Restaurant and the La Tolteca Mexican Restaurant. Other area attractions include: Plantations, Colonial Downs Race Track, Golf Courses, Military Bases and Museums. Pet acommodation: 15 USD per night per pet. Pet limit: maximum 55 lbs, 2 pets per room. Dogs only, no cats. Guests under the age of 21 must be accompanied by someone 21 or over to stay at this hotel.

hotel.name: Le Meridien Cambridge-MIT
hotel.description: Anchoring the renowned University Park at MIT, Le Meridien Cambridge-MIT stands amidst an area legendary for its infrastructure of invention. The Boston / Cambridge area is a cultural capital of the US including world-renowned music ensembles like The Boston Symphony Orchestra, the Handel and Haydn Society, in addition to hundreds of museums, such as the Museum of Fine Arts, the Museum of Science and the Children's Museum. Recreational opportunities abound with picturesque islands, local mountains and dramatic coastline offering a voyage of discovery throughout all four seasons of the year. Le Meridien Cambridge-MIT's elegant guest rooms and suites offer a place of luxurious sanctuary and unmatched comfort. Situated in the heart of Central Square in Cambridge, Le Meridien is steps away from a culturally diverse area renowned for its cuisine and shopping, easily accessible from Logan Airport and just minutes from Boston city centre.
hotel.airportsDesc: Logan International Airport, (BOS), 6.00, MI;

hotel.name: The Harbour View Inn
hotel.description: Overlooking the historic harbour and waterfront park, the HarbourView Inn hotel is Charleston, SC's most acclaimed inn. Surrounded by over three hundred years of history, the HarbourView Inn hotel is within walking distance of the famous city market, world renowned restaurants, antique row and boutique shopping in Charleston. Enjoy unparalleled amenities and services, such as evening turn down service with a sweet dream treat, evening wine and cheese reception, and before bed cookies and milk, for a hotel in the heart of the historic district. Panoramic views, vast atriums and luxurious hotel rooms some with private balconies, working fireplaces and whirlpool tubs. All rooms feature flat-screen TVs, luxurius bedding, tempur-pedic mattresses, and hand crafted furnishings including 4 poster beds.

facility.title: Traditional Inn Room
facility.desc: Our Oversized Traditional Rooms feature a King or Two Queens and are decorated in a decidedly West Indies old world style and feature two queen beds with Tempur-pedic mattresses. Each room is stocked with 26" plasma TV's, mini-fridges, in-room safes, iHome docking station, lightweight waffle weave bathrobes, hair dryers, make-up mirrors, and an iron and ironing board. Rates include complimentary breakfast delivery, turndown service, and an evening wine and cheese reception.

Continental breakfast, high speed Internet access, and on-site parking are all complimentary at this acclaimed Lake Buena Vista, FL hotel, while large guest rooms provide an abundance of amenities to reflect the comforts of home. Splash in the spectacular outdoor swimming pool with a children's play area or relax in the whirlpool. Boasting a variety of dining options, the Village Food Court at this Walt Disney World Good Neighbor Hotel offers ice cream, pizza, and sandwiches. Enjoy convenient, quick access to many nearby attractions, including Walt Disney World, Universal Studios, SeaWorld, and Discovery Cove. Indulge in spacious studio suites perfect for extended family vacations at Springhill Suites Lake Buena Vista, Fl

hotel.name: Venetian Resort Hotel Casino
hotel.description:
With such a spectacular setting, it's clear from the minute you arrive that this is an all-suite, five-diamond resort destination with something extra. Located on the world-famous Las Vegas Strip and approximately four miles from McCarran Airport, The Venetian triumphs in recreating the glory of Venice. Suites start at 650 square feet, nearly twice the size as a typical Las Vegas hotel room. The Palazzo is steps away and offers guests more amenities and features to enjoy.

Faithful replications of the Doge's Palace, the Bridge of Sighs, the Campanile Tower, and St. Mark's Square offer awe-inspiring sights and sounds true to the crown jewel of Europe. Don't miss the quarter-mile Grand Canal set in a frescoed sunset sky where gondoliers serenade their passengers on the romantic ride of a lifetime. Features such as the 134,000-square-foot Canyon Ranch SpaClub, the more than 80 international boutiques of The Grand Canal Shoppes, an opulent casino featuring all your table and slot games, a five-acre pool deck, menus created by celebrity chefs including Emeril Lagasse, Wolfgang Puck, David Burke, Thomas Keller, and Mario Batali, and the entertainment of Rock of Ages - the Las Vegas Spectacular, and Rita Rudner guarantee every visit to The Venetian will be unforgettable.

There is a daily resort fee of $25 plus tax that will be charged upon check-in. Resort fee includes daily access to the complete fitness center located inside the Canyon Ranch SpaClub for up to two guests, unlimited en-suite high-speed Internet access, unlimited local and toll-free telephone calls, daily newspaper, free boarding pass printing, one free regular coffee at Cafe Presse (one per stay for up to two people). Not Valid at Sands Expo location. And One 2-for-1 drink coupon for well drinks, house wine, or domestic beer at any Casino Bar excluding The Bourbon Room (must be 21 or older to redeem drink coupon, limited one per stay).

facility.title: Bella Suite
facility.desc: This 700-square-foot suite features a bed chamber with two plush queen-sized pillow-top beds, Egyptian cotton sheets, two 400-count wool throws, and a 32" flat-screen LCD HDTV. The sunken living room has a dining table that seats three, an oversized coffee table and ottoman, an L-Shaped full-sized sofa-sleeper (upon availability), and a 32" flat-screen LCD HDTV. The private work area includes a dual-line telephone and wireless high-speed Internet access. The 130-square-foot bathroom features a 17" LCD HDTV, a Roman tub with separate glass-enclosed shower, an adjacent water closet with telephone, a double-sink vanity, and luxurious robes. Other amenities include bath products by Agraria San FranciscoTM, a DVD player, a CD player/alarm clock, remote-controlled Roman shades and curtains, a fully-stocked refreshment center, and an in-suite safe.

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Atlanta Executive Park/Emory
hotel.description: North of downtown Atlanta in Executive Park Business Center, the Courtyard Atlanta Executive Park hotel near Emory meets the needs of business travelers. This hotel near Emory University, is also near the CDC and the chic Buckhead area. Enjoy superior features placing us among the most preferred Emory hotels in Atlanta. The new state-of-the-art lobby provides flexibility and choices where guests can work or relax, free Wi-Fi throughout and access to news, weather and airport conditions via our GoBoard®. The highlight of our new lobby is The Bistro–Eat. Drink. Connect. Enjoy enhanced food and beverage choices in the morning, dinner service in the evening and The Market, your 24-hour one-stop shop for fresh sandwiches and snacks. Retreat to your stylish, guest room with plush bedding, a flat screen TV and enhanced workspace with complimentary wireless Internet to keep you productive. Our Emory hotel offers two meeting rooms for small business and social events, an updated gym, and an outdoor seasonal pool.

hotel.name: Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel
hotel.description: The Renaissance Harborplace Baltimore Hotel is delighted to showcase a new distinctive design featuring modern urban sophistication. The hotel's recently renovated 586 guestrooms and 34 suites have been revived with unprecedented comfort and include new amenities including flat panel televisions, iPod docking stations and improved high-speed Internet connectivity. Discover a four-diamond jewel among downtown Baltimore hotels, situated just steps from the area's most unique sights and attractions. Enjoy premier access to the world-famous Inner Harbor, home to the Baltimore Aquarium, the Maryland Science Center, and 120 dining and shopping options. The Renaissance Baltimore hotel's WATERTABLE restaurant/lounge and Ground Floor Cafe have become local favorites, boasting award-winning culinary talent and offering an all-natural menu bringing stylish twists to each season's finest ingredients. Experience the rich culture of Charm City in a vibrant location sure to delight you at this Baltimore Inner Harbor hotel.

Discover the vibrant atmosphere of Baltimore's famed Inner Harbor from the distinctive Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel, where waterfront views, luxury accommodations and remarkable service set the standard for downtown Baltimore hotels. Laced with the city's charm and surrounded by an abundance of landmarks, our sophisticated hotel puts guests near upscale shopping, fine dining and fun things to do in downtown Baltimore, Maryland. Offering a variety of accommodations, guests will find it easy to relax as all rooms feature luxury linens, marble bathrooms, Enhanced High-Speed Internet access and room service so they can make the most of their travel time. On-site amenities include our popular Watertable restaurant and lounge, a 24-hour fitness center and refreshing indoor pool. Conveniently situated near the Baltimore Convention Center, our luxury hotel's impressive meeting and event space is ideal for hosting downtown conferences and elegant social events.
City Center, Location Type: City

facility.title: Watertable
facility.desc: Savor all-natural American classics created by a skilled culinary team using only the freshest of each season's ingredients. From small plates and cocktails to multi-course meals and fine wine, memorable fine dining in Baltimore, MD starts here.

facility.title: Watertable Lounge
facility.desc: Whether ending the day or kicking off the evening, the Watertable Lounge offers an atmosphere filled with breathtaking Inner Harbor views, friendly service and an offering of inventive cocktails, fine wine, tasty appetizers and delicious meals.

facility.title: The Ground Floor Cafe & Bar
facility.desc: Boasting choice Starbucks® Coffee drinks, fresh pastries and free Wi-Fi, this coffee house serves up tantalizing fare throughout the day making it easy to brunch or lunch as time allows. Sandwiches, fresh fruits and salads are daily menu favorites.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Inn & Suites of Sun City
hotel.description:
Welcome to BEST WESTERN Inn & Suites of Sun City!
Whether you need to be near Sun City, Arizona or Surprise, Arizona, our Youngtown hotel has a superior location, making commutes easy for guests.
Glendale, Arizona and Peoria, Arizona are just a short drive away from our Youngtown hotel. Our proximity to spring training stadiums makes us a popular choice for sports teams and their loved ones. The University of Phoenix Stadium is minutes away, and our friendly staff always goes the extra mile to make each guest as comfortable as possible. hotel.name: Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites CLEARWATER BEACH
hotel.description: Directly on the Gulf of Mexico - Sunsets and Dolphin Sightings Complimentary! Discover all that Clearwater Beach has to offer at the convenient, comfortable smoke free Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites. In the heart of everything, from shopping and dining to entertainment, you are within walking distance of the white sands of Clearwater Beach, and Pier 60 where you can enjoy nightly sunset celebrations. Located 30 minutes away from Tampa International Airport (TPA), the Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites is your best choice in Clearwater Beach. Whether you're coming to Clearwater Beach for fun or business the Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites is your personal retreat. You'll have room to relax, work or play most of the day in our spacious rooms, KidSuites or one bedroom suites. Amenities such as flat screen LCD HD televisions, granite counter tops, private balconies, free high-speed Internet, plush towels, and luxurious bedding mean every night is a great night and every day starts right. You can take a dip in our heated Gulf-front pool, relax with your favorite beverage at Jimmy's Iguana Bar or our Rum Rumer's Tiki Bar. You can enjoy a dining adventure at Jimmy's Fish House providing nightly entertainment. The best of Clearwater Beach is waiting for you at the Award Winning Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites. The only thing you won't find is a reason to leave. This hotel is committed to providing accessible facilities under the American Disabilities Act. If your accessibility needs are not met, please contact the Hotel Manager on Duty. Should you require additional information regarding accessible facilities for guests with disabilities, please call 1-800-Holiday (U.S. and Canada) or contact the hotel directly. For the hearing impaired, TDD service is available at 1-800-238-5544 within the U.S. and Canada.
hotel.airportsDesc: Tampa International Airport, (TPA), 22.00, MI; St. Pete Clearwater Regional Airport, (PIE), 15.00, MI;

hotel.name: Donovan House, a Kimpton Hotel
hotel.description: Washington DC property Donovan House brings urban chic to the nations capital. 193 luxe and seductive rooms feature custom design elements including chocolate leather canopy beds Studio Gaia club chairs and translucent cocoon spiral showers. The hotels acclaimed restaurant Zentan by acclaimed chef Jennifer Nguyen serves up inventive Asian inspired cuisine. Above it all is a private rooftop pool and bar that offers guests and natives a metropolitan hideaway boasting a full-service bar food from Zentan and private cabanas. It is the perfect place for relaxation or late night cocktails and events. Donovan House provides you with a plethora of insider information on how to navigate the city like a DC native. Here are a handful of restaurants featuring local influences and fare as well as some of our favorite must see spot

hotel.name: Hilton Fort Lauderdale Marina
hotel.description:
Renew your body and spirit at Fort Lauderdale Grande, formerly the Fort Lauderdale Marina Marriott, poised at the edge of Florida's majestic Intracoastal Waterway. With refined elegance, a dynamic location and impeccable service, this luxurious Fort Lauderdale hotel provides a soothing, unhurried atmosphere in one of Americas most colorful locales. The hotel is ideal place to conduct your business meeting or enjoy a long-awaited vacation. Lounge by the poolside deck, and drift to sleep under the warm sunshine.

Hotel cannot guarantee bedding option.

hotel.name: Embassy Suites Hampton Roads - Hotel, Spa & Convention Cente
hotel.description: Connected by a covered walkway to the Hampton Roads Convention Center, Embassy Suites Hampton Roads - Hotel, Spa & Convention Center is a great place to make the most of your stay. Within easy reach of some of the area’s largest corporations and most popular attractions, this all-suite hotel has excellent access to I-64 and is less than 20 miles from Norfolk International Airport and the Newport News/Williamsburg International Airport.Stay connected and productive thanks to the complimentary BusinessLink™ Business Center or get some work done from the comfort of your spacious two-room suite. A private bedroom and separate living area, featuring a sofa bed, means you have the flexibility to relax with the whole family. Start every day in style with a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. In the evening, unwind with a drink and snack at the complimentary Evening Reception*. Pamper yourself with a trip to Spa Botanica. Keep active by swimming laps in the indoor pool or by utilizing the fitness center. The adjoining Hampton Road Convention Center features over 160,000 sq. ft. of conference and exhibition space, making this the ideal choice as a Hampton conference hotel.* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. facility.title: Property
facility.desc: Connected by a covered walkway to the Hampton Roads Convention Center, Embassy Suites Hampton Roads - Hotel, Spa & Convention Center is a great place to make the most of your stay. Within easy reach of some of the area’s largest corporations and most popular attractions, this all-suite hotel has excellent access to I-64 and is less than 20 miles from Norfolk International Airport and the Newport News/Williamsburg International Airport.Stay connected and productive thanks to the complimentary BusinessLink™ Business Center or get some work done from the comfort of your spacious two-room suite. A private bedroom and separate living area, featuring a sofa bed, means you have the flexibility to relax with the whole family. Start every day in style with a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. In the evening, unwind with a drink and snack at the complimentary Evening Reception*. Pamper yourself with a trip to Spa Botanica. Keep active by swimming laps in the indoor pool or by utilizing the fitness center. The adjoining Hampton Road Convention Center features over 160,000 sq. ft. of conference and exhibition space, making this the ideal choice as a Hampton conference hotel.* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Airport Executel
hotel.description:
Enjoy convenient access to the Seattle/Tacoma International Airport while staying at this full-service Seattle, Washington hotel.
Welcome to the BEST WESTERN Airport Executel, where guests will discover the highest standard of customer service and accommodations for an affordable rate. Situated only 1.5 miles from the Seattle/Tacoma International Airport, this 100% non-smoking Seattle hotel features well-appointed guest rooms and suites, each equipped with over 70 free cable television channels and free wireless high-speed Internet access. Start the day off with a complimentary hot breakfast buffet featuring make-your-own waffles! Then enjoy a variety of delicious cuisines at the onsite restaurant. Take a dip in the indoor swimming pool before relaxing in the Whirlpool hot tub. The hotel also features an exercise facility, a business center, social area in the Atrium overlooking the pool with board games plus meeting space accommodating up to 60 people. Guests will also appreciate the complimentary airport shuttle and Sleep and Fly packages.
Only 15 miles from the heart of Seattle, guests staying at the BEST WESTERN Airport Executel will find themselves close to many of Seattle's key attractions such as the Space Needle, Pike Street Market and the SouthCenter Mall. Easy access to the LightRail link which offers fast service to downtown Seattle with stops at Safeco Field (home of the Seattle Mariners) and Qwest Field (home of the Seattle Seahawks). Enjoy an afternoon of fun at Six Flags® or Enchanted Village located only minutes away or spend the afternoon touring the Boeing Museum of Flight. The Alaska Cruises Departure Ports are also only 15 miles from the hotel, making the hotel ideal for travelers heading out to sea.
The friendly, helpful staff at the BEST WESTERN Airport Executel is ready to ensure a fun-filled memorable stay in Seattle, Washington. Make a reservation today!
Credit card required at check-in for all res

hotel.name: Sheraton San Diego Hotel & Marina
hotel.description: Come experience the all-new feel of Sheraton San Diego Hotel & Marina. Part of a $35 million renovation, all of our 1,053 guest rooms feature a bold and attractive redesign to complement spectacular views of our marina, the downtown San Diego skyline, or beautiful San Diego Bay. At the end of a full day, sink into the new, all-white Sheraton Sweet Sleeper™ Bed, custom-designed with a plush-top mattress, then wrapped in crisp cotton sheets with petal-soft blankets and duvets. Our facelift also includes a fresh new façade, as well as the arrival of Link@Sheraton experienced with Microsoft, for finding new friends or connecting with old ones via complimentary Wi-Fi and broadband access—or just relaxing in an inviting spot over coffee and a snack. Nestled at the water's edge on spectacular San Diego Bay, our hotel affords panoramic views of the bay and the downtown city skyline. Some of the country's most unique attractions are within a 10-minute drive—including Sea World, the world-famous San Diego Zoo, the popular Gaslamp Quarter, and Seaport Village. Our guest rooms and suites are spread across two towers, each offering a private balcony or patio where you can enjoy San Diego's average year round temperature of 72 degrees. The Marina Tower features 698 guest rooms, four restaurants and lounges including our newest addition—Tapatini's—with an exclusive tapas menu and signature martinis. The Bay Tower is located 300 yards away and features 346 guest rooms, an outdoor pool, Jacuzzi, and our award-winning restaurant Alfiere's, known for its Mediterranean fresh market cuisine.
hotel.airportsDesc: San Diego International Airport, (SAN), 1.00, MI;

hotel.name: Hilton Houston Westchase
hotel.description: Discover a spacious, elegant hotel on Westheimer Road when you check in to the Hilton Houston Westchase hotel. Set in the stylish Westchase district, this Houston hotel is located 30 minutes from both William P. Hobby (HOU) and George Bush Intercontinental (IAH) Airports. Just off the Sam Houston Tollway, this west Houston hotel offers easy access to downtown Houston and beyond, on the doorstep of corporate businesses such as ABB, Halliburton and the SAP America Training Center.Take in panoramic views of the city and the elegantly landscaped hotel garden surroundings from the floor-to-ceiling windows of your guest room. Upgrade to the Executive Level and enjoy all the lounge facilities, including its own business center and conference room. Suites are airy and spacious. Accessible rooms are designed to maximize comfort.Mesquite wood grilled steaks are the order of the day at Rio Ranch restaurant. Relax by the 30-foot limestone fireplace created by Texas artisans. An easy Texas Hill Country atmosphere runs through Rio Ranch at breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Atrium Lobby Bar is a bright spot for evening cocktails and watching the game with colleagues.Host any event at Hilton Houston Westchase. Minutes from the Energy Corridor, boardrooms play host to briefings. The Omni Room is an elegant backdrop for the grandest of functions with reception space for 900. Take your celebration into the pleasant gardens of this west Houston hotel.

hotel.name: The Westin Reston Heights
hotel.description: Brand new and ideally located for business or leisure, The Westin Reston Heights is a blend of comfort and sophistication moments from Dulles International Airport and a short cab ride from our nation?s capital. Our convenient location is close to great shopping, area museums and galleries, corporate headquarters, government buildings, and downtown Washington, D.C. After a day of activities or a business meeting, retreat to one of our 191 comfortable and spacious guest rooms or suites. Each room includes the Heavenly Bed? and Heavenly Bath?, ergonomic workspace, and a flat screen television. In addition, each room offers wireless High Speed Internet Access and 24-hour room service. Rejuvenate body and mind in our WestinWORKOUT? Gym or in the heated indoor pool. Then, enjoy a delicious meal in Vinifera Wine Bar & Bistro. Find total renewal at The Westin Reston Heights.

hotel.name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Phoenix Chandler
hotel.description:
The La Quinta Inn and Suites Phoenix Chandler was recently named a 2014 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence award winner!
NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
The newly renovatedLa Quinta Inn & Suites Phoenix Chandler is conveniently located off I-10 and Chandler Blvd. The hotel is surrounded by offices of several Fortune 500 companies including Intel, ADP and Honeywell. Although a half mile from Intel offices, the hotel is also less than 10 miles from the Intel Plant in Chandler. Enjoy our Free Bright Side BreakfastTM each morning. Located just 12 miles south of Sky Harbor Airport, the hotel is near downtown Phoenix, home of the Arizona Diamondbacks and Phoenix Suns. We provide easy access to many nearby Phoenix attractions, such as Firebird International Raceway, Gila River Casinos, Rawhide Western Town, and many spectacular Golf Courses. After a hard day of work or play relax on the sundeck around the heated outdoor pool. Work away the day's stress in our 24-hour fitness center or soak in the bubbling spa. Our rooms are spacious and clean, and include free wireless internet access. Stay productive in our 24-hour business center. Our meeting room can accommodate up to 40 people. Whether you are visiting the area for business or pleasure, you'll enjoy the dependable service you have come to know from La Quinta Inn & Suites.

hotel.name: Embassy Suites Denver-Downtown/Convention Center
hotel.description: The Embassy Suites Denver – Downtown/Convention Center hotel, honored as one of the 'Top 25 US Hotels' by TripAdvisor in 2013, offers the perfect setting for business or pleasure. Stay at this gateway to Denver's lively downtown scene. Boasting a contemporary convention venue, our LEED™-certified hotel in Denver, Colorado is within walking distance of the best attractions in the downtown area.Relax in a classic two-room suite with a separate, spacious living area. Enjoy comfortable, home-like amenities such as two 32-inch flat-screen HDTVs, video game consoles, microwave, coffeemaker and a mini-refrigerator. Accessible rooms are available.Start your day with a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. Mingle with other guests and enjoy a variety of beverages and snacks at the complimentary Evening Reception*. Relax in the indoor saline swimming pool or take advantage of the 24-hour fitness facility. Massage services are available for guests who want to indulge in intense relaxation in beautiful mountain surroundings.Hold your business meeting or social event in one of our 14 flexible venues for 35-650 guests and delegates. High-speed WiFi is available in your guest room for a minimal fee, or use complimentary internet access in the 24-hour BusinessLink™ Business Center.* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. hotel.name: Hampton Inn Waldorf
hotel.description: The gateway to the beauty of southern Maryland...welcome to the Hampton Inn Waldorf. Stay with us at the Hampton Inn® hotel in Waldorf, and you'll be amid the rolling and lush terrain of Charles County. It's a stunning and romantic place to visit, loaded with history, restaurants, shopping and golf. Our natural areas are much celebrated and host gorgeous wildlife along with excellent hiking and biking trails. All of those outdoor activities are within just minutes of our hotel. Yet we offer a great deal of manmade beauty as well. Across the street from the Hampton Inn hotel in Waldorf, you'll find one of Maryland's largest malls. We're also just minutes from major businesses and institutions such as the U.S. Naval Surface Warfare Center (NSWC) and Naval Sea Systems Command. It's one of the most advanced research centers in the world. Lastly, when you're ready for all the monuments and history of our nation's capital, Washington, D.C. lies only 18 miles away. So come visit us at our hotel in Waldorf, your gateway to the beauty of southern Maryland. Here at the Hampton Inn Waldorf, we're passionate about taking good care of you. That's why we offer a broad range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional. Whether you're planning a corporate meeting or need accommodations for a family reunion or your child's sporting group, we're delighted to offer you easy planning and booking tools to make the process quick and organized.

Our natural areas are much celebrated and host gorgeous wildlife along with excellent hiking and biking trails. All of those outdoor activities are within just minutes of our hotel.Yet we offer a great deal of manmade beauty as well. Across the street from the Hampton Inn hotel in Waldorf, you'll find one of Maryland's largest malls. We're also just minutes from major businesses and institutions such as the U.S. Naval Surface Warfare Center (NSWC) and Naval Sea Systems Command. It's one of the most advanced research centers in the world. Lastly, when you're ready for all the monuments and history of our nation's capital, Washington, D.C. lies only 18 miles away. So come visit us at our hotel in Waldorf, your gateway to the beauty of southern Maryland.services & amenitiesHere at the Hampton Inn Waldorf, we're passionate about taking good care of you. That's why we offer a broad range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.Whether you're planning a corporate meeting or need accommodations for a family reunion or your child's sporting group, we're delighted to offer you easy planning and booking tools to make the process quick and organized. * Meetings & Events * Local restaurant guide

hotel.name: Lord Baltimore Hotel
hotel.description: Lord Baltimore Hotel housed in a stunning French Renaissance building located in the heart of downtown Baltimore and just three blocks from the famous Inner Harbor, the historic Lord Baltimore Hotel features complimentary services such as high speed wireless internet access. Guests at this grand hotel enjoy easy access and exclusive offers at area attractions including the National Aquarium, Walters Museum, Visionary Museum, Baltimore Museum, Peabody Library and concert venues. The Lord Baltimore Hotel is in the City's Business and Financial Districts and is one the best Baltimore Inner Harbor hotels.Towering over the Baltimore skyline at 23 stories with 440 guest rooms, the hotel offers more than 20,000 square feet of meeting, banquet and event space. Lord Baltimore Hotel offers a magnificent and historic 1920 grand ballroom that features Baccarat crystal chandeliers and a mirrored replica Versailles Dining Room. Our in house cafe proudly served Starbuck's coffee. Following our 2013-2014 renovation and restoration, all guest rooms and public spaces feature authentic and unique designs that incorporate state-of-the-art technology while embracing historic ambiance and, in 2014, the hotel will re-launch the long hidden Speakeasy that was closed with the repeal of Prohibition.The hotel is located in the city center near the intersection of Baltimore and Charles Street in the heart of Baltimore. Valet parking is offered and several self-parking facilities are adjacent to the hotel.

hotel.name: San Francisco Marriott Union Square
hotel.description: Combining luxury and convenience, the San Francisco Marriott Union Square invites guests to experience exceptional service in ideal accommodations. Sitting on the corner of Sutter and Powell streets, our Union Square hotel is just steps from world-class shopping, restaurants, bars and the theater district. Being in the heart of downtown, our San Francisco hotel allows business travelers to walk to meetings at the Moscone Center or in the Financial District, while vacationers can enjoy lunch in Chinatown and catch a game at AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. Our Union Square San Francisco hotel offers 400 guest rooms, including 53 suites with phenomenal views of the bay and city skyline. Working professionals can take advantage of high-speed Internet throughout our nine meeting rooms featuring 10,000 square feet of flexible event space in addition to our full-service business center. Whether here for work or play, come experience the charm and sophistication of our San Francisco hotel.
hotel.airportsDesc: San Francisco International Airport, (SFO), 14.20, MI, N; Oakland International Airport, (OAK), 20.10, MI, NW;

hotel.name: Sheraton Dallas Hotel
hotel.description:
Ideally located in the heart of the Arts and Financial district and minutes from the Convention Center, the Sheraton Dallas Hotel provides everything you need for business or leisure.
No event is too big or too small for our expert in-house catering, audiovisual, floral, and convention service departments. Our portfolio of over 260,000 square feet of flexible rooms and ballrooms are some of the largest in the Lone Star State, and make us a favorite choice for productive meetings, world-class events, spectacular city views and large gatherings. You will also enjoy a wide spectrum of dining and entertainment options ranging from Players Sports Bar to Bagels on Bryan coffee house to Pearl Street Café. A full service health club as well as indoor and outdoor pools complement the 1,840 comfortable guest rooms and suites. With DART light rail stopping right at the hotel, youre just a short ride from Dallas's sports and convention complexes, tourist attractions, and nightlife. We are connected to Plaza of the Americas – an extensive shopping complex featuring an indoor ice skating rink. From intimate gatherings to large-scale conventions, the Sheraton Dallas Hotel is the best choice for a successful event and satisfied attendees.
hotel.airportsDesc: Dallas Fort Worth International Airport, (DFW), 23.00, MI;

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Denver Downtown
hotel.description: Welcome to the Courtyard by Marriott Denver Downtown hotel! Our boutique-style Denver Marriott hotel is ideally located on the famed 16th Street Mall, just 4 blocks from the Colorado Convention Center and close to the best restaurants, attractions and shopping in the city. Visit the Pepsi Center, Coors Field, Larimer Square, Denver Pavilions and the Denver Center for the Performing Arts. Walk to major corporations such as CenturyLink, Accenture and DaVita. Our Denver downtown hotels stylish rooms and suites feature first-rate amenities, including luxury bedding, stylish décor, beautiful artwork and high ceilings. We are housed in a beautifully renovated historic building, and offer distinguished meeting space ideal for corporate gatherings. Guests are invited to enjoy our fitness and business centers, and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Be sure to visit our on-site restaurant, Rialto Café, offering award-winning cuisine. The Courtyard Denver Downtown hotel delivers comfort, convenience and style!

hotel.name: The Townsend Hotel
hotel.description:
The Townsend Hotel, Michigan's premier boutique hotel,believes in pampering guests, surrounding them in the luxury for which the hotel has become famous. No detail has been overlooked to uphold the stellar reputation for which The Townsend Hotel is known.
Upon entry to The Townsend Hotel, guests are greeted to a traditional English decor. Weary travelers can relax in front of one of the two crystal Waterford chandeliers and murals inspired by London's Victoria & Albert Museum. The beautiful flower arrangements are a standard at the Townsend Hotel.

facility.title: Rugby Grille
facility.desc:
When it comes to fine dining, Detroit's finest is right here. Our Rugby Grille was recently awarded the AAA-Four Diamond award, and was the 2006 Restaurant of the year award winner in Hour Magazine. Connoisseurs of American continental cuisine will delight in the traditional, yet innovative fare of the Rugby Grille. The menu reveals offerings that show Chef Barnett's desire to expand the cuisine.
The Rugby Grille is open seven days a week for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Enjoy the light and airy gallery with fresh cut flowers on every table or the warmer ambiance of the Grille with its cherry wood paneling and cozy fireplace.
From a business luncheon to a leisurely evening meal, expect unsurpassed quality in every detail.

facility.title: Deluxe King Room
facility.desc: Deluxe King Room includes Egyptian Cotton sheets, Twice Daily housekeeping, Dual line phone, High speed internet, Marble bath, Gilchrist & Soames Bath Products, In-room safe, Honor bar.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: Take advantage of our 1,100-square foot fitness center where you'll find cutting-edge equipment including Precor and Tectrix treadmills, recumbent bicycles, StairMaster, no-impact, elliptical cross-trainers, as well as Cybex specialized weight machines. Individual headsets and television monitors allow guests to personalize their music and viewing selections.

facility.title: Luxury Suite
facility.desc: Luxury Suites inclued a separate living area from the bedroom, Egyptian Cotton sheets, Twice Daily housekeeping, Dual line phone, High speed internet, Marble bath, Gilchrist & Soames Bath Products, In-room safe, Honor bar.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc:
With the elegance and flexibility to accommodate your most creative imaginings, The Townsend is the ideal setting for your next special event.
For small gatherings of five to twenty-five guests, our Suites and Penthouses provide professional, yet relaxed settings. For larger meetings, from an impressive corporate function to a romantic wedding reception, The Townsend Hotel has everything you need to create a flawless occasion and lifelong memories. By skillfully blending state-of-the-art audiovisual technology with the beauty of traditional European dcor, The Townsend has the most opulent and comfortable event space in southeastern Michigan.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The Townsend Hotel is located within downtown Birmingham, 40 minutes from Detroit Metropolitan Airport, and only minutes away from Oakland County's corporate community. Guests from around the world enjoy eclectic restaurants and charming boutiques that wind along tree lined streets, all within walking distance from The Townsend. The night life includes everything from a boisterous Irish Pub to a cigar and martini lounge. Outdoor enthusiasts can enjoy their recreational activities in more than 300 acres of parks, as well as wooded trails, lakes, beautiful gardens, and outdoor fountains and sculpture.

hotel.name: Great Wolf Lodge Grapevine
hotel.description:
Great Wolf Lodge in Grapevine Texas is the only place you can go to experience a huge indoor waterpark; stay in guest rooms designed like beautiful north woods cabins and dine in restaurants that will make you feel like you are camping under the stars.
At Great Wolf Lodge our gigantic indoor waterpark is reserved exclusively for our guests. That means we are saving lots of howlin waterpark fun just for you and your pack. So soak yourself under our 1000 gallon tipping bucket; lounge in the endless lazy river; zip down one of our fantastic tube slides or splash in our zero-depth entry pool.
Great Wolf Lodge does not do anything in a small way. Be sure to venture to our Cub Club rooom that has family friendly crafts and activities. Or let your kids run wild with our live action adventure game called MagiQuest - for an additional fee. And when the kids are ready check out Scooops our ice-cream themed kids spa designed just for the 12 and under set.
hotel.airportsDesc: Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport, (DFW), 9.00, MI, N; Dallas Love Field, (DAL), 21.00, MI, NW;
