hotel.name: Royal St. Charles
hotel.description:
The Royal St. Charles Hotel, a contemporary styled boutique hotel, is located just 1 block from Bourbon Street and the French Quarter. The hotel features modern amenities and spacious guest rooms and is ideally situated for both the business and leisure traveler.
The Royal St. Charles hotel features luxuriously appointed rooms and suites, voice mail, in-room safe, original artwork, handmade furniture, coffee makers, irons & ironing boards, hair dryers. The Royal St. Charles Hotel has an Amenity Package Fee of $9.95 per night. This package includes unlimited local and long distance phone calls, wi-fi internet access, 24 hour fitness center usage, and up to $20,000 insurance on your in-room safe. This is a mandatory fee by the hotel. Valet Parking is $32 per night, plus tax (unless the cost is included in a special package). The hotel also offers 4100 sqf of meeting/banquet space accommodating 10 to 300 guests. Non-smoking and handicapped-accessible rooms are also available.
Ideally situated for both the business or leisure traveler, the Royal St. Charles hotel invites you to enjoy a relaxing stay with us on your next visit to New Orleans!

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc:
Our catering staff is awaiting your arrival for a successful and memorable event. From a variety of New Orleans cuisine and fun, your guests can truly have a "taste of New Orleans".
Allow our special events coordinator to plan your event from start to finish. Additional services offered and arranged by the catering department: transportation, off-site events at local attraction venues, restaurant reservations, golf outings, specialty decor, musical entertainment, tours, team building activities & more.
We offer 4100 square feet of meeting/banquet space with five private rooms, which can accommodate 10 to 300 guests in a wide variety of meeting room setups. Meeting and reception packages are available for your convenience, as well as audio and visual capabilities.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc:
From I-10 WEST (Airport): Take I-10 toward Westbank (US 90), exit St Charles/Carondelet Street. Continue to the 3rd light, turn left on Camp Street. Go through 7 lights, turn left on Common Street. The Royal St. Charles Hotel is one block up on the right.
From I-10 EAST: Take I-10 toward the "Central Business District" (CBD), take the Canal Street Exit. At the light take a right on to Canal Street. Go approximately one mile and take a right on St. Charles Avenue. Take the first right at Common Street. The Royal St. Charles Hotel entrance is on the right

hotel.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Bethesda - Downtown
hotel.description: The Residence Inn Bethesda Downtown is conveniently located near the Naval Medical Center, NIH, FDA and NRC. Our Bethesda, Maryland hotel is just 1 block from the DC metro rail Bethesda station, a few short miles from I-495, the Capital Beltway, and the I-270 Technology Corridor. Washington DC's NW boroughs of Chevy Chase and Tenleytown are also nearby. Our downtown Bethesda hotel's location is perfect for guests working in Maryland and DC, or visiting American University and the University of DC. Designed for extended stays, you can stretch out and relax in a suite that offers separate sleeping, living and dining areas. We also offer allergy friendly "green" rooms. All our suites provide the comforts of home with full kitchens, living rooms with sofa beds and high-speed Internet access. Our Washington DC area hotel serves breakfast daily and offers nightly social hours midweek. For groups, there are also 7 meetings rooms with space for 200 attendees available.

hotel.name: Ramada Plaza Hawthorne/LAX
hotel.description:
The Ramada Plaza Hawthorne/LAX is located only 3.5 miles for the Los Angeles International Airport. We offer complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport during peak arrival and departure periods. Our Park Before You Fly package is a great option for guest taking a trip. We are only 5 miles from the Manhattan Beach and area attractions.
We offer a full service restaurant and lounge on site serving breakfast and dinner daily, heated outdoor pool and courtyard, fitness center, guest coin laundry and dry cleaning service, lobby business center, ATM, gift shop and covered indoor parking. We also offer Atlas Car Rental in the hotel lobby.
Our guest rooms feature free high speed internet access, coffee makers, hair dryers, iron and ironing board, and work desk.

hotel.name: The Blake Hotel New Orleans, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member
hotel.description: Whether you are in town for business, leisure or attending a convention, Blake Hotel New Orleans is the perfect location. We are located on the St. Charles Streetcar line in the heart of Downtown New Orleans and steps away from all the local attractions including the famous French Quarter, Ernest N. Morial Convention Center, New Orleans Superdome, New Orleans Arena and Harrah's Casino. The hotel is blocks away from some of New Orleans' finest restaurants and shopping. This is thhe perfect location to experience Mardi Gras with all parades passing right in front of the hotel. Valet Parking is offered at 29.95 USD per night per vehicle. Hyatt Place is a new kind of hotel that puts style, innovation and the Hyatt Touch within everyone's reach. Our guests will enjoy a spacious guestroom with a 42 inch flat panel high-definition television, our signature Hyatt Grand Bed, a plush Cozy Corner oversized sofa sleeper that is separated from the sleeping area, and complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi internet access throughout the hotel. The hotel completed a $1.5 million renovation in February 2014 to maintain the hotel's stylish modern design, which included all 151 guestrooms and all public spaces and corridors, including the Gallery, meeting space, StayFit Gym, and other common areas. The innovation extends beyond the guestroom. Our Gallery is a warm and open area that features an intimate coffee and wine cafe, a TV den and an e-room with free access to a public computer and printer. We have 151 fully appointed rooms, meeting rooms with catering and audio visual available, indoor heated pool, fitness center, complimentary a.m. Kitchen Skillet, which features breakfast sandwiches, waffles, French toast, and pancakes. Easy access to I-355 and I-88. Centrally located to IBM, Oakbrook Terrace Tower, McDonald's Corp HQ, Oakbrook Shopping Center, and Brookfield Zoo. hotel.name: Rancho Bernardo Inn - Golf & Spa Resort
hotel.description:
A unique 4 diamond Golf & Spa Resort experience with warm, attentive service. All rooms are oversized, feature a patio or balcony and a wonderful view. Surroundings are lush and tranquil and world-class recreation and fine dining await. Most importantly, each and every guest is treated as a lifetime friend.

Located in San Diego North, the Inn boasts nearly perfect weather year-round with several hundred days of sunshine annually. After enjoying the award winning Spa, Golf, Tennis, Fitness Center, Heated Pools and Dining retreat to your spacious, custom-furnished guestroom.

Feel comfortable and at home with hand-chosen antiques, original artwork and a complete range of amenities to satisfy just about every need. The warm, inviting accommodations include single king or two queen bed guestrooms. Every room includes a patio or private balcony offering a view of the valley, golf course, or one of the Inn's manicured gardens.

The nightly INNclusive Plan of $19 includes your choice of overnight self or valet parking, in-room resort high speed and wireless internet access, complimentary welcome beverage per person, in-room premium coffee service, unlimited local, 800 and credit card calls, unlimited use of the fitness center, use of the Inn's driving range and daily newspaper delivery, Monday-Friday.

facility.title: El Bizcocho
facility.desc: This 5 star award-winning restaurant features contemporary French cuisine and a 1,600-label wine list. The Mexican-colonial decor includes rich colors and wrought-iron chandeliers. Outdoor patio seating is available. Dinner and Sunday brunch are served, jackets are recommended.

facility.desc: On Wednesday afternoons, high tea is served in this room with multiple fireplaces, leather, couches and walls lined with antique musical instruments.

facility.title: The Veranda Bar and Grille
facility.desc: California-Mediterranean cuisine is served at this casual bistro overlooking the 18th hole. Menu items range from salads and wood-fired pizzas to steaks. Guests can dine on an outdoor terrace with a fireplace. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily.

facility.title: Sports Bar
facility.desc: This casual bar has a clubby feel with a pool table and plaid carpeting. The bar offers a high definition Plasma screen and four TVs, a variety of board games, and a dartboard. Sandwiches, burgers, snacks, beer, and cocktails are served. Open late morning till late night

hotel.name: Baymont Inn & Suites Nashville Airport/ Briley
hotel.description: Enjoy the southern hospitality at this Baymont Inn and Suites Nashville Airport/ Briley, just off Interstate 40 and minutes from Nashville International Airport, the Grand Ole Opry, the Country Music Hall of Fame, and the great live music and dining of downtown Nashville. Pets are welcome at this lodging, which offers complimentary wireless Internet and complimentary breakfast, laundry, parking for buses, trucks and cars, and fitness center. Take care of work needs in the business center with meeting rooms, fax service and computer access, and when the work is done splash in the outdoor pool. There is no charge for kids 17 and under when accompanied by an adult.

hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Chicago
hotel.description: Rising above the Chicago River, Hyatt Regency Chicago lays adjacent to the Chicago Loop business district and the Magnificent Mile shopping and dining areas. This breathtaking hotel features 2,018 guestrooms including 119 suites, 337 new Deluxe rooms, and an exclusive Regency Club. All guestrooms feature wireless Internet access at a modern workstation. This full service hotel offers an extensive business center, a complimentary fitness center, six food and beverage outlets, wireless Internet access in public areas, and convenient indoor access to all shops and services in Illinois Center. The famous Big Bar is a perfect place to relax and enjoy a cocktail without leaving the hotel. Stetson's Chophouse, located on the hotel's first floor, was voted one of the top ten steakhouses in the city by the Chicago Tribune. The casual elegance of Networks Bar & Grill allows for a variety of dining venues in the hotel. Hyatt Regency Chicago continues to receive national awards for excellence in cuisine and hospitality.

hotel.name: Ames Boston Hotel
hotel.description: With it's signature flare for flamboyance, Morgans Hotel Group has transformed the Byzantine-Romanesque Ames building; originally built in 1893 as the headquarters of the Ames farm equipment empire; into a 114 room, 14 story boutique hotel gem- opening in November 2009. Located at the historic intersection of Court, State, and Washington Streets, Ames is just steps to the major office towers of Boston's Financial District, fabled Boston Harbor, historic Fanueil Hall Marketplace, posh row homes of Beacon Hill, glamourous nightlife and shopping, and Boston Common. With more than a cursory nod to history, Ames showcases striking original architectural elements such as mosaic tile ceilings, ornately detailed staircases, 12-14 foot guestroom ceilings, intricately carved white marble fireplaces, and dramatic windows- juxtaposed against clean modern finishes, uber sexy glass showers, mirrored chandeliers, and interpretive illusionary art installations. Appropriate to it's latter-day incarnation, Ames features leading-edge fitness and business centers, 46" LG plasma televisions, and (BOSE) audio equipment. The Ames building was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1974.
hotel.airportsDesc: Logan International Airport

facility.title: Property
facility.desc: Historic architecture with a modern, minimalist spirit History buffs appreciate both the location and original architecture of the AMES in the Byzantine-Romanesque Ames building. Built in 1893 as headquarters for the Ames farm equipment empire, the boutique hotel showcases mosaic tile ceilings, ornate staircases, carved marble fireplaces and dramatic arched windows. Designer David Rockwell added clean modern finishes and eye-catching decor. Now on the National Register of Historic Places, the hotel neighbors Faneuil Hall, Beacon Hill, Quincy Market, Boston Common and Boston Harbor.

facility.title: Superior
facility.desc: Luxurious King Bed. Providing a contrast of history and innovation, the Ames guest rooms exhibit an elegantly minimal and sleek framework with details that pay homage to the original 19th century design of the building. The illumination and levity of each room is enhanced by light oak flooring and textiles, harmoniously balancing sophistication and comfort. Scattered details nod to the 19th century aesthetic of the original building such as the custom designed desk, a modern interpretation of Federal style, and the table lamp, while modern and sophisticated amenities give guests the utmost comfort, such as the white marble, walk-in shower with a luxurious rain showerhead and hand-held shower features. All guest rooms at Ames are non-smoking rooms. Other amenities include Malin + Goetz bath products, Flat Screen HDTV, Ipod docking station, wireless high speed internet and luxurious down bedding.

Ideally located near historic Faneuil Hall and Beacon Hill, the 114-room Boston hotel offering an atmosphere that is at once refined and playful, a state-of-the art fitness center and suites accented by dramatic, Romanesque arched windows and original fireplaces. All guest rooms at Ames are non-smoking rooms. Ames Hotel 1 Court Street Boston, MA 02108

hotel.name: Holiday Inn IRVINE SOUTH/IRVINE SPECTRUM
hotel.description: Our Orange County Hotel's Hospitality is Outstanding The upscale Holiday Inn® Irvine South - Irvine Spectrum offers guests a fresh way to experience the best in hospitality in Orange County. Our hotel's detail-oriented staff and premier location off the I-5 makes us the top choice for business and pleasure. Corporate guests appreciate being close to more than 100 corporate offices, John Wayne Airport (SNA) and the Irvine Spectrum. Our hotel's complimentary business center offers all the tools you need for business. Each room has free high-speed Internet access and a specialized work area with an ergonomic desk and chair plus state-of-the-art design for a quiet and peaceful experience. Disneyland®, Wild Rivers Water Park and the Irvine Spectrum are favorites of our hotel's guests. Easy access to the San Diego Freeway makes it simple to explore everything Southern California and Orange County offers. Our hotel's staff can assist with directions to Foothill Ranch, Verizon Amphitheater or anywhere else! What sets us apart from other Irvine Spectrum hotels are the amenities you'll enjoy. Each quiet room immerses you in comfort as a personal retreat with HDTV and upscale linens. A state-of-the-art fitness center is complimentary, and our sparkling pool and spa is a great place to soak up the California sun. Then, end your day with a drink or delicious meal in our restaurant and bar. You'll agree, we're the best among Irvine Spectrum hotels.

Also included is high-speed Internet service, cordless phone, refrigerator, hairdryer, iron/board, bottle water and snack.

hotel.name: Hotel Erwin
hotel.description:
The Hotel Erwin is located in the heart of world famous Venice Beach. Only steps away from the boardwalk and the sandy beaches of the Pacific Ocean. The hotel has undergone a multi-million dollar renovation that has added a floor of Premier rooms, a sundeck offering panoramic views of the beach and all of LA, and completely renovated the existing floors. The corridors and rooms feature the vibrant artwork of world famous Venice artists. Venice has gone through significant revitalization having brought scores of great restaurants, boutiques, and art studios. Even the movie stars are moving in: Dennis Hopper, Anjelica Houston, Nicolas Cage, and Julia Roberts reside in this bohemian community. Some of L.A.'s most innovative and interesting architecture lines always entertaining Main Street. But without question, Venice Beach is best known for its Ocean Front Walk, a nonstop Mardi Gras of vendors, street performers, and visitors of all ages.


Parking is $30 per night. Valet parking only.
hotel.airportsDesc: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX)

facility.title: HIGH/Bar Lounge
facility.desc:
Perched atop the Hotel Erwin overlooking the Pacific Ocean, High is the premiere Venice Beach open-air lounge, where the nightly sunset is the main event.
High takes full advantage of its outdoor rooftop location and delivers breathtaking, nearly 360 degree views of the city, from famed Muscle Beach and the Boardwalk below to the Hollywood Sign and Downtown L.A. With an inviting, "no velvet ropes" attitude and a comfortable, contemporary design, tourists and locals alike mingle and enjoy a drink menu of premium handcrafted cocktails, artisan beers, interesting wines and light snacks. Whether you're here to try out a new cocktail, relax with some friends or simply to check out the view, there's no better lounge in Venice Beach than High. Hours Nightly, 5:30pm - late night (Hours are subject to change, please call 310.452.1111 for more information.) Reservation/contact information 1697 Pacific Avenue Los Angeles (Venice Beach), CA 90291 P: 310.452.1111

facility.title: Premier Ocean View Room
facility.desc: These rooms are equipped with 1 king bed, sitting area and private balcony to enjoy the views. Relax with contemporary furnishings and a 42-inch flat-screen HD TV. Bring your own music or videos to play through the Media Hub and iHome docking station. Guests will enjoy the spacious walk in shower and our rain style shower heads. All rooms offer laptop sized safes.

facility.title: Deluxe King or Two Queen
facility.desc: Large room offering a king bed or two queen beds and views of the eclectic Venice Beach neighborhood surrounding the hotel. All rooms offer a private balcony for you to enjoy. Bring your own music or videos to play through the Media Hub on the 32-inch flat-screen HD TV. All rooms offer lap-top sized safes.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: High-speed internet access available.

facility.title: Partial Ocean View King or Two Queen
facility.desc: Large room offering a king bed or two queen beds and partial views of the eclectic Venice Beach neighborhood surrounding the hotel and ocean. All rooms offer a private balcony for you to enjoy. Bring your own music or videos to play through the Media Hub on the 32-inch flat-screen HD TV. All rooms offer lap-top sized safes.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc:
Hotel Erwin's Larry's Loft meeting room defies the stodgy, bland tradition of corporate hotel conference centers.
For those planning an important company retreat, you'll enjoy wireless Internet, catering, access, and 1,000 square feet of gallery-style meeting space. Additional services such as audio/visual equipment simply await your beck and call. With nearby access to LAX and a beautiful rooftop lounge to enjoy cocktails with your group, Hotel Erwin gives you the right balance of energy and relaxation to get the most out of your next meeting in Venice Beach.
Meeting and Events Facilities: 1,000 square feet of unique gallery-style meeting space Audio/visual equipment available upon request Wireless Internet Catering available upon request
HIGH, open-air lounge for post-event festivities Accessible to freeways for easy access from any Los Angeles area

All rooms offer laptop sized safes.

facility.title: Deluxe Two Room Suite King with Sofa
facility.desc: These suites offer a view of the eclectic Venice Beach neighborhood surrounding the hotel and include a king bed in the private sleeping area with a queen sofa sleeper in the living area. These 750 sq. ft. suites feature a separate living room, dining room and wet bar. The living area includes a 42-inch HD TV, fireplace and private balcony. Bring your own music or videos to play through the Media Hub. All rooms offer lap-top sized safes.

facility.title: Partial Ocean View Two Room King Suite
facility.desc: These suites offer a partial view of the eclectic Venice Beach boardwalk and ocean, include a king bed in the private sleeping area with a queen sofa sleeper in the living area. These 750 sq. ft. suites feature a separate living room, dining room and wet bar. The living area includes a 42-inch HD TV, fireplace and private balcony. Bring your own music or videos to play through the Media Hub. All rooms offer lap-top sized safes.

facility.title: Full Ocean View Two Room King Suite
facility.desc: These suites offer a full view of the eclectic Venice Beach boardwalk and ocean, include a king bed in the private sleeping area with a queen sofa sleeper in the living area. These 750 sq. ft. suites feature a separate living room, dining room and wet bar. The living area includes a 42-inch HD TV, fireplace and private balcony. Bring your own music or videos to play through the Media Hub. All rooms offer lap-top sized safes.

facility.title: BarLo Kitchen and Cocktails
facility.desc: BarLo, a Venice Beach eatery and hangout, serves up a breakfast, brunch and dinner menu of ever rotating barn to belly dishes and drinks that incorporate innovative ingredients. Inspired by fresh farmer's market ingredients and with a focus on simplicity, BarLo in Venice Beach, delivers a menu of vibrant flavors while providing a strong communal sense that reflects what Venice Beach is about.

hotel.name: Hotel Monteleone
hotel.description:
There are 570 comfortable first class guestrooms and suites in the Hotel Monteleone. It's the perfect place to come back to and rejuvenate from a busy day or night exploring the consummate pleasures of New Orleans.

Beginning, January 20, the valet parking rate for overnight parking is $40.00 plus tax (12%) = $44.80 for all vehicles regardless of size. .

And what a history these guest rooms have! The Hotel Monteleone has long been the home to some of the cities, and the worlds, most famous and colorful characters. Tennessee Williams, William Faulkner and Truman Capote called it home as well as countless movie stars, dignitaries, royalty and political kingpins. All refund requests for Special Events must occur within 60 days of hotel check-out. This hotel requires that you are at least 18 to check in. Base rate is for 2 guests.

Our hotel is a pet friendly hotel but requires a 100.00 non-refundable cleaning fee and 25.00 per pet per day.

facility.desc: Rooms are newly refurbished in beautiful earth tones, conveying a sense of comfort, warmth, and relaxation. Rooms have new marble and granite bathrooms and plush amenities. High ceilings and ornamental moldings enhance the French Quarter ambiance. Flat Screen HDTV Television, Coffee Maker, Refreshment Center. Rooms are traditional in size and are located throughout this historical hotel. These Traditional Rooms range from 240 to 300 square feet.

facility.title: Criollo
facility.desc: Casual elegant restaurant located off the lobby. Ingredient-driven season menu is designed to offer creative dishes by culinary traditions & an appreciation of todays contemporary tastes. Open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc:
Experience the resounding elegance of old New Orleans without leaving any modern conveniences behind. Unique features of this AAA Four Diamond, family owned hotel include the city's first rooftop pool, a fitness area, room service, business center, and multi-lingual concierge. Now Open: Spa Aria.
Valet Parking is available - $30 for cars and $32 for oversized vehicles per night.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: The hotel provides over 20,000 square feet of beautifully decorated meeting space and expert staff to service any function. All meeting rooms are equipped with high speed internet access and our private Business Center offers a variety of services right in the hotel.

facility.title: Traditonal/King
facility.desc: Rooms are newly refurbished in beautiful earth tones, conveying a sense of comfort, warmth, and relaxation. Rooms have new marble and granite bathrooms and plush amenities. High ceilings and ornamental moldings enhance the French Quarter ambiance. Flat Screen HDTV Television, Coffee Maker, Refreshment Center. Rooms are traditional in size and are located throughout this historical hotel. These Traditional Rooms range from 240 - 290 square feet.

facility.title: Carousel Bar
facility.desc: The world famous Carousel Bar in Hotel Monteleone is the only bar in New Orleans that revolves around the room. It overlooks famous Royal Street through large fan windows. "Take a ride on the Carousel and change your point of view!"

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The Hotel Monteleone is the premier address of the French Quarter. Located at the top of Royal Street, the hotel is within walking distance of the finest restaurants, antique shops, galleries, and most major attractions. Only one block from Bourbon Street and two blocks from the Central Business District.

facility.title: Junior Suite/King
facility.desc: Newly refurbished in beautiful earth tones, conveying a sense of comfort, warmth, and relaxation. All have new marble and granite bathrooms and plush amenities. High ceilings and ornamental moldings enhance the French Quarter ambiance. Flat Screen HDTV Television, Coffee Maker, Refreshment Center. These suites have enhanced bath amenities, including a Jacuzzi garden tub, separate glass shower, and double vanity. These suites range in size.

hotel.name: Sheraton Cerritos Hotel
hotel.description: Come feel refreshed at Sheraton Cerritos Hotel. A sense of welcome awaits you in our newly renovated lobby. The life of a traveler becomes less complicated here thanks to Starbucks® coffee and a chance to catch up with loved ones online at our lobby "connection destination," Link@Sheraton experienced with Microsoft. Relax over a cocktail at our Lobby Bar, or soak up the Southern California sun over a delicious meal at our new Grille 91 patio. Our newly renovated meeting spaces and ballrooms are perfect for every planners needs. Whether youre planning an event for 12 colleagues, or 600 friends and family—we make it easy for you with our friendly, consistent, and hospitable service. At the end of a busy day, our 203 recently refreshed guest rooms offer a touch of warmth and class, with dark wood furniture, marble-top counters, and the unmatched Sheraton Sweet Sleeper™ Bed with crisp white bedding, plus wireless High Speed Internet Access. And for the comfort of our guests, we are a 100% non-smoking hotel. Ideally located on the border of the Los Angeles County and Orange County, Cerritos is a gateway to seeing all that Southern California has to offer. Tucked into the beautifully landscaped Towne Center, our hotel is steps from the Cerritos Center for the Performing Arts, which features great musical talent and Broadway shows year-round. Our central location also allows families to see everything the area has to offer, including favorite theme parks and attractions, great shopping, dining, and entertainment venues all over the Los Angeles and Orange Counties. Enjoy our outdoor heated pool and Jacuzzi during downtime or work out in our state-of-the-art fitness center. Find the meaning of true relaxation and great service plus the warmth and comfort of a hidden gem that is Sheraton Cerritos Hotel.

hotel.name: Seagull Inn Oceanfront
hotel.description:
On the oceanfront in the middle of the strip; 3 blocks north of 24th St. Park (free concerts) and 4 blocks south of Neptune Statue. Exceptional amenities include seasonal onsite restaurant, indoor pool with jacuzzi, bike rental and sundeck with free Internet. Conveniently located next to the Dairy Queen. Watch the waves of the ocean or the scenes on the boardwalk from almost every room on the property. This charming inn is a special treat for those seeking alternatives to the sameness of bland chain choices. $1.00 Per Day Virginia Beach Lodging Fee. CHECK IN TIME 4PM. Children (15 and Under) stay free up to a maximum of 3 in a room. All Children above 3- $10.00 per night charge. Extra person age 16 and over are considered adults - $10 per night charge.
Reservations made through this site will require the guest to have their valid credit card presented at check in for a preauthorized $50.00 charge. This amount will be released, if all motel policies are complied with at checkout. A cash deposit of $50.00 is required if a credit card is not available.

hotel.name: The Virginian Suites, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member
hotel.description: The Virginian Suites, an Ascend Collection hotel is minutes from downtown Washington, D.C., nestled in the beautiful, trendy district of Rosslyn in Arlington, VA. The Rosslyn Metro Station, shops and restaurants are only a five-minute walk away. Arlington Cemetery and Ft Myer are only two blocks away, and Pentagon and NFATC are just a short drive down the road. This all-suite property with residential style studio and one-bedroom suites from 450 to 650 square feet, all with full kitchens, offers free wireless high-speed Internet, Direct TV, 24-hour fitness center, sauna, seasonal outdoor pool, and weekday shuttle service to Rosslyn Metro, Safeway and NFATC. Enjoy our catered pizza party every Wednesday evening. Parking charge: 12 USD per night.
hotel.airportsDesc: Ronald Reagan National Arpt, (DCA), 4.00, MI, S; Dulles Int'l Airport, (IAD), 24.40, MI, NW; Baltimore / Wash. Intl Arpt, (BWI), 35.40, MI, NE;

hotel.name: Baymont Inn & Suites Anderson Clemson
hotel.description: Warm Carolina hospitality abounds at the Baymont Inn and Suites Anderson Clemson, just off Interstate 85 and convenient to Clemson University, Lake Hartwell, the Anderson historic district and the Blue Ridge Mountains. Pets are welcome at this hotel which offers complimentary wireless Internet and complimentary breakfast with freshly made Belgian waffles as well as daily paper courtesy of the hotel, fitness center, large-vehicle parking and 24-hour front desk. Wrap up work details in the business center with meeting rooms, computer access and fax service, and if the weather is fair, splash in the outdoor pool. Rooms feature pillow-top mattresses, microwaves and refrigerators, ideal for longer stays, and there is no charge for kids 17 and under when staying with adults.

hotel.name: W Washington D.C.
hotel.description: Located next to the White House, the W Washington DC brings a touch of modern luxury to our capital. Occupying the oldest hotel in Washington you'll discover architecture that can only be described as historic Italian Renaissance meets modern cool. Featuring 317 rooms with all of the W's celebrated comforts, plush W bed, fabulous in-room entertainment and fully wired technology, Bliss Spa and SWEAT our fully equipped fitness center. Whether it is a cocktail reception or an important board meeting, our dedicated event staff and special sensory set-up is here to serve your needs. Satisfy all of your culinary desires in our signature restaurant or get political at our rooftop bar and terrace with amazing which offers spectacular views and a flirtatiously fun scene.

Next to the White House, the most powerful suits - pinstripes and black lace—rendezvous at W Washington D.C., where Italian Renaissance meets modern cool. With commanding rooftop views of major landmarks, W-Gate is all about stately indulgence. Calling all style senators—the Congress of Cool is in session. In Dianna Wong's sleek setting, J&G Steakhouse, P.O.V rooftop bar and terrace, FIT gym, and the capital city's first Bliss® Spa assemble in vogue. We cannot tell a lie—with 317 rooms featuring the signature W bed, fully wired technology, fabulous in-room entertainment, delightful Munchie Box and our Whatever/Whenever® service, the First Amendment of luxury, you'll never want to leave.
Downtown

hotel.name: Embassy Suites Tampa - Airport/Westshore
hotel.description: Welcome to our Embassy Suites Tampa - Airport/Westshore hotel. Located just five miles from the Port of Tampa and a short drive to Clearwater Beach, St. Petersburg and Gulf Beach, this Tampa hotel is centrally located near top Florida attractions including; Busch Gardens Tampa, Lowry Park Zoo, the Florida Aquarium and International Plaza, featuring upscale shopping and dining options. Enjoy comfort and convenience at our stylish and sophisticated all-suite hotel, centrally located in Tampa’s vibrant Westshore business district near the Tampa airport.Relax and unwind in a spacious suite with everything you need to feel at home. Start each day with our free cooked-to-order breakfast or enjoy an evening drink at our complimentary Evening Reception*. Choose from a selection of traditional Coastal Florida favorites and enjoy the casual and friendly atmosphere at our Bay Café and Lounge 555.Host a meeting or event in the 9,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting facilities, or celebrate a special occasion with friends on the 3,200 sq. ft. outdoor pool terrace at one of the best hotels near Tampa airport.After a busy day in the BusinessLink™ Business Center, refresh with a swim in our outdoor pool or work out in the fitness center. Retreat to the comfort of one of our two-room suites boasting a separate living room and bedroom. Enjoy more space to work, entertain friends or relax and unwind with room service.*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking

hotel.name: InterContinental STEPHEN F. AUSTIN
hotel.description: The Hotel finished a multimillion dollar renovation of all guestrooms, suites and public areas in March of 2013. Affectionately known as the ‘Stephen F,’ this Austin luxury hotel is ideally placed on Congress Avenue. The unique Art Deco façade is a famous Austin landmark and has been part of the city scene for more than 60 years. At the heart of the culture capital of Texas, this Austin luxury hotel is just blocks from art museums, the state capitol and right next door to Paramount Theatre.

facility.title: Perry s Steakhouse and Grille
facility.desc: Perrys Steakhouse and Grille is located downtown in the historic Norwood Tower, within easy walking distance of the Capital Complex and other downtown landmarks. This location features unique decor, patio seating and Perrys award winning menu.

facility.title: Roaring Fork
facility.desc: The Roaring Fork's Wood Fired Cooking captures the spirit of bold American cuisine, creating flavors that crackle with a rugged edge.

facility.title: Manuel's
facility.desc: Award wining Mexican Cooking in the heart of Downtown. Famous for its Margaritas and the Sunday Brunch with Live Music.

facility.title: The Coffeeshop at the Hideout Theatre
facility.desc: Located at 617 Congress Ave is the Hideout Coffeehouse, right below the Hideout Theatre. Locally owned and operated, the coffeehouse is open morning to night, weekdays and weekends, and serves beer, wine, fresh sandwiches, pastries, Amys ice cream, as wel

facility.title: South Congress Cafe
facility.desc: An Icon on SoCo, serving brunch all day and offering an extensive and eclectic dinner menu after 5 PM, the South Congress Cafe is known for its Boar Chili and Carrot Cake French Toast. Happy Hour Monday to Friday from 3 to 6 PM

facility.title: Quattro Gatti Ristorante
facility.desc: Quattro Gatti is a contemporary Italian eatery in the heart of Austin. Enjoy a variety of menu items like spaghetti al pomodoro, margherita pizza, and salmone ala verde as well as an assortment of wines from a diverse wine list.

facility.title: Stephen F's Bar & Terrace
facility.desc: The Stephen F's Bar & Terrace is consistently voted the Best Hotel Bar in downtown Austin, with a balcony that overlooks Congress Avenue and a gorgeous view of the Texas State Capitol.

hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Minneapolis
hotel.description: Located on Nicollet Mall, in the heart of downtown, the Hyatt Regency Minneapolis is the city's premiere hotel. Our dramatic atrium lobby welcome you to 533 newly renovated guestrooms and suites, including Hyatt Business Plan, Hyatt Gold Passport and exclusive Regency Club accommodations. At the Hyatt Regency you can dine on tempting cuisine at Taxxi, An American Bistro, or enjoy billiards and casual fare at Spike's Sports Bar & Grille. Slip into our fully-equiped health club and spa. Relax in a heated indoor pool, two whirlpools and sauna. While in Minneapolis, explore the historic State and Orpheum theaters, visit the Guthrie theater or the Walker Art Center and catch the latest event at the Target Center or Metrodome. Hyatt Regency Minneapolis... experience the excitement of a world-class city as only Hyatt can deliver.

Experience the newly renovated Hyatt Regency Minneapolis, perfectly situated on Nicollet Mall in downtown Minneapolis. Following the recently completed $50 million transformation, guests will enjoy a striking new lobby, luxurious new guestrooms and suites and a brand new restaurant and market place. The redesigned hotel pays tribute to the unique culture of Minnesota, with sleek mid-century Scandinavian decor highlighted by a spacious lobby featuring an expansive stone fireplace framed by rustic wooden logs. Our over-sized and luxurious guestrooms offer exhilarating views of the skyline while providing modern amenities and plush comfort. The city's newest culinary hotspot, Prairie Kitchen & Bar, specializes in Scandinavian-inspired, locally grown and seasonal cuisine. The versatile meeting facilities boast 101,000 sq ft of flexible meeting space with direct access to the Minneapolis Convention Center. The hotel's premiere downtown location provides convenient access to an incredible array of Twin Cities attractions, from shopping to sports to theater.

hotel.name: Hotel New Orleans Downtown
hotel.description:
What's the word for W New Orleans? Spicy. In a city filled with exquisite shops, great music and an unparalleled nightlife, W New Orleans offers savvy travelers an equally hot hotel experience. Whether you're traveling to New Orleans for a convention, a business trip, incredible jazz or a fun weekend getaway, W New Orleans offers you the style and comfort you deserve. Take a flying leap onto our fluffy down feather bed. Stay a while. Meet and mingle in our playful Living Room. Ascend our grand marble staircase to tempt your taste buds at Zoe. You don't have to go far to sample the notorious New Orleans nightlife. Located in our Living Room, Whiskey Blue - recently named one of the best new bars in New Orleans by Gambit magazine - is part of a string of hip and trendy bars created by Randy Gerber.
W New Orleans is unconditionally dedicated to service. Twenty-four-hour concierge and room service, in-room data ports, and meeting facilities wired with the latest in technology. Looking for a fantastic costume for Mardi Gras? Reservations anywhere in the city? Just push a button on your phone to reach our Whatever/Whenever desk. We'll help you have an unforgettable New Orleans experience. When you're ready to venture outside, the best of New Orleans surrounds you.

facility.desc: Ironing Board:Elevators:Internet Access:Restaurant:Free Newspaper:Hairdryer in Room:Safe:Cribs Available:In Room Movies:Wheel Chair Access:Air Conditioned:Accessible facilities:Iron:Room Service:Dining Guide:Meeting/Banquet Facilities:Pet friendly:Business Center:Laundry Service:Phone Service:High Speed Internet:Smoke Detectors:Concierge Desk:Data port Available:Adjoining Rooms:WiFi:Outdoor Pool:Exercise Gym:Valet Parking:Bar/Lounge:Cordless Phone:Maid Service

Unparalleled service and genuine Southern hospitality await at Hotel New Orleans Downtown. Tucked away in a quiet location that ensures peaceful nights, the hotel is steps from the French Quarter, the Warehouse District, a casino, and shopping.
Palates are intrigued by a culinary fusion of bold flavours and spices at Zoë, where Louisiana comfort foods juxtapose with contemporary cuisine. Poolside cabanas afford indulgent relaxation on the rooftop, while the fitness centre overlooks downtown.
The hotels 410 stylish, comfortable guest rooms and suites allow inspiring perspectives on downtown and the Mississippi River. These stimulating retreats include oversized work desks, beds with pillow-top mattresses, and organic bath amenities.
Resort

hotel.name: Howard Johnson Hotel - Newark Airport
hotel.description: This Howard Johnson Hotel-Newark Airport is conveniently located off Interstates 78 and 95 with easy access to New York City. A shuttle to and from New York City is available for a small charge. Enjoy complimentary 24-hour airport shuttle service to Newark International Airport, and 24-hour live flight schedule details for Newark Liberty Airport in the lobby. If you enjoy sports, watch the Devils at the Prudential Center less than ten minutes away. See concerts at the Izod Center, and cheer for race horses at the Meadowland Racetrack less than twenty minutes away, or catch the ferry the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island. Utilize the exercise facility, business center with fax services, and refuel at the on-site restaurant. Parking is available for a small fee. Plan your day from the comfort of your guest room with complimentary wireless Internet access, refrigerator, microwave and coffee-maker. Suites, smoke-free and handicapped-accessible rooms are also available.

Televisions come with cable channels. Guestrooms also feature air conditioning, multi-line phones, and speakerphones.

hotel.name: The MAve NYC
hotel.description: The MAve, a Modern Boutique Hotel in Manhattan. Stay at the newest boutique hotel in the Flatiron District of Midtown Manhattan. Taking its name from Madison Avenue, The MAve Hotel puts you in the heart of iconic New York. An urban retreat created with a distinctly modern design of simple and clean lines, The MAve is refreshingly relaxed and not hard edged. Our location, just shy of the point where Broadway, 23rd Street and Madison Ave converge, means our guests have easy access to all New York has to offer. From one of NYC's most famous landmarks, the Flatiron building, to Madison Square Park, from the local favorite Shake Shack to the market at Union Square, while staying at The MAve Hotel you will see and experience what makes the city tick from the perspective of a real New Yorker. We invite you to explore the sites and attractions near our Midtown Manhattan hotel. Whether you are traveling for business or pleasure our guest rooms and services provide a level of comfort that you'll appreciate from a New York boutique hotel. The MAve Hotel offers special amenities and a sincerely warm welcome to make your stay at one that will bring together your complete New York experience. What you need to know: The MAve Hotel is located in the Flatiron District of Midtown Manhattan NYC, featuring the nightlife of real New York. Our Madison Avenue location and easy access to the subway makes getting around for business breeze. Madison Square Park, Union Square, the Shake Shack, the Empire State Building and shops on Fifth Avenue are just blocks away. Within a five block radius of The MAve Hotel, New York City's melting pot of cuisine offers guests anything their palette desires. H20 bath products, free HSIA and WiFi access, IP phones and HDTVs are only some of the amenities you'll find at The MAve Hotel. At The MAve Hotel, our mission is to provide you with a unique and authentic New York experience. We can't wait to exceed your expectations.

Showcasing a distinctly modern design of simple and clean lines, The MAve welcomes both leisure and business travelers looking for a true New York experience. The MAve's outstanding service and full array of boutique hotel amenities mean that guests won't have to choose between style and substance. hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn
hotel.description:
Enjoy the convenience of an airport hotel while still being close to the best attractions in the region like Rivers Casino.
The Allstate® Arena is just minutes from our Des Plaines hotel, and the Rosemont Convention Center is a short drive away. Whether you need to catch a connecting or red eye flight, or are in the region for a conference, location at this OHare Airport hotel is critical. At our hotel, we have designed the perfect location and rooms to maximize trips for business and leisure travelers alike.
We offer free airport shuttle service, one during check-in and one during check-out, for your convenience. However, were also close to the Metra Station, so its simple to use public transportation to get around the area. Located in a quiet neighborhood, we have the best of city and suburban living.
Were known for our Des Plaines hotel amenities, like having a microwave and fridge in every room. The indoor pool is the perfect place to relax after a day of work or exploration. Free parking, large guest suites and over 80 channels of cable are available in our 100% smoke-free hotel. A free full breakfast sweetens the deal and features a waffle station, incredibly fresh fruits and pastries, a huge selection of cereal and yogurt and our staple 100% Arabica coffee and juices.
Downtown events and entertainment only take a few minutes to get to from our Des Plaines hotel. Were close to dozens of restaurants and shopping options, as well as local hospitals. Whether you are here for an escape, to visit a loved one or you are just passing through on business, count on our Des Plaines hotel to treat you right.
We regularly welcome guests in town for business with Honeywell/UOP, United® Airlines, local industries and workers here for conventions, meetings and concerts. No matter your reason for visiting, you deserve large quiet rooms that make you feel right at home.
Reserve a quiet getaway at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn now!

hotel.name: Inn on Ursulines
hotel.description: Hotel guests enjoy a truly unique and charming experience in one of the world's most exciting destinations, the French Quarter of New Orleans. With historic style and all of today's modern conveniences, your authentic French Quarter retreat awaits. French Quarter Inns are situated in a quiet, residential section of the French Quarter, where you are just a short walk from New Orleans Suites to the sights and sounds of America's most walkable city. Off site parking (0.4 miles from the hotel) is offered for a fee.

hotel.name: Quality Inn Downtown Convention Center
hotel.description: The 100 percent non-smoking Quality Inn Convention Center hotel in Portland, OR is one and one-half blocks from the Oregon Convention Center, and near Lloyd Center mall, Rose Garden Arena and Memorial Coliseum. Downtown Portland and Portland Art Museum are within two miles of the hotel. The MAX, Portlands light rail system, stops just one block away and provides easy airport and downtown access. Hotel amenities include free hot breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet access, an indoor heated pool and a business center. All Cash Paying Guest require a Valid Credit Card or 150.00USD cash deposit. Parking 5.00USD per car per night for first car, additional cars per reservation is 10.00USD per night per car

hotel.name: Boardwalk Resort Hotel and Villas
hotel.description:
Boardwalk's accommodations feature spacious 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom suites, all with fully-equipped kitchens and dining areas large enough to seat six. Spacious living rooms include large sectional sleeper sofas, floor-to-ceiling windows with private balconies with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean or gorgeous sunset views of Virginia Beach.
Suites offer a large bathroom, a private balcony off the master bedroom and kitchenettes in the extra rooms. Some 1-bedroom suites include a sleeper sofa in the bedroom allowing six to be accommodated. All rooms and suites include premium TV channels, DVD players, laptop-compatible safes and high-speed Internet access.
Guests also enjoy a fitness center, an indoor pool and a whirlpool, laundry facilities onsite and a private parking garage. Rockfish Bar and Sea Grill is located within the resort and not only serves fresh seafood, pasta and steaks, but the largest collection of Beatles memorabilia in the world.
The Boardwalk Resort Hotel and Villas is located in the heart of the resort district on Virginia Beach's famous boardwalk - named one of the "Top Ten Boardwalks in America."
The hotel is proud to announce that the Boardwalk Resort and Villas is a smoke free environment.
Guests must be at least 21 years of age to register at the property and a valid photo ID and a major credit card must be presented at check-in. A hold of $100 USD will be charged to the credit card in the case of incidentals.
hotel.airportsDesc: Norfolk International Airport (ORF) is 19 miles from The Boardwalk Villas.

facility.title: Mahi Mah's
facility.desc: Having received "Best of Virginia Beach Awards" for their signature dishes including sushi, seafood and delectable crab cakes, Mahi Mah's remains a local favorite. Mahi Mah's wine selection is superb and has been lauded with the "Wine Spectator Award of Excellence." You can dine inside or enjoy the view on one of the two patios that overlooks the famous Virginia Beach boardwalk. Feature live, seasonal entertainment on the seaside bandstand. Mahi Mah's is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and Sushi Bar stays open late. Mahi Mah's, located in the Ramada Inn at 6th and Atlantic Ave. 757-437-8030.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: You can spend your vacation days relaxing in the warm glow of coastal sunshine. Or, if you want a little excitement, Virginia Beach offers water sports galore - some just steps from resorts. Choose parasailing in the morning, jet skiing after lunch, or decide to surf all day. There are boat tours that take you to fish, watch dolphins or simply see the sites -- all from right here on the oceanfront. And of course, the famed Virginia Beach Boardwalk is just outside your door so you can walk or bike to all the best shopping, dining, and amusement on the strip.

facility.title: City View Queen Suites
facility.desc: City view queen suites offers over 600 square feet of vacation space and accommodate up to 4 people. The bedroom offers a queen size bed and the living room has a pull out sofa. Each room offers a color cable TV and the living room has a DVD/VCR. The suite offers a fully equipped kitchen with dining area for 6. The bath has a jetted tub for one.

facility.title: Ocean View One Bedroom Suite
facility.desc: Ocean view one bedroom suite offers a partial view of the ocean and accommodates up to 6 people. It has a queen size bed and a pullout sleeper sofa in the bedroom. It also offers a pullout sofa in the living room. Each room has a color cable TV and the living room has a VCR. The suite offers a full kitchen with dinette set. The bath has a jetted Jacuzzi tub for one. It includes a private balcony with a partial view of the ocean.

facility.title: Standard Efficiency Room
facility.desc: Standard Efficiency room offers a full size bed, kitchenette with microwave and refrigerator. The room has a color cable TV and approximately 212 square feet of vacation space with a window view of the city.

facility.title: Ocean View Queen Suites
facility.desc: Ocean view queen suites offers over 600 square feet of vacation space and accommodate up to 4 people. The bedroom offers a queen size bed and the living room has a pull out sofa. Each room offers a color cable TV and the living room has a DVD/VCR. The suite offers a fully equipped kitchen with dining area for 6 and a balcony with partial view of the ocean. The bath has a jetted tub for one.

facility.title: Two Bedroom Ocean View Suite
facility.desc: Two bedroom ocean view suite has approximately 860 square feet of vacation space and accommodates up to 6 people. Each bedroom has a queen size bed, and there is a pull out sofa in the living room. Each room offers a cable TV and the living room has a DVD/VCR. The suite offers a fully equipped kitchen with dining area for up to 6 people and a private balcony with a partial view of the ocean. There are two bathrooms where the master bath has a jetted tub for one. Includes private ocean view balcony.

facility.title: RockFish
facility.desc: Enjoy casual, fun, and delicious food at the RockFish Bar and Grill. Famous for their crab cakes, seafood, kid-friendly favorites, and extensive collection of Beatles memorabilia, RockFish serves dinner Wednesday through Friday night. On the weekends they serve both lunch and dinner with a Sunday brunch that features a Bloody Mary bar! RockFish is the perfect place to grab a quick bite or enjoy a delicious seafood dinner on the oceanfront patio. RockFish is located in the Virginia Beach Boardwalk Hotel Resort & Villas at 16th Street and the Boardwalk (Atlantic Avenue). Call 213-ROCK (7625).

facility.title: Catch 31
facility.desc: Catch 31 offers a feast for all your senses! Open display kitchen lets you watch chefs as they prepare hardwood grilled seafood specialties shuck oysters at the raw bar. Choose from two indoor dining areas and an outdoor patio and bar with beautiful fire pits. You can enjoy seasonal nightly entertainment in Neptune's Park right next door. Catch 31, located in the new Hilton Virginia Beach at 31st and Atlantic Ave., is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. 757-213-3000.

facility.title: Pi-zzeria
facility.desc: Pi-zzeria features the area's only rotating brick-stone oven, and bake the best pizzas in town! Fun, eclectic, and family-friendly, Pi-zzeria offers great food and a lovely patio where you can dine al fresco. Enjoy a pitcher of freshly made sangria from the full-service bar. Pi-zzeria offers plenty of parking for dine-in or you can carry out your pizza for an impromptu oceanfront picnic. Located on 33rd Street & Atlantic Ave. 757-213-0600. http://www.pi-zzeria.com

facility.title: Salacia
facility.desc: Salacia, the wife of King Neptune in Roman mythology, welcomes you to a more refined dining experience. Nestled behind cobalt blue glass-block walls, Salacia is the only 4-Diamond restaurant in Virginia Beach and proudly features tableside food preparation, special cheese and dessert presentations, and Sommelier services. For a truly unforgettable evening, you'll want to try secluded seaside terrace for a private meal with an ocean view. Salacia is located in the Hilton Oceanfront, Virginia Beach at 31st and Atlantic Ave. http://www.HiltonVB.com

hotel.name: Turtle Cay Resort
hotel.description: Located in the popular south end of the beach, Turtle Cay Resort features spacious queen bed deluxe rooms and 1-and 2-bedroom suites facing a large, enclosed courtyard with two outdoor pools and two hot tubs. Every suite features a fully-equipped kitchen with bar and dining area. High ceilings, gas fireplaces and oversized bathrooms with jetted tubs add to the home-like ambiance. Two-bedroom suites include an extra bathroom and kitchenette in the front bedroom, making the space easy to share. Accommodations also include premium TV channels, DVD players, in-room safes and high-speed Internet access and private parking. Many rooms have fireplaces and in-room washers and dryers. Queen bedroom rooms include fully-equipped kitchenettes with mini-refrigerators, microwaves and coffeemakers. Turtle Cay Resort is one block from the Virginia Beach boardwalk, two blocks from the Virginia Beach Fishing Center, and two miles from Ocean Breeze Water Park. Guests must be at least 21 years of age to register at the property and a valid photo ID and a major credit card must be presented at check-in. A hold of $100 USD will be charged to the credit card in the case of incidentals.
hotel.airportsDesc: Norfolk International Airport is 17 miles away.

facility.desc: Nestled at the south end of the Virginia Beach oceanfront, Turtle Cay is tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the beach while being just a few steps from the world renowned three mile Boardwalk.

facility.title: STANDARD - EFFICIENCY
facility.desc: Standard efficiency room offers two queen beds. The 2 queen studio offers over 550 square feet of vacation space with 2 queen beds and one bathroom. Complete with a kitchenette including a microwave, mini-fridge, coffee maker, and a dining area for 2 people, this room ensures a memorable and relaxing stay. The room also features a 27" TV with DVD.

facility.title: KING - SUITE
facility.desc: King Suite offers one king bed and one sofa bed. The 1 bedroom suite offers over 770 square feet of vacation space featuring a master bedroom with a king size bed adjacent to a large master bathroom with jetted tub and walk-in shower. A living room with sleeper sofa and fire place, and fully equipped kitchen with a dining area for 4 people ensure a memorable and relaxing stay. Private balcony located off of the living room and cable televisions and DVDs are in the master bedroom and living room.

facility.title: 2 BEDROOM SUITE
facility.desc: The 2 bedroom suite offers over 1,340 square feet of vacation space. The master bedroom offers a king size bed adjacent to a large master bathroom with jetted tub and walk-in shower. The second bedroom offers 2 queen beds ans separate bath. A living room with sleeper sofa and fire place, fully equipped kitchen with a dining area for 6 people ensure a memorable and relaxing stay. Private balcony located off of the living room and television and DVD are in the both bedrooms and living room.

A variety of restaurants, shopping and entertainment are also just minutes away.

hotel.name: Ramada Amherst/Getzville Hotel and Conference Center
hotel.description: Refresh at this Ramada Amherst/Getzville Hotel and Conference Center off Interstate 290 after a day of business or exploring the University of Buffalo, historic downtown Buffalo, the impressive Niagara Falls, and the Buffalo Zoo. Buffalo Niagara International Airport is also nearby. Relax at this smoke-free lodging with complimentary wireless Internet access, complimentary continental breakfast, complimentary newspaper, fitness center, complimentary parking, dry cleaning services, room service, airport shuttle, meeting space and 24-hour business center. Enjoy a delicious meal at Embers Grill onsite. Guest room amenities include coffee-maker and desk. Handicapped-accessible rooms are also available. There is no charge for children 17 and under with an adult.

hotel.name: West Inn And Suites
hotel.description: Rated-1 for Carlsbad on Trip Advisor West Inn and Suites in Carlsbad California is a boutique hotel offering the ultimate in luxurious detail and an ideal location for both the business and leisure traveler. Our unique hotel features -King Size beds in every room 2 King Size beds in double bedded accommodations- and location offers the very best of Coastal North San Diego luxury.Our experienced team recognizes that no two travelers want the exact same experience. Family guests of West enjoy accommodations featuring King Size Beds a complimentary hot breakfast buffet parking and Wi-Fi pool and spa along with cookies and milk served at bedtime. West provides complimentary shuttle service within five miles and is a five minute drive to LEGOLAND Museum of Making Music shopping or one of many North Coastal San Diego golf courses.Bring a bike and take a short ride or walk to the pristine beaches of Carlsbad.The Famous San Diego Zoo Wild Animal Park Sea World Balboa Park and Gaslamp Quarter are all within a thirty minute drive.

facility.desc: Bistro West open for lunch and dinner features an extensive menu of Comfort Cuisine.

hotel.name: Gullwing Beach Resort
hotel.description: Tucked away on the quiet south end of Estero Island, GullWing Beach Resort is located on Fort Myers Beach - a wide, sugar-white sand beach ranked by FamilyFun Magazine as the best "family friendly" beach in the southeast U.S. GullWing is truly a home away from home with it's elegantly appointed one-, two- and three-bedroom condominium suites that include private screened balconies, Jacuzzi tubs, dining room, living room with wet bar, washer and dryer and fully-appointed kitchens with a pass through breakfast bar, refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, microwave, cookware and coffee maker. Let GullWing embrace you in its comforts. With the shimmering Gulf of Mexico as its backdrop, GullWing is the place to make lasting memories. Frolic in the warm turquoise waters or collect seashells from dawn till dusk. Play a set of tennis. Enjoy a barbecue at our beachside gazebo or just sit back in your spacious balcony and enjoy the sounds of the tide rolling into shore. Take an evening stroll along the beach and watch dolphins play in the surf as the sun paints a beautiful picture over the Gulf. Lay out on one of Floridas most pristine beaches or enjoy the tropical view while poolside. Other resort features include an outdoor whirlpool spa, cabana rentals, fitness center, conference facilities, golf nearby, water sports and fishing charters nearby, activity programs and fine dining and shopping are just moments away. Whatever it is you enjoy, GullWing will surely suit your vacation needs.
hotel.airportsDesc: Fort Myers International Airport(RSW)

facility.title: Three Bedroom Suite
facility.desc: This oversized three bedroom suite features a king-size bed in the master bedroom, a queen-size bed in the second bedroom, a queen size bed in the third bedroom. A queen size sofa sleeper in the living room and can accommodate a maximum of six guests. Every suite includes a Jacuzzi tub, a fully appointed kitchen with washer and dryer, spacious living room with wet bar and dining area.

facility.title: One Bedroom Suite
facility.desc: This spacious one bedroom suite features a king-size bed in the master bedroom, a queen-size sofa sleeper in the living room and can accommodate a maximum of two guests. Every suite includes a Jacuzzi tub, a fully appointed kitchen with washer and dryer, spacious living room with wet bar and dining area, private screened balcony plus a spectacular view of the Gulf of Mexico.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: Located on Estero Island, this l2-story all-suite condo-style hotel on Fort Myers Beach overlooks the Gulf of Mexico. Cabana rentals and watercraft equipment are available on the beach (surcharge). The Gullwing's outdoor sundeck with splash pool and spa tub overlooks the white-sand beach and the Gulf of Mexico. Gas grills and picnic gazebos are available for guests. Family-friendly amenities include year-round activity programs for all ages Wednesday through Saturday. Please note- The front desk is open until 10 PM daily. Guests intending to arrive outside these hours must contact the hotel directly. The hotel contact information will appear in the reservation confirmation e-mail.

facility.title: Two Bedroom Suite
facility.desc: This oversized two bedroom suite features a king-size bed in the master bedroom, a queen-size bed in the second bedroom, a queen-size sofa sleeper in the living room and can accommodate a maximum of six guests. Every suite includes a Jacuzzi tub, a fully appointed kitchen with washer and dryer, spacious living room with wet bar and dining area, private screened balcony plus a spectacular view of the Gulf of Mexico.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: On the quiet south end of Estero Island, just off the coast of Fort Myers, Florida.

hotel.name: Santa Clara Marriott
hotel.description: Located in the heart of Silicon Valley, the Marriott Hotel is minutes from the Santa Clara Convention Center, San Jose International Airport, and located next to Intel, McAfee, and EMC. Adjacent to our hotel, guests can also enjoy all the rides and thrills of California's Great America amusement park. Our hotel in Santa Clara, CA features complimentary Wi-Fi in all public areas, an outdoor heated lap pool and fitness center. Located on-site, is Bradley Ogden's award winning Farm to Table Santa Clara restaurant, Parcel 104, where Executive Chef Jonathan Hall serves delicious and fresh Northern California cuisine. Find spacious guest rooms offering outdoor balconies with screen doors, luxurious bedding and tiered high-speed wired / Wi-Fi Internet access. In addition, our Silicon Valley hotel offers 30 meeting rooms with 27,209 square feet of flexible event space making this hotel the perfect place for a convention, wedding or meeting. The Santa Clara Marriott Hotel is the ultimate Silicon Valley retreat.
hotel.airportsDesc: Norman Y Mineta San Jose International Airport, (SJC), 4.00, MI, S; San Francisco International Airport, (SFO), 30.00, MI, N; Oakland International Airport, (OAK), 30.00, MI, NE;

hotel.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Birmingham Downtown at UAB
hotel.description: Welcome to the Residence Inn Birmingham Downtown at UAB. We are conveniently located in the historic Five Points South Dining and Entertainment District just steps from the UAB Campus. Relax and enjoy the residential feel of our all suite hotel. Start your day with our complimentary hot buffet breakfast, stay connected with high-speed wired and wireless internet (complimentary) and step out into the Southern hospitality of downtown Birmingham. With multiple James Beard Foundation Award winning restaurants, art galleries, and museums there is something for everyone here in Birmingham. Relax in our pet friendly suites or by the contemporary lobby fireplace, refresh at the outdoor pool or rejuvenate in our state-of-the-art fitness center.
hotel.airportsDesc: Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport, (BHM), 6.00, MI, NE; Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, (ATL), 157.00, MI, E;

hotel.name: Guy Harvey Outpost, a TradeWinds Beach Resort
hotel.description:
Guy Harvey Outpost, a TradeWinds Beach Resort, is located on the award-winning white sands of St. Pete Beach. Offering The SandBox beach lounge with VIP Cabanas, open fire pit tables and the popular Sand Bar. Dine on cutting edge seafood at Guy Harvey RumFish Grill showcasing a 33,500 gallon aquarium featured on Animal Planets Tanked, indoor/outdoor bars, live entertainment and a retail store carrying the areas largest selection of Guy Harvey merchandise. Also enjoy unlimited rides on the new Triple Wipe Out ride.

The iconic artwork of Guy Harvey graces the lobby and public areas, and guests can experience every adventure imaginable in this water paradise or simply explore the shore or escape to the serenity of The SandBox beach lounge.

Ride Bucky the mechanical shark, take flight with JetLev, your personal water powered jet pack or catch a wave atop WaveJet, an electric powered surfboard. Experience Florida fishing at its finest with inshore, offshore, fly and chartered deep sea fishing. Scuba dive to sunken ships or book a snorkeling trip. Children also have a place in the adventure at Guy Harvey Outpost with tailored activities just for kids.

In addition to the hotel amenities and services at Guy Harvey Outpost, you'll have access to a wealth of facilities and programs at TradeWinds Island Grand, a short walk down the beach. There you can explore the grounds of the largest resort on St. Pete Beach, enjoy more casual, fine dining and beach bars, and then retreat back to the intimacy of the Outpost.
hotel.airportsDesc: Tampa International Airport Clearwater/St. Petersburg Airport

facility.title: Beachfront Suite
facility.desc: Enjoy breathtaking views of radiant sunsets and the sparkling Gulf of Mexico. Offers a separate bedroom with 2 double beds plus a double-size sofa bed in the separate living area. Kitchen includes refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, dishware and mini-bar; WiFi and daily newspaper. Non-smoking only.

facility.title: Guy Harvey RumFish Grill
facility.desc: Guy Harvey RumFish Grill features a 33,500 gallon aquarium featured on Animal Planet's hit series, Tanked. Dine on cutting edge seafood, explore the tanks, enjoy nightly live entertainment with indoor and outdoor bars, and shop the 2,200 square foot retail store. Serving breakfast, lunch, dinner and a late night menu.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Florida's largest west coast metropolitan area with a population of over 3 million, Tampa Bay has long been known for its cultural diversity, balmy climate, unique attractions and brilliant white sand beaches. TradeWinds Island Grand, on the Gulf of Mexico, is located directly on the white sand beaches of St. Pete Beach - voted the No. 1 beach destination in the U.S. by TripAdvisor's 2012 Travelers' Choice Award - and is certified as a Florida Green Lodge. Just 10 minutes from Fort DeSoto State Park and 30 minutes from Tampa International Airport.

facility.title: Courtyard View Suite
facility.desc: Separate bedroom with 2 double beds plus a double-size sofa bed in the separate living area. Kitchen includes refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, dishware and mini-bar; WiFi and daily newspaper. View of the tranquil North Courtyard or Oasis Courtyard pool area. Non-smoking only.

facility.title: Standard Hotel Room
facility.desc: Cozy room with an entrance and window off the walkway overlooking the parking area and Gulf Boulevard. Comes with 2 double beds and is complete with all your basic needs including a wet bar area with mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, and mini-bar; WiFi and daily newspaper. Non-smoking only.

facility.title: Guy's Gulfside Grill
facility.desc: Enjoy casual dining with outdoor seating beachfront for good morning breakfasts, right from the pool lunches, afternoon tropical coolers and snacks, and dinners with a sensational sunset view.

facility.title: Perks Up
facility.desc: Coffee and Cocktails at Guy Harvey Outpost for fresh pastries and muffins, breakfast items and your Starbucks coffee fix. Later in the day, you can catch a few cocktails while waiting for friends in the lobby.

facility.title: Courtyard View Hotel Room
facility.desc: Enjoy the refreshing Gulf breeze overlooking the tranquil pond of the North Courtyard or Oasis Courtyard. Includes 2 double beds with a wet bar area, mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, and mini-bar; WiFi and daily newspaper. Non-smoking only.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Anaheim Orange County Hotel
hotel.description:
The BEST WESTERN PLUS Anaheim Orange County Hotel is 100% non-smoking.
Centrally located in the heart of the OC (Orange County). The hotel is conveniently located to I-5, 91, 55, as well as exit 6 and exit 6A off the 57 Freeway, adjacent to Anaheim, Fullerton, Brea and Yorba Linda.
This beautiful hotel is close to Anaheim Resort, Anaheim Convention Center, Disneyland® Resort, CSUF, California State University Fullerton, Brea Mall, many restaurants within a five mile area. Special in room amenities are free high-speed Internet, free local calls, refrigerators, and flat screen HD televisions.
Free hot breakfast, served daily from 6 AM-10 AM. Featuring scrambled eggs, cheese omelets, bacon, sausage as well as a wide variety of other delicious items.
Businesses near hotel: CADE Auto Auction, Kimberly Clark, Pacific SunWear, Boeing, Orange County Flyers, FedEx, Albertsons, Conagra Foods, SoCal Edison, WalMart, Home Depot.
Local Attractions are Disneyland® Resort (Disneyland® Park, Disneys California Adventure® Park, Downtown Disney® District), Angel Stadium (Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim), Honda Center (Anaheim Ducks), Knott's Berry Farm® and the Nixon Library.
hotel.areaServed: Hollywood, Yorba Linda, San Diego, Buena Park, Anaheim, Fullerton, Santa Ana, Brea

hotel.name: The Westin Boston Waterfront
hotel.description: Explore the exciting city of Boston from the new AAA Four Diamond Westin Boston Waterfront. We're less than three miles from Logan International Airport, and a short cab, water taxi, or T train ride away from Back Bay, the Financial District, and family attractions such as the New England Aquarium and the Boston Children's Museum. Connected to the The Westin Boston Waterfront Boston Convention & Exhibition Center (BCEC)New England's largest convention center. The Westin Boston Waterfront is an ideal location for your next business function. The hotel itself offers a total of 70,000 square feet of meeting space, including the 15,000 square foot Grand Ballroom and 8,500-square foot Harbor Ballroom. Our additional 19 meeting breakout rooms will accommodate groups of five to 150. Parking is available onsite, for a fee, for up to 250 cars. When work is done, rejuvenate body and mind in our Westin WORKOUT Gym, and enjoy a delicious meal in our dining room, Sauciety. Or, venture to nearby attractions with our complimentary shuttle service, designed to transform your Boston commute into an energizing experience. Our 793 guest rooms and suites reflect Westin's soothing aesthetic. Rest in the signature Heavenly Bed and enjoy the flat-screen TV and Wireless High Speed Internet Access. Our Heavenly Bath is the perfect place to refresh. We also provide slippers and bathrobes to make your stay with us even more relaxing.
hotel.airportsDesc: General Edward Lawrence Logan International Airport, (BOS), 2.00, MI;

hotel.name: Holiday Inn LOS ANGELES-INTL AIRPORT
hotel.description: Visit LA and enjoy the new standard in LAX Hotels Choose the Holiday Inn® Los Angeles International Airport hotel to experience the effortless elegance of updated decor and the convenience of a central location, all at an affordable price. The hotel is within 30 minutes of most major Los Angeles attractions and one mile from LAX. Our hotel guests can squeeze the most into their stay. Our hotel is convenient to the 105 and 405 freeways. We are near aerospace defense industry as well as refineries and major universities. Our professional amenities make business and family friendly. The 24-hour, complimentary LAX shuttle runs every 15 minutes, and the self-service Business Center is open 24 hours. 4,066 sq ft of meeting space and free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel help you stay productive when you are not relaxing in the outdoor heated pool or enjoying a cocktail at Landings Lounge. You'll have plenty of entertainment options nearby. Walk a block to the Ocean Express trolley to ride to Manhattan Beach, take a quick drive to LA, Hollywood or Disneyland® or see our concierge desk to discover what sets us apart from other hotels near Los Angeles Airport (LAX). Our hotel's sales team is always offering new LAX hotel deals and holiday packages. Call to ask about our specials or book online with our best price guarantee. You'll be relaxing in the heart of LA in no time. See you here soon!
hotel.airportsDesc: Long Beach, (LGB), 12.00, MI, N; Los Angeles International Airport, (LAX), 1.00, MI;

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites GUTHRIE NORTH EDMOND
hotel.description: Guthrie Hotel Near Lazy E Arena and Langston University. Located just 19 miles north of Oklahoma City, a comfortable drive from Stillwater, or Edmond, our Guthrie hotel located on Hwy 33 and I-35 provides a great location for visiting the historic first capital of Oklahoma with easy access to nearby tourism, collegiate activities, fishing, water sports, and shopping without the congestion of the metro. We understand the needs of corporate travelers, so we provide a 24-hour business center with 2 PC stations, high-speed Internet access, printing, and work area. As well, we offer both a meeting room, which accommodates up to 50 guests, an adjacent boardroom that can be added to handle a larger group, or on its own for a smaller meeting. Our hotel also appeals to leisure travelers because it is located close to area treasures, such as Langston University and the downtown merchants of historic Guthrie. Enjoy activities like seeing a rodeo at the Lazy E Arena, exploring the Oklahoma Sports Museum or watching a movie at the Beacon Drive-In Theater. Other guests would rather take in a round of 18 at the Cedar Valley Golf Club. If you are looking for hotels in Guthrie with choice amenities, consider that our hotel features 3 Jacuzzi suites, HD TV, a heated indoor pool, full complimentary hot breakfast, and a fitness center. We look forward to your stay at the Holiday Inn Express® Guthrie - North Edmond Hotel .
hotel.airportsDesc: Will Rogers International Airport, (WRA), 45.00, MI;

hotel.name: The Westin Copley Place, Boston
hotel.description: The Westin Copley Place, Boston is an idyllic urban retreat for travelers, set in the center of one of historic Boston's finest neighborhoods, Back Bay. The hotel features amenities such as Westin's exclusive 10-layer Heavenly Bed®, the WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio with indoor pool, shopping in the retail gallery at Copley Place, skywalk access to more than 100 shops at Copley Place and the Prudential Center, as well as the newly-opened Grettacole Spa®, located adjacent to the hotel lobby. We also feature our well-known Turner Fisheries, and chic hotspot Bar10. The Westin Copley Place, Boston offers the kind of comfort and class guests desire. The Westin Copley Place, Boston is conveniently located across the street from Back Bay Station for Amtrak and commuter rail service.

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Atlanta Midtown/Georgia Tech
hotel.description: Our newly renovated Courtyard Midtown Atlanta hotel is located right next to the Georgia Tech University campus. Enjoy our convenient location at our Georgia Tech hotel near Philips Arena, High Museum of Art, Georgia Aquarium, Georgia Dome & Atlantic Station. The exciting new features at our Midtown Atlanta hotel include inviting, flexible spaces to work or relax in, complimentary high-speed Internet throughout and easy access to the latest news, weather and airport conditions via our GoBoard. The highlight of our new lobby experience is The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect. You will enjoy enhanced food and beverage offerings in the morning, all-new dinner service, and The Market, your 24-hour one-stop shop for fresh sandwiches and snacks. Our Georgia Tech hotel in Midtown Atlanta has two meeting rooms to accommodate small meetings and social events, with onsite catering available. Start planning your stay today at our Midtown Atlanta hotel and allow us to help you make the most of every travel experience.
