hotel.name: Seabonay Beach Resort
hotel.description:
Escape your cares and enjoy the South Florida lifestyle at Seabonay Beach Resort in Hillsboro Beach. Newly decorated we offer 77 condo style accommodations which include standard rooms, junior suites and one bedroom suites. Our suites are condo style with a full working kitchen, living room and a balcony. Tucked within an affluent area, Hillsboro Beach boasts easy access to Fort Launderdale and its suburbs, with Boca Raton three miles north and Deerfield Beach a mile west.
Perched on the Atlantic Ocean waterfront, Seabonay Beach Resort will feel like your very own private island, your home away from home and the only place you will enjoy staying at in South Florida. For those looking to drop a line, the nearby Pier at Deerfield Beach offers an excellent fishing hole.
During your stay with us you can relax by the heated outdoor swimming pool, enjoy the outdoor casual living room with a large screen television or go for a stroll on the private beach with some of the most breathtaking views in Florida.
All guest rooms/suites offer complimentary Wi-Fi, premium cotton linens, complimentary local calling with a direct dial phone, private bathroom with a shower-tub combination, complimentary toiletries, premium 24 TV channels, central air and heat, coin operated laundry room & laundry service, front desk safety deposit box, private parking, meeting room, daily housekeeping, friendly staff and complimentary continental breakfast for two per room.
hotel.airportsDesc: Served by Fort Lauderdale Airport (FLL), Palm Beach Airport (PBI) or Miami International (MIA) for commercial flights. Charter/Private airports include Boca, Fort Lauderdale Executive & Pompano AirPark.
hotel.areaServed: Located on the beach along Florida's Gold Coast in the Greater Fort Lauderdale area, this property is nestled on the Hillsboro Mile between Deer-field Beach and Pompano Beach. Minutes from Boca Raton, too.

facility.desc: - Lumiere Meeting Room - Lumiere Room is a 1200 square foot room that will accommodate up to 50 seated guests. It is often used for private meetings, family reunions, and private events. This meeting room offers plenty of natural light, a flat screen television with laptop connectivity and has complimentary Wi-Fi. Please contact us directly for facility availability and event equipment rentals.

facility.desc:
Standard Room *Budget Friendly The Standard Room is a spacious non-smoking room that gives you the option of two queen beds or a plush king sized bed. Seabonay Beach Resort's standard rooms are spacious, comfortable and an affordable accommodation.

facility.title: One Bedroom Suite

hotel.name: Anaheim Marriott Suites
hotel.description: Located just minutes from the Disneyland Resort and the Anaheim Convention Center, serviced by the Anaheim Resort Transit system (ART) for a $4 charge per day, departing every 20-30 minutes. The Anaheim Marriott Suites offers a variety of conveniences for both the leisure, group and business traveler. Every room is a suite in this luxury hotel. Enjoy the "Revive" bedding package in each suite that is designed with a living room and a separate bedroom. Guests will appreciate such amenities as a large well lit desk, two telephones with data ports, high speed Internet access, voice messaging, cable with pay-per-view programing on two remote-controlled televisions, iron & ironing board, coffee/tea maker, mini refrigerator and room service. Guests can work out on state-of-the-art exercise equipment, then relax in the pool and whirlpool. Dine in SunSpot, an American Restaurant or indulge in the simple luxuries of our very own Starbucks, just off the lobby

The Anaheim Marriott Suites is the premier and largest Marriott all suites full service hotel located just one mile from the Disneyland Resort attractions and the Anaheim Convention Center. The Marriott Suites features 371 spacious two-room suites, a contemporary lobby and 10,000 square feet of flexible meeting space catering to a variety of social events, meetings and weddings. Enjoy the "Revive" bedding package in each suite designed with a living room and a separate bedroom. Guests will appreciate such amenities as a large well lit desk, wireless and high speed Internet access, voice messaging, cable with pay-per-view programming on two remote-controlled televisions, iron & ironing board, coffee/tea maker, mini refrigerator, room service, dry cleaning service and laundry facilities. Guests can work out on state-of-the-art exercise equipment, relax in the outdoor pool and whirlpool. Dine in SunSpot, an American Restaurant or indulge in the simple luxuries of our very own Starbucks, just off the Lobby.

hotel.name: Oak Plantation Villas Resort
hotel.description:
All the expectations for a perfect vacation await you at Oak Plantation Villas Resort, a SunVest Resort. The Oak Plantation Resort is located only 6 miles from Walt Disney World with complimentary scheduled shuttle service - NEW! Extended shuttle service to Universal Studios & SeaWorld, and 15 miles from Orlando International Airport. Local attractions include, Universal Studios, Sea World, Wet N Wild, Gatorland, Dinner Shows, world class shopping and fine dining.

Oak Plantation Resort, tucked away in the middle of a canopy oasis of lush oak hammocks in Kissimmee, yet in close proximity to something for everyone. From world renowned theme parks to world class shopping and fine dining; from golf to sandy stretches of beach a short drive away. Oak Plantation Resort offers a memorable vacation experience at a real vacation value. All the amenities of a first class resort and conveniences of our fully equipped one and two bedroom villas await you. We invite you to stroll along our manicured path that surrounds our lake with fountains, to turn the corner and find inviting lagoon style pools, whirlpool Jacuzzi, game room, picnic areas, and interactive kiddie pool. Or take up the sports track and serve up a match of tennis or head to the basketball courts. Relax poolside at our Pun Nu Luna Tiki Bar or surf the web at our high speed Internet Cafe. Enjoy numerous activities daily for guests of all ages including movie night poolside with free popcorn, Bingo night with free pizza, and much more.

In addition, Oak Plantation Resort offers complimentary shuttle service to and from Disney Theme Parks. Transportation is also provided to Universal and Sea World for an additional fee.

Guest accommodations feature spacious and beautifully appointed villas providing living room with pull out sleeper sofa, separate bedroom with master suite providing king size bedding with private bath. Fully equipped kitchen offers oven, refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, blender and more.

NEW!Unlimited Buffet Breakfast: includes our famous "Make Your own Waffles", eggs sausage, seasoned potatoes, cereal, bagels, fresh fruit, milk, juice, coffee and much more! ONLY $5.95 PER PERSON!
hotel.airportsDesc: Orlando International Airport

Designed by Lisa Strong, the hotel features contemporary interiors, luxurious bedding, dark hardwood floors, and stylish bathrooms. Centrally located in Los Angeles, blocks to Hollywood, LA Convention Center, Staples Center, Beverly Hills, Universal Studios, the finest restaurants and night spots, and two blocks to metro station.

hotel.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Raleigh - Cary
hotel.description: Welcome to DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Raleigh-Cary, located in suburban Cary, North Carolina, mid-way between downtown Raleigh and Research Triangle Park. Our convenient location in Crossroads Shopping Plaza near US 1 and I-40 is within walking distance of a variety of retail stores, restaurants and entertainment options. Raleigh-Durham Airport and downtown Raleigh are only 15 minutes from our Cary, NC hotel. Enjoy warm hospitality and a warm cookie when you arrive at the DoubleTree by Hilton Raleigh-Cary hotel. Unwind in a comfortable guest room and view an on-demand movie and range of premium TV channels on a 37-inch flat-screen TV. Keep in touch with family and business with high-speed internet access, and catch up with work at the desk. Upgrade to a suite with amenities that include a microwave, refrigerator, wet bar and complimentary internet access.Dine at the Park Bar and Grill and start the day with a buffet breakfast cooked the way you like it. Enjoy classic American cuisine and refreshing beers and spirits in this welcoming restaurant. Enjoy freshly prepared snacks, salads, sandwiches and more at our 24-hour Grab-n-Go shop. Stay active during your stay in the fitness center and have a refreshing swim in the indoor pool. Make business easy in the 24-hour business center featuring helpful business facilities. Hold meetings, business events and receptions in 1,600 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space that is ideal for all occasions.

hotel.name: Salish Lodge Spa
hotel.description: The original Snoqualmie Falls lodge built atop the falls in 1916 was a logging route stopover famous for its lumberjack breakfast. Building on the existing lodge and inspired design the Salish Lodge was built in 1988 and has since become a haven for visitors seeking rejuvenation and renewal in the breathtaking setting of the cascade mountains. Our world class spa was added in 1996 to create the ideal destination for relaxation and retreat. The spectacular falls majestic mountains and expansive views of break taking countryside combine to awe and inspire. Rooms are luxurious yet cozy each featuring a fireplace and double Jacuzzi tub enclosed in windows to take in the beauty of the surroundings.
hotel.airportsDesc: Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, (SEA), 34.00, MI, NE;

hotel.name: French Market Inn
hotel.description:
Preserving the charm of the past while offering the beauty of the present, the Historic French Market Inn's comfortable guest rooms feature a variety of decors and exquisite furnishings. It's richly detailed decor and antique furnishings are accented with modern details in every room.

Must be 21 years of age to purchase a room. Children under 12 stay free with adult. The hotel requires a valid I.D. and credit card at time of check in. A hold may be placed on the credit card to cover the security deposit and incidental charges.

Valet parking available for $28 per night, oversize vehicles $30 per night.

hotel.name: St. James Hotel, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member
hotel.description: The St. James Hotel, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member, is one of New Orlean's finest luxury boutique hotels. New Orleans' Creole-Caribbean influence has never been more alive. Located in the Banks Arcade, a 19th century landmark once the center of the Caribbean sugar and coffee trade, each of our 86 guest rooms celebrates this intimate connection with elegant West Indies decor and complete with rooftop terraces and charming courtyards. Valet Parking is offered at 29.95 USD plus tax per night per vehicle excluding special events

facility.desc: New and Exciting, Fog has become the choice of hotel guests and locals to spend evenings dining in Santa Monica. With Chef Ray Garcia at the helm, Fig is a Market fresh, French style bistro with a variety of menu items to please any taste.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: The Fairmont Miramar Hotel & Bungalows hosts Santa Monica's largest meeting space available. Conveniently located off the front drive and offset from the guest room areas, it sets the tone for great business to take place with no disruption to our guests enjoying the hotel.

facility.title: In Room Dining
facility.desc: If the restaurant is not your mood, the 24 hour in room dining menu is at your finger tips for anything from elegant selections to comfort foods in your PJ's.

facility.title: Lobby Restaurant
facility.desc: Open for all meals of the day, the Lobby Restaurant which also spills into the Koi Pond area really gives you either indoor or outdoor options in a relaxing atmosphere.

facility.title: Fairmont Room - 1 king bed non-smoking
facility.desc: 250-400 sq feet in either Ocean Tower or Palisades building Wireless Internet, A/C, Mini Bar, Newly Renovated

facility.title: Fairmont Room - 2 double beds
facility.desc: 250-400 sq feet in either Ocean Tower or Palisades building Wireless Internet, A/C, Mini Bar, Newly Renovated.

facility.title: Deluxe Room - 1 king bed
facility.desc: 250 sq feet in Ocean Tower with upgraded views of grounds or Palisades Park. Private Balcony. Wireless Internet, A/C, Mini Bar, Newly Renovated

facility.title: Deluxe Ocean View Room
facility.desc: 250 sq feet in Ocean Tower with preferred views of Palisades Park and Pacific Ocean. Private Balcony Wireless Internet, A/C, Mini Bar, Newly Renovated

facility.title: Signature Bungalow - 1 king bed
facility.desc: 305-350 sq feet. Individually located throughout quiet Miramar gardens. Close access to pool terrace. Great for private getaways. Wireless Internet, A/C, Mini Bar, Newly Renovated

hotel.name: Royal Beach Palace
hotel.description:
This 66 room hotel offers well-appointed rooms within walking distance of the beaches and Ocean. Relax in our large pool or sip a refreshing cocktail while you soak up the beautiful Florida sun! There are also many fine restaurants and bars for your dining pleasure and entertainment within close proximity.
The location of this hotel makes it an ideal place for a family vacation with all the best that Fort Lauderdale has to offer close at hand. Within easy reach of the airport and the cruise ships, the hotel is ideal for that overnight stop over before traveling on to other exotic locations.
hotel.airportsDesc: Fort Lauderdale International Airport and Miami International Airport

facility.desc: Just minutes from the beach and ocean is the Riverwalk Arts and Entertainment District in the heart of downtown Fort Lauderdale, home to cultural attractions, shops, parks and restaurants.

facility.title: 1 King Bed, partial ocean view
facility.desc: Our Ocean View King bed Rooms on the top floor offer a spacious retreat for up to 2 people and have a partial view of the ocean. Rooms have full amenities including flat screen LED TV's, coffee maker, refridgerator, microwave and guest safe. Rooms also have balconies so that you may sit and enjoy the ocean breezes.

facility.title: 2 Queen Bed room, partial ocean view
facility.desc: Our Ocean View Rooms on the top floor offer a relaxing space for up to 4 people and have a partial view of the ocean. Rooms have full amenities including flat screen LED TV's, coffee maker, refridgerator, microwave and guest safe. Rooms also have balconies so that you may sit and enjoy the ocean breezes.

facility.title: 1 King Bed

facility.title: 2 Queen Beds

hotel.name: Orlando World Center Marriott
hotel.description: Discover the completely redesigned Orlando World Center Marriott. This impressive Orlando resort hotel is the quintessential destination for meetings and families alike. Experience our luxury Orlando resort's newly renovated Falls Pool Oasis featuring a new slide tower with two 200-foot winding waterslides and one 90-foot speed slide, a dedicated kids splash park, interactive game room, and more. An ideal choice for event professionals, our resort boasts 450,000 sq feet of flexible, state-of-the-art event space and functional meeting facilities. From 18 challenging holes of championship golf, award-winning restaurants and a rejuvenating full-service spa – this resort inspires guests to engage, relax, retreat, work and play. Escape to our resort located only 1.5 miles from Disney World and just minutes from SeaWorld Orlando, Universal Studios and Legoland for your next vacation. Whether your stay is for business or pleasure, it's all waiting for you at this unforgettable Orlando Marriott luxury resort.
hotel.airportsDesc: Orlando International Airport, (MCO), 17.00, MI, SW; Kissimmee Gateway Airport, (ISM), 10.00, MI, NE;

Resort, Location Type: Resort

facility.title: Siro Urban Italian Kitchen
facility.desc: Sample delicious and creative Italian cuisine at Siro Urban Italian Kitchen, the Orlando World Center Marriott's contemporary and casual Italian restaurant. You'll love the funky décor and our chef's innovative take on classic Italian dishes.

facility.title: Solaris
facility.desc: For the best daily breakfast buffet in Orlando, FL, look no further than Solaris. Enjoy homestyle cooking for breakfast or lunch at this warm and welcoming restaurant.

facility.title: High Velocity
facility.desc: Sports fans and casual observers alike will love High Velocity, the Orlando World Center Marriott's combination sports bar/restaurant. Watch the big game on one of several flat-screen HDTVs and enjoy a selection of the best beers and bar fare in town.

facility.title: Hawk's Landing Steakhouse & Grille
facility.desc: Boasting fantastic golf course views, Hawk's serves premium steaks and features a world-class wine list. Treat yourself to delicious food and even better views.

facility.title: Mikado Japanese Steakhouse
facility.desc: Orlando, FL's best Japanese restaurant offers authentic Teppanyaki-style cusine, including fresh-made sushi; watch as expert chefs prepare it for you. It's the perfect location for both a romantic date or for celebrating a special occasion with family.

facility.title: Falls Pool Bar & Grill
facility.desc: Enjoy a refreshing drink and casual grilled favorites while you lounge by our sparkling outdoor pool.

facility.title: Food Court
facility.desc: On the go? Stop by Mangrove food court for a quick, delicious bite to fuel your Orlando adventures. We serve pizza, hot and cold sandwiches, burgers, salads, ice cream and coffee.

facility.title: Starbucks®
facility.desc: Enjoy perfectly prepared Starbucks® coffee beverages and pastries right here in our hotel lobby.

hotel.name: SpringHill Suites Houston Intercontinental Airport
hotel.description: Welcome to SpringHill Suites by Marriott Houston Intercontinental Airport hotel, ideally located just a mile from the terminals at Houston Intercontinental Airport (IAH). Catch a breath of fresh air while on the road in our spacious suites with separate living, working and sleeping areas. Stay productive with free high speed internet, large work area and flat screen TV at this Houston hotel. Enjoy the convenience of a pantry area with mini-fridge and microwave. Start every day with a complimentary new breakfast buffet featuring hot and healthy items. Unwind at our lounge, outdoor pool or fitness center. See all that Houston has to offer at nearby Sam Houston Race Park, Deerbrook Mall, Market Square, SplashTown, Downtown Houston, Houston Zoo, The Galleria, Reliant Stadium, Toyota Center and more! Nearby companies include Halliburton, Exxon Mobil & Continental Airlines. Among Houston Intercontinental Airport hotels, the SpringHill Suites by Marriott stands above the rest!
hotel.airportsDesc: George Bush Intercontinental Airport, (IAH), 0.40, MI, S; William P Hobby Airport, (HOU), 28.20, MI, N;

hotel.name: The Westin Convention Center, Pittsburgh
hotel.description:
In the center of the business and cultural district, guests at The Westin Convention Center, Pittsburgh have easy access to a variety of local attractions. Complimentary transportation is available from the hotel seven days a week to the center of the business district, as well as the Heinz History Center, Andy Warhol Museum, PNC Park and Mellon Arena.
Connected by a skywalk to the new David L. Lawrence Convention Center, The Westin Convention Center, Pittsburgh is ideally situated for the business traveler. All meeting rooms have High Speed Internet Access and we offer a self-service Business Center so you can take care of any last-minute details. We also house Pittsburgh's premier seafood restaurant, The Original Fish Market.
Rejuvenate in the 8,000-square-foot Westin WORKOUT featuring free weights, aerobic equipment, Nautilus training, indoor lap pool, steam, sauna, massage therapy and aerobic classes.
Enjoy views of the cityscape from one of our 616 guest rooms and suites; each features our signature Heavenly Bed and Heavenly Bath. Our plush bathrobes will help you relax, and High Speed Internet Access allows you to keep up while you're away from home.
hotel.airportsDesc: Pittsburgh International Airport, (PIT), 18.00, MI;

hotel.name: Embassy Suites Philadelphia - Center City
hotel.description: Stay in a spacious two-room suite at Embassy Suites Philadelphia - Center City, located in the downtown Philadelphia financial district and eight minutes from Philadelphia International Airport. Enjoy excellent suite amenities, such as high-speed internet access, marble bathroom vanities, and comfortable furniture in the separate living area. Our Philadelphia - Center City hotel’s suites with sofa sleepers and comfortable beds are ideal for vacationing families and groups considering downtown Philadelphia hotels.Start the day with a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast, and enjoy complimentary refreshments at the nightly Evening Reception*. Room service is available, and T.G.I. Friday’s provides delicious meals in an informal, comfortable setting at our hotel. Take advantage of the services available in the BusinessLink™ Business Center. Our fitness center with state-of-the-art equipment is sure to help you maintain a good workout routine.The hotel’s location near Glaxo Smith Kline Headquarters, Comcast Center, and the Philadelphia Convention Center makes it a convenient base for business travelers, while vacationing guests can enjoy easy access to many of Philadelphia’s top attractions such as the Liberty Bell, Philadelphia Museum of Art, and RittenHouse Square.*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Raleigh Cary
hotel.description: Enjoy the comfort and convenience of our Courtyard Cary, NC hotel. Located between Raleigh and Research Triangle Park, our Cary hotel is perfect for business and leisure travelers alike. Unique among hotels in Cary, the Courtyard features a new lobby with inviting, flexible spaces to work or relax in, free Wi-Fi throughout and easy access to the latest news, weather and airport conditions via our GoBoard. The highlight of our new lobby experience is The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect., which provides guests with healthy food and beverage offerings in the morning and evening dinner service with cocktails. Attend a conference in our 1,320 sq. ft. of meeting space or check out attractions including Town Center Mall, Koka Booth Amphitheatre and Thomas Brooks Park before relaxing in newly renovated guest rooms with luxury bedding and desks with ergonomic chairs. It's a new stay at the Courtyard Raleigh Cary hotel.
hotel.airportsDesc: Raleigh-Durham International Airport, (RDU), 15.00, MI, S;

hotel.name: Red Roof Inn North Charleston Coliseum
hotel.description: With Newly Renovated Rooms and flat screen TVs, this 100 percent Smoke-Free Red Roof Inn is a great location for leisure travelers and those visiting the many colleges in the Charleston area! Charlestons famed Historic District is close by and Northwoods Mall is just ½ mile. Frankies Fun Park, Whirlin Waters Waterpark, North Charleston Coliseum, and Charleston Southern University are all within 5 miles of Red Roof North Charleston Coliseum. Daniel Island Tennis Center (home of the Family Circle Cup), historic downtown Charleston, The Citadel, and The College of Charleston are within 15 minutes drive. This hotel is within walking distance of many restaurants, near outlet malls with brand name stores, 7.6 miles from the Charleston International Airport and 15 miles from the beach.
hotel.airportsDesc: Charleston AFB/Intl Airport, (CHS), 3.71, MI, E;

hotel.name: Wyndham Boston Chelsea
hotel.description: Travelers for business and leisure alike will enjoy the convenience and comfort of this Wyndham Boston Chelsea, just three miles from downtown and minutes from Logan International Airport. This hotel is within easy reach of the best Boston attractions, dozens of corporate HQs, and some of New Englands best colleges and universities. Courtesy shuttle makes it easy to get to and from the airport and local destinations. Enjoy complimentary wireless Internet as well as an indoor pool and hot tub, and sundeck for the summer months. Stretch road-weary muscles in the fully equipped fitness center, and take care of work details in the 24-hour business center. Dine at the in-house restaurant for breakfast, lunch or dinner, or order room service. After hours, relax in the bar/lounge. Spacious guest rooms feature flat-screen TV and Herman Miller ergonomic chair, and many have skyline views. Select rooms are available with refrigerator and microwave, ideal for longer stays.

hotel.name: Red Coach Inn
hotel.description: The Red Coach Inn has been welcoming guests to Niagara Falls since 1923, and is one of the city's most distinctive historic structures, with its English Tudor exterior and warm English country ambiance. Located just 500 yards from the majestic Upper Rapids, our accommodations offer a lodging experience far superior to a conventional hotel stay. Choose from two-bedroom suites, one-bedroom suites, and guest rooms, each uniquely decorated. Most have fireplaces, kitchens, and canopy beds. All accommodations are air conditioned with private full bath, whirlpool tub, free long distance, free wi-fi, television, coffeemaker, luxurious terrycloth robes, Bose stereo, and Gilchrist & Soames amenities from England. Enjoy breakfast and the local newspaper in our restaurant each morning from 7:30 to 11:00, also included with your stay. We also offer banquet facilities for business conferences, family reunions, showers, wedding receptions, and rehearsal dinners.
hotel.airportsDesc: Buffalo International Airport 24.61 milesNiagara International Falls Airport 7.30 miles

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Located 500 yards from the Upper Rapids the Red Coach Inn is so close you can hear the roar. We are a 2 mile walk from the Niagara State Park's Maid of the Mist boat tours and the Cave of the Winds. The Canadian border is about a 10 minute walk from

facility.title: Standard Guest Room
facility.desc: Rooms include a queen or king size bed and private full bath with a Jacuzzi jetted tub. Additional amenities include air conditioning, refrigerator, telephone, Bose stereo, color cable television, voicemail, wireless internet access, coffeemaker, plush European robes, hair dryer, and Gilchrist and Soames amenities from England

facility.title: One Bedroom Suite
facility.desc: Apartment style suites include a Queen or King size bed and separate living room. Additional amenities include a refrigerator, coffeemaker, toaster, air conditioning, private full bath with a Jacuzzi jetted tub, telephone, Bose stereo, color cable television, voicemail, wireless internet access, plush European robes, hair dryer, and Gilchrist and Soames amenities from England

facility.title: 2 Bedroom Suite
facility.desc: Apartment style suites include two queen or a king and queen size beds with a separate living room and fully equipped kitchen. Additional amenities include a sofa sleeper, air conditioning, private full baths with Jacuzzi jetted tubs, telephones, Bose stereo, color cable televisions, voicemail, wireless internet access, plush European robes, hair dryers and Gilchrist and Soames amenities from England.

facility.title: Rapid Room
facility.desc: The Red Coach Inn features a full service Niagara Falls restaurant serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The restaurant offers an extensive menu for fine dining at affordable prices, and our chefs create a new feature menu for lunch and dinner each day. Enjoy a panoramic view of the majestic Niagara Rapids in our Rapid Room , or sit by a roaring wood fire in our natural stone fireplace. Our Cruvinet wine bar features an array of vintage wines by the glass, flavored coffees, cappuccino, and beers from around the world. Our banquet rooms with picture windows offer a spectacular view of the rapids and can comfortably accommodate parties up to 50.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Mt. Vernon Inn
hotel.description:
Close to area attractions and known for a reputable brand, this Winter Park hotel puts guests close to all the top destinations but with a much more affordable rate than Orlando-central hotels.
Orlando hotels come with a premium price, but the reality is that hotels in Winter Park are just as convenient if not more so. There are no city traffic jams to contend with, and your BEST WESTERN Mount Vernon Inn comes with a generous side of hospitality. A service-oriented staff is committed to making every guest feel right at home, which is a welcome change after a long flight or road trip. For guests here to enjoy the Disney magic or nearby beaches, a quick check-in and spacious rooms are the perfect start to a vacation.
While its true that Winter Park hotels are easily drivable to many attractions, this property sets the bar high by combining convenience with quality amenities and spacious, quiet rooms. From relaxing to a day at Walt Disney World or Universal Studios, this is your vacation so spend it as you like. If that means a trip to Epcot Center and SeaWorld or heading immediately to the Harry Potter Attraction, the best of Florida is minutes away. Dont miss out on the Universals Island of Adventure or one of the many white, sandy beaches just a few miles away.
Guests enjoy the surrounding lush foliage and stunning ornamental gardens of this Winter Park hotel. With premier shopping and fine dining nearby, the entertainment options are endless. This property is located near a number of cultural points of interest, including the Morse Museum of American Art and Polasek Museum and Sculpture Garden. From the Annie Russell Theatre to the Loch Haven Art Center, theres something for the whole family. Visit the Orlando Science Center for a real treat or ask a helpful staff member for recommendations.
Book your Florida getaway at BEST WESTERN Mt. Vernon Inn and let the festivities begin!

hotel.name: Residence Inn Orlando at SeaWorld
hotel.description: Delight in an award-winning Orlando hotel near SeaWorld named as the hotel - Best for Families - in the U.S. by TripAdvisor in its 2008 Travelers Choice awards. The Residence Inn Orlando SeaWorld Hotel neighbors a number of family attractions, including Universal Studios, SeaWorld, Discovery Cove, Walt Disney World, and Orlando Premium Outlets featuring upscale shopping at over 120 stores. Offering complimentary theme park transportation, this hotel in Orlando, FL boasts rooms that offer high speed internet access at no cost and 50% more space than traditional hotel rooms. One and two bedroom Orlando, FL hotel suites are also available, which are perfect for family vacations. Begin each morning with complimentary hot breakfast buffet or use your fully equipped in-room kitchen. Enjoy a variety of family friendly amenities at this hotel in Orlando, such as a heated outdoor swimming pool, game room, and sport court. Experience a home away from home at Residence Inn Orlando SeaWorld/International Center.

hotel.name: The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel
hotel.description: Experience genuine renewal at The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel. Situated atop a 150-foot bluff, this peaceful sanctuary complements its refined elegance and graceful atmosphere with impeccable service. Located halfway between Los Angeles and San Diego, this luxury hotel in Laguna Beach has catered to the world's most discriminating guests for 27 years. Discover a time-honored haven, which has raised the traditional standard of hotel service to an entirely new level, blending unexpected luxuries with the timeless elegance of the sea.
hotel.airportsDesc: John Wayne Airport, (SNA), 25.00, S, Mile; Los Angeles International Airport, (LAX), 75.00, SE, Mile; San Diego, (SAN), 60.00, N, Mile

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc:
Set a loftier goal for your next corporate event. Situated high atop a dramatic ocean bluff, The Ritz-Carlton, Laguna Niguel, raises the standard for business functions - with award-winning Southern California meeting facilities that pair ideal meeting venues with impeccable service. From exclusive board meetings, to product launches or corporate-wide celebrations, we ensure all your events are memorably excellent. Discover the many signature features of this Southern California meeting hotel, which include:
18 function rooms, for groups from two to 900 More than 26,224 square feet of indoor conference and banquet space, offering extensive flexibility Nearly 54,000 square feet of outdoor space, graced with garden courtyards, pool terraces, and oceanfront lawns The finest facilities and staff anywhere, offering an experienced touch with visible results

facility.title: Ocean View Guestroom
facility.desc: This 400 square foot room is beautifully decorated in hues reflective of the sand and sea, guest rooms blend classic furnishings and modern-day conveniences with generous living spaces and includes a private balcony or patio with ocean views.

facility.title: Garden / Pool View Guestroom
facility.desc: Beautifully decorated in hues reflective of the sand and sea, guest rooms blend classic furnishings and modern-day conveniences with generous living spaces.

facility.title: Limited View Guestroom
facility.desc: Beautifully decorated in hues reflective of the sand and sea, guest rooms blend classic furnishings and modern-day conveniences with generous living spaces.

facility.title: Raya
facility.desc:
Raya is a restaurant concept by acclaimed Chef Richard Sandoval with Chef de Cuisine Greg Howe at the helm. Raya showcases Pan-Latin Coastal Cuisine prepared with sustainable seafood, local produce, grass fed meats and Chef Richard Sandoval's signature Latin flavors.
A private dining room is also available with seating for 14.
Breakfast is served daily from 7 to 11:30am.
Lunch is served daily from 11:30am t0 2:00pm.
Dinner is served daily from 6:00pm to 9:00pm Sunday through Thursday and :00pm to 9:30pm Friday and Saturday.
Resort casual dress is requested.

facility.title: 180blu
facility.desc:
180blu is an oceanfront dining lounge featuring panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean and the blue skies across the horizon. Perched 162-feet above Salt Creek Beach, 180blu is the perfect Southern California experience to enjoy refreshing hand-crafted beverages, small plates from Raya and a little slice of heaven on earth!
180blu offers an appetizer and dessert menu as well as specialty cocktails, beer and wine.
Live music is presented Thursday, Friday and Saturday from 6:00 to 9:00pm.

facility.title: The Market Place
facility.desc:
Give in to temptation at The Market Place, offering a wide variety of coffee, espresso, sweet treats and more. Early risers will enjoy a selection of gourmet coffees, pastries and other breakfast items. Throughout the day, guests will be tempted with homemade sweets from the pastry kitchen and a variety of Panini's and freshly made sandwiches.
Open Sunday - Thursday from 6:00am to 3:00pm and Friday - Saturday from 6:00am to 9:00pm.
The Market Place also offers wine by the glass.

facility.title: enoSTEAK
facility.desc: enoSTEAK is an intimate steakhouse featuring only the highest quality ingredients. All the steaks are from prime and grass-fed, pasture-raised beef. The organic produce is grown locally and harvested at the peak of the season. enoSTEAK also highlights artisanal cheeses, charcuterie and a large selection of fine wines.

facility.title: Bar Raya
facility.desc:
Gather in the casual confines of Bar Raya's sophisticated, yet friendly atmosphere. Fine cocktails, appetizers and company are even finer alongside the breath-taking ocean views and stylized, silver bar.
Bar Raya is open 11:30 a.m. to midnight Sunday through Thursday and 11:30 a.m. to 1 a.m. Friday and Saturday. Seating is available on a first-come, first served basis and an appetizer menu is available throughout the day.

facility.title: The Dana Pool Cafe
facility.desc: Serving casual lunch fare poolside, weather permitting.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Orange County Airport North
hotel.description:
Located in central Orange County, near the Orange County Airport, this Santa Ana hotel offers something for everyone, plus a great location and rates.
Stay at this Santa Ana hotel to enjoy the best Orange County has to offer. Families will love visiting nearby Disneyland® Resort. Sports fans will enjoy being near baseball games at Anaheim Edison Field. Shoppers can indulge in retail therapy at area shopping centers, including South Coast Plaza Shopping Center, Fashion Island Shopping Mall and the Outlets of Orange. And everyone will love being just a short drive from soaking up the warm sun at Newport Beach, Laguna Beach and Huntington Beach—the choice is yours when you stay at the BEST WESTERN PLUS Orange County Airport North. Plus, with easy freeway and interstate access, guests can explore popular Southern California attractions—all located just a short distance from this Orange airport hotel.
After an exciting day exploring Orange County, head back to the BEST WESTERN PLUS Orange County Airport North to rest and relax in a cozy guest room thats complete with cable satellite television with HBO® and free wireless high-speed Internet access and 100% smoke-free. Other amenities at this hotel in Santa Ana also include a complimentary full breakfast each morning, an outdoor heated swimming pool and hot tub, on-site exercise facility, guest laundry and courtesy shuttle service to John Wayne Airport, located just two miles away. For those staying here on business, this Orange County Best Western offers full business services, meeting-banquet facilities that can accommodate up to 60 people and a close proximity to area business and banquet needs, including the Irvine Business Park, Anaheim Convention Center and more. University of California Irvine and Irvine Valley College are also just minutes away.
Ready for an unforgettable Santa Ana, California hotel stay. Make your BEST WESTERN PLUS Orange County Airport North reservations today and save!

hotel.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Birmingham
hotel.description: Unlike other Birmingham hotels, this Residence Inn by Marriott Birmingham Inverness hotel offers you all suites, with all the comforts of home. We offer flexible rates based on your length of stay. Located in the Inverness suburb, near Hoover, we are not far from the The Summit Shopping & Restaurants, Riverchase Galleria, and Oak Mountain State Park. This Inverness hotel adds a few special touches, like a complimentary grocery-shopping service...and our HomeTouch breakfast area, featuring fruit, yogurt, everything for a hot morning burrito, and more. And extreme comfort in well-appointed suites featuring a full kitchen, living area, and a bedroom featuring crisp linens, quilted comforters and fluffier pillows. High-speed Internet access will keep you connected. For workouts, there's a fitness center, Sport Court, and pool. Monday through Wednesday, you can enjoy our hospitality social, with beer, wine and a light dinner, compliments of the Residence Inn.

hotel.name: SpringHill Suites Atlanta Airport Gateway
hotel.description: Welcome to the new SpringHill Suites Atlanta Airport Gateway, a stylish and smartly designed all-suite hotel in College Park ready to energize you! Situated just 10 minutes from Atlanta, this hotel near ATL Airport is connected to the airport via the ATL SkyTrain, with easy access to most areas of the city by MARTA Rail. This hotel near Georgia International Convention Center is also close to many businesses like Chick-fil-A, Delta Airlines, or Atlanta Auto Auction. If you're ready to escape from routine, look no further than Turner Field for Braves baseball or Philips Arena for Hawks basketball. For NASCAR fans, visit the Atlanta Motor Speedway, only 30 minutes from our College Park suite hotel. But before you head out, join us for complimentary breakfast each morning featuring a new, hot breakfast buffet. And while you're away from home, you'll still be connected via complimentary high speed Internet access throughout the hotel. Start planning your stay at the SpringHill Suites Atlanta Airport hotel today!

hotel.name: Palomar Philadelphia, a Kimpton Hotel
hotel.description: Every Kimpton hotel tells a distinct story. The story of Hotel Palomar Philadelphia is Art in Motion; and before you even set foot in the magnificent lobby; youll know precisely why. The hotel itself is one of the citys most striking examples of Art Deco design - a landmark 1929 building that has been restored to its original grandeur and beyond. The Hotel Palomar Philadelphia is now the citys only LEED Gold Certified eco-friendly hotel. Here you will enjoy an ideal location in the heart of Center City within the trendy Rittenhouse Square neighborhood just steps from all of Philadelphias finest attractions - Rittenhouse Square Park; Old City Philadelphia; the Mutter Museum; Philadelphia sports attractions and high-end boutique shopping.

hotel.name: The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel
hotel.description: The Hilton Waterfront Beach Resort is located on the picturesque coastline of Southern California, in the heart of Surf City USA™ in Huntington Beach California. A captivating coastal oasis, with stylish accommodations, this dynamic Huntington Beach resort is a premier destination for discerning travelers. Uncompromising service and the memory of striking sunsets over the Pacific Ocean will forever beckon visitors back to our hotel in Huntington Beach.This AAA four-diamond rated Hilton hotel and resort in Huntington Beach is close to several major California airports, including Los Angeles (LAX), Long Beach (LGB), and John Wayne Orange County (SNA). Centrally located in the heart of, Southern California, there are many major attractions nearby, including Disneyland, Disney's Grand California Adventure, Knott's Berry Farm, the Aquarium of the Pacific, and neighboring Laguna and Newport Beach. The rooms at the Hilton Huntington Beach, CA hotel are thoughtfully designed to bring you complete comfort and tranquility. Coastal sunsets from your private, furnished balcony and the sound of crashing waves will wash away the stress of your everyday life. Sleep better than you have in years, and awake to picturesque views and all of the comforts of home at our Huntington Beach, California hotel.Guests of our Huntington Beach resort can enjoy our signature restaurant, Shades Restaurant & Bar, serving fresh and innovative fare, is the perfect spot for a power breakfast, lunch, dinner or a romantic rendezvous. The beautifully appointed dining room and energized poolside patio, with its flickering fire pit, intoxicating ocean views and live entertainment, offer something for everyone and is the ultimate backdrop for dining, gathering with friends and people watching.Throughout the summer, our Surf Hero Deli and Beach Cabana are open, offering a perfect place to grab a bite to eat by our pool or on the beach.Whether it be surf lessons, bike rides on the boardwalk, beach volleyball, or s'mores over a bonfire at sunset, to our Huntington Beach, California hotel delivers the ultimate Southern California lifestyle. The resort's proximity to the beach and year-round sunshine attracts fun seeking families, business travelers and corporate meeting attendees to Surf City year after year.Travel should take you places
hotel.airportsDesc: John Wayne/Orange County Airport, (SNA), 12.00, MI, NW; Los Angeles Intl Airport, (LAX), 40.00, MI, SE; Long Beach Airport, (LGB), 19.00, MI, SE;

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Birmingham Colonnade
hotel.description: The Courtyard Birmingham Colonnade hotel is proud to share our newly renovated state-of-the-art lobby and stylish new guest rooms. Whether in town for business or fun, we offer what you need for a relaxing and productive stay. Located just 25 minutes from downtown and the airport, this Birmingham, AL hotel is close to the University of Alabama at Birmingham as well as many businesses and restaurants situated along Highway 280. The exciting new features at the Courtyard Birmingham Colonade hotel in Birmingham, AL include inviting, flexible spaces to work or relax, free Internet access throughout, access to the latest news via our GoBoard and The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect. offering enhanced breakfast, dinner and beverage options. Our hotel also offers 2 meeting rooms with 884 sq ft. of meeting space to host your next event. Visit our hotel in Birmingham, AL and experience true comfort in an excellent location.
hotel.airportsDesc: Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport, (BHM), 20.00, MI, S;

hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Coconut Point
hotel.description: Featuring 454 elegantly appointed guestrooms with lush garden and Estero Bay views, you can rest assured that your experience at Hyatt Regency Coconut Point will be relaxing and memorable. Exclusive Regency Club accommodations include personalized concierge attention, Continental breakfast service, evening cocktails and hors d'oeuvres. Creativity, attention to details, and superb service from our attentive staff makes this retreat the perfect choice for elegant dinner parties or large catered receptions. Let our chefs tantalize you with tropical cuisine and culinary delights in our five restaurants including relaxed poolside dining. Enjoy cocktails in our lounges or a quiet dinner in your suite with the convenience of room service. Break away from business and pamper yourself in our private spa and salon. Enjoy the benefits of a fully equipped fitness center or take to one of our two lighted tennis courts. Experience nearby beaches, exclusive shopping and a 12-acre environmental preserve. Or close that important business deal on our 18-hole Raymond Floyd-designed championship golf course. At Hyatt Regency Coconut Point...the amenities are endless. Hotel charges an additional Resort Fee of $15.00 USD per room per night upon check out

hotel.name: Anaheim Portofino Inn and Suites
hotel.description:
Newly Refreshed Rooms: The five-story, 190-room Portofino Inn and Suites is adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center, across the street from Disneyland Park, Disney's California Adventure Park and Downtown Disney. The hotel is also located across the street from an IHOP Restaurant and within walking distance to the new Anaheim GardenWalk, dining and entertainment district. GardenWalk shopping includes more than 20 stores, while the entertainment options are a bowling alley, IMAX Theater, Aveda Spa, a wine bar and a lounge.

This contemporary hotel is comprised of two buildings and has deluxe rooms, and Kid's suites. There's the kids suite with separate parent's room, two-room king suite and deluxe rooms. All rooms have private balcony, and suites have microwaves and refrigerators. A driveway and parking area separates the two buildings. The inviting lobby features marble floors and lots of windows and natural light, beckoning guests into their comfortable Anaheim stay. Family friendly, Portofino is also ideally located for conventioneers or those visiting Anaheim for business.

Portofino Inn and Suites' amenities include an outdoor heated pool, spa and large sundeck, a fitness center, video arcade, gift shop, car rental Kiosk, ATM access, coin-operated laundry, WiFi throughout the property and self-parking. The property is 100% non-smoking. Disneyland Park Hopper tickets are available at the front desk.

A resort charge of $9.99 plus tax per night will be assessed. Resort Fee includes high speed internet access and parking.

Please note: Only one car per room will be provided space to park at the hotel.
hotel.airportsDesc: John Wayne Orange County, Long Beach Airport, Ontario Airport and Los Angeles International Airport
hotel.areaServed: Anaheim, Buena Park, Long Beach, Irvine, Los Angeles, Garden Grove and Newport Beach.

facility.title: Anaheim Garden Walk
facility.desc: Newly opened on June 14 2008, the Anaheim Garden Walk promises to be one of Anaheim's top shopping and dining destinations. Located just steps from Disneyland and a short walk from the Portofino Inn & Suites, this chic and modern outdoor mall is sure to fulfill all of your shopping and dining needs. Browse a variety of upscale stores such as Brooks Brothers, The Sunglass Hut, and Tommy Bahama just to name a few or grab a bite at some of the world's top restaurants and eateries such as Bubba Gump Shrimp Co., P.F. Chang's, and McCormick & Schmick's. Please check the mall website regularly as new stores are opening every day throughout the summer.

facility.title: Downtown Disney District
facility.desc: Downtown Disney District is a 300,000 sq. ft. dining/shopping/entertainment promenade. It features such flagship entertainment facilities as a House of Blues, a 12-screen movie theater and an ESPN Zone. There are also 15 shops (including the inevitable, and massive, World of Disney Store), seven full-service restaurants, and an open-air bar. It's a fun place to relax after a busy day at the theme parks.

facility.title: Ruth's Chris Steak House
facility.desc: U.S. Prime steaks, seafood and wine.

facility.title: Joe's Crabshack
facility.desc: Seafood, Salads, Sandwiches and Shelfish.

facility.title: Bubba Gump Shrimp Co-GardenWalk
facility.desc: Casual Environment where everyone can enjoy a great meal and have some fun too.

facility.title: Cheescake Factory-GardenWalk
facility.desc: Unique, upscale casual dining restaurant offering more than 200 menu selections.

facility.title: Roy's Restaurant
facility.desc: Hawaiian Fusion.

facility.title: McCormick & Schmicks Grille
facility.desc: McCormick & Schmick's Seafood Restaurant features 30 varieties of FRESH seafood on a daily changing menu. Recognized with Best Seafood Restaurant awards.

facility.title: Pop the Cork
facility.desc: Pop the Cork offers wine lovers 40 to 50 wines by the taste, flight & glass, plus a selection of 150 wines by the bottle. Enjoy your wine with selections from their small plate menu, such as paninis, salads, cheeses and meats.

facility.title: The Great Steak & Potato Company
facility.desc: A "meat and potatoes" fast-food operation, providing a unique visual, sensory and eating experience for the customer. Their signature attractions are only the finest, freshest ingredients. Grilled and prepared to order, right in front of the customer.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: No one ever said you can't combine business with pleasure. Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim Hotel certainly allows you to do both! The adjacent meeting room is perfect for small groups and corporate retreats. And if you're traveling to Anaheim for a major convention or trade show, you'll appreciate our convenient location just across the parking lot from the Anaheim Convention Center.

facility.title: P.F. Chang's China Bistro
facility.desc: A restaurant chain founded in 1993 offering American Chinese cuisine in an upscale atmosphere. The elaborate dcor is designed to give the impression of a Chinese village, with many restaurants in the chain displaying life-size replicas of the famous Xian terracotta soldiers.

facility.title: California Pizza Kitchen
facility.desc: Known for their Original BBQ Chicken Pizza, pizza lovers were jolted out of the pepperoni-mode and thrown into BLT bliss, Thai Chicken euphoria and Jamaican Jerk nirvana. Not limiting their menu to just pizza, they created an innovative selection of pasta, salads, and to-die for-desserts.

facility.title: Deluxe Room with two Queen Beds
facility.desc: Two queen beds in a spacious room with private balcony. Flat-screen TVs with HBO, CNN, ESPN and The Disney Channel. Complimentary in-room coffee, Iron and ironing board, Hairdryer and phone with voicemail. The hotel is 100% non-smoking

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: The hotel also features an outdoor heated pool and spa, video arcade, gift shop, car rental Kiosk, ATM access, coin-op laundry, WiFi throught the hotel and self- parking. The property is 100% non-smoking. Disneyland Park Hopper tickets are available at the front desk.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Portofino Inn & Suites is located across from Disneyland Park and Disney's California Adventure. Adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center and within walking distance to the new Anaheim GardenWalk entertainment and dining district, Portofino Inn & Suites is ideally located for your Anaheim adventure.

facility.title: Kids Suite
facility.desc: Kids' room features bunk bed (2 twin beds), sofa sleeper, refrigerator, microwave, 37-inch flat screen TV including HBO, CNN, ESPN and The Disney Channel -and kid-size activity table with chairs. Separated by French doors, parents' room features king bed, armoire, coffee maker, TV with free premium channels, bathroom with two vanities.Iron/ironing board. Hairdryer. Non-smoking.

hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Huntington Beach Resort & Spa
hotel.description: Located in the seaside community of Huntington Beach, "Surf-City USA", the resort enjoys 2,000 feet of beach frontage offering spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean. A pedestrian bridge makes beach access incredibly convenient. 517 guest rooms offer a casual elegance and feature luxurious appointments and amenities, each boasting a private terrace. The resort offers an award winning spa and two pools including a childs water playground. Surf lessons, bike rentals, seasonal Disney shuttle, beach amenities are just some of the exciting activities available. Multiple dining options including 24 hour in room dining and an on property grocery store.
hotel.airportsDesc: John Wayne/Orange County Airport, (SNA), 13.00, MI, NW; Los Angeles Intl Airport, (LAX), 35.00, MI, S; Long Beach Airport, (LGB), 18.00, MI, NW;

hotel.name: South Seas Island Resort
hotel.description:
Resort offers family vacationing at its finest on Captiva Island.
South Seas Island Resort, on a secluded Captiva Island is located on a 330-acre Wildlife Preserve. Create a memorable vacation experience by choosing from a broad range of accommodations for families large and small.
The South Seas Island Resort combines fun and learning, activity and relaxation with interactive programs, fishing and sailing lessons, golf, tennis, a pristine beach and 13 swimming pools. It's a complete vacation resort at the edge of the Gulf Coast.

Highlights
Fitness center and tennis complex, Family Interactive Center with supervised activities for kids, tweens and teens, 13 pools and H2 Whooa Water Park, Go Fish and Go Sail Programs, Top PGA-rated par-3 executive golf course.

Rooms At the South Seas Island Resort - accommodations range from harborside rooms to private homes with as many as six bedrooms. All accommodations feature private balconies, screed lanais or patios, 300-thread count linens, granite baths and flat-screen TVs. Amenities vary with the accommodations from small refrigerators and in-room coffee to full kitchens and laundry.

facility.title: Property
facility.desc:
Resort offers family vacationing at its finest on Captiva Island.
South Seas Island Resort, on a secluded Captiva Island is located on a 330-acre Wildlife Preserve. Create a memorable vacation experience by choosing from a broad range of accommodations for families large and small.
The South Seas Island Resort combines fun and learning, activity and relaxation with interactive programs, fishing and sailing lessons, golf, tennis, a pristine beach and 13 swimming pools. It's a complete vacation resort at the edge of the Gulf Coast.

Highlights
Fitness center and tennis complex, Family Interactive Center with supervised activities for kids, tweens and teens, 13 pools and H2 Whooa Water Park, Go Fish and Go Sail Programs, Top PGA-rated par-3 executive golf course.

Rooms At the South Seas Island Resort - accommodations range from harborside rooms to private homes with as many as six bedrooms. All accommodations feature private balconies, screed lanais or patios, 300-thread count linens, granite baths and flat-screen TVs. Amenities vary with the accommodations from small refrigerators and in-room coffee to full kitchens and laundry.

facility.title: The Pointe
facility.desc: Located poolside in the Resort Pool Complex, North Pointe, featuring indoor and outdoor seating and delicious sandwiches, salads, burgers and vegetarian options. Open for lunch, daily 11:00am - 6:00pm

facility.title: Scoops and Slices
facility.desc: A 1950s themed diner serving a wide selection of Edy's ice cream, gluten-free and fat-free soft serve frozen yogurt, pizza and a wall of candy that is a dream come true for your sweet-tooth. Conveniently located just outside of the Resort Pool Complex, North Pointe. Open Sunday - Thursday, 11:00am - 10:00pm; Friday & Saturday, 11:00am - 11:00pm

facility.title: Doc Fords Rum Bar & Grille
facility.desc: One of Sanibel and Fort Myers Beach's favorite family restaurants, Doc Ford's offers mouth-watering Caribbean inspired cuisine in a casual atmosphere. Doc Ford's will be bringing all their specialties, including Yucatan Shrimp, their Lime Panko Crusted Fish Sandwich and the Martinque-Jerked Pork Chop. Try their famous Mojitos or a rum infused cocktail. Open daily, 11:00am - close

facility.title: Poolside Bar
facility.desc: The Poolside Bar, a full service bar, weather permitting, located on the main pool deck with Pine Island Sound as the backdrop

facility.title: Sunset Beach Bar
facility.desc: Sunset Beach Bar, located directly beside Sunny Island Watersports at Sunset Beach, is a limited service eatery serving prepared hot and cold sandwiches, hot dogs and snacks along with tropical libations. Sunset Beach and Sunset Beach Bar is the best spot on Sanibel & Captiva to see the unmatched sunsets of Southwest Florida. Located at Sunset Beach, North Pointe. Open daily 11:00am until sunset, weather permitting

facility.title: Starbucks
facility.desc: Offering delicious fresh brewed coffee, lattes, pastries and all your other world-famous favorites. Open 7:00am - 6:00pm

facility.title: Bayside Villas
facility.desc: Bayside Villas are located at the South end of the resort, a short walking distance to the beach, These accommodations offer a living room with sleeper sofa, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. A large screened balcony, overlooks the bay and a mangrove forest

facility.title: Tennis Villas
facility.desc: Tennis Villas are located at the south end of the Resort in the Tennis complex, and are just a short walking distance to the beach. These loft style Villa features separate living room with sleeper sofa, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen.

facility.title: Beach Villas
facility.desc: Situated at the south end of the Resort, the Beach Villas are approximately 100 yards from the sandy beaches accessible by boardwalks. Enjoy 3 pools in the complex, complete with gas grills poolside. Beach villas feature a living room, dining area, and a full kitchen. Private screened in balconies overlook the Gulf of Mexico

facility.title: 2 Bedroom Marina Villa
facility.desc: Perched on the scenic north end of the property, the 2 Bedroom Marina Villas look out over the scenic Main Marina or Bay from a large screened balcony. These Villas are a terrific option for families and larger parties. The Marina Villas offer two separate bedrooms, two full bathrooms, living room, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. This complex of Villas includes a pool and gas grills.

facility.title: Harborside Rooms & Junior Suites
facility.desc: Located at the Resort's prestigious North Village, the center for many of the resorts activities, these accommodations feature private balconies offering water views or views of the Marina. Junior Suites feature a king bed with a sitting area complete with a double sleeper sofa.

facility.title: Harbourside Bar & Grill
facility.desc: South Seas' family casual restaurant Harbourside Bar & Grill serves both traditional breakfast fare and dinner favorites including steak, fresh catch, pasta, delicious sides and signature cocktails. Indoor and outdoor dining is available overlooking Yacht Harbour Marina.

hotel.name: Hilton Short Hills
hotel.description: Stay at the Hilton Short Hills hotel, a AAA Four Diamond rated hotel located steps from the Mall at Short Hills. This Short Hills, NJ hotel is 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport and less than 10 minutes from New Jersey Transit trains. Travel to New York City in less than 40 minutes by train or 60 minutes by car.Rejuvenate at the hotel while exploring or doing business in New Jersey or further afield. Relax with specialty martinis and enjoy views of the woodland at the Retreat Lounge. Dine on American cuisine at The Dining Room. The Patio offers a poolside and al fresco setting during the summer months. Maintain your exercise regime at the fully equipped 24-hour fitness center. Swim lengths in the indoor spa pool or relax with a cold drink by the seasonal outdoor pool. Indulge in beauty treatments offering superior wellness benefits at eforea spa.Stay connected with work and friends at the 24-hour self-service business center. Host an elegant business event or wedding at this Short Hills hotel. The hotel boasts an expert planning team, flexible meeting rooms and exclusive Executive Lounge to help make sure that your Short Hills event is a success. Experience a memorable dinner and reception in the Grand Ballroom or the outdoor Tented Pavilion.

hotel.name: Hilton Boston Downtown/Faneuil Hall
hotel.description: The AAA Four Diamond Hilton Boston Downtown/Faneuil Hall hotel offers a unique blend of old and new, conveniently located steps away from the popular Faneuil Hall Marketplace in downtown Boston’s Financial District. The hotel's stylish renovation has brought new luster to the 1920's art deco skyscraper, adding a host of modern comforts and conveniences. Relax in a spacious guest room with high ceilings and thoughtful amenities. Upgrade your stay and enjoy one of our deluxe rooms or one of 66 two-room suites.Host an event or meeting with over 10,000 sq. ft. of versatile function space in this Boston downtown hotel. The 1,893 sq. ft. Kellogg Ballroom accommodates up to 150 guests for a stylish reception. Have breakfast, lunch or dinner at Nix’s Mate Restaurant, enjoying contemporary American cuisine with an innovative twist. The menu boasts a flavorful mix of regional favorites including the freshest New England seaf

hotel.name: Sanibel Inn
hotel.description:
Sanibel Island, Florida -- an island hideaway off the Ft. Myers coast where nature meets the sea, offers the relaxation of the beach and a vision of the environment in harmony with nature. Soaked in hues of indigenous flowers jasmine, periwinkle, bougainvillea, lantana, dune daisy and hibiscus -- Sanibel Inn peers into butterfly gardens shaded by more than 600 palms. Inside, warm-toned bamboo flooring along with a palette of grass green, sea blue and golden wheat featured in trellis and striped patterns adorn each of the 68 hotel rooms and one-bedroom suites. Nature comes indoors with photos of the local flora and fauna framed in dark wood. Along with hotel rooms and one-bedroom suites, Sanibel Inn offers two-bedroom condominiums that are perfect for families or larger groups of friends who wish to stay at the Inn. With 23 miles of paved hiking and bike paths, guests experience nature up close and personal, gazing at spoonbills and herons. Exploration continues on the beach where more than 200 rare species of shells, including junonia and alphabet cones, await discovery. Adventures resume on the greens at The Dunes Golf & Tennis Club winding through 75 acres of natural lake view fairways and Audubon Cooperative Society wetlands.

The Beach Bar - Located pool side serving light fare including sandwiches, wraps and special treats for children.

Sea Star Cafe and Bar - Sea Star Cafe features traditional cafe fare with an Island twist for breakfast, lunch and dinner, the Sea Star Cafe and Bar provides Sanibel Inn guests with a casually chic dining option. Located just steps from the lobby, the Sea Star offers delectable menu items including breakfast favorites, sandwiches, burgers, pastas, steaks and the finest seafood from the Gulf and beyond. Open from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m., seven days a week.

Sanibel Inn will add a Resort & Recreation Fee of $10.00 ($11.10 including tax) per day, per room to your rate. The Resort & Recreation Fee includes: Bicycles for adults and children, Kayaks, Tennis Court access including racquet rental, Beach Chairs & Umbrellas (based on availability and city ordinance restrictions), Guestroom wireless high speed internet, Newspaper Delivery (six days per week)
hotel.airportsDesc: RSW - Ft. Myers Aiport, TPA - Tampa Airport, FLL - Ft. Lauderdale Airport

facility.title: Beachfront Guestroom
facility.desc: Enjoy the incredible panoramic views of the Gulf of Mexico and sugar-sand beach from the private screened patios or balconies furnished with teak furniture. Feel at home with amenities such as a refrigerator, microwave, coffee and newspaper service. Enjoy the complimentary HBO and the Disney Channel on the new 42" LCD flat panel television. To complete the room, an iron and ironing board, safe, hair dryer and daily housekeeping service are also provided. The 450 square foot room accommodates up to four guests with a majority offering two queen beds or a limited amount offering one king. A DVD player is available upon request.

facility.title: Two Bedroom Sanibel Residence
facility.desc: Ideal for families, the Two Bedroom Sanibel Residence offers the comforts of home in a tranquil setting overlooking the butterfly gardens and a short walk to the shell strewn beaches. A separate screened balcony offers and outdoor room to enjoy the fresh air and sea breezes. With 1,000+ square feet and decor unique to each unit, the spacious two-bedroom Residences feature a large living/dining area, full kitchen with house wares, and two baths. Accommodating up to six, the Residence features a king bed in the master bedroom and two twin beds in the second bedroom.

facility.title: Gulf View Guestroom
facility.desc: Screened patios or balconies furnished with teak patio furniture offer the ideal spot to overlook the tranquil pool and the Gulf of Mexico across the horizon. Adorned in warm tones, the Gulf View Guestrooms offer either a comfortable king bed or two queen beds. Feel at home with amenities such as a refrigerator, microwave, coffee and newspaper service. Watch the complimentary HBO and the Disney Channel on the new 42" LCD flat screen televisions. A DVD player is available upon request. The room is complete with iron and ironing board, safe, hair dryer and daily housekeeping service. The room accommodates up to four guests and is 450 square feet.

facility.title: Beachfront Suite
facility.desc: The newly renovated Beachfront Suite offers unrivaled views of the beautiful Gulf of Mexico and beaches of Sanibel from the privacy of screened patios or balconies furnished with teak patio furniture. Decorated with warm-tones and bamboo flooring, these suites offer extra space with amazing views from the separate living room with sleeper sofa. A cozy bedroom with 42" flat screen TV offers a comfortable king size bed. Feel at home with amenities such as a refrigerator, microwave, coffee and newspaper service, complimentary HBO and the Disney Channel, iron and ironing board, safe, hair dryer and daily housekeeping service. A DVD player is available upon request. The room accommodates up to three guests and is 500 square feet.

facility.title: Gulf View Suite
facility.desc: Relax in a screened patio or balcony furnished with teak patio furniture overlooking the tranquil pool with the Gulf of Mexico across the horizon. Best of all, the suite is steps from the beach. Adorned with warm-toned bamboo flooring along with a palette of warm tones that echo the natural elements of the beach, these newly renovated suites offer extra space with a separate living room with sleeper sofa. A cozy bedroom with new 42" flat screen TV offers a comfortable king size bed. Feel at home with amenities such as a refrigerator, microwave, coffee and newspaper service, complimentary HBO and the Disney Channel, iron and ironing board, safe, hair dryer and daily housekeeping service. A DVD player is available upon request. The room accommodates up to three guests and is 500 square feet.

Open from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m., seven days a week.

hotel.name: Palomar San Diego a Kimpton Hotel
hotel.description:
Hotel Palomars sophisticated luxury combines elegant textures and contemporary Asian influenced design. Enjoy our luxurious downtown San Diego accommodations appointed with Zen-inspired furnishings as you relax and rejuvenate from the days excursions. Be sure to visit SummerSalt San Diegos hottest rooftop pool bar and lounge where you can gather above the city lights with San Diego locals and vacationers. Restore yourself and experience Se Spas Asian-inspired treatments. Hotel Palomar provides an ambiance unrivaled in southern California and found nowhere else in the world. Located in the Historic Gaslamp District the heart of downtown San Diego Hotel Palomar provides a truly unique experience and is sure to please even the most well traveled guests.
Located just over 3 miles from San Diegos Lindberg Field Airport Palomar San Diego is adjacent to the Gaslamp Quarters historical architecture eclectic shopping and premier dining establishments. Palomar San Diego is also steps from the San Diego Convention Center- Petco Park -trendy East Village and the Metropolitian Trolley System which provides easy access to Mission Valley Old Town and Mexico. Spectacular Balboa Park and the San Diego Zoo are 3 miles and Mission Bay and Sea World is 8 miles away.

facility.title: Saltbox Dining and Drinking
facility.desc: Saltbox raises the bar with its gastro-lounge approach featuring fresh farm-to-table ingredients. Here a deceptively simple menu takes on a spirited focus with skillful food and drink pairings.

facility.title: SummerSalt Lounge

hotel.name: Hampton Inn Birmingham I-65/Lakeshore Drive, AL
hotel.description: discover true Southern hospitality...welcome to the Hampton Inn Birmingham I-65/Lakeshore.Birmingham has been called "the last major Southern city". And though the largest city in Alabama continually grows more sophisticated, we still cling to many small town Southern ways. So don't be surprised at the symphony when you hear patrons discussing rival college football games. And though you'll find arugula salad in our upscale establishments, there'll be plenty of chances to savor down-home Southern cooking near our Birmingham hotel.If you're looking for a comfortable hotel in Birmingham while you're here on business or vacation, look no further than the Hampton Inn® Birmingham I-65/Lakeshore Drive hotel. We're conveniently located off I-65, just five miles from downtown Birmingham and 10 miles from Birmingham International Airport. Our comfortable Birmingham hotel offers the perfect home base from which to explore all our vibrant city has to offer, including: great restaurants, shopping malls, golf courses, the zoo, botanical gardens and Samford University.services & amenitiesEven if you're in Birmingham to enjoy the great outdoors, we want you to enjoy our great indoors as well. That's why we offer a full range of services and amenities at our hotel to make your stay with us exceptional.Are you planning a meeting? Wedding? Family reunion? Little League game? Let us help you with our easy booking and rooming list management tools. * Meetings & Events * Local restaurant guid

hotel.name: The Lafayette Hotel
hotel.description:
The Lafayette Hotel, a 1918 historic landmark on fashionable St Charles Avenue, has been restored to its former splendor with its original French doors and period wrought iron balconies. The foyer is an exotic melange of Italian marble, wood moldings, English carpets and a French polished mahogany front desk. Upstairs, the 44 rooms and suites are luxuriously decorated and furnished with designer fabrics; the lavish marble baths matched by thoughtful touches such as terry bathrobes and french-milled soaps. As one would expect, the staff delight in offering a highly personalized service. Desi Vega's Steakhouse is a unique New Orleans style restaurant know for its southern style food and exceptional wine.

***Pets allowed with a one time non-refundable Fee of $ 50.00, (deep cleaning fee). If the pet causes damage greater then $50.00 the guest is liable for replacement or repair.*** Must be 21 years of age to purchase a room. Children under 12 stay free with adult. $4.95 per day fee for unlimited local and long distance calls within the US. Wireless internet available in public areas only.

self parking available for $28.00 per night.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Nestled at the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains at the cross-section of two major railroads, the city was once the primary industrial center of the southern United States. At the height of the nation's manufacturing age, the city grew so fast in population, it was called the "Magic City." Today, Birmingham has transformed itself into a medical research, banking and service-based economy, making it one of the nation's most livable cities with a vibrant downtown, a burgeoning loft community, a world-class culinary scene and more green space per capita than any other city in the nation!

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites OKLAHOMA CITY SOUTHEAST - I-35
hotel.description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express and Suites Hotel in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma! The hotel is perfect for both business and leisure travelers seeking contemporary accommodations in the Oklahoma City area. Conveniently located off of Interstate 35 and South East 15th Street, the hotel is conveniently located to the downtown area. Local points of interests, like the Bricktown Entertainment District, Tinker Air Force Base, Downtown Oklahoma City, and the Oklahoma City Will Rogers Airport (OKC) are just minutes from our front door. Area businesses include Schlumberger, Devon Energy, Sandridge Oil and Gas, Baker Hughes Intl, AT&T, Raytheon, Halliburton, Delta Airlines, Dell Computers, and United Technologies. The OU Medical Center and Childrens Hospital, Saint Anthonys Hospital, and the Veterans Administration Center are 3 miles away from the hotel. The Holiday Inn Express and Suites Oklahoma City Southeast is also the perfect location for local attractions, including the Oklahoma City Thunder basketball games, Oklahoma City Redhawks Baseball, National Cowboy Hall of Fame, and the local National Softball Hall of Fame. Our hotel features 87 spacious guestrooms and suites, HDTVs, free high speed internet (wired and wireless), microwaves, refrigerators, daily complimentary full hot breakfast, business center, guest laundry, fitness center and an indoor pool and hot tub. Get a jump start with our signature cinnamon rolls and enjoy our warm, friendly hospitality as our guest at the
hotel.airportsDesc: Will Rogers World Airport, (OKC), 12.00, MI;

hotel.name: Albuquerque Marriott Pyramid North
hotel.description: Discover Albuquerque Marriott Pyramid North, one of the most outstanding hotels in Albuquerque, NM. Our business-friendly hotel's spacious guest rooms and suites in North Albuquerque provide the perfect blend of comfort, luxury and functionality with plush beds, high-speed Internet and executive desks. You will find that our prime location near I-25 in the Journal Center Business Complex, just minutes from Historic Old Town and the Albuquerque airport, is ideal for both corporate and leisure travelers. Premier amenities include a business center, fitness room, and a connected indoor and outdoor pool. In addition, our hotel's Albuquerque, New Mexico, event area totals 27,000 square feet of flexible indoor and outdoor meeting space. Enjoy spacious seating for up to 1,800 guests of large weddings or business conferences. Guests looking for delectable dining can experience the unique flavors at our North Albuquerque hotel's restaurant, Sandia Grill. Or, stop in for a late-night cocktail at High Desert Lounge.

hotel.name: The Westin Pasadena
hotel.description:
In the heart of one of Californias most exciting cities, The Westin Pasadena boasts easy access to such cultural activities as the historic old town, museums, and restaurants. Visiting for business? Were also only a short distance from the Pasadena Conference Center.
Relax in contemporary comfort at The Westin Pasadena. Our library is an excellent place to reflect, and our seasonal outdoor heated rooftop pool has beautiful views. With your kids playing in our full-service Westin Kids Club, youll have a moment to focus on yourself. Pick up one of our running maps from Runners World, which have suggested 3- and 5-mile runs.
Our signature Heavenly Bed®, with pillow-top mattress, is standard in every room. Try out our new WestinWORKOUT® room and exercise in the privacy of your own room with guided DVDs and equipment.

hotel.name: M Resort Spa Casino
hotel.description:
** No Resort Fees! ** M Resort Spa Casino offers a distinctly different resort experience. Our goal is to satisfy guests' individual needs by infusing an impeccable service standard coupled with upscale accommodations, global cuisine choices, a world-class spa and salon, unmatched meeting and conference facilities and the latest casino games. Situated on over 90 acres and higher in elevation than other resort-casinos on the Las Vegas Strip the M Resort provides optimal views of the world-famous Las Vegas skyline from its guest rooms, suites, conference center and restaurants.

M Resort Spa Casino received TripAdvisor Travelers' Choice 2010 Winner "Relaxation & Spa" - the only hotel in Las Vegas to receive this prestigious award. M Resort has also been awarded the Forbes Travel Guide "Four Star Award" for 2011, the second year in a row. In 2010, we were one of the few hotels to ever receive this award within the first year of operation!

Enjoy a variety of dining and drinking options, including Hostile Grape, Marinelli's, Anthony's and Studio B. Check out the brand new Hash House A Go Go, and the newly expanded Vig Deli and 32 Degrees Draft Bar!

As of October 14th, 2013 the pools at M resort are now closed for the season

Wireless internet access is available in guest rooms for $14.99 per 24 hours. Daily Spa Mio and Fitness Center access: $15 per guest. Guests must be 21 or older to check into the M Resort. PLEASE NOTE MAIN POOL IS SCHEDULED FOR CLOSURE SEPTEMBER 24,2012
