facility.desc: The Hostile Grape is the place to enjoy a glass of wine or your favorite cocktail and socialize with friends in a comfortable hip atmosphere. Sample small pours by using the cellars innovative dispensing system. Hostile Grape's new hours of operation: Thursday through Sunday 5 p.m. to 1 a.m. Hostile Grape is offering Live JAZZ Nights Thursday, Friday and Saturday night. Our underground wine cellar offers more than 160 wines by the glass.

facility.title: Baby Cakes
facility.desc: Baby Cakes offers an impressive assortment of freshly made pastries cookies gelatos variety of coffees and cakes for any occasion.

facility.title: Marinelli's
facility.desc: Marinelli's offers delicious authentic regional Italian cuisine. Menu selections include risottos pastas steaks chops and veal dishes. Marinelli's new hours of operation: 4 p.m. to 10 p.m. daily. Marinelli's features authentic and regional Italian cuisine. The restaurant offers outdoor terraces overlooking Villaggio Del Sole events piazza and the Las Vegas Strip.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Impeccable service is combined with the right facilities that offer breathtaking views from the conference center. M Resort caters to the small to mid-sized meetings and conferences with 60,000 sf. of open and dynamic spaces that include optimum customization, technology and connectivity for turn-key events.

facility.title: Resort Room
facility.desc: The 550 square feet Resort Room features a pillow top mattress and fine linens. The executive desk is spacious and practical, equipped with convenient outlets, high speed internet access ($14.99 per 24 hours) as well as a comfortable executive chair. Each room offers a living space that includes high technology features such as a BOSE Sound System, iPod docking station and 42" High Definition LCD Flat screen television. The bathroom has a marble vanity with double sinks, vanity stool, in-laid mirror television and a separate tub and shower.

facility.title: 32 Degrees Draft Bar
facility.desc: The expansion of 32 Degrees Draft Bar has been completed just in time for football season. Open 24 hours, 32 Degrees Draft Bar offers 96 of the coldest brews on tap. Among them are lagers, pilsners, ales, wheat beers, stouts and limbic ale. The bee bar also offers beer cocktails, seasonal favorites and specialty ciders.

facility.title: Vig Deli
facility.desc: Newly expanded! Vig Deli offers views of the sports book screens and walls covered with some of the greatest sporting lists from Triple Crown winners to football's elite. The Vig offers a classic menu of made-to-order deli favorites including the Club Sandwich, Philly Cheesesteak, Grilled Chicken Pita Wrap and Slice of Pizza.

facility.title: Anthony's Gourmet Burgers & Brews
facility.desc: Anthony's Gourmet Burgers & Brews presents the finest varieties of burgers offering each with classic toppings and toppings with a twist like stout braised short ribs, micro greens and cranberry-blue moon orange mayonnaise. Delicious buns, homemade fries, and a hot fudge sundae will complete this grown-up burger bar experience. Must be twenty-one.

facility.title: Anthony's Prime Steak & Seafood
facility.desc: Grand Opening! Anthony's Prime Steak & Seafood offers the best aged steaks and freshest seafood in the city. The steakhouse will be a personal reflection of its namesake, Anthony A. Marnell III, to create a contemporary dining experience with an appreciation for the classics. Anthony's Prime Steak & Seafood will offer casual elegance with exceptional service. The new menu is filled with customer favorites as well as Anthony's personal selection.

facility.title: Studio B
facility.desc: Studio B integrates a state-of-the-art restaurant with a live-action cooking studio. Enjoy delicious appetizers entrees and desserts. Guests may also enjoy beer and wine selections at no additional cost.

facility.title: Hash House A Go Go
facility.desc: Hash House A Go Go brings farm-fresh food with a funky, modern twist to the visitors of M Resort. The well-known restaurant is famous for its unusual decor and enormous portions. The restaurant has garnered dozens of local and national accolades and has been featured on the Food Network, "Martha Stewart," "Rachael Ray," and most recently the popular Travel Channel program "Man v. Food." Hours of operation: 7 a.m. to 11 p.m. Sunday through Thursday and 7 a.m. to 2 a.m. Friday and Saturday.

hotel.name: Comfort Inn Midtown West
hotel.description: The Comfort Inn hotel Midtown West in New York, NY is conveniently located near several area attractions, including Times Square, Broadway, the Theater District, Empire State Building, Intrepid Sea, Air and Space Museum, and Rockefeller Center. Central Park and the 5th Avenue shopping district are also nearby. Hotel amenities include free hot breakfast and free wired and wireless high-speed Internet access. All guest rooms are nonsmoking and include coffee makers, irons and ironing boards. Hotel available for guest arrival from April 15, 2013.

hotel.name: La Jolla Cove Suites
hotel.description:
The Oceanfront family resort is located in La Jolla, San Diego's premier travel destination . Whether you prefer shopping, sight-seeing, or just enjoying the peace and tranquility of a La Jolla sunset, this romantic coastal nook remains a dreamlike escape. At La Jolla Cove Suites, 95% of the suites are oceanfront / ocean view with private balconies. The location affords some of the best panoramic ocean views in San Diego. Start your day with stunning oceanfront views and a deluxe complimentary continental breakfast served daily from 7:00 to 10:00 a.m. on the rooftop. Choose from freshly made waffles, or enjoy Danish, muffins, croissants, bagels, cereals, fresh fruit, and juices, along with coffee and tea. Use the year round chlorine free heated saltwater pool to compliment your workout or just to take a relaxing plunge. After a busy day soothe those aching muscles in a world class saltwater chlorine free spa - heated to a comfortable 101 year round. The BBQ court is located adjacent to the pool and Jacuzzi. La Jolla Cove Suites has partnered with La Jolla Sports Club, offering complimentary gym services to hotel guests. Complimentary gym services include: Complete gym access, spa, and steam room, fitness classes: yoga, conditioning and strengthening, locker rooms, towels, and private showers and 2 hour complimentary parking. Daily parking is $20.00. The hotel also offers amenities such as free breakfast.

Wireless internet access is now available in all of the guest rooms!

Please be advised, effective Monday, January 7th, 2013 the self-parking fee for guests of La Jolla Cove Suites will change to $20.00 per night

Bike rentals are now available for $15 per hour or $45 per day!
hotel.airportsDesc: The hotel are located just 13.5 miles north of San Diego International Airport.
hotel.areaServed: La Jolla, CA Greater San Diego Area

Accommodates a maximum of 4 adults and 2 children, or 6 adults ($25 nightly additional guest charge applies for the 5th and 6th adults). 700 sq. ft. Rate includes complimentary deluxe continental breakfast and free wireless internet. On-site parking available for a nominal fee.

facility.title: Brockton Villa
facility.desc: Located just a few steps away from the hotel, this oceanfront restuartant is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Hours Monday - Friday: 8:00AM - 9:00PM Saturday: 8:00AM - 9:00PM Sunday: 8:00AM - 9:00PM.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Situated near the beach in La Jolla, this hotel is close to Children's Cove, La Jolla Cove and Cuvier Park. Scripps Park is just across the street from the property as is the world famous La Jolla Cove, and the Scripps underwater marine reserve. Also nearby are Museum of Contemporary Art San Diego and Windansea Beach.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: La Jolla Cove Suites features a 12000 square foot oceanfront rooftop venue with panoramic views of La Jolla Cove, Scripps Park and the Pacific Ocean. This one of the best sunset wedding locations in San Diego. The rooftop events center accommodates groups of up to 225 persons. The enclosed conference center will comfortably seat 70 people in a theater style arrangement, 40 in a classroom seating and 30 with a conference table set-up. The executive board room comfortably accommodates 8 persons. Hotel conference rooms are equipped with full kitchens and a bar area. The hotel offers support services with necessary equipment available for a typical meeting or conference, including, podiums, tables and chairs, flip charts, writing supplies, projection equipment, catering services and refreshment stations. Given ample notice, requests for special needs may be accommodated. La Jolla Cove Suites' meeting rooms comfortably accommodate 48 persons in a theater style seating arrangement and 1.

facility.title: One Bedroom Oceanfront Suite
facility.desc: This suite has one bedroom with one new queen size Serta Perfect Sleeper bed with triple sheeting, separate living room with a sofa sleeper, kitchenette that offers a convenient way to prepare meals, flat screen TV wtih premium channels including HBO and furnished oceanfront balcony. Accommodates a maximum of 2 adults and 2 children, or 3 adults ($25 nightly additional guest charge applies for 3rd adult). 500 sq. ft. Rate includes complimentary deluxe continental breakfast and free wireless internet. On-site parking available for a nominal fee.

Stand up shower, flat screen TV that offers premium channels including HBO and table with two chairs. This room does not have a view. Accommodates a maximum of 2 adults. 200 sq. ft. Rate includes complimentary deluxe continental breakfast and free wireless internet. On-site parking available for a nominal fee.

facility.title: Oceanfront Studio Suite
facility.desc: This suite offers one new queen size Serta Perfect Sleeper bed with triple sheeting, a kitchenette that offers a convenient way to prepare meals, flat screen TV with premuim channels including HBO and furnished oceanfront balcony. Accommodates a maximum of 2 adults. 350 sq. ft. Rate includes complimentary deluxe continental breakfast and free wireless internet. On-site parking available for a nominal fee.

Large one bedroom suite with two new queen size Serta Perfect Sleeper beds with triple sheeting in the bedroom, flat screen TV with premium channels including HBO, separate living room with a sofa sleeper, dining area, full kitchen that offers a convenient way to prepare meals, and a large furnished oceanfront balcony. Accommodates a maximum of 4 adults and 2 children, or 6 adults ($25 nightly additional guest charge applies for 5th and 6th adults). 900 sq. ft. Rate includes complimentary deluxe continental breakfast and free wireless internet. On-site parking available for a nominal fee.

Large one bedroom suite with one new king size Serta Perfect Sleeper bed with triple sheeting in the bedroom, flat screen TV with premium channels including HBO, a separate living room with a sofa sleeper, full kitchen that offers a convenient way to prepare meals, dining area and a large furnished oceanfront balcony. Accommodates a maximum of 4 adults and 2 children or 6 adults ($25 nightly additional guest charge applies for 5th and 6th adults). 980 sq. ft. Rate includes complimentary deluxe continental breakfast and free wireless internet. On-site parking available for a nominal fee.

hotel.name: Boston Hotel Buckminster
hotel.description: Built in 1897, the historic Boston Hotel Buckminster was one of the first hotels built in the Boston area. The hotel was designed by renowned architect Stanford White, who also designed the Boston Public Library as well as many of the elegant Back Bay townhouses on Beacon Street. The hotel is located on the triangular intersection of Beacon Street and Brookline Avenue in Boston's Kenmore Square. Today the Boston Hotel Buckminster stands as the "Heart of Kenmore Square", offering 116 guest rooms and suites as Boston's only true Budget Hotel. The Boston Hotel Buckminster's location is second to none in the City of Boston, as it is the closest hotel to both Fenway Park and Boston University. The hotel serves visitors to the Back Bay and Downtown Boston areas year round and provides easy access to the Kenmore Station on Boston's Subway System and is within a short walk to the vast majority of Boston's attractions. Parking is available for a fee.
hotel.airportsDesc: Boston Logan International Airport (BOS).

facility.desc: These Standard Guest rooms include 2 Queen beds, a comfortable sitting area, marble bathroom,work desk, voicemail, microwave, and refrigerator.

facility.title: Fenway American Bistro
facility.desc: Featuring American dishes with regional New England cuisine, using use local crafted or farmed items to offer the freshest ingredients possible. Offering appetizers, sandwiches, the freshest fish and burgers, Maine lobster sliders, Boston cream pie, to a great steak " something for everyone. Our wines list features up and coming wines, and the beer list boasts some of the best New England brews and of course fan favorites. The atmosphere is both casual and relaxing for sport fans, after work get-togethers, and neighborhood dining. Located in historic part of Boston, across from Fenway Park, the restaurant is decorated in rich tones of amber and blue. Pictures of historic Boston abound with a nod to old time baseball. Kitchen open 6:30am " 11pm with the Bar opened until 12am. Breakfast is served 6:30am-10:30am Monday " Friday. Saturday and Sunday 6:30am " 12pm

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Heart of Kenmore Square next to Fenway Park and Boston University.Boston Hotel Buckminster is conveniently located within walking distance (or a short 'T' ride) of all the city's major sites and attractions, and only a two minute walk to the Kenmore T Station on the Green Line.

hotel.name: Isle of Palms & Wild Dunes by Wyndham Vacation Rentals
hotel.description: Bordered by the Atlantic Ocean and the Intracoastal Waterway, featuring broad sandy beaches and breathtaking ocean views, lively shops and restaurants, and a full-service marina, the Isle of Palms offers endless recreation options. Discover the island charm on foot or by bike, or rent a boat and explore the coastal waters. Enjoy a couple of sets of tennis or a round of golf, charter a fishing trip or try your hand at sailing.Within a short ride, guests can visit historic Boone Hall Plantation, take pleasure in wonderful shopping and dining at the Mount Pleasant Towne Center, watch the shrimp boats come in on Shem Creek, or show your patriotism at the Patriots Point Naval and Maritime Museum. Downtown Charleston offers shopping, dining, art, music and theatre only 30 minutes from the Isle of Palms.Our comfortable villas are between 25 and 50 yards from the beach, and offer a respite for guests looking to lose themselves in the wheel of pelicans and seagulls above the shore, the rush of the waves lapping against the sand, and the scent of the sea brought in on ocean breezes. Properties are located both on the Isle of Palms and inside Wild Dunes.All properties offer completely furnished living and dining areas, fully equipped kitchens- including cookware, silverware and dishes. Amenities include a cable TV and DVD player, telephone, microwave, and central heating and air conditioning. All linens except beach towels are provided and, in most properties, a washer/dryer. Bedding varies, but most properties have a queen bed in the master and either 2 twin beds or a queen bed in subsequent bedrooms. Please note that check-in is not guaranteed before 4PM and there may be times when your access is unavoidably delayed. Check-in is located at Ocean Park Plaza, 1400 Palm Blvd, Ste N, in the Isle of Palms. The office is open 9am-5pm. Guests arriving after 5 pm should contact ResortQuest to set up a lock box for after-hours check-in.
hotel.airportsDesc: CHS

hotel.name: Surfside Oceanfront Inn and Suites
hotel.description: Welcome to one of Virginia Beachâ€™s finest vacation destinations, located on 12th Street and situated on the glistening Atlantic Ocean. Our team is committed to creating a vacation experience based on a foundation of customer care that nurtures and develops lasting relationships. We offer all oceanfront rooms with your choice of two queen-size beds, single beds, or relax in our two-room suites featuring a family room with a breakfast bar and Jacuzzi tub. All of our rooms come with a private oceanfront balcony, free WiFi, 39â€ LCD TV, DVD player, microwave, coffee maker, refrigerator, hair dryer, safe, iron and ironing board. We offer complimentary deluxe continental breakfast featuring fresh Belgian waffles and complimentary coffee and juice 24 hours a day. Also, seasonally heated indoor pool with kiddie pool, fitness room, guest coin-operated laundry facilities, and free on-site parking for one vehicle up to 6â€™2â€. Our hotel also features meeting and banquet facilities. On-site amenities include a restaurant and gift & convenience shop with bike rentals. We are located within minutes of the Virginia Aquarium, Ocean Breeze Water Park, the Virginia Beach Convention Center, Motor World and a short drive away from Busch Gardens.

hotel.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New York City - Chelsea
hotel.description: The DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New York City - Chelsea welcomes you with a peaceful ambiance after a busy day of sightseeing or business. Our location in Chelsea, a secluded residential neighborhood featuring eclectic shops, restaurants and galleries, makes this property a convenient midtown Manhattan hotel.Walk from our DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel to New York City landmarks, such as Penn Station, Madison Square Garden, the Jacob K. Javits Convention Center, the Empire State Building, and the Broadway Theater District, as well as many other midtown Manhattan attractions. The hotel’s close proximity to Fifth Avenue designer boutiques, Central Park trails and landmarks, world-renowned museums, and performing arts venues gives you more time to explore the city. If you’re here on business, the Financial District, Wall Street, and major corporations can be quickly accessed by foot, taxi, or subway.Our 26-story hotel features a sleek, modern design in a warm color palette. Retreat from the vibrant city to rest and relax in a guest room or junior suite. Rely on the business center for the support services you need when away from your office. Savor American cuisine or sip a cocktail at Chelton’s Bar and Grill before going to a Broadway show or a Madison Square Garden event. Maintain your exercise routine in our fully equipped fitness center.The DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New York City - Chelsea offers a tranquil retreat in the heart of midtown Manh

hotel.name: Belmond Charleston Place
hotel.description:
One of the finest hotels in Charleston, South Carolina. Located in the heart of Charlestons historic downtown, Belmond Charleston Place offers unparalleled luxury accommodations including beautifully appointed rooms and suites, award winning dining at the Palmetto Cafe and Charleston Grill restaurants, and a full-service Spa with rooftop indoor outdoor pool and Jacuzzi.

Belmond Charleston Place has extensive facilities including a business center, two award winning restaurants, bar and lounge, live entertainment, more than 30 luxury shops in the adjacent Shops at Charleston Place, meeting and banquet facilities for up to 1,700 people, full service European spa, fully-equipped health club with sauna, steam bath and Jacuzzi, indoor/outdoor heated swimming pool with retractable glass roof, childrens splash pool and 24-hour room service. The hotel is A.D.A. compliant and offers 22 specially-equipped rooms for the physically challenged. The top two floors of the hotel are club accommodations, offering private concierge service, all day complimentary beverage service including continental breakfast, afternoon tea, evening cocktails and hors d*oeuvres plus after dinner cordials with desserts. All 435 guest rooms and suites offer marble bathrooms, work desk, complimentary high-speed internet service, dataport, 2-line did phones, voice mail, hair-dryer, plush robes, individual climate control, iron and ironing board and black-out drapes.
hotel.airportsDesc: Charleston International Airport is located 12 miles from Charleston Place Hotel and offers service from US Airways, Delta, JetBlue, Southwest, United and US Airways.
hotel.areaServed: A perfect blend of 18th century style and 21st century comfort, Belmond Charleston Place is situated in the heart of Charleston, South Carolina, one of America's oldest cities.

One of the finest hotels in Charleston, South Carolina. Located in the heart of Charlestons historic downtown, Belmond Charleston Place offers unparalleled luxury accommodations including beautifully appointed rooms and suites, award winning dining at the Palmetto Cafe and Charleston Grill restaurants, and a full-service Spa with rooftop indoor outdoor pool and Jacuzzi.

Belmond Charleston Place has extensive facilities including a business center, two award winning restaurants, bar and lounge, live entertainment, more than 30 luxury shops in the adjacent Shops at Charleston Place, meeting and banquet facilities for up to 1,700 people, full service European spa, fully-equipped health club with sauna, steam bath and Jacuzzi, indoor/outdoor heated swimming pool with retractable glass roof, childrens splash pool and 24-hour room service. The hotel is A.D.A. compliant and offers 22 specially-equipped rooms for the physically challenged. The top two floors of the hotel are club accommodations, offering private concierge service, all day complimentary beverage service including continental breakfast, afternoon tea, evening cocktails and hors d*oeuvres plus after dinner cordials with desserts. All 435 guest rooms and suites offer marble bathrooms, work desk, complimentary high-speed internet service, dataport, 2-line did phones, voice mail, hair-dryer, plush robes, individual climate control, iron and ironing board and black-out drapes.

facility.title: Deluxe Level Room
facility.desc: Deluxe Rooms feature Charleston-inspired design and classic furniture, complimentary wireless Internet access and on-demand HD movies. Bathrooms feature Italian marble and brass fixtures - most feature double-vanity sinks. Bedding options include a choice of one king or two double beds based on availability at time of arrival

facility.title: Premier Rooms
facility.desc: Premier Rooms the recently redesigned Premier Rooms inspired by Charlestons traditional past and vibrant present are equipped with modern luxuries including a 42-inch flat screen television, mini-refrigerator, master controlled lighting, bedside reading lights, complimentary wireless Internet access and on-demand HD movies. Bathrooms feature marble vanities with ample storage and walk-in tiled showers. Bedding options include a choice of one king or two double beds based on availability at time of arrival.

facility.title: Charleston Grill
facility.desc: The experience of dining in the Charleston Grill is something that will shine as a bright star amidst the Southern elegance and refinement of Charleston itself. Reward yourself with an evening of highly creative and uniquely presented cuisine served flawlessly by skilled and knowledgeable staff. Relax in the warm and intimate ambiance created by mahogany panelling, hand stenciled hardwood flooring, and the soft sounds of the live jazz trio. From light and simple to rich and indulgent. The menu at Charleston Grill promises an incredible dining experience for everyone. Our menu at the Charleston Grill is based on the idea of four categories or "Quadrants": Lush, Pure, Cosmopolitan and Southern. Seven days a week, the lounge area (serving appetizers and desserts) opens at 5:00pm.

facility.title: Thoroughbred Club
facility.desc: Conveniently located adjacent the grand staircase, the Thoroughbred Club is open seven days a week. Live entertainment is enjoyed 1pm -11pm Monday - Saturday, and 5pm - 10pm on Sunday.

facility.title: In-room Dining
facility.desc: Dining or entertaining in the privacy of your room or at the spa is just a phone call away. We offer twenty-four hour service... breakfast, lunch, dinner or snacks; catering for private parties in your suite; and picnic lunches for your excursions to the beach or countryside. On your day of departure, consider our gourmet cuisine to go.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The Charleston area is located on the coast of South Carolina, midway between Myrtle Beach and Hilton Head Island. It is easily accessible by car. I-26 has its eastern terminus in Charleston and connects with I-20, I-85, I-40, I-77 and I-95 from the north. US Highway 17m the coastal north-south route, runs through Charleston and connects with I-95 from the south.

facility.title: Junior Suite
facility.desc: Junior Suites feature a spacious room with Charleston-inspired design and classic furniture including a king bed, an offset living area with an additional 32-inch TV - large couch with sofa bed and easy chairs surrounding a coffee table. Junior suites include complimentary wireless Internet access and on-demand HD movies. The spacious bathroom is enhanced with Italian marble and brass fixtures. Many Junior Suites connect to a Deluxe Double Room.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: We offer the ultimate in flexible meeting space, with a total of 22,000 square feet within the hotel, including the Grand Ballroom (14,000+ square feet), The Riviera Theatre, a national historic landmark, ten more function rooms, six hospitality suites, the Grand Hall and several other outdoor courtyards.

facility.title: Concierge Club Level Double
facility.desc: The Club Level is available by private access only and is located on the top two floors of the hotel offering the best views of Charleston - dedicated staff and full food and beverage service including extensive breakfast, afternoon tea, evening hors doeuvres and bar selection followed by nightly cordials and desserts. Club Double rooms feature two double beds, Charleston-inspired design and classic furniture, complimentary wireless Internet access and on-demand HD movies. Bathrooms feature Italian marble and brass fixtures - most feature double-vanity sinks.

facility.title: Concierge Club Level King
facility.desc: The Club Level is available by private access only and is located on the top two floors of the hotel offering the best views of Charleston - dedicated staff and full food and beverage service including extensive breakfast, afternoon tea, evening hors doeuvres and bar selection followed by nightly cordials and desserts. Club King Rooms feature a king bed, Charleston-inspired design and classic furniture, complimentary wireless Internet access and on-demand HD movies. Bathrooms feature Italian marble and brass fixtures - most feature double-vanity sinks.

facility.title: Palmetto Cafe
facility.desc: The Palmetto Cafe epitomizes the wonderful Charleston juxtaposition of lazy tranquillity with cosmopolitan glamour. This casual elegant restaurant overlooks a lush courtyard complete with circular bronze fountain and impeccably kept gardens. It is proudly recognized as the only 4 diamond breakfast and lunch restaurant in the city. Saturday and Sunday Brunch should not be missed with gourmet omelets, Belgian waffles, and fresh seafood available.

hotel.name: Embassy Suites Niagara Falls - Fallsview
hotel.description: Welcome to the Embassy Suites Niagara Falls-Fallsview hotel, located beside Niagara Falls. Be astounded by spectacular views from the huge windows in our two-room suites overlooking this beautiful landmark. Expect an unforgettable stay at our modern hotel with excellent service, a friendly multi-lingual staff, and more space for family and work in our two-room suites. Our Ontario, Canada hotel is only 40 minutes from Greater Buffalo International Airport. Expect a private bedroom and separate living room, a refrigerator, microwave, WiFi and two televisions with cable channels and in-suite movies. Executive suites at this Niagara Falls, Canada hotel have full views of the Falls and a full-sized sofa bed. Plan your wedding or business event in our 10,000 sq. ft. event space with the stunning Niagara Falls as your backdrop. Conference rooms include A/V components and interconnecting screens with simultaneous display LCD projectors. Work in our complimentary 24-hour BusinessLink™ business center with WiFi and mobile printing. Relish a daily complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and our complimentary Evening Reception* that includes two alcoholic drinks and snacks. Enjoy a meal onsite at the Keg Steakhouse & Bar overlooking the Falls, or sample delicious desserts in T.G.I. Friday's. Exercise in the complimentary fitness center at our Niagara Falls, Canada hotel, and unwind in our indoor pool, whirlpool and video arcade. * Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age

hotel.name: Motif Seattle
hotel.description: Motif Seattle a is distinctly different and unique hotel located within downtown Seattle featuring the best shopping, theaters and cultural attractions on the West Coast. Whether you're in town on business or pleasure, the impeccable service and casual northwest flair will make your stay comfortable in Seattle. The hotel is noted for its exemplary level of service and sophisticated atmosphere, with amenities to satisfy both business and leisure travelers. The 319 smoke-free guest rooms offer stunning views of Elliott Bay and the city. They feature, new beds with Sealy plush pillow-top mattresses, terry bathrobes, telephone data-ports, Keurig Coffee Machines and refrigerators. On-site services include an award-winning concierge and bell staff, free wi-fi, a business center and a fitness center. The hotel also features two restaurants, the fifth floor Frolik Kitchen+Cocktails, including downtown Seattle's largest outdoor dining deck and seasonal summer entertainment on the patio, and Elephant & Castle British Restaurant & Pub. Motif Seattle is walking distance to Seattle's cultural, business and shopping attractions, including the ornate 5th Avenue Theatre and the classic Paramount Theatre, the famous Pike Place Market (with the world's first Starbucks coffee house), the Washington Convention & Trade Center and over 10 million square feet of retail shopping including Macy's Northwest and Nordstrom flagship stores. The Monorail to the Seattle Center's Space Needle and the Experience Music Project (EMP) is just steps away. The Benaroya Hall and Seattle Art Museum are a few blocks away from the hotel. The hotel is also positioned for convenient Fifth Avenue access to Qwest Field, home of Seattle Seahawks football, Safeco Field, home of Seattle Mariners baseball, and Seattle Storm basketball. The hotel is one mile from Seattle University, 6 miles from the University of Washington and its Medical Center and 6 miles from the campus of Seattle Pacific University. Motif Seattle is a full-service convention hotel with 15,000 square feet of newly renovated, flexible meeting and banquet space. This hotel can accommodate up to 600 guests for your next conference or special occasion. *Secure, underground parking is available for a nightly fee of USD $39.04/vehicle. Please note that garage clearance is 6'2". The hotel has a no smoking policy.
hotel.airportsDesc: Sea-Tac Airport (SEA).

The eleven meeting rooms include 10 breakouts and the Emerald Ballroom, which can accommodate up to 600 people in a theater format. Professional conference specialists are on-site to take care of all your needs, including audio/visual equipment and full-service catering.

Features a Sealy Stay Comfortable plush pillowtop bed, with views of Elliot Bay, Puget Sound, and the Olympic Mountains. Amenities include free wireless Internet access, 37" Flat Panel TV, Essential Elements bath amenities, refrigerator,Keurig Coffee Machines, work desk and chair, iHome docking station, iron, ironing board, hairdryer, robes and Satellite TV offered.

facility.title: Deluxe - Queen

Features Sealy Stay Comfortable plush pillowtop beds, with views of Elliot Bay, Puget Sound, and the Olympic Mountains. Amenities include free wireless Internet access, 37" Flat Panel TV, Essential Elements bath amenities, refrigerator, Keurig Coffee Machines, work desk and chair, iHome docking station, iron, ironing board, hairdryer, robes and Premium Cable or Satellite TV offered.

facility.desc: Standard King offers one king bed. Tower King Non Smoking. 350 square feet. Features Sealy Stay Comfortable plush pillowtop beds, with city skyline views. Amenities include free wireless Internet access, Essential Elements bath amenities, refrigerator, Keurig Coffee Machines, work desk and chair, data ports, alarm clock/radio, iron, ironing board, hairdryer and Premium Cable or Satellite TV.

facility.title: Standard - Queen
facility.desc: Standard Queen offers two queen beds. Standard Two Queen Non Smoking. 350 square feet. Features Sealy Stay Comfortable plush pillowtop beds, with city skyline views. Amenities include free wireless Internet access, 37" Flat Panel TV, Essential Elements bath amenities, refrigerator, Keurig Coffee Machines, work desk and chair, iHome docking station, iron, ironing board, hairdryer, robes and Premium Cable or Satellite TV offered.

Amenities include free wireless Internet access, 37" Flat Panel TV, work desk and chair, iHome docking station, Keurig Coffee Machines, iron, ironing board, hairdryer, robes, and Satellite TV offered. ADA features include bathroom handrails, handheld showerhead, lever handles, lowered peepholes, Braille room numbers, TTY and TDD kits available as well as shower chairs.

facility.title: Frolik Kitchen+Cocktails
facility.desc:
A unique venue with a contemporary, urban feel, relaxing space embodying the downtown Seattle vibe.
Breakfast 6:00AM - 10:00AM Lunch 11:00AM - 4:00PM Dinner 5:00PM - 10:00PM
Room Service 7:00AM - 10:00PM

facility.title: Elephant & Castle Pub
facility.desc: For a casual lunch or late night dinner, visit the Elephant & Castle Pub with outside entry from the lower level of the Hotel. Cozy up to the fireplace or relax on the patio and let the authentic English cuisine tease your taste buds.

hotel.name: Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea
hotel.description:
The industrial chic Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea is located in Manhattan's fashionable Chelsea district, known for its galleries, eclectic nightlife, outstanding restaurants, and shopping.
Our superb Manhattan location is ideal for both the business and leisure traveler. Our hotel is easily accessible from Penn Station, Madison Square Garden, Times Square, and the Theatre and Garment Districts. The Toy Building, Hewlett Packard, Viacom, GE Capital, Sony, and Verizon are all nearby as well.
Welcome to Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea - in the heart of New York City!

hotel.name: Sanctuary on Camelback Mountain
hotel.description:
Situated on 53 acres, high above the valley, Sanctuary on Camelback Mountain recalls the era when the finest resorts were elegant and intimate. Sanctuary on Camelback Mountain offers its guests unparalleled privacy and peace. Every aspect of the property blends into the ageless mountain setting, yet guests enjoy the most modern of pleasures and conveniences.

Sanctuary on Camelback Mountain provides a unique resort experience, offering stunning, panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and valley below. Terraced high on Camelback Mountain, this tranquil setting is secluded, yet close to upscale shopping, dining and world-class golf. The Sanctuary Spa provides a relaxed, luxurious retreat with an Asian-inspired design and philosophy includes indoor and outdoor treatment rooms, a fitness center with a movement studio, meditation garden, a therapeutic Watsu pool and a shaded, outdoor lap pool. The resort also offers Arizona's largest infinity-edge resort pool, six newly resurfaced tennis courts and hiking and biking trails. Sanctuary was recognized as "Top Resort in the United States", "27 World's Best of the Best" Readers' Choice Awards, 2006.

A daily Resort Fee of $14.00/night plus tax will apply per room, to be paid directly to the property upon check-out. This fee includes access to the spa facilities. To ensure you are able to take advantage of our spa services, please book your spa treatments two weeks prior to your stay. Please note: Summer Pool Policy - Effective Friday, June 6th through Sunday, September 1st, Sanctuary Camelback Mountains infinity edge pool is exclusively adult-only on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays. Guests must be at least 16 years or older to gain access. The resort provides two satellite pools on property as an alternative for guests travelling with family members 15 years and younger.
hotel.airportsDesc: Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport

facility.title: Mountain Vista Casita
facility.desc: Feature great views of Camelback Mountain and Paradise Valley. Spectacular contemporary design with unique wood block flooring, glass-tiled dry bar. The casitas offer 500 sq.ft. including a luxurious bath with travertine marble shower and separate oversized bathtub.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Terraced high on Camelback Mountain, this tranquil setting is secluded, yet close to upscale shopping, dining and world-class golf.

facility.title: Elements
facility.desc: Watching the light of sunset on Camelback Mountain during dinner at elements restaurant is one of the most popular pleasures at Sanctuary Camelback Mountain Resort and Spa in Paradise Valley, Arizona. With a menu as inspiring as the stunning location, elements restaurants features farm-fresh American cuisine with Asian accents. The menu changes monthly to reflect the seasonal harvests and always includes innovative ideas from Iron Chef America winner Executive Chef Beau MacMillan.

facility.title: Jade Bar
facility.desc: Drink the view from jade bar. Adjacent to elements, jade bar's intimate setting and secluded outdoor patio are ideal for sipping martinis. Choose from an extensive selection of wines by the glass and innovative cocktails. Then enjoy the full elements menu, which is also available for dining at the bar and in the lounge.

facility.title: Mountain Vista Suite
facility.desc: These 1000 sq ft suites feature breathtaking views of Camelback Mountain and Paradise Valley. Striking contemporary design with unique wood block flooring. The living-dining area features sleek yet comfortable furniture, a large, high def flat-screen tv, kitchen alcove with limestone dining table and wood burning fireplace. Enjoy the panoramic views from the spacious balcony. Guests also enjoy a spacious bath with separate travertine marble shower and oversized bathtub.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: Health club, business center, handicapped access, restaurant, pool, room service, pets allowed, concierge and indoor/outdoor spa. Pool will be closed for renovations August 24-Aug 29,2008

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim at Disneyland Resort
hotel.description:
Anaheim's newest Marriott Disneyland Hotel. Located four blocks from the Disneyland Parks. This Anaheim Hotel is the perfect choice when visiting Orange County, CA. When location is important, this Anaheim Hotel is just minutes from Downtown Disney, Anaheim Angels Stadium, Crystal Cathedral, the Honda Center, Knott's Berry Farm, Soak City.

Brand New Lobby features:

TRAVELERS At our new Courtyard hotel you'll enjoy a refreshing service experience beginning with our barrier-free welcome pedestals, which invite a warm and natural interaction between guests and staff_ . You'll also feel connected to the area with up-to-date local information, weather and maps provided by our interactive GoBoard. Refuel any time of the day with a variety of food and beverage options at The Market; open 24/7 you can pick up and charge items to your room. Plus, count on The Market to conveniently stock amenities that you may have forgotten to pack like toothpaste, aspirin and even hairspray. You will have 100% control of your entertainment experience when you slip into one of our semi-private media pods. Whether your little one needs to watch cartoons while eating breakfast or you have a favorite can't-miss program, your own personal 20-inch HDTV with remote is the perfect solution.

Bistro- Eat. Drink. Connect

Our new Bistro restaurant helps you start your day with freshly brewed Starbucks coffee and a variety of healthy and hearty food options. The Bistro gives you the option to choose from a variety of light items and meals that you can order to grab-and-go or sit and enjoy a leisurely meal in one of the lobby's comfortable seating areas or communal tables. Join us daily from 5pm-7pm for happy hour menu items. We proudly serve" Starbucks Coffee all day at the BISTRO You will find it easy to stay connected with home and work because our business center features complimentary computer stations with free Internet access. Enjoy the convenience of printing directions to local attractions and getting a jump on your travel day by printing your boarding pass on our new boarding pass printers. If you exercise for a rejuvenating experience, our well-equipped fitness room features state-of-the-art cardio theater exercise equipment with built-in LCD monitors. You can also maintain your fitness routine using free weights, exercise mats or our pool. Bistro Open for breakfast and dinner.

If attending a conference, the Anaheim Convention Center is only a block away. Unique rooms comfortably accommodate business and leisure travelers alike with spacious deluxe rooms and our family-friendly kids suites.

Guests take advantage of unique amenities such as a business center, 24-hour market, workout room and complimentary wireless high speed Internet hotel wide. The Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) shuttle operated by the City of Anaheim has pickup locations nearby. A $4 per person/per day ticket allows unlimited round trip passage around the Resort area.

Overnight parking is available for $14/night plus tax per vehicle.

Please Note - All rates at this hotel include complimentary in-room high speed Internet access.

Renovation complete! Brand new rooms.
hotel.airportsDesc: Orange County/John Wayne, (SNA), 14.00, N, Mile; LA/Ontario International Airport, (ONT), 33.00, NW, Mile; Los Angeles, (LAX), 34.00, SE, Mile

You will have 100% control of your entertainment experience when you slip into one of our semi-private media pods. Whether your little one needs to watch cartoons while eating breakfast or you have a favorite can't-miss program, your own personal 20-inch HDTV with remote is the perfect solution.

Bistro- Eat. Drink. Connect

Our new Bistro restaurant helps you start your day with freshly brewed Starbucks coffee and a variety of healthy and hearty food options. The Bistro gives you the option to choose from a variety of light items and meals that you can order to grab-and-go or sit and enjoy a leisurely meal in one of the lobby's comfortable seating areas or communal tables. Join us daily from 5pm-7pm for happy hour menu items. We proudly serve" Starbucks Coffee all day at the BISTRO You will find it easy to stay connected with home and work because our business center features complimentary computer stations with free Internet access. Enjoy the convenience of printing directions to local attractions and getting a jump on your travel day by printing your boarding pass on our new boarding pass printers. If you exercise for a rejuvenating experience, our well-equipped fitness room features state-of-the-art cardio theater exercise equipment with built-in LCD monitors. You can also maintain your fitness routine using free weights, exercise mats or our pool. Bistro Open for breakfast and dinner.

If attending a conference, the Anaheim Convention Center is only a block away. Unique rooms comfortably accommodate business and leisure travelers alike with spacious deluxe rooms and our family-friendly kids suites.

Guests take advantage of unique amenities such as a business center, 24-hour market, workout room and complimentary wireless high speed Internet hotel wide. The Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) shuttle operated by the City of Anaheim has pickup locations nearby. A $4 per person/per day ticket allows unlimited round trip passage around the Resort area.

Overnight parking is available for $14/night plus tax per vehicle.

Please Note - All rates at this hotel include complimentary in-room high speed Internet access.

Renovation complete! Brand new rooms.

hotel.name: Aston MonteLago Village Resort
hotel.description:
MonteLago Village Resort is a one-of-a-kind luxury resort just 17 miles from the Las Vegas strip. Set among the desert mountains of Nevada on the shore of sparkling Lake Las Vegas, this Mediterranean-themed village offers exquisite shopping and dining and access to championship golf and lakeside recreation of Lake Las Vegas Resort - plus complimentary shuttle to The Strip!

MonteLago Village Resort offers two lodging locations; Viera and Luna Di Lusso.

Viera keeps relaxation and refinement close at heart, located in our beautiful Mediterranean-style village; just outside your door you can easily wander down a cobblestone street where the pace is slow and leisurely.

Luna Di Lusso is just across the Pontevecchio Bridge, situated on a lakefront plateau near the Nicklaus-designed Reflection Bay Golf Club. Luna di Lusso provides inspiring views of MonteLago Village across Lake Las Vegas.

Aston MonteLago Village Resort implements a Resort fee of $23 plus tax daily per room, to be collected directly by the property. The Resort Fee covers: High Speed Internet access in all rooms and free wireless internet in both lobbies, Business Services provided by the Front Desk, Inter-resort shuttle services, Secured garage parking, Fishing permits for Lake Las Vegas, preferred golf rates at the semi-private South Shore Golf Club or Tuscany Golf Club, and USA Today in the lobby; plus, show your room key at participating Village Shops and Restaurants for a 10% discount.
hotel.airportsDesc: McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas - 17 miles.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN Seaside Inn-St. Augustine Beach
hotel.description:
Welcome to BEST WESTERN Seaside Inn-St. Augustine Beach! Saint Augustine Beach hotels put guest's steps away from the sandy beaches and beautiful surf to make for a memorable getaway.
This Saint Augustine Beach hotel is close to the beaches, but also sets the bar high when it comes to customer service. Each guest is treated like family, from the warm welcome to the staff members who act as local ambassadors and are always on hand with tips and recommendations. Brand name recognition might be what catches the eye of many travelers, but it's the special touches like pillow top mattresses and the sound of the ocean nearby that makes staying at the BEST WESTERN Seaside Inn-St. Augustine Beach so special.
Close to the University of St. Augustine, our property is a favorite with visiting professors, academics, students and their families. Whether you're here for a day or an academic year, there's plenty to do close by. Visit the Zoological Park and Alligator Farm, the perfect trip for an adventurous family. The Castillo de San Marco and Marineland are also in the neighborhood, and there's nothing like a day of exploring the natural beauty of the region to instill a little romance into a couple's getaway.
Hotels in Saint Augustine Beach provide plenty of charm and accessibility to some great local fare. Dine in one of the local restaurants and try out some truly fresh dishes. Business travelers with Northrop Grumman and Luhrs Mainship take advantage of the prime location of our Saint Augustine Beach hotel, with fast commutes making it easy to transition from meetings to happy hour. Medical tourists and healthcare professionals in town for Flagler Hospital enjoy the homey atmosphere of our hotel and favor the property for extended stays.
Book your next stay at BEST WESTERN Seaside Inn-St. Augustine Beach for the best rates!

hotel.name: Carvi Hotel New York
hotel.description:
Located within Manhattan's sophisticated Midtown East Side neighborhood in the heart of New York City is the stunning Carvi Hotel. Contemporary accents and, state of the art amenities are hallmarks of this modern boutique hotel. Comfort, style and personalized service exceed the expectations of the most savvy traveler. The elegant and comfortably appointed lobby welcomes guests to the intimate, comfortable setting of the Carvi Hotel. This quaint boutique hotel is uniquely designed to provide guests with the experience of living in an exclusive Manhattan neighborhood with all of the amenities and services of a luxurious hotel. Guest rooms are decorated with a modern elegance and are filled with an abundance of amenities to make a stay with the hotel as close to home as possible.
Children up to 5 year's old stay free with existing bedding. Rollaway beds available upon request at extra charge.
hotel.airportsDesc: JFK Airport about 45 minutes & LaGuardia Airport around 35 minutes. Transportation by TAXY, SUBWAY and AIRPORT SHUTTLES.

facility.desc: The hotel is adjacent to famed Rockefeller Center and within close proximity to Times Square, Broadway Theaters, Lincoln Center, Central Park, Fifth Avenue and the United Nations. Guests of the Carvi Hotel have immediate access to world-class restaurants and shopping, as well as a variety of museums and entertainment options.

facility.title: Executive Queen
facility.desc: The luxurious rooms are designed with a European motif consisting of one Queen size bed, dressed with 100% Egyptian white cotton linens, 350 thread count. In addition, the hotel also offer complimentary Wi-Fi high speed internet access throughout the entire hotel, flat screen HD-TV with 150 channels and iPod docks. In room mini-bar contains a variety of snack and beverage options. In room safety box for laptop. Finally, all the Carvi bathrooms feature beautiful Portuguese marble, delux amenities, and 100% combed cotton robes.

hotel.name: W Dallas - Victory
hotel.description:
Famed Texas hospitality meets W style in Victory Park, near Downtown, Uptown, Turtle Creek, the high-style Design District, and the citys nightspots. W Dallas - Victory is also just minutes from visionary museums and popular festival sites.
Savor modern American gastropub fare at Cook Hall, mix and mingle in the Living Room, workout at FIT, de-stress at Bliss® Spa or splash at WET®, our outdoor infinity pool. Host a dynamic bash in our re-energized event venue, Altitude.
Revel in one of our sleek guest rooms and suites, fresh off a multimillion-dollar renovation. Traditional Texas accents juxtapose with glitzy décor amid rainforest showerheads, plasma TVs, W signature beds and the lemon + sage Bliss® Sinkside Six.

hotel.name: Shorebreak Hotel, a Joie de Vivre Boutique Hotel
hotel.description:
Shorebreak is a new boutique lifestyle beachfront hotel in Downtown Huntington Beach, centrally located along the alluring California coastline in the original Surf City USA. Upscale tranquility blends with luxury in a uniquely crafted Orange County getaway.

The ultimate Southern California beach experience with a contemporary twist, Shorebreak combines the relaxed, sun-drenched spirit of the Orange County coastline with edgy modern accents. The only hotel located near the iconic intersection of Main Street and Pacific Coast Highway, Shorebreak situates you at the center of eclectic shopping, dining, and entertainment all within earshot of crashing ocean waves.

The property is a showcase of modern hotel design at the cusp of lifestyle trends. Shorebreak Hotel draws its inspiration from Southern California's cultivated yet laid-back surf culture, combining four-star touches with a penchant for fun. Highlights include guestrooms with ocean views, exquisite furnishings, versatile event space, romantic fire pits and ready access to a variety of exciting recreational activities. Shorebreak's Zimzala Restaurant and Bar is a popular attraction for locals and visitors, offering American Favorites with an emphasis on fresh seafood, surf-inspired dcor, and free-spirited good times. Envisioned as a fusion of urban sophistication and beach ambiance, Shorebreak Hotel sets a new standard.

From location to design, amenities to service, every detail at Shorebreak Hotel works in harmony to support the greater whole: an uncompromising Southern California surfside experience that offers equal parts excitement and inspiration. At Shorebreak Hotel, you will never miss a beat with onsite fitness facilities featuring a yoga studio, high speed Wi-Fi, business center, and technology butler. When work is done, enjoy our complimentary wine hour, evening story-telling.
hotel.airportsDesc: Orange County (SNA) - 13.00 Miles, Long Beach (LBG) - 15.00 Miles, Los Angeles (LAX) - 37.00 Miles
hotel.areaServed: Huntington Beach, Newport Beach, Laguna Beach, Long Beach, Costa Mesa, Fountian Valley, Anaheim, Irvine.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc: Guestrooms and suites at Shorebreak Hotelare beautifully accoutered, amply supplied, and comfortable. Executive desk and credenza come standard, and every room features unique and tasteful contemporary artwork. Rooms at the Shorebreak feature flat panel high-definition televisions with media hub, wireless high-speed internet access, and iPod docking stations. Guests will also enjoy complimentary gourmet coffee and tea, generously stocked refreshment centers, and 24-hour in-room dining featuring outstanding and eclectic offerings, such as our signature "Dreamy Night Pillow Menu."

facility.title: WATERFRONT VIEW - 2 QUEEN BEDS
facility.desc: Waterfront View 2 Queen Beds - Enjoy full ocean views from this spacious Guestroom. Waterfront Guestrooms are directly facing Huntington Beach with view of the pier. Private balcony. Surf city inspired Huntington Beach style decor. 2 Queen Beds.

facility.title: WATERFRONT VIEW - 1 KING BED
facility.desc: Waterfront View 1 King Bed - Enjoy full ocean views from this spacious Guestroom. Waterfront Guestrooms are directly facing Huntington Beach with views of the pier. Private balcony. Surf city inspired Huntington Beach style decor. 1 King Bed.

facility.title: Zimzala Restaruant
facility.desc: Open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, Zimzala complements the active beach lifestyle. Breakfast at Zimzala is the perfect start to an active day at the beach. Begin with one of our fresh juices or smoothies, then enjoy an array of frittatas, French toasts, warm healthful cereals, and house-baked pastries. Express barista service is offered at the bar during the early morning hours.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Shorebreak Hotel is located just off the beach where the Pacific Coast Highway meets the Huntington Beach Pier. Located in a new development known as "The Strand," Shorebreak Hotel will be the first full-service, luxury boutique hotel on the waterfront in Huntington Beach and the only hotel located in downtown Huntington Beach. This ideal location is well suited to both business and leisure travelers.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Complemented by breathtaking oceanfront vistas amidst an energetic downtown beach setting, Shorebreak Hotel is the perfect locale from which to entertain, reward, inspire and create.From executive retreats to corporate sales meetings, Shorebreak Hotel is a superb choice for meetings and events of consequence. Beautiful surroundings, state-of-the-art technology, and an experienced support staff make any banquet, meeting, or seminar an unforgettable experience. Shorebreak's extensive facilities include 8,000 square feet of total function space, including a stunning 3,000 square foot ballroom. Highlights include a private dining room with wraparound terrace; an interior courtyard terrace with outdoor fire pits, corner boardroom suites, and an executive business center.

facility.title: CITY COUTYARD VIEW - 2 DOUBLE BEDS
facility.desc: City Courtyard View 2 Double Beds- Spacious guestroom with lovely views of the hotel's interior courtyard with fire places or neighborhood views. Surf city inspired Huntington Beach style decor. 2 Double Beds.

facility.desc: City Courtyard View 1 Queen Bed - Spacious guestroom with lovely views of the hotel's interior courtyard with fire places or neighborhood views. Surf city inspired Huntington Beach style decor. 1 Queen Bed.

hotel.name: Scottsdale Plaza Resort
hotel.description: Warm and inviting, the Valley of the Sun beckons. Lush palms and golf greens grace the stunning backdrop of red desert rock. Turquoise pools sparkle with flower-adorned courtyards and everywhere the sun rejuvenates. You will be charmed by the tasteful residential feeling of our Mediterranean inspired design and architecture. Inside, an extensive collection of fine art and exquisitely detailed decorations surround each guest with elegance. Choose from 170 patio, bi-level and villa suites or 224 spacious guest rooms. Recent renovations include new carpet in all standard rooms and premium mattresses in all rooms. Additional amenities include fireplaces, private patios and balconies with sweeping views. Enjoy live jazz nightly, or authentic Mexican cuisine, relax in JD's or enjoy refreshments and snacks poolside. Welcome to the Scottsdale Plaza Resort.
hotel.airportsDesc: Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) Scottsdale Airpark (SCL)

facility.title: JD's Lounge
facility.desc: Enjoy the atmosphere of an English Sports Pub at JD's Lounge. Shoot a game of pool, play a few holes of Golden Tee, catch some sports action on five large TV's and choose from a fine selection of beers on tap all accompanied by the best free popcorn around. Open at 11am to 2am daily.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc:
The Scottsdale Plaza Resort has both the space and the technology your group needs to conduct effective business events.
More than 30,000 square feet of flexible, functional meeting facilities The area's finest acoustically perfect amphitheater T-1 and High-Speed Internet Access Full, In-House Audio/Visual Capabilities Fourteen meeting rooms, including the lavishly appointed Executive Lodge Boardroom, for groups from 10 to 1,000 people
Our in-house audiovisual experts, AV Concepts, are your turnkey multimedia production experts. They know how to turn your best ideas into the most inspiringentertainingand professional show of your career.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The resort is three miles north of Oldtown Scottsdale and Art District, near Camelback Mountain and hiking trails, and adjacent to McCormick-Stillman Railroad Park. Nearby attractions include Scottsdale Stadium (Spring Trianing home of The San Francisco Giants), Scottsdale Fashion Square, The Borgata, Taliesin West, Phoenix Zoo, and Desert Botanical Gardens. 25 minutes to downtown Phoenix, featuring Chase Park (home of the Arizona Diamondbacks), America West Arena (home of the Phoenix Suns), Heard Museum, Dodge Theater, and Arizona Science Center.

facility.title: Remington's Restaurant and Lounge
facility.desc: Amazing cuisine, an intimate and relaxed atmosphere and impeccable service is what awaits you at Remington's Restaurant. Enjoy American and International cuisine prepared by award winning Chef. Select a fine wine from our collection, featuring varieties from throughout the world. Lunch served Monday - Friday, 11am to 2pm. Dinner served nightly, 5 - 10 p.m Jazz in Remington's Lounge, Tuesday - Saturday, starting at 5 p.m. For reservations or information, please all 480-951-5101.

facility.title: Garden Court
facility.desc: Mornings begin at the Garden Court. Fresh and airy, the Garden Court offers sumptuous breakfast buffets indoors with the soothing sounds of a Mediterranean fountain or on our outdoor patio. Lunch offerings are sure to please any mid-day appetite. Breakfast and lunch daily.

facility.title: Caf Cabana
facility.desc: Linger poolside under the warm Arizona sun for delicious refreshments and cool drinks at the Caf Cabana. Splash away the day in the cool pool waters or soak it all in sitting in Arizona's largest whirlpool spa. Opens at 11 am to sunset, weather permitting, daily.

facility.title: One Bedroom Suite
facility.desc: One Bedroom Suite features two double beds, cable television, telephones with voice mail and data ports, electronic key locks, hair dryers, a fully-stocked mini-bar, turkish cotton robes and towels, iron and ironing board, coffee maker, in-room safe, in-room movies, full-length mirrored wardrobes, High-speed Internet connection, some suites have sofa bed.

facility.title: Standard Two Double
facility.desc: Standard Two Double features two double beds, 375-495 square feet, granite-like wet bar, counters, two upholstered chairs, ottoman, desk with High-speed Internet access (surcharge), 21-inch TV, shower/tub combination, dressing benches, dressing area with twin-sink vanity, bathrobes.

hotel.name: The Westin Kierland Villas, Scottsdale
hotel.description:
The past meets the present at Arizona's newest resort treasure, The Westin Kierland Villas, Scottsdale—designed to capture the modern luxury and style that is the hallmark of the Westin name. The luxurious, fully equipped vacation villas are located on 10 acres within the exclusive Kierland master-planned community, just outside of Scottsdale. Boasting more than 300 days of sunshine, the area is renowned for its breathtaking sunsets, stunning vistas, and fascinating history.
Each villa offers a private balcony with breathtaking views of the spectacular Arizona landscape. Fully equipped kitchens and kitchenettes include everything necessary to prepare and enjoy a gourmet meal. A separate living room includes a queen size sofa bed, entertainment center with television, DVD player, and stereo system. The master bedroom is its own oasis, complete with whirlpool tub and of course, the Westin Heavenly Bed®. All also offer washers and dryers, and some are even equipped with fireplaces!
Resort amenities include: adult swimming pool, interactive tot pool, family swimming pool, jetted spa, well-equipped WestinWORKOUT® Gym, cabanas, grilling and picnic area, deli/marketplace, babysitting services, and a multitude of dining options. Whether relaxing at the spa or off-roading in the Sonoran Desert, shopping downtown or golfing on one of our courses, there is truly something for everyone to enjoy at The Westin Kierland Resort Villas, Scottsdale.
hotel.airportsDesc: Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, (PHX), 20.00, MI; Scottsdale Airport, (SCF), 2.00, MI;

hotel.name: WyteStone Suites
hotel.description: This property is 100 percent nonsmoking. From the moment you enter you will know you are some place special with the five story atrium lobby warm stone fireplace the at home atmosphere and the friendly welcome from our staff. After checkin you will be surprised at the size of our True Suites. True Suites have two separate rooms a front parlor with a separate bedroom. Inroom features include high speed Internet a microwave refrigerator coffee maker hair dryer iron and ironing board and a TV in both the parlor and the bedroom. If this were not enough we also offer a free hot buffet breakfast for all our guests. If you dont have your laptop with you we have a business center with a faxcopier and computer with internet connection. While visiting the hotel you can enjoy our exercise room and indoor swimming pool.

hotel.name: Market Pavilion Hotel
hotel.description: Welcome to the Market Pavilion Hotel, Charleston's newest and most luxurious hotel. Located in the epicenter of Downtown, we're just minutes from the waterfront, tour guides, shopping and grand old homes. Set among some of Charleston's most historical landmarks, the Market Pavilion Hotel offers the most decadent guest rooms in the city and countless amenities such as Grill 225, a member of the Great Steakhouses of North America, and Charleston's most popular night spot, the Pavilion Bar, which boasts the best view in the city. Most importantly, we're redefining the Art of Southern Hospitality. So whether you join us for a leisurely getaway or company meeting, to pop the question or seal the deal, you'll indulge in The Market Pavilion Hotel's premium value and service. Welcome to the Art of Southern Hospitality.

facility.title: Luxury Hotel
facility.desc:
Luxury Level King..Experience a brightly polished mahogany foyer that introduces an opulent guestroom in old Charleston-style. Heavy plaster crown molding, original paintings, old-world decor and fine, rich fabrics await your stay. Exquisite mahogany furniture in each room features poster beds, marble topped bedside tables, a desk area and a sitting area. A CD Player Alarm Clock is located at the bedside table. 600 thread count Italian linen sheeting and cashmere blankets cover the bed's deluxe mattresses.

The bath is Italian marble with a separate shower and tub, gilded gold mirror flanked by Lennox wall sconces, lighted make-up mirror, scale and a hairdryer located in the vanity drawer. Plush robes and towels and exclusive Hermes European toiletries are added for your comfort.

Included with your King guestroom is our Evening turndown service, complimentary High-speed Internet service, Evian bottled water and continental breakfast consisting of fresh baked pastries,

facility.title: Grill 225
facility.desc: Under the direction of Executive Chef Demetre Castanas, the Grill 225 menu is headlined by 100% USDA Prime Beef and fresh seafood from both local and international waters. We promise classic Prime steak house cuisine, exceptional and innovative desserts, a glamorous ambience and a robust wine selection. Operated by industry veteran Nick Palassis, Grill 225 proudly features the city's most professional and attentive wait staff. Since opening in 2002, Grill 225 has become known to be the place where Charlestonians and visitors come for the best overall dining experience in Charleston. We look forward to serving you soon. Serving lunch and dinner daily.

facility.title: Pavilion Bar
facility.desc: The Pavilion Bar is a rooftop oasis, complete with views of historic Charleston, a cascading pool, signature cocktails, eclectic cuisine offerings and the city's most spectacular sunsets.

hotel.name: Loews Don CeSar Hotel
hotel.description: Known as Florida*s *Pink Palace* the Loews Don CeSar Hotel facing the white sands of the Gulf of Mexico was built in 1928 to resemble a Mediterranean-style castle. Born in the Great Gatsby era as a playground for the rich and famous the iconic *Pink Palace* has been revitalized and refreshed within ensuring a future as rich and storied as its history. Enjoy newly redesigned 277 luxurious rooms including 36 suites many with spectacular views of the pristine Gulf beaches or Boca Ciega Bay. Relax and indulge at Spa Oceana featuring over 11000 square feet of spa facilities luxurious spa treatments full service salon and a stunning rooftop garden overlooking the azure waters of the Gulf of Mexico. All guest rooms feature Free Wi-Fi / bathrobe / Keurig coffee maker / 36 inch flat screen TV / Make-up mirror / hairdryer / ipod docking station

facility.title: Sunsets Lounge

facility.title: Beachcomber

facility.title: Uncle Andys Ice Cream Parlor

hotel.name: Holiday Inn ORLANDO - LAKE BUENA VISTA
hotel.description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Orlando - Lake Buena Vista This official Walt Disney World® hotel is fresh from a $35 million top-to-bottom makeover, making it the perfect place to stay during your vacation to the Walt Disney World® Resort. With 323 upgraded rooms, lobby and business amenities and facilities, you are sure to enjoy the comfort and convenience of our charming Orlando hotel. Whether you are in town for a weekend getaway, destination wedding or family vacation, our newly remodeled hotel in Lake Buena Vista puts you in the center of it all. Located within the Walt Disney World Resort, our hotel is just a short walk from everything the Downtown Disney ® area has to offer, as well as several Orlando attractions, golf courses and shopping. If you're in Orlando on business, feel free to utilize our 10 different meeting rooms with space for 18 to 600 guests, on-site audio/visual equipment, catering services and sales & meeting professionals. During your vacation, enjoy our choice Orlando hotel amenities, which include free high-speed Internet access, a delicious on-site restaurant and lounge, brand new 32" LG® LCD HDTVs and Bath & Body Works® bath amenities in every room
hotel.airportsDesc: Orlando International, (MCO), 17.00, MI, NE;

facility.title: Grab and Go
facility.desc: For your convenience the Grab and Go Outlet is located in the lobby that offers freshly brewed Rainforest coffee, Cappuccino, Breakfast Pastries, Sandwiches and Assorted bottled products including packaged Beer and Wine.

facility.title: Palm Breezes Bar
facility.desc: For an fun and lively spot to meet people, join us at our indoor bar. The Palm Breezes Bar is the perfect place to sip a cocktail or sample delicious appetizers from the inviting menu.

hotel.name: Comfort Inn Manhattan Bridge
hotel.description: The Comfort Inn Manhattan Bridge in New York City, is a hidden gem centrally located in Lower Manhattan in Little Italy/Chinatown. Walk to the subway for a quick ride to New York City attractions like Times Square, 9/11 Memorial, the Empire State Building and the Statue of Liberty. SoHo and the Lower East Side are just blocks away along with a variety of wonderful restaurants and trendy bars. Guests enjoy our FREE Hot Breakfast buffet served daily from 7AM-10AM ( sausage, eggs, Flavored Belgian Waffles, cereal, assorted breakfast pastries). On-site valet parking, $35 per night, Garage hours are 7AM-11PM with no in-out privileges and additional charges for oversize vehicles. Inquire about our FREE Parking Package (restrictions apply). Hotel is currently doing construction on the 11th and 12th until March 31st 2014.

SoHo and the Lower East Side are just blocks away along with a variety of wonderful restaurants and trendy bars. Guests enjoy our FREE Hot Breakfast buffet served daily from 7AM-10AM ( sausage, eggs, Flavored Belgian Waffles, cereal, assorted breakfast pastries). On-site valet parking, $35 per night, Garage hours are 7AM-11PM with no in-out privileges and additional charges for oversize vehicles. Inquire about our FREE Parking Package (restrictions apply). Hotel is currently doing construction on the 11th and 12th until March 31st 2014.
City Center, Chinatown Area

hotel.name: Capitol Skyline Hotel
hotel.description: When it comes to Washington, DC hotels, the Capitol Skyline Hotel is perfectly located for all the DC area attractions many of which are within walking distance from the hotel. Now independently owned and operated, Capitol Skyline is located within 5 blocks from the US Capitol and 3 blocks from the Washington Nationals Park stadium and near other area attractions including the National Mall, Smithsonian Institution, and the Navy Yard. Travelers will be within 5 miles from Reagan National Airport (DCA). Hotel guests will appreciate the convenience of the on-site Lapidus Restaurant. Other amenities include a seasonal outdoor pool, business center, fitness center, and free drop off shuttle service to downtown sites and Metro stations. Guest can also take advantage of sightseeing tours picking up directly from the hotel. Each spacious, comfortable guest room features all the right amenities including free wireless internet, cable television, in room safes, and on demand movies. Self parking available at $25 per night.
hotel.airportsDesc: Conveniently located just 4 miles from Reagan Washington National Airport.Washington Dulles International Airport-34 Miles Baltimore Washington International Airport-33 Miles

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The Capitol Skyline Hotel is conveniently located in downtown Washington, DC only a few blocks away from the United States Capitol, the National Mall, the Smithsonian Institution Museums, the Library of Congress, the Supreme Court, and the new Washington Nationals Stadium. Close to Washington Monument, the National Gallery of Art, Ft. McNair, Bolling Air Force Base, and the White House, the Capitol Skyline Hotel is the perfect choice of Washington DC hotels. The Capitol Skyline Hotel is easily accessed from the Navy Yard Metro and Interstates 95, 295, 395 and 495, is 1 mile or 5 Metro stops from the Washington Convention Center and 4 miles from Reagan Washington National Airport.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Plan your next elegant meeting, conference, or event at the Capitol Skyline Hotel, offering 40 years of hosting successful events and meetings at the best of Washington DC hotels. Whether you are planning a wedding celebration, a business meeting, corporate event, seminar, conference or gala reception, the beautifully renovated Capitol Skyline Hotel delivers a stylish, sophisticated environment for every occasion when it comes to DC events. Our luxurious Washington DC hotel features 5,000 square feet of meeting and banquet space divided into six versatile rooms and halls that can accommodate up to 500 guests for your DC event.

facility.title: Standard
facility.desc: The Deluxe Double/Double Rooms at the Capitol Skyline Hotel feature two double beds and views of either our swimming pool and the Nationals Baseball Stadium or downtown Washington city streets. All have ample sitting areas and workspace for your Washington, DC lodging comfort.

facility.title: Lapidus Restaurant & Lounge
facility.desc: Capitol Skyline Hotel guests will enjoy hearty American fare in our restaurant, serving breakfast, lunch and dinner. Lapidus features a diverse menu to satisfy familie s and sophisticated palettes. The Hotel also offers delightful poolside dining and weekend barbeques. Catering by Lapidus in our banquet rooms for every occasion.

facility.title: Skyline Lounge
facility.desc: Overlooking the fabulous pool and deck. Relax and unwind with friends and colleagues in our casual Skyline Lounge serving a full bar of spirits, drinks and wines. Enjoy a martini after work or meet up with friends before exploring the nation's capital or going to the Washington Nationals baseball games (3 blocks from hotel). Relax with a cool drink or snack as you lounge by the sparkling outdoor swimming pool at Capitol Skyline Hotel. You'll discover a peaceful paradise in the heart one of the most vibrant cities in the country.

hotel.name: JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
hotel.description: In the heart of Downtown Los Angeles, just steps from STAPLES Center, JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE Hotel fashions a new standard for luxury. Our stunning 54-story masterpiece hotel is the focal point of L.A. LIVE, offering guests a front-row seat to this emerging entertainment, sports and dining epicenter. With convenience to the LA Convention Center, guests at our hotel also enjoy an unmatched location for attending events at STAPLES Center, Nokia Theatre, Club Nokia, the GRAMMY Museum, Conga Room, Regal Cinemas, and much more. Hosting many of L.A.'s most fashionable events, our luxury hotel boasts 100,000 square-feet of contemporary, state-of-the-art Los Angeles meeting and event space. Entertainment events at L.A. LIVE are complemented by the hotel's lavish Ritz Carlton Spa®, a rooftop pool , dining options such as Wolfgang Puck's WP24 and LA Market Restaurant, modern yet comfortable guest rooms, and luxurious suites. Entertain your senses at JW Marriott Los Angeles.
hotel.airportsDesc: Los Angeles International Airport, (LAX), 17.20, MI, NE; Burbank Bob Hope Airport, (BUR), 16.00, MI, SE;

facility.title: LA Market
facility.desc: Our Downtown L.A. restaurant, LA Market Restaurant, focuses on seasonal, California dishes incorporating locally sourced ingredients.

facility.title: The Mixing Room
facility.desc: Enjoy world-class mixology within L.A. LIVE, innovative small plates, a lush and comfortable design and the ideal location in LA for star gazing and people watching. The Mixing Room maintains a spirit rooted in warmth, hospitality and a sense of fun.

facility.title: WP24 by Wolfgang Puck
facility.desc: WP24 by Wolfgang Puck is a shining star on the 24th floor of The Ritz-Carlton, Los Angeles, offering modern Chinese fare with panoramic views of downtown L.A.

facility.title: NEST at WP24
facility.desc: Nest at WP24 offers an approachable and modern restaurant and lounge concept and is the perfect complement to the highly executed fine dining of the adjacent WP24 by Wolfgang Puck.

facility.title: Illy Espressamente
facility.desc: At Illy, we pride ourselves on not only serving the finest, best quality beverages in Los Angeles, but also for having the friendliest baristas around.

facility.title: gLAnce Lobby Bar
facility.desc: gLAance Bar is the place to see and be seen in downtown Los Angeles.Located on the lobby level of the hotel and features light fare and refreshments.

facility.title: Ford’s Filling Station - Opening Fall 2014
facility.desc: Ford’s Filling Station, an innovative American gastropub with a pub-like attitude serving seasonal food. Refuel the mind, body and spirit! The “Filling Station” metaphor “Fuel No Gas” represents a place to fill up on all good things in life.

hotel.name: Brandywine River Hotel
hotel.description:
Charming and quaint boutique hotel nestled amongst rich historical locale with a high standard of comfort and service. The Brandywine River Hotel intimate and full of charm is the perfect hybrid in overnight accommodations. Blended with elegantly designed guest rooms each including high speed internet access and personal attentive service paying attention to details you will never want to stay in another chain hotel again.
The warm smell of fresh baked cookies welcomes you the friendly and courteous staff escorts you to your guest room where you will find fresh comfortable and luxurious accommodations. Each guest room features enchanting interior design private bath hair dryer satellite TV and high speed internet. Treat yourself to one of our Fireside Jacuzzi suites. With your choice of queen or king size bed you ll love the indulgence of the Jacuzzi bath tub and warm inviting fireplace.
Take pleasure in the European style breakfast in front of the fireplace in the tranquil Ashley Dining Room where you will also find the fresh baked cookies and hot tea served each afternoon.
Allow our knowledgeable staff to offer recommendations on where to tour eat and play. The Brandywine River Hotel is located only minutes away from the world renowned Longwood Gardens as well as various other attractions such as the Brandywine River Museum Chadds Ford Winery Winterthur Estate Nemours Mansion Hagley Museum and many more. There is truly something for everyone.
Enjoy a glass of wine champagne or aperitif from our lobby bar in front of the cozy fireplace in the hotel lobby while we make dinner reservations for you at the Brandywine Prime restaurant only steps away from the hotel. Or you may enjoy a bottle of wine from our wine cabinet and room service from Brandywine Prime in the comfort and privacy of your guest room.
The business center where you will find area attraction information as well as information on local events is equipped with 2 high speed internet computer acc
