hotel.name: Omni San Diego Hotel
hotel.description: The Four Diamond Omni San Diego is located in the heart of San Diego across from the convention center. This modern glass high rise hotel reflects the natural beauty and modern sophistication of this vibrant city. All guest rooms and suites feature floor to ceiling windows and plush comforts such as Egyptian cotton sheets and fluffy terry robes. Members of the Omni Select Guest Program receive complimentary high speed internet access. Rooms were designed with business and leisure travelers of today in mind and provide executive work desk with convenient modem and electrical outlets. Guests can dine at the onsite McCormick and Schmicks Restaurant and relax on the sun terrace beside the outdoor heated swimming pool and Jacuzzi. Guests can take in a baseball game at Petco Park next to the hotel or work out in the full service fitness center. All of the many attractions of San Diego are either within walking distance or a short drive away. San Diego International Airport is just 8 minutes from the hotel. Hotel is 100 percent smoke free.
hotel.airportsDesc: San Diego International Airport / Lindbergh Field, (SAN), 4.00, MI, SE;

facility.title: McCormick and Schmicks
facility.desc: McCormick and Schmicks serves over 40 varieties of fresh seafood on our menus each day. We offer steaks and poultry as well as salads and pasta. Aside from lunch or dinner there is an outstanding breakfast menu which features traditional fare and innovative specialty items. Daily Hours 0600 - 2200

facility.title: McCormick and Schmicks Bar
facility.desc: The bar offers the perfect place for cocktails after work or a microbrew before a baseball game. Light snacks are also available. Daily Hours 1100 - 2300

facility.title: Terrace Lounge
facility.desc: Poolside service located rooftop terrace which offers great food and poolside beverage service. The lounge is open seasonally from the end of June through the beginning of September. Daily Hours 1100 - 1900

facility.title: Morsels
facility.desc: Our gourmet coffee bar and gift shop offers an assortment of delicious pastries and desserts as well as gourmet coffee and a variety of gifts and sundries. Daily Hours 0600 - 2100

hotel.name: Staybridge Suites SAN JOSE
hotel.description: The Staybridge Suites San Jose is an all suite property an ideal place to Get Comfortable whether it be for Training, Corporate Travel, or Leisure Travel. Staybridge Suites is perfect for your next extended stay and a great alternative to a corporate apartment or temporary housing. Each suite has a fully equipped kitchen, a separate living room and large desk with free high speed internet access. Complimentary daily breakfast buffet is provided and a Sundowner reception Tuesday - Thursday evenings. Located in the heart of Silicon Valley only 1 mile from San Jose Airport and just 4 miles from downtown San Jose, HP Pavilion, home of the San Jose Sharks! Close to Paramount's Great America (Package Available), Winchester Mystery House, Raging Waters, and San Jose State University and Santa Clara University. We are a pet friendly hotel, and conveniently located to 101 and 880 Freeways. We are within 30 miles to Santa Cruz Beach and Boardwalk, Bonfonte Gardens and the Gilroy Outlets. We are located close to many top Silicon Valley companies such as Cisco, IBM, eBay, Hitachi, and Adobe Systems. Whatever the reason for your travel is, we would love for you to join our Priority Club and stay with us while in San Jose. This hotel is committed to providing accessible facilities under the American Disabilities Act. If your accessibility needs are not met, please contact the Hotel Manager on Duty. Should you require additional information regarding accessible facilities for guests with disabilities, please call 1-800-Holiday (U.S. and Canada) or contact the hotel directly. For the hearing impaired, TDD service is available at 1-800-238-5544 within the U.S. and Canada.
hotel.airportsDesc: Oakland International, (OAK), 40.00, MI, NE; San Francisco International, (SFO), 45.00, MI, N; San Jose Mineta International, (SJC), 1.30, MI, E;

Newly Renovated All Suite Airport Hotel in San Jose, California This completely renovated airport hotel provides travelers with a great starting point when traveling to Silicon Valley. The Staybridge Suites® Hotel San Jose is located 1.5 miles from San Jose International (SJC) and four miles from downtown San Jose. Whether visiting for business or pleasure, the central location, smart amenities and spacious apartment-style suites combine to satisfy our guests. A great choice for vacationers to San Jose, California, this airport hotel's suites ensure easy access to top attractions, including SAP Center, home of the NHL's Sharks. Families love being within minutes of theme parks like California's Great America and Raging Waters. Other popular stops include The Tech Museum of Innovation and San Jose Museum of Art. Business guests seeking hotels near San Jose airport have many reasons to choose this all-suite facility. An on-site boardroom is available for groups of up to 15, the Business Center is open daily and a free airport shuttle is provided. In addition, Silicon Valley companies like Cisco, IBM, eBay, Hitachi and Adobe Systems are nearby. The hotel's location near the San Jose airport isn't its only perk. Guests can take advantage of a sparkling, outdoor pool, onsite Fitness Center and a 24-hour Pantry. Free breakfast is provided daily, and Evening Socials are held Tuesday-Thursday. We know you'll be comfortable here!
Airport, airport

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Providence Lincoln
hotel.description: The new state-of-the-art lobby at Courtyard by Marriott® Providence Lincoln, provides greater flexibility and choices for our guests. This Rhode Island hotel near Providence features our new lobby with inviting, flexible spaces to work or relax in, free Wi-Fi throughout and easy access to the latest news, weather and airport conditions via our GoBoard™. The highlight of our new lobby experience is The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect.™ which provides guests with healthy food and beverage offerings in the morning and evening dinner service with cocktails. This hotel near Twin River Casino is also conveniently located minutes from Bryant University and Kirkbrae Country Club. We offer complimentary shuttle service within 5 miles, a well equipped fitness center, indoor pool and whirlpool. A 24-hour business center and boarding pass printing service is also available. Your stay at Courtyard by Marriott® Providence Lincoln is sure to be more comfortable and more productive than ever before!

This hotel near Twin River Casino is also conveniently located minutes from Bryant University and Kirkbrae Country Club. We offer complimentary shuttle service within 5 miles, a well equipped fitness center, indoor pool and whirlpool. A 24-hour business center and boarding pass printing service is also available. Your stay at Courtyard by Marriott® Providence Lincoln is sure to be more comfortable and more productive than ever before!

hotel.name: Brookshire Suites Baltimore Inner Harbor
hotel.description:
Contemporary quarters shake up downtown's cookie-cutter scene
The 97-room Brookshire Suites Baltimore Inner Harbor puts a premium on character, located close to local attractions like National Aquarium, Baltimore Convention Center, Camden Yards and the Baltimore Orioles, M & T Bank Stadium, Maryland Science Center, and Pier 6 Pavilion. The lobby at this contemporary hotel is adorned with street art by artist Michael Owen. Guests enjoy access to special perks and services that many other 3-star hotels leave out: free breakfast (and yes, it's hot). Patrons can also work out at the fitness center and buy snacks at the Marketplace on site.
We appreciate your business. We also appreciate value. Instead of charging our guests a-la- carte for many popular amenities, we've bundled our most popular amenities together in one package. We call this our Destination Fee. The mandatory $9.95 destination fee is charged to all guests nightly. Items indicated with ** are items included in the destination fee:
Smoke Free Environment Hot Breakfast Buffet ** High-speed Wireless Internet ** 24-Hour Fitness Center** Two Complimentary Bottles of Water at Check-in** On-Site 24 Hour Guest Laundry Facilities Local and Domestic Long Distance Telephone Calls** Featuring Bath Amenities by Gilchrest and Soames Meeting Space - 750 Sq. Ft. MarketPlace Snack Shop Valet Parking $36.00 per night (20% City and State Tax Included). Pet Fee $35.00 (non-refundable deposit) - $10.00 per day fee. Maximum weight for pets is 35 lbs

hotel.name: Inn on St. Peter
hotel.description:
The Inn on St. Peter is the leisure traveler's perfect retreat to the Crescent City. Carefully restored with traditional finishes, this New Orleans Inn marries the desires for modern convenience and comfort with an historic French Quarter setting.
Listed on the National Register of Historic Places, the Inn on St. Peter was originally constructed in 1805 with its design influenced by the Spanish style of architecture during that period. Gorgeous private courtyards are nestled throughout the property and provide an ambiance and charm that brings every guest back to the peaceful days of the 19th century French Quarter.
Throughout the guestrooms and courtyards guests will find the character of the natural wear of time preserved perfectly for their awe and enjoyment. Each of the 29 guest rooms and suites are unique and tell a different story about the spirit of the French Quarter. Balconies preserved over time offer visitors a distinct experience and a glimpse into simpler times.
Immerse yourself in the culture and history of the French Quarter at the Inn on St. Peter.
hotel.airportsDesc: MSY
hotel.areaServed: 2 blocks from Bourbon Street, located in a quiet area of the French Quarter

hotel.name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston-Bush Intercontinental Aprt
hotel.description: Small town hospitality with the big city reality...welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites Houston-Bush Intercontinental Airport, TX.Go from the old west to outer space when you visit Houston, the eclectic metropolis known as "Space City." The Hampton Inn & Suites® hotel in Houston-Bush Intercontinental Airport (JFK Boulevard), TX is perfect blend of a beautiful contemporary design and comfortable surroundings. We are conveniently located near 3 major freeways that will bring you to all of Houston's hottest attractions and businesses. If you are flying in or out of George Bush Int'l Airport-IAH we are only 1 mile from the airport, being the closest Hilton Family Brand Hotel to the airport.Tour the NASA Johnson Space Center where you can learn about the history of space travel, or take a behind-the-scenes journey where you might see the Historic Mission Control Center and astronauts training for upcoming missions. Additionally, we are only a few miles away from the famous Redstone Golf Club, Downtown Houston, H&H Ranch, The Houston Museum District, The Toyota Center, The Minute Maid Park, numerous of shopping facilities, and many many more! Ask the team at our Houston hotel for more tips on all the area's attractions. services & amenitiesEven if you're in Houston, Texas to enjoy the great outdoors, we want you to enjoy our great indoors as well. That's why we offer a full range of services and amenities at our hotel to make your stay with us exceptional.Are you planning a meeting? Wedding? Family reunion? Little League game? Let us help you with our easy booking and rooming list management tools.* Meetings & Events* Local restaurant guide

hotel.name: Radisson Blu Mall of America
hotel.description: Newly-built Radisson Blu Mall of America hotel conveniently located at the amazing Mall of America, making excellent dining, entertainment and shopping options right at your fingertips! Experience our Yes, I Can! Service from the moment you arrive until you depart. Valet and self-service parking greet your arrival. Enjoy your sense of arrival with our grand entry to our unique lobby. Experience delicious local Farm to Table created dishes in our signature Firelake Restaurant. Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout. Relax in our indoor swimming pool and fitness room and unwind in our Firelake Lounge. In keeping with our Responsible Business model, we are LEED certified and proactively recycle in our guestrooms, kitchen and meeting room areas. Our meeting and event areas accommodate groups from 10 to 1,400 and offer natural lighting in many. Guestrooms offer complimentary in-room refrigerators, coffee makers and HD television.

hotel.name: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Tribeca
hotel.description: The Newest Star among Manhattan New York Hotels in TribecaStyle and sophistication meets comfort and affordability at the brand-new Hilton Garden Inn New York/Tribeca Hotel. Boasting an exclusive location in the trend-setting neighborhood of Tribeca, home of the renowned Tribeca Film Festival, our New York City hotel is a convenient gateway to the best of the city.Your satisfaction is our first priority, and we stand out from other Lower Manhattan hotels with an extensive range of services and amenities to meet the needs of business and leisure guests.* 151 brand new spacious guest rooms, each with a 32" high-definition flat screen TV, microwave, refrigerator, hair dryer and coffee maker - Learn more about our Manhattan New York lodging options* 24 hour Pavilion Pantry® convenience mart stocked with snacks, drinks and more* Complimentary 24-hour business center* Complimentary wireless internet throughout the hotel* Complimentary fitness center and Stay Fit Kits®Tribeca offers something for everyone, whether you're a fashion addict, film fanatic, restaurant connoisseur or history buff. When you stay at our Hilton Garden Inn Tribeca, NY hotel in Manhattan, just steps from Chinatown and moments from Little Italy, you can enjoy immediate access to it all. Stroll along cobblestone streets to find an eclectic mix of luxury boutiques, world-class art galleries, award-winning restaurants and incredible New York nightlife. If you'd like to explore the rest of our amazing city, the subway station is just outside our doors. Legendary New York attractions near our pet-friendly Tribeca, New York hotel include:* Canal Street - 0.1 miles* Children's Museum of Arts - 0.38 miles* Wall Street - 0.45 miles * South Street Seaport - 0.94 miles * National Sports Museum - 1.19 miles * New York City Police Museum - 1.21 miles* Statue of Liberty Ellis Island - 1.24 miles* Chelsea Piers - 1.47 miles* Empire State Building - 2.73 miles* Metropolitan Museum of Art - 4.57 miles* Central Park Zoo -5.52 milesConducting business in the city? The Hilton Garden Inn New York City hotel in Tribeca is just minutes from St. Vincent's Hospital, the Jacob Javits Convention Center, New York Academy of Sciences, the World Financial Center and top corporations including: Citigroup, American Express, Merrill Lynch and Goldman Sachs.Hosting a special event, meeting or wedding in New York? When booking hotel rooms for your event guests, turn to the Hilton Garden Inn New York City/Tribeca hotel for refreshingly affordable group lodging in an unrivaled locale, just minutes from Battery Gardens and the Tribeca Rooftop event venue.Tribeca, NY hotels provide a dynamic setting for business trips or weekend getaways, and we match our stellar location with inviting accommodations, state-of-the-art amenities and first-rate service. Reserve your stay at the Hilton Garden Inn New York, NY hotel and get even more for less with our valuable NYC hotel deals.***** Everything. Right where you need it.® ***

hotel.name: Bonaventure Resort and Spa
hotel.description:
Ft. Lauderdales Premier Golf and Spa Resort
Surrounded by 23-acres of tropical paradise and home to aLaya, one of south Florida's largest destination day spas, the AAA Four-Diamond Bonaventure Resort & Spa provides endless opportunities for relaxation as well as recreation. Book a tee time on the recently renovated PGA East course or at the PGA West course. Volley at the Cliff Drysdale tennis center or simply bask in the sunshine at one of four outdoor pools. Stroll along the nature trail and stop to take in the waterfalls, Koi fish and swan.
This renowned resort features spacious estate-style guestrooms and suites, four sun-drenched pools, a fitness center accessible 24-hours by guests, and multiple dining options, including the locally acclaimed Irelands Steakhouse.
Conveniently located to Ft. Lauderdale/Hollywood International Airport and just minutes from Sawgrass Mills-the countrys largest outlet mall, the BB&T Center, and Everglades eco-adventures found nowhere else on earth. Bonaventure Resort & Spa offers a unique and memorable experience for those on leisure or business travel

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Conveniently located to Ft. Lauderdale International Airport and exceptional beaches and just minutes from Sawgrass Mills, Bank Atlantic Center, and Everglades adventures, Bonaventure Resort & Spa offers a unique and memorable experience for guests.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: With ease of movement from a ballroom general sessions to one of a variety of breakout rooms the Bonaventure Conference Center provides on ideal setting for groups from of 10 to 1,000. Our team of seasoned sales professional to the conference services and catering managers we will provide detailed assistance with your site inspection, preplanning to execution through a smooth departure.

facility.title: DELUXE - KING
facility.desc: Features the latest in luxury and technology, including one king bed with down pillows and soft sheeting, a cozy arm chair, work desk with two chairs, LCD TV and deluxe marble bath with walk-in shower, tub and bidet. Additional features include wired and wireless high-speed Internet access, iHome iPod docking station with AM/FM clock radio.

facility.title: DELUXE - DOUBLE
facility.desc: Features the latest in luxury and technology, including two full-size beds with down pillows and soft sheeting, a cozy arm chair, work desk with two chairs, LCD TV and deluxe marble bath with walk-in shower, tub and bidet. Additional features include wired and wireless high-speed Internet access, iHome iPod docking station with AM/FM clock radio.

facility.title: EXECUTIVE - DOUBLE
facility.desc: Features the latest in luxury and technology, including one king bed with down pillows and soft sheeting, a cozy arm chair, work desk with two chairs, kitchenette with stove-top & refrigerator, LCD TV and deluxe marble bath with walk-in shower, tub and bidet. Additional features include wired and wireless high-speed Internet access, iHome iPod docking station with AM/FM clock radio.

facility.title: KING - SUITE
facility.desc: Features the latest in luxury and technology, including one king bedroom, living area with queen sofabed, kitchenette, dining area for four, work desk with two chairs, LCD TV and deluxe marble bath with walk-in shower, tub and bidet. Additional features include wired and wireless high-speed Internet access, iHome iPod docking station with AM/FM clock radio.

facility.title: Banyan Restaurant
facility.desc: Experience casual dining at its best at our welcoming Florida restaurant. Sun streams in a wall of windows and brightly reflects off gleaming wood floors and stone wall accents. Prepare for a meeting over a hearty breakfast, or gather friends for a carefree luncheon. Join us any time of the day to sample an array of tempting cuisine, designed to satisfy even the most discerning palates.

facility.title: Ireland's Steakhouse
facility.desc: Prepare yourself for a relaxing and memorable evening at this award-winning Ft. Lauderdale restaurant, known for its superb cuts of beef and incredible seafood. Ireland's Steakhouse welcomes guests to sit back and enjoy a spectacular meal and exceptional service. Warm red and yellow decor creates an elegant yet cozy feeling in the dining area.

facility.title: Cabana Bar & Cafe
facility.desc:
Unwind with a light yet filling lunch; lush greenery, cool breezes and the soothing sounds of trickling water beckon guests to lounge at the Cabana Bar & Cafe. Gather friends for happy hour and share some of our
irresistible starters.

hotel.name: Wingate by Wyndham Tulsa
hotel.description: Conveniently located off Interstate 44, this Wingate by Wyndham Tulsa is near Tulsa International Airport, downtown Tulsa, BOK Event Center, Oneok Field, Big Splash Water Park, museums, golfing, shopping and many local restaurants. Ideal for both work and play, this smoke-free lodging offers complimentary breakfast, complimentary internet, fitness center, heated indoor saltwater pool, hot tub, dry cleaning and laundry facilities, meeting and conference rooms, board room, and business center with complimentary copy, print and fax services. Guest room amenities include microwave, refrigerator, safe, TV and newspaper. Suites and handicapped-accessible rooms are also available.

hotel.name: Buena Vista Palace
hotel.description:
Across the street from Downtown Disney. Newly renovated guestrooms. Free transportation to Disney theme parks.Heighten your Orlando experience at a Downtown Walt Disney World resort that soars above the rest.
Towering 27 stories above the world favorite destination the Buena Vista Palace in the WALT DISNEY WORLD Resort raises the bar for exceptional quality and service
Important Notice - Daily resort fee of 16.95 USD per night per room which includes Self Parking, Guestroom High Speed Internet Access (wired or wireless), Daily membership to the Fitness Center ( room key required for entry ), Cyber Caf (24 hour access) located on the first floor of the Main building, Airline Boarding Pass Printer in lobby, Unlimited use of recreational facilities, Weekday New York Times newspaper available in Hotel Lobby, Telephone calls: Unlimited local and 800 phone calls, Long Distance calls (within the Continental 48 states only): Up to the first 30 minutes (additional minutes $.10 a minute), Disney Bus Transportation, daily to each of the four (4) Walt Disney World theme parks; Magic Kingdom, Epcot, Animal Kingdom, Hollywood Studios and nightly to Downtown Disney.

Everything in this tropical paradise is geared toward your comfort and pleasure from our expansive Recreation Island to our state-of-the-art meeting facilities Feast on sumptuous cuisine in eight restaurants and lounges including The Outback Restaurant

Enjoy luxuriously appointed guest rooms complete with dreamy pillow-top mattresses and high-speed and wireless Internet access Take a refreshing dip in one of three outdoor pools or schedule a soothing treatment at our full-service European Spa
Experience the spectacle of world-famous Downtown Disney with its vibrant shops delicious restaurants and thrilling nightlife or if you prefer drive 20 minutes to the theater sports and cultural opportunities of downtown Orlando
Whether you are in town for a family vacation romantic getaway or business conference unforgettable features await you at the Buena Vista Palace including
-1014 guest rooms including 122 suites beautifully appointed
-27 story main tower and 6 story Island Resort wing complex providing extra room to work and play
-High-speed and wireless Internet access in all guest rooms and suites
-Wireless Internet connection in all public spaces meeting areas and guest rooms 90000 square feet of flexible meeting space accommodating up to 2080
-44 meeting-event rooms with versatile floor plans
-10000 square foot European style spa providing more than 60 spa services including massages body treatments and facials
-Exciting sports activities including basketball court and volleyball court one lighted tennis court game room and children playground
-Three heated pools in a lush landscaped setting
-Eight onsite restaurants and lounges

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Located inside The WALT DISNEY WORLD Resort, the Buena Vista Palace Hotel & Spa offers guest special privileges such as access to Disney golf courses, transportation to all Disney theme parks, and dining with Disney characters. The Magic Kingdom awaits!

facility.title: Resort View Guestroom
facility.desc: Generous sized guestrooms located within the resort's tower or Island Resort. A selection of rooms offer private balconies. All accommodations feature high-speed Internet access, coffee maker with coffee, cordless phone with voice mail and data-port capabilities, On-Command movies, Web TV', Sony Playstation', ironing sets, blow dryer, ceiling fans and an assortment of toiletries from the Golden Door' Bath Care Collection. Features either one king bed or two queen sized beds.

Features either one king bed or two queen sized beds.

facility.title: Island Suite
facility.desc: Spacious and comfortable, these elegantly appointed suites include a generous master bedroom with one king or two queen sized beds, and separate living room with sofa bed and additional half-bath as well as a private balcony. All accommodations feature high-speed Internet access, coffee maker with coffee, cordless phone with voice mail and data-port capabilities, On-Command movies, Web TV', Sony Playstation', ironing sets, blow dryer, ceiling fans and an assortment of toiletries from the Golden Door' Bath Care Collection.

facility.title: Island Suite Water view
facility.desc: Spacious and comfortable, these elegantly appointed suites include a generous master bedroom with one king or two queen sized beds, and separate living room with sofa bed and additional half-bath as well as a private balcony with views of the resort's tranquil lake or sunny pool deck. All accommodations feature high-speed Internet access, coffee maker with coffee, cordless phone with voice mail and data-port capabilities, On-Command movies, Web TV', Sony Playstation', ironing sets, blow dryer, ceiling fans and an assortment of toiletries from the Golden Door' Bath Care Collection.

facility.title: Tower Junior Suite
facility.desc: Cozy, one-bedroom suite accommodations featuring a separate master bedroom and living area with half-bath. Private balconies overlook the scenic lake and pool area. All accommodations feature high-speed Internet access, coffee maker with coffee, cordless phone with voice mail and data-port capabilities, On-Command movies, Web TV', Sony Playstation', Herman Miller' ergonomic chairs, ironing sets, mini-bar, blow dryer, ceiling fans and an assortment of toiletries from the Golden Door' Bath Care Collection.

facility.title: Tower One bedroom suite
facility.desc: An expansive suite including a master bedroom with water view and full bath connected to a separate parlor encompassing a comfortable sitting area with sofa bed and a second full bath. All accommodations feature high-speed Internet access, coffee maker with coffee, cordless phone with voice mail and data-port capabilities, On-Command movies, Web TV', Sony Playstation', Herman Miller' ergonomic chairs, ironing sets, blow dryer, ceiling fans and an assortment of toiletries from the Golden Door' Bath Care Collection. Features either one king bed or two queen sized beds.

facility.title: Premium Suites
facility.desc: The signature suites encompass 1650 ' 1800 sq. ft. and offer numerous upscale amenities, including a large master bedroom with separate living room and dining area, either one-and-a-half or two full baths, and multiple balconies. The Presidential Suite offers a full kitchen, while the Penthouse Suite features a wet bar area with a mini-refrigerator. All accommodations feature high-speed Internet access, coffee maker with coffee, cordless phone with voice mail and data-port capabilities, On-Command movies, Web TV', Sony Playstation', Herman Miller' ergonomic chairs, ironing sets, blow dryer, ceiling fans and an assortment of toiletries from the Golden Door' Bath Care Collection.

facility.title: Watercress Cafe
facility.desc:
Cuisine type - American
Location - on property
Open daily
Breakfast 6am-10pm Mon-Sat.
Lunch 11am-3pm Mon-Sat
Sunday brunch with Disney characters 8am-2pm buffet only.
Serving American fare with a lovely lake view home to our daily full breakfast buffet and Disney character breakfasts on Sunday. Kid friendly menus. Prices range from 8.00-24.00 USD.

facility.title: Outback Restaurant
facility.desc:
Cuisine type - American
Location - on property
Open daily serving dinner from 530pm-11pm.
The outback restaurant features Florida's finest steaks and fresh seafood including 4-6lb lobsters as well as pasta offerings in an Australian themed setting. Our spectacular decor features a cascading multi-level indoor waterfall that flows into a Japanese koi fish pond. Impressive rock formations weathered woodwork aboriginal designs and an open-hearth grill located in the center of the restaurant. Reservations are suggested. Prices range from 13.00-52.00 USD for dinner.

facility.title: Watercress Bakery Shop and Mini Market
facility.desc:
Cuisine type - American
Location - on property
Open daily from 6am-midnight.
Located on the first floor next to Watercress Cafe. Featuring freshly brewed Starbucks coffee, water, juices, soda, fresh bakeries, snacks, salads and sandwiches to go cereals, ice cream, pain reliever, fresh fruits and more.

facility.title: Castaway Grill - Pool Snack Bar
facility.desc:
Cuisine type - American
Location - on property
Open daily 11am-6pm weather permitting.
Offering frosty tropical drinks, savory snacks, salads, items from the grill and other delights as you relax on Recreation Island. Self-service or pool service available. Average price 4.00-13.00 USD

facility.title: Top of Palace Lounge
facility.desc:
Cuisine type - American
Location - on property
Open daily from 530pm-2am.
Serving spectacular sunsets or fireworks displays along with cocktails, appetizers and desserts from a 27th floor vantage point.

facility.title: Shipwreck Bar -Pool Bar
facility.desc:
Cuisine type - American
Location - on property
Open daily 11am-6pm weather permitting.
Offering cool drinks. Self-service or pool service available. Average price 3.00-10.00 USD.

hotel.name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago North Shore/Evanston
hotel.description: Experience our Inviting Evanston HotelDiscover the Hilton Garden Inn Chicago North Shore/Evanston hotel - a welcoming Chicago North Shore hotel. Adjacent to Northwestern University, our comfortable Evanston hotel is the perfect choice for students and families. Scenic Lake Michigan parks and beaches are only a short walk away. And the commuter rail link to downtown Chicago and O'Hare International Airport is a block down the street. Experience deluxe accommodations, friendly service and a relaxed atmosphere during your next stay in Evanston.* Located in the heart of Evanston, Illinois* Adjacent to Northwestern University* One block to public transportation* Walking distance to Lake Michigan parks and beaches* 25 minutes from Chicago-O'Hare International Airport (ORD)Business is just Steps Away from our Chicago North Shore HotelTravelers for business enjoy the close proximity of Chicago's most prominent companies and corporations.* Kraft* McDougal Littel * Rauland Borg* Rotary International * Solucient* ZS AssociatesThe Excitement of Chicago is just minutes from our Evanston HotelOur Hilton Garden Inn hotel is offers guests a variety of after-work relaxation or some fun during a weekend getaway.* Bahai Temple* Chicago Botanic Garden* City Center* Downtown Chicago * Lake Michigan Beaches * Wrigley Field***** Everything. Right where you need it.® ****

hotel.name: Rivers Edge Hotel and Spa
hotel.description: River's Edge Hotel & Spa (formerly known as Avalon Hotel & Spa) is an environmentally-friendly, 99-room deluxe boutique hotel and a vital component of Portland's South Waterfront District. This emerging mixed-use neighborhood integrates alternative transportation, parks and trails, green building practices, retail, arts and restaurants. Perched on the banks of the Willamette River and Cottonwood Preserve, just minutes from downtown Portland, River's Edge offers travelers the sophistication and warm hospitality of the Pacific Northwest. Guests and visitors enjoy classic service, modern amenities and comforts expected from Portland boutique hotels, making River's Edge Hotel & Spa a favorite among all Portland waterfront hotels. Among the hotel's valued amenities is The Spa at River's Edge, a luxurious two-level, 13,000-square-foot full-service spa, salon and fitness center. To delight the palate, there's Aquariva restaurant and bar - the dramatic, contemporary, riverside dining space featuring outdoor seating at river's edge. River's Edge event space lends itself to productive meetings, intimate private parties or equally incredible riverside wedding events. From 10 - 120 guests. Overlooking the Willamette River, is an outdoor terrace, perfect for al fresco coffee breaks, receptions and parties. The best to see and do in downtown is within a quick and easy Portland Streetcar ride, or let us give you a ride in our Courtesy Lincoln Navigator. The city of Portland, with its trendy and eclectic eateries, varied attractions, plentiful shopping and wide array of seasonal events and festivals, is a destination equally well-suited for business and leisure travelers. Come enjoy Portland's urban resort! Please note that the cost for valet parking is now $25 per night.
hotel.airportsDesc: (PDX)Portland International
hotel.areaServed: Located on the banks of a quiet bend in the Willamette River, River's Edge Hotel & Spa offers Portland lodging convenient to the Waterfront District, the Rose Quarter and, of course, downtown.

The living area has a sofabed, fireplace and offer views of the West Hills, Southwest Portland, John's Landing and partial views of the Willamette River - some have their own furnished balconies. The bathroom boasts a separate tub and glass shower. iHome Alarm Clock Radio with connection for Apple mobile devices and MP3 player, Green Natra bath amenities, hairdryer, coffee maker, ironing board and iron, laptop computer safe. facility.desc: Conference/dining table for up to 20, Living room seating area, two telephones, one cordless, with private dedicated phone numbers/voice mail, speaker phone, High-speed internet access, Full concierge business services, Complete meeting set-up.

facility.title: Amenity Info
facility.desc:
Our Spa provides a luxurious sanctum of calm for very personalized, professional, rejuvenating treatments. Within our beautifully tranquil surroundings, you'll experience a philosophy of healing which brings the rich, therapeutic traditions of Europe and Asia together with those, which are uniquely northwest in nature.
Nurturing facials, Signature Treatments in our Rain dance wet room - each is yours for the choosing. Balanced with an exhilarating session in our Fitness Club or a leisurely stroll along our river walk, the Avalon Spa is, by design, the spa you have been waiting for.

facility.title: Aquariva
facility.desc: Dine riverside at Aquariva where "You're only a stranger once." Located on the Willamette River bordering the heart of downtown Portland, and ideally positioned at the edge of the South Waterfront District, enjoy gracious, scenic riverside dining. Aquariva is the perfect setting for a romantic evening of sumptuous dining. Or to simply sip a glass of exceptional wine. Even host an intimate private party or an incredible riverside wedding. Open daily for dinner and happy hour, lunch M - F and Sunday brunch featuring food that is thoughtfully created, seasonally-inspired and beautifully presented. Seasonal outdoor terrace dining on banks of the Willamette River.

Each suite features a sitting area with sofa bed, king-size bed, fireplace, balcony overlooking the Waterfront. The bathroom with marble bathtub and separate glass shower is a spacious. iHome Alarm Clock Radio with connection for Apple mobile devices and MP3 player, Green Natra bath amenities, hairdryer, coffee maker, ironing board and iron, laptop computer safe. Complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access. Courtesy Navigator Service to downtown, within 3 miles, West side of River.

facility.title: Deluxe Hillside Suite
facility.desc: The 733-square-foot Deluxe Hillside Suite offers views of the West Hills and partial views of the Willamette River from the furnished balcony. The suite boasts a separate living area with a dining table that seats six, sofa bed, and fireplace. The bathroom with marble bathtub and separate glass shower has dual vanities and is quite spacious. iHome Alarm Clock Radio with connection for Apple mobile devices and MP3 player, Green Natra bath amenities, hairdryer, coffee maker, ironing board and iron, laptop computer safe. Complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access. Courtesy Navigator Service to downtown, within 3 miles, West side of River. An ADA Deluxe Hillside Suite is also available.

facility.title: Deluxe Riverside Suite
facility.desc: The hotels premier accommodation offers 1,040 square feet of thoughtfully designed space. The suites feature a wraparound furnished balcony overlooking the Willamette River and Cottonwood Preserve, large separate living room with sofa bed, dining table that seats six, wet bar, kitchenette, fireplace and powder room. Outfitted with a separate marble Jacuzzi tub and glass shower, the bathroom is located off a spacious master bedroom with king-size bed and furnished balcony.

hotel.name: Hilton Garden Inn Valencia Six Flags
hotel.description: Located in the heart of the Valencia/Santa Clarita valley, this beautiful Valencia, California, hotel is the only Hilton Garden Inn closest to Six Flags Hurricane Harbor and Six Flags Magic Mountain. At the Hilton Garden Inn Valencia Six Flags hotel you'll find everything right where you need it, including complimentary high-speed Internet access. The Hilton Garden Inn Valencia, CA, hotel is designed to suit every budget by offering valued price, family style atmosphere and great service. This modernized Valencia hotel has all new features to equip every personality in mind; you won't even need to leave the grounds to have an amazing experience.The Hilton Garden Inn Valencia is located around the corner from some of the most coveted golf courses and world famous sites and attractions. We are minutes away from the area's fastest growing businesses, including those in the technology, aerospace, education, biomed and entertainment industries.Some of the many great amenities offered to all of our guests here at the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Valencia near Six Flags include:* The Great American Grill®* Neutrogena® Bathroom Amenities* Complimentary Workout Facility* USA Today® each Weekday Morning* Outdoor Heated Pool and Whirlpool* Refrigerator, Microwave, and Coffee Maker* Evening Room Service and On-Site Catering* 24-Hour Pavilion Pantry® Convenience MartWe offer great space and services for groups and meetings at our Valencia, CA, hotel including 2,500 square feet of meeting and banquet space, an outdoor courtyard, a 24-hour business center and complimentary high-speed wireless Internet service in the lobby and all of our 152 guest rooms. Oversized work desks and Herman Miller Mirra® chairs are available in each room as well as PrinterOn® Remote Printing for your convenience.Come enjoy our hospitality at the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Valencia, CA. We are ready to serve your every need.*****Everything. Right where you need it

hotel.name: Hilton Garden Inn Tampa North
hotel.description: The jewel of north Tampa is the Hilton Garden Inn North Tampa hotel. Located in a tranquil nature preserve, yet minutes from the most exciting attractions in Florida, our Tampa, FL hotel has something for everyone! Just a few miles from the University of South Florida, Busch Gardens, Adventure Island Water Park, and the Museum of Science and Industry (MOSI). Conveniently located off the I-75 and I-4 split, you can have easy access to all that Tampa Bay has to offer in minutes! Our hotel in Tampa, Florida is also located within a short distance of the Moffitt Cancer Center and the corporate offices for Verizon, Verizon Wireless, Coca-Cola, Bausch & Lomb, Circle K, United Rentals, Alltel and Achieve Global.Our goal is to please the busy executive or leisure traveler by providing deluxe accommodations, friendly service, and a relaxed atmosphere. Our Hilton Garden Inn Tampa, Florida hotel's special amenities include:* New 37" flat panel HDTV with LodgeNet On Demand® video with an available Premium Sports Package* Complimentary high-speed wired or wireless Internet access with secure PrinterOn® remote printing* An in-room hospitality center with microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker* On-site restaurant and bar with room service* Two dual-line phones with voicemail and data ports* The Garden Sleep System® bed for a relaxing night's sleep* The famous Herman Miller ergonomic chair* Complimentary HBO® and Nintendo® Video Games* Complimentary USA Today® each weekday morning* Heated outdoor pool, whirlpool and fitness center* Complimentary 24-hour business center* A Preferred Busch Gardens hotel, as well as an official sponsorship hotel for University of South FloridaThe Hilton Garden Inn Tampa hotel offers 3,800 square feet of meeting and banquet space which can accommodate up to 150 people banquet style while providing exceptional food and beverage service for all your guests.Food & Beverage at our Tampa HotelOur Tampa, Florida hotel's on-site restaurant, The Great American Grill® Restaurant features traditional American fare. An abundant breakfast buffet with cooked-to-order eggs, omelets, and waffles. Breakfast served Monday through Friday 6:30am - 10:00am and Saturday and Sunday 7:00am - 12:00pm; lunch is served each weekday 11:00am - 2:00pm; dinner and room service are served nightly from 5:00pm - 9:00pm. Our HGI Bar features cocktails in our bar or on the comfortable outdoor patio. Additional snacks and supplies are also available in the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry® conveniently located next to the front desk, with a wide selection of refrigerated, frozen and microwavable packaged items perfect for in-room preparation, as well as a large assortment of sundry items.Come and enjoy a taste of Florida hospitality and the exceptional service the Hilton Garden Inn North Tampa hotel has to offer. We look forward to seeing you soon.***** Everything. Right Where You Need It
hotel.airportsDesc: Tampa Intl Airport, (TPA), 22.00, MI, SW; Orlando Intl Airport, (MCO), 85.00, MI, E; St. Pete/Clearwater Intl Airport, (PIE), 25.00, MI, W;

hotel.name: Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham SE/Liberty Park
hotel.description: The Hilton Garden Inn SE/Liberty Park Birmingham hotel is located in the heart of the suburban Liberty Park business district of Birmingham exit 23 off I-459. Our Birmingham, AL hotel is next door to the Urban Center Corporate Park that hosts numerous corporations including but not limited to:* Midtown Vulcan Materials* Xerox Corporation* Proxsys LLC* Drummond Company* Federal Reserve BankProviding the finest quality and services, the Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham, Alabama hotel is perfectly designed for business or leisure guests, and offers an abundance of complimentary amenities ensuring your stay in Liberty Park is affordable, fun and hassle-free.* Spacious, newly appointed guestrooms with 32" LCD flat panel televisions, refrigerator, microwave, safe, coffee maker, and large work desks with adjustable lighting and ergonomic chairs.* Our airport shuttle is available from 6:30am - 6:00pm, Monday - Friday, by appointment. Please arrange a shuttle appointment with our front desk.* Complimentary high-speed wired and wireless Internet access is available in each guestroom, featuring secure remote printing directly to our hotel's business center.* Complimentary Fitness Center, complimentary 24-hour Business Center, and complimentary wireless Internet access in the lobby.* Complimentary morning coffee, tea, and USA Today®.* The Great American Grill® restaurant serves classic American cuisine for dinner or enjoy a cocktail in the Pavilion Lounge or dine in the comfort of your room with evening room service.Nearby Attractions & Other Things to Do near our Hotel in Birmingham:* For the motor sports enthusiasts we are located fifteen Minutes from the Barber Vintage Motor Sports Museum.* Do some shopping at The Summit Shopping Area or Riverchase Galleria Shopping Mall located only minutes from the hotel. There you will also find some an abundance of great restaurant for all palates.* Play a round of at the Robert Trent Jones Golf Course located 14 miles from the hotel* Here with your family? Come out and watch the Birmingham Barons Double A-affiliate for the Chicago White Sox located only fifteen minutes from the hotel* Let loose at the at Alabama Adventure (formerly Visionland)* For the race fan in you, Talladega Superspeedway is only 45 miles from the hotel. Something everyone should experience.Meeting and Special Events at our Hotel in Birmingham, ALThe Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham SE/Liberty Park hotel offers 2,200 square feet of meeting space as well as catering services for all your meeting and special event needs. The Great American Grill Restaurant serves freshly prepared breakfast and Dinner in a casual and family friendly setting. The Pavilion Pantry has a selection of refrigerated, frozen and microwavable packaged items perfect for in-room preparation. Come enjoy Alabama hospitality and exceptional service at the Hilton Garden Inn SE/Liberty Park hotel in Birmingham, Alabama.***** Everything. Right where you need it. ® **

hotel.name: Flamingo Waterpark Hotel
hotel.description:
The Flamingo Waterpark Resort, the perfect family-friendly, fun and adventure hotel, resort and waterpark in the Orlando Kissimmee Area.

Located in the Fun Capital of the World, the Flamingo Waterpark Resort is a one of a kind full-service hotel and resort that delights kids and adults alike with a full suite of on-site amenities. Inspired in tropical theme dcor, our state-of-the-art water park welcomes hotel guests as well as daily visitors.

A property that has it all with 6 buildings that encompass 240 rooms, plus a full array of amenities including conference center, restaurants and bars, ballrooms and events' patio, water park, teen activity area, children's playroom, spa, gym and even a gift shop.

The Flamingo Waterpark Resort has a full array of services and amenities that will allow you to do whatever you want during your next Florida vacation.

The property charges a $6.00 per night per room resort fee. Also, Water Park Access is an additional $8.00 per person per day fee.
hotel.airportsDesc:
Orlando International Airport (MCO) - 15 minutes
Kissimmee Airport (ISM) - 10 minutes

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: In addition to the great amenities, entertainment and welcoming service that the Flamingo Waterpark Resort offers, its location is just perfect. Enjoy quick access to all the Orlando and Kissimmee area attractions and airports. Located just minutes south of Orlando in Kissimmee, the Flamingo Waterpark Resort avoids the International Drive Orlando traffic and it's convenient to all the major theme parks, shopping, and attractions in the area. The Flamingo Waterpark Resort is located five minutes from downtown Kissimmee and 15 minutes from Orlando, Florida on US Highway 192 East, adjacent to the Florida Turnpike. We offer shuttle service to the hub of Walt Disney World, Universal Studios, Island of Adventure and SeaWorld. Scheduled transportation hours vary based on Theme Parks operating hours.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Events are a Breeze at the Flamingo Waterpark Resort. Anywhere from children events, birthday parties and family reunions; to corporate retreats, business team building, weddings, mitzvahs and any other occasion, the Flamingo Waterpark resort and conference center accommodates small to large groups as a one of a kind meeting venue. Let our expert staff help you coordinate your event here at the Flamingo Waterpark Resort with our ongoing commitment to excellence and dedication to extraordinary performance and comfort to ensure the success of your next event. Our venues are perfect for accommodating events for up to 400 people. We offer over 4,000 square feet of flexible space with a dedicated Conference Services Team that is committed to exceeding your expectations.

facility.title: KING - GUEST_ROOM
facility.desc: This beautifully appointed room features a king bed with Serta Perfect Sleeper Pillow Top mattress. Amenities include, Wireless High Speed connection, Complimentary Coffee, in-room safes; cable tv; alarm clock/radio; voice mail; hair dryer; iron/board. Not Water Park view.

facility.title: DOUBLE - GUEST_ROOM
facility.desc: Spacious room featuring 2 ultra-comfortable queen size beds with Serta Perfect Sleeper Pillow Top mattresses. The bright, cheery decor will liven up your stay. Amenities include, Wireless High Speed internet connection, Complimentary Coffee, in-room safes; cable tv; alarm clock/radio; voice mail; hair dryer; iron/board. Not Water Park view.

facility.title: DELUXE - KING
facility.desc: Sleep * Slide * Swim * Splash in our Deluxe King. Step out your door and behold Orlando's newest state-of-the-art water park. When it's time to unwind from all the fun, you'll recharge and refresh in a spacious king bed featuring a Serta Perfect Sleeper Pillow Top mattress. Amenities include, Wireless High Speed connection, Complimentary Coffee, in-room safes; cable tv; alarm clock/radio; voice mail; hair dryer; iron/board.

facility.title: DELUXE - DOUBLE
facility.desc: Sleep * Slide * Swim * Splash with our Deluxe Double Queen featuring 2-queen size beds with Serta Perfect Sleeper Pillow Top mattresses. Amenities include, Wireless High Speed connection, Complimentary Coffee, in-room safes; cable tv; alarm clock/radio; voice mail; hair dryer; iron/board. Did we mention a 5 million dollar water park right outside your door? All rooms face pool & Water Park.

facility.title: PREMIUM - KING
facility.desc: In case you need a bit more to relax you than a luxurious Serta Perfect Sleeper Pillow Top king bed, try a Jacuzzi room. Our whirlpool tub will relax and revitalize so you'll be more than ready for tomorrow's activities. Amenities include, Wireless High Speed connection, Complimentary Coffee, in-room safes; cable tv; alarm clock/radio; voice mail; hair dryer; iron/board.

facility.desc: offers offers a variety of breakfast options daily and a eclectic weekend buffet. Full lunch and dinner menu also available.

facility.title: Flamingo Melting Pot Bar & Grill
facility.desc: features a snack, sandwiches and tropical drinks.

facility.title: Auzzie's Lounge
facility.desc: has a wine list and appetizer menu to suit all tastes.

facility.title: Ice Cream and Candy Shoppe
facility.desc: located beside the Flamingo Melting Pot Bar & Grill. The Ice Cream Shoppe is proud to serve refreshing treats that will be sure to satisfy your sweet tooth and keep you cool in the Kissimmee-Orlando Florida heat.

hotel.name: The Westin San Diego
hotel.description:
The Westin San Diego's spectacular crystalline design is a signature landmark in the city skyline. The sophisticated urban setting begins with the 100-foot high lobby atrium, creating a magnificent sense of arrival. The entire hotel offers a retreat from the rigors of travel combined with a stimulating sensory experience.
Located in the heart of beautiful downtown San Diego, the 25 floors of guest rooms feature panoramic views of the San Diego Bay, Coronado Island, and the downtown cityscape. Convenient to business and shopping, we are within walking distance of the San Diego Convention Center, Seaport Village, Little Italy, the San Diego Gaslamp Quarter, and a variety of shopping options. Only minutes away are major attractions, such as the world-renowned San Diego Zoo, Sea World, Old Town, Balboa Park and Museums, the USS Midway, and the breathtaking scenery of San Diego's stunning sandy beaches.
Our flexible meeting space offers state-of-the-art technology for groups of up to 500 persons. To enhance the guest experience, we offer American cuisine in the both the restaurant and lobby bar.
Escape to one of our 436 beautifully appointed guest rooms, complete with revitalizing amenities. Awake re-energized from a restful sleep in our signature Heavenly Bed and enjoy an invigorating shower in the Heavenly Bath.
Westin didn't discover fresh air, but we're proud to offer it at this hotel. Learn more about Breathe Westin and our smoke-free hotels.
hotel.airportsDesc: San Diego International Airport, (SAN), 3.00, MI; McClellan-Palomar Airport, (CLD), 30.00, MI;

hotel.name: Siena Suites Hotel
hotel.description: The Siena Suites Hotel, an extended-stay experience like no other. Located at 6555 Boulder Highway, just a few short minutes from the Las Vegas "Strip" and McCarran International Airport! Whether your plans call for a stay of a week, a month or even longer, the Siena Suites Hotel provides all the amenities needed to make your experience in Las Vegas a memorable one. Spacious guest suites are available in one or two bedroom designs, each with a large living area. All suites boast a full kitchen, free high-speed Internet access with 24/7 support and 25" cable TV with free premium channels. Other amenities include on-site guest laundry, swimming pool, fitness center and a 24-hour front desk to ensure prompt attention to your needs.

facility.title: One Bedroom Select Suite
facility.desc: Our one bedroom suite renovated May, 2014 offers 400 SF of modern living space and features one bedroom with two double beds, a living room and kitchen. This suite includes two 39 flat screen TVs with expanded cable channels, direct dial phones with free local and domestic long distance phone calls, wired high speed internet access, air conditioning, alarm clock radio, bathroom amenities, bath tub, hairdryer and iron and ironing board. The kitchen offers full size appliances including refrigerator, microwave, oven, stove, dishwasher, coffee maker, smoke detector and dining room table. This suite is non-smoking. *Kitchens do not have utensils, pots and pans or dishware.

hotel.name: Saddlebrook Resort & Spa
hotel.description:
Saddlebrook is a destination Resort & Spa just 25 minutes north of downtown Tampa. Saddlebrook features 36 holes of championship golf designed by the legendary Arnold Palmer, 45 tennis courts offering play on every grand slam surface, 5 unique restaurants including the award winning Dempsey's Steakhouse, a full service Spa & Salon and abundant recreational activities all surrounding our half million gallon Superpool - the focal point of our resort. Additionally Saddlebrook offers 95,000 square feet of meeting & function space for your next event.

A nightly resort fee of $12 plus tax wil be collected upon check out and includes daily Fitness center admittance, toll free calls and local calls up to 30 minutes, high speed wireless internet access in the sleeping rooms and public areas, daily in room self serve coffee & tea, and daily newspaper delivery.
hotel.airportsDesc: Saddlebrook is served by Tampa International Airport, (TPA) just 29 miles away. Nearby executive airports include KZPH and X39 within 10 minutes drive.

hotel.name: Wingate by Wyndham Scottsdale
hotel.description: Conveniently located off Route 101 in the heart of Scottsdale Airpark, this Wingate by Wyndham Scottsdale is near WestWorld Event Center, Barrett Jackson Auto Auction, Alltel Ice Den, downtown Phoenix, and many local restaurants. Ideal for both work and play, this smoke-free lodging offers complimentary hot continental breakfast, complimentary internet, Local shuttle service within a 5 mile radius, fitness center, outdoor pool, hot tub, meeting rooms, and 24-hour business center with complimentary print, copy, and fax services. Guest room amenities include microwave, refrigerator, safe, TV and newspaper. Suites and handicapped accessible rooms are also available.

hotel.name: Sheraton Mission Valley San Diego Hotel
hotel.description:
Welcome to the Sheraton Mission Valley San Diego Hotel. Whether you're visiting on business or for fun, you'll enjoy our great amenities and services. Our hotel is just minutes from the San Diego Zoo, SeaWorld, the historic Gaslamp District and a variety of other attractions. Mission Valley's two premier shopping malls are nearby as well.
Unwind over a sumptuous meal at Andres Restaurant or your favorite cocktail at Andres Bar. Or retreat to one of our 260 beautifully appointed, stunning guest rooms to rejuvenate.
Spend your days relaxing by the pool or spa or working out in our state-of-the-art fitness center. Our conference facilities offers over 12,000 square feet of meeting space for your special event.
Rediscover San Diego at the Sheraton Mission Valley San Diego Hotel.
Special Condition Updated Transient Occupancy Tax
We want to make you aware of a new assessment that will become effective January 1, 2008. Last month the San Diego Hotel and Motel Association members voted to approve a marketing assessment of 2% at all hotels in the city of San Diego with more than 70 guest rooms.
The “TMD” (Tourism Marketing District) fee will be posted on all guest room folios as additional assessment over and above the Transient Occupancy Tax (currently 10.565%).'
Please contact the hotel for further information.
hotel.airportsDesc: San Diego International Airport, (SAN), 7.00, MI;

hotel.name: Francis Marion Hotel
hotel.description: The Francis Marion Hotel, located in the heart of historic Charleston. South Carolina was the largest and grandest in the Carolinas when it opened in 1924 named for General Francis Marion the swamp Fox of the American Revolution. The Francis Marion Hotel in Charleston re-opened in 1996, after a $12 million National Trust award wining restoration, and is once again Charleston's grand hotel.
hotel.airportsDesc: Hotel is located 12 miles East of Charleston Airport (CHS)

hotel.name: Pan Pacific Hotel Seattle
hotel.description: The new Pan Pacific Seattle hotel a Forbes Four Star , one of only 3 hotels in Seattle to win the award is conveniently located downtown while the newly completed streetcar service puts guests within minutes of Nordstrom's flagship store and Seattle's shopping district as well as the city's financial center and exciting restaurants. Part of the exclusive 2200 Development in Seattle's South Lake Union neighborhood, the hotel exudes an 'East meets West' theme with sleek modernity through a mix of zebra-wood furnishings and decor in muted hues of taupe, slate and cream.

hotel.name: Palms Casino Resort
hotel.description:
Welcome to Las Vegas' most talked about experience! The Palms Casino Resort offers its guests some of the city's most spectacular views of the Las Vegas Strip, unique rooms, memorable nightlife venues and a bevy of dining options.

The resort today is a Vegas playground for music celebrities and Hollywood stars, with specialty suites offering extra large furniture for the hotel's many NBA guests, and an amazing array of restaurants and nightlife.

No other place offers more non stop excitement than the Palms, making it a one stop destination for legendary Las Vegas nightlife. From the exclusive nightclub Ghostbar, to the truly cutting edge Pearl Concert Theater-home of the 2007 MTV Video Music Awards-the Palms is a hub for celebrities and those who party like celebs. And if you're in the mood for something low key, then join us at The Lounge or stop by the Island Bar for a few cocktails. Explore all of the Palms the Vegas frontrunner.

Savor all the best Las Vegas has to offer under a single roof. The Palms offers a truly diverse culinary experience, from gourmet French dining at Michelin star-rated Aliz and prime meats at celebrity hotspot N9NE Steakhouse, to Italian cuisine at NOVE. Indulge at the all you can eat Bistro Buffet and enjoy 24-hour dining at 24 Seven Cafe.

Outside, the pool provides a welcome reprieve from the Vegas heat with multiple pools, including two designed just for shallow lounging.

The pools at Palms and Palms Place are open seasonally.

If indoor fun is more your style, explore your luck at the 95,000 square foot casino, relax at the Recharge Spa or check out the 14 theater Brendan Theatres complex.

Guests must be at least 21 with proof of ID to check in at Palms Casino Resort.

A mandatory resort fee of 25 USD per night plus tax will be assessed at the front desk. Resort fee includes Complimentary Internet access throughout stay ; Fitness center access; Shuttle service to and from the Forum Shops, every hour on the hour 11 am - 8 pm; and much more.
hotel.airportsDesc: LAS-McCarran International Airport 3.0 Miles North West

facility.title: Property
facility.desc:

facility.title: Amenities
facility.desc: Night Club:Free parking:Business Center:Concierge:Handicapped Rooms/Facilities:Fitness Center:Pool:Restaurant:Room Service:High Speed Internet:Casino:Spa

facility.title: ALIZE
facility.desc: Opens Daily at 5 p.m.Created by world-renowned Chef Andre Rochat in collaboration with celebrated Chef de Cuisine Mark Purdy, Aliz is French cuisine at its absolute finest. But this Michelin-starred restaurant is not just famous for its ever-changing menu, it also has a vast, award-winning wine selection and the largest cognac collection in Vegas.

facility.title: Ivory Suite
facility.desc: At 1,000 square feet, our newly remodeled Ivory Suite is big on style, comfort and space. The suites warm, exotic woods and lavish, colorful furnishings will make you feel right at home. And with amenities such as a full bar, walk in closet and well appointed living room, its very easy to do so.

facility.title: Bistro Buffet
facility.desc: Breakfast 8am-10am, Lunch 11am-3pm Dinner 4pm-9pm Sunday brunch 8am-3pm The all you can eat Bistro Buffet consistently competes for the top spot among upscale buffets in Vegas. Its got an array of live cooking, carving and fresh prep stations along with a huge spread of sumptuous samplings from around the world. With over 250 items daily, its easy to see why the Bistro Buffet is one of the best value buffets in town.

facility.title: N9NE Steakhouse
facility.desc: Restaurant Opens at 5:30 p.m. Bar opens at 5 p.m.N9NE is known as one of the premier steakhouses and celebrity hotspots in Las Vegas. Chef Barry S. Dakake expertly takes the very best of land and sea and creates a diverse menu that changes daily. N9NE is a restaurant where the atmosphere sizzles as much as the food

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: Variety is the key element when it comes to coordinating the perfect meeting. The Palms Casino Resort and Palms Place offer beautifully designed conference rooms, theaters, lounges and restaurants for your next event. But what really sets us apart are our unique venues like Ghostbar. It's no wonder MTV chose the Palms to host the 2007 Video Music Awards. Complementing our 65,000 square feet of meeting space at the Palms is The Pearl, a 2,500-seat concert theater situated directly below a 10,500-square foot ballroom. The Palms and Palms Place is ideal for large conferences and seminars.

facility.title: Superior Room
facility.desc: Vegas is the place to be and the Superior Guestroom is the place to stay. Located in the Palms' Fantasy Tower, you'll be surrounded by amazing amenities and fabulous features. With pillow top mattresses and down comforters and pillows. 510 square feet. Floor-to-ceiling windows. High-speed Internet access, minibar, in-room safe, and 32-inch Plasma TV with premium channels.

facility.title: NEW! Nove Italiano
facility.desc: Opens Daily at 6 p.m. Closed Sunday and Monday.Rome wasnt built in a day but you can get a taste of it in a night. NOVEs Chef de Cuisine Kieran Toivonen prepares classic Italian fare amid chic, playful dcor and stunning views. Feast on NOVEs essential dishes including 8oz filet mignon, fresh fish and of course, pasta made in-house daily

facility.title: Hot Spot! ** GHOSTBAR **
facility.desc: Intimate booths frame the boutique-nightclubs 14-foot floor-to-ceiling windows which complement the lounges unparalleled view of the night sky and city below. Murano-style glistening chandeliers and a deluxe fireplace filled with flameless candles offer a romantic and sleek element to the venue. The sky-deck, complete with boxwood hedges and white banquettes, offers the same sophistication as the interior, but with a whimsical feel. An exclusive new menu offering of Rose champagne hand-crafted cocktails and bottle service will also be available.

facility.title: Premier Room
facility.desc: The perfect balance of comfort and class,the Premier Guestrooms have everything you need and with so much to do on the Vegas strip,it's the perfect way to kick back and relax.Check in time on Friday, Saturday and Sunday is 4 p.m.All rooms and suites in the Ivory Tower have been remodeled in an ultra-chic and modern style.Designed by Klai Juba Architects,the sophisticated Premier rooms feature horizontal lines, warm wood tones and vibrant luxe velvets.Each sleek space is highlighted by a dramatic, custom mural that extends horizontally wall to wall above the bed. The mural contains a seductive set of eyes and bold colored palm leaves which complements the rooms sleek design.Each room provides luxurious amenities for the ultimate guest experience including a Serta pillow top mattress, lush down feather pillows and bedding,and a 46 inch Samsung HD LED Television.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The Palms Hotel is a 703-room masterpiece offering the very best in resort entertainment. Inside this comfortably upscale tropical paradise you'll find an eclectic mix of restaurants and lounges, and salon, a 14-screen movie theater and conference facilities. Conveniently located on Flamingo Road just West of I-15, The Palms sits just one mile west of the Las Vegas Strip. Visit the Forum Shops aboard complimentary transportation.

facility.title: Fortunes
facility.desc: Opens Daily at 10 a.m. A restaurant within a restaurant, Fortunes is an exclusive space inside 24 Seven Cafe. Known for its delicious variety of dim sum classics served tableside, you can also find several hot pot options and popular Chinese favorites like orange chicken, lettuce wraps, Kung Pao beef, chow mein and more.

facility.title: The Eatery and Chocolat Bistro
facility.desc: Open 24 hours.The Eatery is our collection of popular, fast casual restaurants located at the west end of the casino. No matter what or when you're craving, you can always grab a quick bite and then get back to the good times. With roots in Italy, the world famous Chocolat Bistro will be a stylishly chic fusion of traditional European gelateria, creperie and patisserie featuring delectable crepes, handcrafted chocolates, a palette of bright, fruit gelatos and an array of mouthwatering desserts. The space will be chocolate chic, bringing the taste of top tier chocolates to life through contemporary design featuring rich wood tones, creamy caramel accents and sparkling chandeliers all complementing a menu designed to make every bite delectable.

facility.title: Scarlet
facility.desc: 9Group Las Vegas will bring a new sophisticated bar with an elaborate mixology program created by renowned mixologist Francesco Lafranconi to Palms with the opening of Scarlet. Scarlet will provide an intimate atmosphere and a select libation menu featuring top-shelf liquors, unique infused spirits, exclusive signature cocktails and much more.

facility.title: 24/7 Cafe
facility.desc: With a menu as diverse as the day is long, 24 Seven Caf is always delicious and always open. Serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, late-night and everything in between, this caf is a great place to sit back and relax with friends or grab some takeout and keep on going.

hotel.name: Wyndham Garden Baronne Plaza Hotel
hotel.description: Located in the National Historic Lower Central Business District, this building was constructed in 1931 and features the original Art Deco stone and granite facade. The elegant lobby boasts the original marble floors, stately columns, and stained glass skylights. Its excellent location, only one block from Canal Street and the French Quarter, offers convenient access to New Orleans' most famous landmarks, including Jackson Square, French Market, Riverwalk, Casinos, New Orleans Convention Center, Jax Brewery, Riverfront Streetcar Line, Aquarium of the Americas, all Mississippi River attractions, and the Super Dome. A valid major credit card is required at check in for all guests. No pets, including service animals, are allowed at this property.
hotel.airportsDesc: Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport

hotel.name: Hollywood Historic Hotel
hotel.description: The Hollywood Historic Hotel opened in 1927 at the beginning of the early glamour days of Hollywood. Recently restored, the hotel honors the Old Hollywood Era and style. Built by acclaimed architect S. Charles Lee, The Hollywood Historic Hotel is a historic landmark of the "Golden Era". The hallways and rooms adorn black and white photos of the 1920's and 30's Hollywood and the celebrities of it's time. Hollywood Historic Hotel is located on the famous Melrose Ave. and is just ONE block away from Paramount Pictures/ Paramount Studios and 10 minutes away from the Hollywood Walk of Fame. The rooms offer nostalgic views of the Hollywood Sign, Griffith Observatory and Downtown Los Angeles Skyscrapers. A landmark property in the heart of Hollywood. The Hollywood Historic Hotel rooms offer state of the art card key locks, LCD TV's with premium channels,stainless steel refrigerators, coffee makers with coffee and condiments,high quality linens,towels,amenities and spacious Eastern King beds. The front desk is open 24 hours a day. Parking is Free. Must be 18 or older to check in. Please note that the deposit policy is $100 due upon check in per room per stay.

hotel.name: Lamothe House
hotel.description: Nestled in the ancient oaks of Esplanade Avenue, the ornate architectural detail of the past meets modern comfort and convenience in our restoration of the historic Lamothe House hotel. Featuring an elaborate courtyard accented by mature landscaping, a garden pond, and a refreshing pool, peace and relaxation are just steps away from the thrill the Crescent City has to offer. In addition to 30 guest rooms refinished in traditional style, five grand Antique Suites have been preserved from the original 1839 construction of the home of Jean Lamothe, a wealthy sugar cane planer of French descent. Furnished with antique furniture & artwork, the detail and charm that exemplifies old New Orleans is accessible to today's traveler. Not to be overlooked is the Faubourg Marigny neighborhood the Lamothe House calls home. Here visitors will find Frenchmen Street, often referred to as "the local's Bourbon Street", which features some of the best local music and cuisine found in the French Quarter. Whether it's your first or your next visit to the Big Easy, find the authentic New Orleans experience you are searching for at the Lamothe House.
hotel.airportsDesc: MSY
hotel.areaServed: Lamothe House is located on Esplanade Avenue, one of the French Quarter's most famous Oak Lined streets, steps away from the action, but not sleeping in the middle of it.

facility.title: Marigny Brasserie
facility.desc: A casually-chic place to dine. It is a favorite among locals, foodies, and the well-informed tourist. Our friendly and helpful servers take extreme care in every aspect of your dining experience. High ceilings, natural light, and ceiling fans create an intimate atmosphere with a warm welcoming feel. Walking Distance.

facility.title: Deluxe King
facility.desc: Our Deluxe One King Guest Room is furnished with one King bed. Boasting an extraordinary courtyard with mature landscaping, a garden pond, and a refreshing pool, the Lamothe House is the perfect retreat from your Big Easy exploration. In the guest rooms, guests will find antique heart of pine floors, white Carrera marble bathrooms, and all the modern conveniences and technology the seasoned traveler expects including complimentary wireless internet, LED TVs with HD programming, alarm clock with MP3, and Keurig coffee makers.

facility.title: Fiorella's
facility.desc: Fiorella's is noted for casual dining in the Quarter by the famous French Market with its famous fried chicken fried fresh to order. Walking Distance.

facility.title: Dining
facility.desc: Continental Breakfast and Afternoon Sherry. Many Restaurants within walking distance including Emeril's NOLA, Red Fish Grill, K-Paul's, The Bourbon House, etc.

facility.title: Cafe Du Monde
facility.desc: Grab yourself a table! It's first come first served at Cafe du Monde. Open twenty four hours a day, Cafe du Monde is a popular late night spot. Of course, mornings and nights can blur together in New Orleans. Cafe du Monde sells delicious cafe au lait (pronounced Ca-Fay-O-Lay) which is made from steamed milk, coffee and chicory, beignets (pronounced "Ben-Yay") - which are french donuts drowned in powdered sugar and are quite tasty, hot chocolate, and an ambiance not found anywhere else in the world! Walking Distance.

facility.title: Praline Connection
facility.desc: The candy shop and down-home restaurant offering authentic, no-nonsense soul food. Walking Distance.

facility.title: Quarter Scene
facility.desc: Located just one block off Bourbon Street, the Quarter Scene is a local's favorite restaurant within easy reach of the tourist looking for a more genuine experience than offered on Bourbon Street. Offering both true New Orleans' cooking and a comfortable place to meet locals and other travelers. The warm, casual atmosphere features large windows overlooking the always colorful sights of the French Quarter. The menu features items that will entice everyone from the traditional list to the adventuresome, with an emphasis on fresh local ingredients prepared with a homemade touch. The menu includes such New Orleans necessities as savory Gumbo, spicy Shrimp Remoulade, enormous Oyster, Shrimp or Roast Beef Po'Boys, spectacular entree salads, seafood platters, and Country FriedSteak with the best Country Gravy in the Quarter.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Lamothe House is located on Esplanade Avenue, one of the French Quarter's most famous streets, and a bounding street, so you are steps away from the action, but not sleeping in the middle of it. One of the city's best kept secrets, the Faubourg Marigny, is just steps from the Lamothe House.

hotel.name: The Whitehall Hotel
hotel.description:
The Whitehall Hotel remains a landmark destination in downtown Chicago, offering a very European sense of grace and grandeur. Thanks to meticulous restorations. In perfect harmony with the old world charm are modern conveniences such as a fitness center. In-room features include three multi-line telephones with voicemail, high speed internet (for fee). Step outside and you'll find that the hotel is ideally located in the heart of the Gold Coast, nestled amid the Magnificent Mile's shops, restaurants, theaters, entertainment, and the business district. The Whitehall Hotel, Downtown Chicago's True Independent Boutique Hotel, proudly and successfully endures the test of time. The hotel will exceed your expectations and invite you to explore The Whitehall Hotel today.

This property is 100% smoke free

hotel.name: El Patio Inn
hotel.description:
Located just 1.5 miles from Universal Studios Hollywood; this petit hotel's Spanish style villas have a romantic atmosphere with hacienda warmth and charm. The El Patio Inn is a historic building. the rooms have been completely renovated in 2013. The guest rooms are quaint and comfortable with modern conveniences for your traveling needs with newer furnishings throughout. The hotel is minutes to fine dining, shopping, and entertainment, additional amenities include: Complimentary assorted packaged pastries and hot beverages,juice, free local calls,Complimentary Cable TV; express check-out, wake-up service, concierge services, laundry valet service, Complimentary Wi-Fi and Universal Studios tickets available at the front desk.
Please note the following: No Pets (Only Service Dogs) Deposit of $100 per stay. Roll away beds are available at $25 per night. Bed types during busy times are not guaranteed (Double, Queen) Utility Surcharge to be at $5.00 per night We have only a room with an over sized Jacuzzi There is no public Hot Tub for use. Due to busy summer season, we unfortunately cannot guarantee bed size (either double or queen).

hotel.name: Grand Palms Hotel Spa & Golf Resort
hotel.description:
Grand Palms Hotel - Spa and Golf Resort is a full service South Florida resort situated on over 500 acres of tropical beauty. 137 rooms including 36 lavish suites, outstanding restaurant, lounge, meeting and banquet facilities added to three quintessential 9-hole Golf courses within more than a thousand palm trees makes the Grand Palms a tropical paradise.
Grand Palms 27 holes of championship golf is proud to introduce you to our PGA Certified Instructor from National Professional Golf Instructors Association Ken Williams. Practice stations for personal lessons; videotape your swing for a take home teaching analysis. Our tennis courts facility boasts six magnificent Har-tru clay courts lighted for your choice of day or night play. Weekly clinics, Private or Group lessons, and Junior Programs available with a USTA, ITA, USPTA certified instructors.
Escape from everyday stresses of life at our relaxing Grand Palms Hotel-Spa Resort. Re-energize in our state-of-the-art Health Club and rejuvenate in our tranquil Spa and Salon. Our Wellness program provides treatments, methods and lectures toward positive change for optimum health and well-being.
Grand Palms Resort Continental Restaurant is open daily for breakfast, lunch and dinner where you can enjoy indoor and outdoor seating. Grand Palms Resort is now equipped with the new lightning fast secure mesh node PerfectWiFi technology.
Must be at least 21 years old to check in.
Major credit card required at check in time.

hotel.name: Andrew Pinckney Inn
hotel.description: Circa 1840-meticulously restored-w/expanded Continental Breakfast served on the Rooftop Garden Terrace overlooking the Market Area and Charlestons Waterfront. The Andrew Pinckney's three story atrium and outdoor courtyard with lions head fountain are perfect for relaxation after a busy day. The Rooftop Terrace is noted for spectacular sunsets, silhouetting the Church steeples and historic landmarks of the enchanting city. Charleston is truly a living museum of Art and Architecture. A short walk to nationally famous local restaurants, horse drawn carriages, historic homes, art galleries, museums, antique shops, and the visitors center. sightseeing tours pick up in the lobby.
