facility.title: Queen Guestroom (Accessible)
facility.desc: You will find our beautifully appointed Queen Guestrooms located in the Church Street Building. These modest sized Charleston accommodations reflect a traditional British West Indies style in a soothing palette of blues and greens accompanied by modern amenities and plush queen bed. All complemented by lovely views of the magnolia-and-hibiscus charm on Church Street or into our three story atrium. Queen Guestroom baths are highlighted with Italian Travertine porcelain tile, granite countertops, and spa quality Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities.

facility.title: Traditional Guestroom (Double Beds)
facility.desc: Decorated in tasteful hues and furnishings, our spacious Traditional Guestrooms offer a relaxing retreat for guests. Boasting plush bedding and duvet, these Charleston accommodations feature two double beds. The Traditional Guestrooms are outfitted with modern in-room comforts, Italian Travertine porcelain tile and granite countertop bathrooms, and Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities.

facility.title: Traditional Guestroom (King)
facility.desc: Decorated in tasteful hues and furnishings, our spacious Traditional Guestrooms offer a relaxing retreat for guests. Boasting plush bedding and duvet, these Charleston accommodations feature one king bed. The Traditional Guestrooms are outfitted with modern in-room comforts, Italian Travertine porcelain tile and granite countertop bathrooms, and Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities.

facility.title: Junior Suite
facility.desc: Our spacious Junior Suites are beautifully appointed with an oversized sitting area complete with sleeper sofa, writing desk, and plush king bed. Located in the three story atrium of the Church Street Building, these Charleston accommodations feature a colorful birds eye view of the rooftops of Charleston. Each Junior Suite is appointed with modern in-room conveniences and Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities.

facility.title: Cotesworth Suite
facility.desc: The Cotesworth Suite features a king bed and expansive sitting area boasting a comfortable sleeper sofa and chairs. Additional rich wood furnishings, including a separate wring desk, complement the traditional British West Indies color palate of light blues and soothing greens. Sun drenched windows fill the suite with an abundance of natural light and afford views overlooking historic Pinckney Street. The bathroom features a whirlpool tub, granite countertop, and spa quality Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities.

facility.title: St. Philips Suite
facility.desc: This St. Philips Suite features magnificent views of the Market Street area and St. Philips steeple from the arched glass doors and Juliet balcony. Wrapped in the soothing light blues, sage greens and accented with exposed brick, the one-of-a-kind St. Philips suite abundantly provides both historic and romantic charm. The luxurious bathroom is enhanced with hand-laid Italian Travertine tile, granite countertops, Kohler bath fixtures, and a soaking tub with spa-like shower combination. The suite offers premium in-room comforts and Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities.

facility.title: Townhouse Suite
facility.desc: Our two story Townhouse Suites feature a downstairs separate living area which boasts a comfortable pullout sleeper sofa, half bath, and wet bar area - complete with mini-refrigerator and microwave. The upstairs master bedroom offers a king size bed and sitting area with writing desk. The full size bath, encased in hand-laid Italian Travertine porcelain tile, features granite countertops, Kohler bath fixtures and spa quality Gilchrist & Soames amenities. The Townhouse Suites are outfitted with a host of modern in-room comforts and amenities.

facility.title: Queen Guestroom
facility.desc: You will find our beautifully appointed Queen Guestrooms located in the Church Street Building. These modest sized Charleston accommodations reflect a traditional British West Indies style in a soothing palette of blues and greens accompanied by modern amenities and plush queen bed. All complemented by lovely views of the magnolia-and-hibiscus charm on Church Street or into our three story atrium. Queen Guestroom baths are highlighted with Italian Travertine porcelain tile, granite countertops, and spa quality Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities.

facility.desc: Located in close proximity to many of Charleston's attractions. Within a mile of the hotel is the IMAX Theatre, SC Aquarium, Powder Magazine,Old Exchange and Provost Dungeon, Gibbes Museum of Art, Charleston Museum, Confederate Museum and the Nathaniel Russell House.

hotel.name: Courtyard by Marriott Birmingham Downtown at UAB
hotel.description: The Courtyard Birmingham Downtown hotel near UAB Medical Center is ideal for business or leisure travelers, equipped with inviting accommodations and smartly designed work areas. Adjacent to UAB's North Pavilion parking deck, the Birmingham hotel features easy access to the hospital via an enclosed sky bridge. Guests will especially enjoy our new, state-of-the-art lobby experience, the highlight of which is The Bistro - Eat.Drink.Connect. The on-site restaurant includes enhanced food and beverage options in the morning, all-new dinner service, and The Market, open 24 hours with fresh sandwiches and snacks. Our hotel in Birmingham offers beautifully designed guest rooms with free wireless Internet in the heart of the UAB campus and medical district. This Birmingham hotel also features flexible event space accommodating up to 80 people for your next Birmingham, AL event. Start planning your stay today at the Courtyard hotel in Birmingham.

hotel.name: Courtyard Houston Medical Center
hotel.description: The New Courtyard by Marriott Houston Medical Center provides greater flexibility and choices for all our guests. This Medical Center/Reliant Park hotel is within minutes to major centers in Houston such as the Texas Medical Center which houses the world renowned MD Anderson, Reliant Park, Downtown Houston, the famous Business District of the Galleria but also close to companies such as Shell, Schlumberger, R-Stahl and NDT System. The highlights of this new hotel features an inviting lobby, flexible spaces to work or relax in, free Wi-Fi throughout and easy access to the latest news, weather and airport conditions via our GoBoard. facility.title: The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect.®

hotel.name: Travelodge Clearwater Central
hotel.description:
Welcome to the TRAVELODGE CLEARWATER CENTRAL
Our location allows you to experience the areas plentiful attractions--beautiful beaches, water sports, golf, museums, Brighthouse Field, Phillies Spring Training, Clearwater Threshers, McMullen Tennis Centre, Long Centre, Ruth Eckerd Hall, Clearwater Beach, Pier 60, Tropicana Field, Busch Gardens, shopping, and much more.
We have a large, resort-style OUTDOOR HEATED POOL. Come relax by the nicest pool in town
Start your day with our complimentary Bear Bites continental breakfast, as well as enjoy the guest barbecue, located in one of the picnic kiosks surrounding our tropical outdoor heated pool.
We offer free Wi-Fi -lightning speed- in all rooms and public areas, and a computer kiosk with Internet access and printer.
Enjoy premium cable with over 100 channels -HBO and ESPN included-, in-room safe, coffee-maker, iron and ironing board and hairdryer.
Pets stay free. As not all rooms are pet-friendly, please call ahead to reserve a pet room. We have a fully fenced outdoor pet area on property.
Weekly rates available. Please contact hotel directly.
With comfortable accommodations and renowned Florida hospitality, the Travelodge Clearwater Central offers you a truly outstanding stay.

hotel.name: Hobby Airport Inn
hotel.description:
If youre flying into Houstons William P. Hobby Airport, stay at our Hobby Airport Inn Houston TX airport hotel, just (1) one mile from the airport " or a quick shuttle ride! Our Transportation is complimentary for groups and individuals.
Thank you for your interest in the Hobby Airport INN Houston Hobby Airport property.
Our Houston hotel is popular with business travelers because of its close proximity to Interstate 45, Port of Houston, Beltway 8 and Almeda Mall. All locations are within a quick drive
Enjoy free Bear Bites breakfast each morning that includes, fruits, assorted pastries, freshly made waffles,and assorted cereals. We offer free Wi-Fi Internet access at our affordable hotel in Houston as well as complimentary parking. Our guest rooms feature pillow top mattresses, refrigerators, microwaves and 32-inch LCD TVs for your enjoyment. Our outdoor pool offers you a refreshing break from the hustle and bustle of Houston happenings. Laundry facilities onsite, vending machines, free local calls and discounted rates for extended stays are just a few of the reasons savvy travels trust our hotel near Houston airport.
For your groups enjoyment we offer VIP group service including Complimentary Welcome Reception upon arrival, rooms pre-registered and blocked together, and departing gift.
Visit our front desk to inquire about how we can help you work on the go via fax, copy and computer services.
We offer complimentary onsite parking, and a free shuttle service to and from William P. Hobby Airport.
Thank you for your interest and we look forward to speaking with you soon!!
all guest go to baggage claim area and walk out to pick up area 9 b just outside of the baggage claim area.

hotel.areaServed: Regardless of what your interests are, Houston has attractions just right for you. From Space Center Houston (home to NASA's Mission Control) to the largest Fine Arts Museum in the Southwest, the options are many.

hotel.name: Hollywood Beach Marriott
hotel.description: Get away to our charming, boutique-style Hollywood Beach hotel on the Broadwalk, rated AAA 4-Diamonds and nestled between the Atlantic Ocean and the Intracoastal Waterway, and a world apart from the everyday. The Hollywood Beach Marriott offers guests a dazzling South Florida oceanfront location, yet we are just an easy 6 miles from the Fort Lauderdale airport and 8 miles from the Port Everglades cruise ships. Featuring 229 South Floridian style guest rooms, this hotel in Hollywood, Florida boasts an array of amenities such as plush Marriott bedding, wide balconies and tranquil Atlantic ocean views. Relax and bask in the sun at our beachfront pool or explore the world-famous Broadwalk just steps away, with fabulous café dining, shopping, and nightlife. With elegant indoor and stunning outdoor venues, our Resort in Hollywood, Florida can easily accommodate your meeting and event needs. We look forward to your visit to the Hollywood Beach Marriott.
hotel.airportsDesc: Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport, (FLL), 6.00, MI, SE; Miami International Airport, (MIA), 30.00, MI, N; Palm Beach International Airport, (PBI), 52.00, MI, S;

facility.title: Latitudes Restaurant
facility.desc: Our popular Hollywood Beach, Florida restaurant features an eclectic menu of creative, South Florida cuisine. Enjoy fresh seafood, chilled salads, and sizzling entrees, plus an extensive wine list. Breezy, covered patio seating available.

facility.title: Latitudes Tiki Bar
facility.desc: Smooth tropical cocktails as well as tavern favorites are the domain of our talented Tiki mixologists. Enjoy your drinks in a festive setting of Atlantic breezes, live music and widescreen televisions.

hotel.name: The Resort on Mount Charleston
hotel.description:
Experience the New Resort on Mount Charleston, Event and Conference Center! Only 30 minutes from Downtown Las Vegas and located high in the crisp clean air of the Toiyabe National Forest, you will find majestic mountainous surroundings, breathtaking views and a variety of outdoor activities year-round. Are you interested in getting married, or hosting a family or business event at the hotel? We offer full-service event coordination to help plan your perfect affair.

A Resort Fee of $9.95 plus tax per night will be assessed at the front desk. Resort fee includes in-room coffee, 2 bottles of Mt. Charleston Water, wireless internet, parking and 24-hour access to the wet and dry saunas.

The hotel does allow pets however there is a maximum of two dogs allowed per guest per night with a maximum weight of 25 pounds. The cost is 25 USD per dog per night plus any applicable tax. Management reserves the right to refuse aggressive dog breeds or dogs that are noisy and/or uncontrollable.

hotel.name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Birmingham-South/Inverness
hotel.description: Enjoy a warm welcome and home comforts at our Birmingham hotelLocated just 15 minutes from downtown Birmingham and Hoover, Alabama, the Homewood Suites by Hilton® Birmingham-South/Inverness hotel is ideally situated near the city’s biggest businesses and popular dining, shopping and tourist attractions. Discover the Alabama Jazz Hall of Fame, Birmingham Museum of Art and Talladega Super Speedway.Enjoy a refreshing stay with the comforts of home at this inviting all-suite Birmingham hotel. Unwind in a modern, comfortable one- or two-bedroom suite with enough space to entertain, relax or catch up with work. Enjoy the privacy offered by separate living and sleeping areas and stay entertained with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and complimentary high-speed internet access. Relax and refresh after a day’s business or sightseeing on a comfortable king -or queen-sized bed.Let us make you feel at home with a complimentary hot full breakfast, and welcome you in the evening with complimentary evening dinner and drinks* served Monday through Thursday. Take advantage of our contemporary business facilities including a 24-hour business center featuring two workstations along with printing and fax capabilities. Be sure to host your next meeting or social event in one of our versatile meeting rooms.Enjoy a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool and visit the fully equipped fitness center or sport court for a great workout during your stay.* Local and state laws

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites
hotel.description:
This North Little Rock, Arkansas hotel has been open since 2009, and is one of the best hotels in North Little Rock, Arkansas. A Champion Award winner in 2012 and TripAdvisor® Award of Excellence winner in 2013, experience it for yourself with a stay at this centrally located Arkansas hotel.
Outside the BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, guests will find themselves just off Interstates 30 and 40 and surrounded by plenty to see and do while visiting the area including the Arkansas State Fair, McCain Mall, William J. Clinton Presidential Library & Museum, University of Arkansas of Little Rock, the University of Arkansas Medical Science and the Verizon Arena, all just minutes away.
Inside the 100% non-smoking BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, guests will find the best customer service and amenities in North Little Rock for the best price. This North Little Rock hotel offers guests well-appointed accommodations and suites, each complete with cable satellite television and free high-speed Internet access. Other hotel amenities include a complimentary full hot breakfast each morning, indoor swimming pool and spa, onsite exercise room and coin operated laundry facilities.
Business guests of this North Little Rock hotel will also enjoy the onsite executive board room, full-service business center and staying close by the Arkansas State Capitol, Arkansas Blue Cross® Blue Shield®, Georgia-Pacific Railroad and more.

hotel.name: Hotel Veritas
hotel.description: Hotel Veritas is a 31-room luxury, boutique hotel in Harvard Square offering personalized service in an intimate Cantabrigian setting. Guest are as diverse and interesting as Harvard University and the city itself.Boutique hotel in Cambridge, MA strives to provide hotel guests with wonderful, memorable experiences. The entire look and feel of hotel near Harvard University is elegant and current, with a respectful nod towards traditional and historic neighborhood. The hotel's guest room accommodations, while small in size, are designed with the fine detailing of an old New England residence and furnishings that are interesting contemporary pieces with rich fabrics and textures.
hotel.airportsDesc: Logan International Airport. 6.0 miles.
hotel.areaServed: Cambridge, Boston, Harvard, Harvard Square, MIT

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Hotel Veritas is located on the eastern edge of Harvard Square in Cambridge, MA, just steps from world-renowned Harvard Yard.

facility.title: Petite Queen
facility.desc: Hotel Queen room, which is ideal for guests for a brief visit and without a great deal of luggage, has one Queen bed with exquisite Anichini Egyptian cotton linens, down duvet and pillows. Marble shower with Palais Jamais by Etro bath amenities and Anichini Turkish robes and towels. HD TV, smoke free, about 175 square feet. Rate includes complimentary wireless Internet access, Nespresso coffee, tea, bottled water, juices, sodas, and access to the Gym at Karma Yoga. Nine Petite Queen rooms are located on the first and second floors, both front and rear facing.

facility.title: Deluxe Queen
facility.desc: Deluxe Queen room has one Queen bed with exquisite Anichini Egyptian cotton linens, down duvet and pillows. Marble shower with Palais Jamais by Etro bath amenities and Anichini Turkish robes and towels. HD TV, smoke free, about 200 square feet. Rate includes complimentary wireless Internet access, Nespresso coffee, tea, bottled water, juices, sodas, and access to the Gym at Karma Yoga. 11 Queen rooms are located throughout the hotel, both front and rear facing.

facility.title: Simple Truth Lounge
facility.desc: The small lobby of Hotel Veritas is called the Simple Truth Lounge - an elegant, intimate place for hotel guests (and a very few interesting "outsiders") to meet for a cocktail or glass of wine. Hotel cocktail and beer lists are focused on offering the best libations made in Massachusetts, with a few other regions thrown in for fun.

hotel.name: Howard Johnson Inn Fullerton Hotel And Conference Center
hotel.description:
Located Close to Disneyland With Free Shuttle to Disneyland Parks and a Free Hot Buffet Breakfast.
Save Money. Keep the Comfort.
10 minutes from Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center, and Knotts Berry Farm, the Howard Johnson Inn Fullerton Hotel And Conference Center aims to save you money without cutting out things most important about a hotel stay.
FREE Wireless Internet.
FREE Kiosk Computer Usage.
FREE Parking.
NO Resort Fee.
Beware the Hidden Fees.

hotel.name: The Westin Tysons Corner
hotel.description: Find the best of yourself at The Westin Tysons Corner. After a recent $22 million renovation, our hotel offers all the personal touches you need to retreat from the rigors of travel and emerge revitalized and renewed. Located in the heart of the Tysons Corner neighborhood and convenient to shopping and major highways, our hotel is also minutes away from the dynamic city of Washington D.C. A rich and vibrant shrine to American history, Washington D.C. also offers world-class dining and shopping. We strive to create a restorative atmosphere by anticipating the needs of our guests and tending to them intuitively. Our 405 superbly comfortable guest rooms are each equipped with High Speed Internet Access, a flat panel TV, 24-hour room service and our signature bath amenities to help replenish your body and elevate your senses. We are also proud to offer an invigorating WestinWORKOUT? Gym. These unique fitness facilities feature Stairmasters, LifeCycles, treadmills, weights, and everything else you need for an energy-building workout that?s second to none. A tranquil oasis residing beside our nation?s capital, The Westin Tyson?s Corner offers something for everyone, whether you want to work, relax, or explore.

hotel.name: Wyndham Hamilton Park Hotel and Conference Center
hotel.description: Nestled on acres of rolling woodlands, this Wyndham Hamilton Park Hotel and Conference Center offers upmarket amenities and premier meeting facilities just minutes from Morristown and a host of Fortune 500 companies. This hotel is also convenient to New York City and the Newark International Airport. Swim indoors in inclement weather or outdoors in the sunshine in the indoor and outdoor pools, and stay active in the state-of-the-art fitness center and racquetball courts. Enjoy two bars and a variety of dining options for all meals, as well as room service all day. The hotel shuttle is a complimentary service to all our registered guests for rides to local companies, attractions and restaurants. It is available on an on call basis from 7AM to 11PM seven days a week based on availability. Pets are welcome. A computer center and complimentary wireless Internet throughout the hotel make it easy to stay productive. Over 27,000 square feet of multi-functional meeting space and a team of event professionals make any event a success. Spacious guest rooms feature Keurig coffee-maker, LCD flat-screen TV, ergonomic desk chair and refrigerator. ADA appointed rooms, all wheel chair accessible. Our rooms feature either Courtyard or Forestviews, neither is guaranteed.

hotel.name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Scottsdale Thunderbird Suites
hotel.description:
***Summer Special - 25% off for AAA and AARP members***
In the heart of North Scottsdale, two blocks from Kierland Commons, the BEST WESTERN PLUS Scottsdale Thunderbird Suites is a newly renovated all suites hotel. A warm and friendly atmosphere and a smiling face from our guest services staff are just the first hints of what is in store for you during your stay with us at the BEST WESTERN PLUS Scottsdale Thunderbird Suites. For business or leisure, our hotel offers the services and features to help you make the most of your stay. We are pet friendly! Our resort hotel and Silver Wings Restaurant and Lounge, located in the center of north Scottsdale and two blocks from upscale “main street” Kierland Commons shopping and dining, offers many of the services and amenities that are found at larger Scottsdale resort hotels at a fraction of the cost, yet with an improved service only a smaller hotel can offer. Plus, our hotel is literally only steps next to the new Scottsdale Quarter shopping, dining, and offices. Should nostalgia strike you, our hotel is only minutes from Old Town Scottsdale with its myriad of boutique shops and galleries.
At the BEST WESTERN PLUS Scottsdale Thunderbird Suites you are close to home". We treat you to our own special brand of hometown hospitality. Our location is a perfect setting for your leisure travel in the Valley of the Sun or those ever important business meetings and seminars. No matter what your purpose for coming to Scottsdale, Phoenix or other points in the Valley, our resort hotel makes it happen for you.

hotel.description: The Beachcomber Beach Resort and Hotel located directly on St. Pete Beach provides a resort style atmosphere on 5.5 acres of lush tropical landscaped gardens on our own private beach, on the sun-kissed shores of the Gulf of Mexico located on beautiful St. Pete Beach. No HIDDEN RESORT FEES.At No further charge you get FREE Parking, Free use of Fitness Center, FREE Unlimited Wireless Internet Access with your own computer, FREE Pool Towels, FREE Chaise Lounges at the Pool FREE Coffee in the Lobby Every Morning, FREE Local Phone Calls, FREE HBO Movies, FREE Disney Channel, FREE Live Entertainment Every Day & Night, FREE Membership to Beachcomber Beach Resort Beach Club, FREE use of amenities at our sister property Grand Plaza Beachfront Resort Hotel & Conference Center.

facility.title: Tropical Garden & Fountain View Guestroom with Kitchenette
facility.desc: Comfortable guest room with an outdoor seating area and a view of our lush tropical gardens. Two extra long double beds with pillowtop mattresses. Guestroom amenities include Flat Screen TV and FREE HBO & Disney Channel, DVD player, refrigerator, hair dryer, bathroom toiletries, extra towels, oversized closet, iron and iron board, in room safe, telephone with voicemail & FREE unlimited wireless internet access. Kitchen facilities are in a separate room from the bedroom. Kitchens include a microwave oven, stove, oven, toaster & coffeemaker with complimentary coffee, ceiling fan, dining table & chairs. Also included are dishware, glassware, cookware and utensils. Ideal for families or extended stays.

facility.title: Tropical Garden & Pool View Guestroom with Kitchenette

Guestroom amenities include Flat Screen TV and FREE HBO & Disney Channel, DVD player, refrigerator, hair dryer, bathroom toiletries, extra towels, oversized closet, iron and iron board, in room safe, telephone with voicemail & FREE unlimited wireless internet access. Also included are dishware, glassware, cookware and utensils. Ideal for families or extended stays.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: Beachcomber Beach Resort Hotel is located on a private beach right on Gulf of Mexico. Very closeby to Fort De Soto Park, the City of St. Petersburg, Salvador Dali Museum and Tropicana Field.

facility.title: Players Sports Bar & Grille
facility.desc: Players Sports Bar & Grille offers today's top sporting events viewed on 30 flat screen TV's. Our state of the art satellite systems enable us to get all the sports all the time, so no one misses a game. Pool Table and Free NTN Interactive Trivia are also available.

facility.title: Jimmy B's Beach Bar
facility.desc: For the beach lovers, newly designed Jimmy B's Beach Bar will serve you a tall, chilled cocktail while you witness our spectacular, fiery sunsets. Enjoy top local live entertainment that will keep you dancing until the late night hours so don't forget your dancing shoes. The atmosphere and local natives are so welcoming you will feel you are among your oldest and best friends.

facility.title: SuperSaver Guestroom
facility.desc: Comfortable guest room with an outdoor seating area. Two extra long double beds or one king bed with pillowtop mattresses. Guestroom amenities include Flat Screen TV and FREE HBO & Disney Channel, DVD player, refrigerator, hair dryer, bathroom toiletries, extra towels, oversized closet, iron and iron board, in room safe, telephone with voicemail & FREE unlimited wireless internet access.

hotel.name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Panama City Beach
hotel.description:
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Panama City Beach was recently named a 2014 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence award winner!
Certified "Green Hotel" by the Florida Green Lodging Program.
NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
Experience convenience and a great location off Hwy 98 in Panama City Beach, Florida. Our Panama City Beach hotel is a mile from the world's most beautiful beaches and close to many nearby restaurants. You can walk to the Hooters restaurant, Quiznos, Burger King or Bruesters Ice Cream or take a short drive to Captain Andersons, Schooners, Angelos Steak Pit, Dirty Dicks Crab House or the Saltwater Grill and others. Visit the local attractions of Panama City Beach such as Panama City Beach, St. Andrews State Park, Frank Brown Park, Marina Civic Center, Aquatic Adventures, Zoo World, Ripleys Believe it or Not, Captain Andersons Marina and much more.
If you are here on business you will find that this hotel is nearby many local companies; US Coast Guard Station, Arinc, Naval Support Activity, General Dynamics, Gryphon Technologies, SAIC, L3 Communications and others.
Wake up on the Bright Side with our daily breakfast featuring waffles, eggs, meats, hot and cold cereals, bread, bagels, muffins, fresh fruit along with coffee, milk and juices.
Feel recharged after a great nights sleep on our deluxe pillow top mattresses. Each inviting guest room is equipped with microwave, refrigerator, iron, iron board, hair dryer, free Wi-Fi and an HDTV. Wake up to freshly made coffee prepared the way you like in your guest room coffeemaker.
Relax by our spacious sparkling pool or spa. Hotel offers guest laundry facility, business center. Hotel also offers meeting facilities for your meetings or family gatherings. Our parking wi

hotel.name: Ramada Tampa Airport Westshore
hotel.description:
The Ramada Tampa Airport Westshore. We are located in the heart of the Tampa Westshore district less than 1 Mile to Tampa International Airport TPA.
We are surrounded by the Bay Areas finest dining, shopping and entertainment. We are just minutes from Busch Gardens, University of South Florida, Port of Tampa, Downtown Tampa, Tampa Convention Center, University of Tampa, The Florida Aquarium and Historic Ybor City.
The hotel hosts an on-premise restaurant and bar. Royal Orchid International Cuisine offers an affordable lunch and dinner menu featuring the best wings in Tampa Bay. Special drink pricing and live entertainment are also a trademark of this new restaurant and bar. Royal Orchid International Cuisine is open seven days a week from 11 AM until Closing.
Raymond James Stadium, home of the NFL Tampa Bay Buccaneers and USF Bulls Football, Steinbrenner Field, spring training home of New York Yankees is also 5 minutes from this Westshore hotel. The St. Pete Times Forum, home to the NHL Tampa Bay Lightning is a 10 minute drive. The Ramada Tampa Airport Westshore is central to all of Tampa fine sports venues, including the Ed Radice Sports Complex.
Ask about our fully renovated Executive Guest rooms featuring all new furniture, microwave/refrigerator, flat screen TV and brand new pillow-top bedding.
Our hotel with 10000 square feet of combined meeting and banquet space features, free wireless high speed internet, free local calls, fitness center, business center and an outdoor heated pool as standard amenities. We are an ideal choice for the business traveler, sports enthusiast, a family vacation, shopping excursion, quick overnight or last minute getaway. Cribs, microwaves,refrigerators,desks,adjoining and connecting rooms all available upon request.
ADA certified service animals are welcome at this hotel. Sorry, no other pets are allowed.

hotel.name: Rime Garden Inn and Suites
hotel.description:
The Rime Garden Inn & Suites campus-style environment is relaxing and invigorating; High-Speed Internet, Complimentary Breakfast Buffet & 24-hr shuttle transportation are just a few of our plentiful amenities. The property is within walking distance of shopping and a beautiful park with tennis courts, walking track, playground, and pavilion. We offer membership to an off-site full service gym. The Rime Garden Inn and Suites offers full service meeting facilities that can accommodate up to 200 people. Let the hotel's professional sales and catering staff assist you in planning a successful event. A stay with The Rime Garden Inn and Suites puts you minutes away from the Birmingham airport, EWTN, malls, Birmingham Motor sports Park and all of Birmingham.
A credit card or cash deposit must be presented at check-in for incidental charges.
hotel.airportsDesc: Birmingham International Airport (BMH). 24 hour shuttle service. Park & Fly package available-free parking.

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites ROSEVILLE - GALLERIA AREA
hotel.description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Roseville Galleria Area. Ideally located in Roseville, California and nestled between the lush Sacramento Valley and the Sierra Nevada mountains, our hotel is convenient to many local attractions and just 20 miles east of Sacramento. Explore California's natural beauty during your stay at our Roseville hotel. Families will enjoy experiencing all that Roseville has to offer. Local attractions such as Golfland Family Fun Center and Amusement Park, Magic Circle Theatre, the Maidu Indian Museum and Folsom Lake are within minutes. You can shop at the Westfield Galleria Mall or pick up some local produce and crafts at the Denio's Farmer's Market. Sacramento is just a short drive away, so families can easily explore the California capital during their stay at our Roseville hotel. With convenient access to companies such as Pasco Scientific, Surewest Communications, Union Pacific Railroad, Hewlett-Packard, our hotel is perfect for business travelers who plan to attend meetings in Roseville. During your stay in our hotel in Roseville, California, be sure to enjoy a swim in the outdoor pool, surf the net with free high-speed, wireless Internet access or work out in the fitness center. You can eat well every morning at the free hot breakfast bar featuring our famous cinnamon rolls. Check out our great Roseville hotel deals and book your stay with us today.

hotel.name: Inn on St. Ann
hotel.description: Be a part of our extended French Quarter family at the Inn on St. Ann. This charming French Quarter Inn boasts a courtyard shaded by a century old oak tree and common areas appropriately decorated with antiques, chandeliers, and original artwork. This inn in New Orleans is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Built in 1830, the Inn on St. Ann epitomizes the iconic architecture the French Quarter is often recognized for. With its hanging plants and wrought iron balcony fronting St. Ann, you'll immediately feel the true allure of the French Quarter. Enchanting interior spaces are accented by the exposed brick foyer and grand staircase. Each of our 16 guest rooms has been consistently resorted with traditional finished yet each showcases its own exclusive features with a collection of fireplaces and unique architectural details. The Armstrong Suites, the most admired accommodation of the French Quarter Guest Houses, features floor to ceiling windows opening on to our own private balcony. Whether you desire the grand or quaint, the Inn on ST. Ann has what you're looking for in your next visit to New Orleans. The Inn on St. Ann also features the Marie Laveau Apartments, a hotel property to rich to abandon the name it has carried for decades. A regular stop for all walking tours of the French Quarter, this traditional Creole Cottage was once owned as French Quarter apartments for rent by the famed voodoo priestess of New Orleans, Marie Laveau, as she took up residence in the neighboring home. Carefully restored with traditional finishes, each of the 12 guest rooms at the Marie Laveau tells its own story. It's simply our way of paying tribute to the most powerful lady in the history of the Crescent City. Marie Laveau's services were sought by the rich and poor, black and white, for everything from court cases to affairs of the heart. Much like the voodoo queen, the property attracts visitors and guests of all sorts. The curious and casual, the believers and no-believers. Those seeking a quiet stay or those with the hopes of the mystic. One thing is certain; Comfort, charm, and history can be found in the soothing sounds of the courtyard fountain, the shutters to the French doors, and the unique period details of our guest rooms and suites. Take part in the magical history of the French Quarter at the Inn on ST. Ann and the Marie Laveau Annex.
hotel.airportsDesc: MSY
hotel.areaServed: Located just two blocks from world-famous Bourbon Street, yet in a more residential selection of the French Quarter

hotel.name: Ayres Lodge Alpine
hotel.description:
Natural beauty and warm hospitality define the Ayres Lodge Alpine hotel experience. With its casual elegance, Western-style ambiance and beautiful Southern California scenery, the relaxing Alpine hotel offers a refreshing blend of modern luxury and timeless hospitality in San Diego County. Surrounded by mountain horizons and hometown smiles, Ayres Lodge Alpine is a relaxing retreat for a family vacation or business trip. Guests will enjoy a host of complimentary amenities including extended continental breakfast, parking and WIFI.
Please note: Guests must be at least 21 years of age to check-in/book a room at the Ayres Lodge Alpine.

facility.desc: convenient Alpine hotel, just 30 minutes east of San Diego and the Pacific Ocean, is a peaceful retreat surrounded by the rugged beauty of the California countryside. Getting here is a breeze from Highway 8 and San Diego International Airport. Located a few short miles from Viejas Casino and offers complimentary shuttle.

facility.desc: Standard room with King size Ayres Dream Sleeper double pillow-top bed is 288 sq ft and includes leather sofa pull-out, 32" flat screen TV, executive desk and ergonomic chair. Our bathroom set-up is a shower/tub combination with a separate in-room vanity with hair dryer. Overnight guests enjoy complimentary breakfast, internet, parking and shuttle service to/from Viejas Casino and surrounding area.

hotel.name: Schooner Inn
hotel.description:
Located on the quiet south end peninsula of the Virginia Beach resort area, The Schooner Inn has something to offer everyone. With the Boardwalk and extra wide beach out front and beautiful Rudee inlet to the south and west, this hotel is truly a unique destination. Activities for young and old alike abound to make the most of any vacation. And now, with Virginia Beach*s new Boardwalk, bike trails and Beach Street, USA live entertainment, a Virginia Beach vacation is better than ever.
Enjoy any of the activities that are conveniently available such as surfing, para-sailing, fishing, shopping, jet skis, golf and putt-putt. Please view the Beach Events page to see local attractions, concert schedules and entertainment available during your beautiful Virginia Beach vacation.

hotel.name: The Westin New York Grand Central
hotel.description:
The Westin New York Grand Central's prime Midtown East location is two blocks away from both Grand Central Terminal and the United Nations. Nearby are government and corporate offices; indelible works of New York architecture, such as the Chrysler Building, the Empire State Building, and the Morgan Library; and popular attractions like Times Square and Bryant Park.
Our 774 spacious guest rooms—including 11 one-bedroom suites and one three-bedroom Presidential Suite—present a refined elegance and invigorating city views. All rooms were designed with eco-friendly materials, such as energy-conserving LED lights, water-conserving low-flow plumbing, recyclable carpet pads, and GREENGUARD-certified solar shades. Enjoy a blissful nights sleep in the plush Westin Heavenly Bed®, and refresh daily with the Heavenly Bath®.
Get back to your best self in our 3,000-square-foot WestinWORKOUT® Gym, which offers state-of-the-art fitness equipment. Savor the nutritious options on our restaurants SuperFoodsRx™ menu, and discover a new favorite drink in the wine and espresso bar.
The meeting and event space at The Westin New York Grand Central spans more than 12,000 square feet, with 12-foot-high floor-to-ceiling windows that provide captivating vistas. Choose from our three executive boardrooms, seven breakout rooms, and the stunning ballroom that can accommodate up to 400 people. All are equipped with teleconferencing capabilities, fiber optics, and Internet bandwidth that ranks among the highest in Manhattan.

hotel.name: Hotel Andra
hotel.description:
Step into Hotel Andra and be transported from bustling downtown neighborhood to a warm urban environment. Ideally located in the epicenter of the city, on the seam of the Belltown and South Lake Union neighborhoods and the thriving retail core, Hotel Andra is perfectly situated for guests to engage in the quintessential Seattle experience. Unique boutique shops and luxury retailers alike are within walking distance of the hotel, as well as some of the city's best dining, the world-famous Pike Place Market and the iconic Space Needle.
Originally built in 1926, this classic brick building was thoroughly recreated as Hotel Andra in 2004, and renovated again in 2010. The distressed plank floors of the hotel lobby contrast with minimalist design elements, combining Northwest materials with a Scandinavian-inspired aesthetic. An exposed loft, with comfortable contemporary furnishings, exudes a vibe that is warm and progressive, and provides a discreet vantage of comings and goings below.
Well-suited to accommodate business and leisure travelers alike, Hotel Andra offers a business center with printing stations, an on-site fitness center and affiliations with nearby fitness and spa facilities.
The hotel is home to Tom Douglas' Lola restaurant. One of Seattle's finest, the restaurant specializes in fusing Greek-style cooking with fresh Northwest produce. Assaggio Ristorante, featuring authentic Italian cuisine, is also on site, and features a wine list awarded Wine Spectator's "Award of Excellence".
hotel.airportsDesc: Sea-Tac International Airport

facility.desc: Business Center:Conference Facilities:Concierge:Handicapped Rooms/Facilities:Pet friendly:Restaurant:Room Service:High Speed Internet:Fitness Center or Spa:Meeting/Banquet Facilities:Parking:WiFi

facility.title: Andra Superia Room
facility.desc: The Andra Superia Rooms (400 sq ft) offer one king, one queen or two queen beds offer one king, one queen or two queen beds and spacious sitting area in the same room, with granite counter bar (many with wet bars). Superia Rooms have a separate vanity area with lighted mirror and leather ottoman. Guestrooms feature soft alpaca headboards, white linens with striped chenille coverlets and warm patterned drapery. The 8-foot desk has an ergonomic chair, ample lighting, cordless speaker phone and wired and wireless internet access. Amenities includes Tivoli clock radios with iPod input, plush spa robes, lighted vanity mirrors, in-room coffee makers with complimentary Starbucks coffee and FACE Stockholm bath products.

facility.title: Lola
facility.desc: Renowned chef and author Tom Douglas' Lola restaurant is a staple of Seattle's dining scene. Lola features the classic produce of the Pacific Northwest mingled with cooking styles of Greece; the menu offers modern Mediterranean and North African riffs on local ingredients such as Anderson Valley lamb, Penn Cove shellfish and wild King salmon. Open Monday through Friday for breakfast, brunch, lunch and dinner; Saturday and Sunday for brunch and dinner only. Room service available daily.

facility.title: Assaggio Ristorante
facility.desc: Awarded the Wine Spectator "Award of Excellence", Assaggio Ristorante owner and chef Mauro Golmarvi has created in his menu a welcoming feast that is rich in flavors and authenticity. Assaggio's atmosphere is one of warmth and familiarity, where even first time diners are welcomed as old friends. The menu is bold, robust central and northern Italian cuisine, complemented by a wine list hand-selected by Mauro himself and Assaggio's own sommelier, Kristen Johnson. Open Monday through Friday for lunch and dinner; Saturday for dinner only.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: With its many unique spaces, Hotel Andra is the ultimate address for any private event. Colleagues can escape to this sanctuary for a day of training and meetings. Friends can enjoy a tailor-made luncheon. Imbibe in cocktails and appetizers in the living room loft, while enjoying the stirring hotel scene. 2 beautifully appointed rooms for a total of 3650 square feet. We can accommodate many different configurations including, up to 200 for a reception, 96 for dining and 40 for a board meeting. We offer personalized menus and service, and are happy to handle all of the details for your meeting or event. State of the art audio and visual capabilities. Wireless internet access in all meeting rooms.

hotel.name: Crowne Plaza COLUMBUS NORTH- WORTHINGTON
hotel.description: The Crowne Plaza Columbus North-Worthington offers 300 renovated upscale sleeping rooms and is located near the Crosswoods Business Park. Local businesses include: J.P. Morgan Chase, Mettler Toledo, Nationwide Insurance, Emerson, DHL and Anheuser-Busch. Features that will make your stay comfortable include 32-inch flat screen HDTVs, room service, concierge lounge, PRECOR equipped Fitness Center, and 24 hour Business Center with complimentary Internet access. Our renovated banquet and event space totals 20,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, including the elegant Grand Pavilion. The Crowne Plaza Columbus North-Worthington hotel can accommodate groups up to 1,000 people making the hotel the ideal venue for weddings, conferences and banquets. Area attractions include the Ohio Expo Center & Ohio State Fairgrounds, Columbus Crew Stadium, Nationwide Arena, Huntington Park, German Village, including Schmidts Restaurant, Columbus Zoo, Franklin Park Conservatory, COSI, the Brewery District and The Ohio State University. Nearby golf includes Muirfield Village Golf Club, home of the PGA Memorial Golf Tournament. Premiere shopping is minutes away including Polaris Fashion Place, Easton Town Center and Tuttle Mall. The Crowne Plaza Columbus North-Worthington is close to world class medical centers including; OSU Wexner Medical Center, The James Cancer Center and Riverside Methodist Hospital.

facility.title: Lobby Bar and Lounge
facility.desc: Our lobby bar, located on the first floor of our Columbus hotel, is the perfect place to unwind during your stay. Featuring high-definition TVs with premium sports channels, the lobby bar provides a casual atmosphere to cheer on your favorite sports team

hotel.name: Marriott Marquis Washington, DC
hotel.description: The 1,175-room, 49-suite Marriott Marquis Washington, DC is designed to reflect its surroundings and complement the adjacent Walter E. Washington Convention Center. Guests enjoy direct access to the Convention Center via an underground concourse connection. With more than 100,000 square feet of event space offering 54 breakout rooms, a grand lobby with an atrium skylight, and five retail and restaurant outlets on the ground floor, our hotel in downtown Washington, DC is poised to be the citys next great social hub. Conveniently located near Penn Quarter, DC City Center, and the Verizon Center, our downtown Washington, DC hotel makes it easy to explore the citys best attractions. Be among the first to experience the vibrant Marriott Marquis Washington, DC, a distinctive addition to the Nation's Capital. Meeting organizers can submit an RFP at DCMarquisMeetings.com today.

facility.title: Anthem
facility.desc: Enjoy delicious, casual American dining at Anthem, which takes its inspiration from the original 1927 Marriott Hot Shoppe and includes a nine-seat counter. Be sure to stop by the restaurant for breakfast before setting off to explore Washington, DC.

facility.title: The Dignitary
facility.desc: This sophisticated lounge offers a 40-seat outdoor patio. Sip one of over two dozen bourbons from all over the Eastern US while you nibble on small plates.

facility.title: High Velocity
facility.desc: Need your sports fix while you're in Washington, DC? In addition to being conveniently located near the Convention Center, our hotel offers a vibrant sports bar/restaurant, High Velocity, with nearly 50 beers on tap. Or sample our signature Moscow Mule!

facility.title: Lobby Bar
facility.desc: Our stylish hotel lobby bar offers bites from Marriott's signature "5/10/20" menu, which consists of locally sourced, shareable plates and entrees.

facility.title: Dining Your Way
facility.desc: If you'd prefer to eat on your own schedule while you're here in Washington, we offer a 24-hour food service for pick-up or delivery to your hotel room.

Daily housekeeping service including turndown service is available upon request, 24 hour valet parking ($25/nt). The Crockett Hotel is a sister property of the Historic Menger Hotel next door.

hotel.name: Wyndham Garden Newark Airport
hotel.description: Just 2 miles from Newark International Airport with convenient access to both Newark and New York City, this Wyndham Garden Newark Airport hotel is a well-placed oasis of comfort. Easily reach downtown Newark, Rutgers University-Newark, Red Bull Arena, the Prudential Center, and many corporate offices including Novartis, Prudential and Schering-Plough. For your convenience pets are welcome here, and there is a complimentary airport shuttle, complimentary wireless Internet and onsite car rental. Refresh in the outdoor pool, stretch road-weary muscles in the fitness center, and take care of work details in the 24-hour business center. Gather with colleagues and friends in the large and small meeting spaces, or in the onsite restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Room service is also available, or grab a bite from the 24-hour market. Spacious guest rooms feature flat-screen TVs, and select rooms are available with separate living areas, ideal for extended stays.

hotel.name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Cleveland Beachwood
hotel.description: Among Beachwood hotels, the Fairfield Inn & Suites Cleveland Beachwood hotel is the perfect choice for business and pleasure travelers alike. Located in an upscale eastern suburb of Cleveland, Ohio, Fairfield Inn & Suites Beachwood hotel is close to many area businesses, shopping and dining, and is close to popular attractions such as the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and the Cleveland Museum of Art. Rest in comfort with our custom bedding and stay productive with free wireless high speed internet and local phone calls. Wired High Speed Internet rooms are available for government/military guests. Get a great start each morning with our complimentary hot continental breakfast featuring scrambled eggs and sausage patties. Rejuvenate in the heated Pool, whirlpool spa, & Indoor 2-story waterslide. Please note maximum occupancies. Enjoy your stay!

hotel.name: Americas Best Value Inn an Suites
hotel.description: Welcome to Americas Best Value Inn and Suites Overland Park/Kansas City/ conveniently located off of I-435 Exit 77A. Our exterior corridor hotel is near several area attractions such as the National World War I Museum/ Kansas City Zoo/ Kansas City Speedway/ and The Great Mall of the Great Plains. Make sure to visit the University of Kansas Edwards Campus/ Deanna Rose Children s Farmstead/ and the Kansas City Museum. Enjoy a delicious meal at one of the local restaurants including Winstead s/ Mr Goodcents Subs and Pasta/ and Wok-N-Roll Express. Whether traveling through or staying for a relaxing getaway/ Americas Best Value Inn and Suites Overland Park/Kansas City offers comfortable accommodations/ affordable rates/ and a friendly 24-hour front desk staff to help make your stay enjoyable. Start your day right with our complimentary continental breakfast. Appreciate the convenience of our on-site board room. Stay connected with free wireless high-speed Internet access in our guest rooms and public areas. Relax in our seasonal outdoor pool *open June- July- and August*. Step into the privacy of your own guest room and experience absolute relaxation with amenities including a cable TV including HBO and ESPN/ coffeemaker/ hairdryer/ iron/ ironing board/ desk with lamp/ clock radio/ free local calls/ and wake-up service. Microwaves/ mini-fridges/ and flat panel TVs are in select rooms. Pets are allowed/charges and restrictions apply. Children age 12 and younger stay free in their parent s room. At Americas Best Value Inn and Suites Overland Park/Kansas City/ We ve Got You Covered from the time you hit the road until your head hits the pillow.

hotel.name: Holiday Inn ORLANDO SW - CELEBRATION AREA
hotel.description: Devote your time to fun activities at Holiday Inn, Main Gate East, located in Kissimmee, Florida, off U.S. Highway 192 East (also known as the Irlo Bronson Memorial Highway). We are an official Walt Disney Good Neighbor full-service hotel! Enjoy our newly renovated rooms, kid suites, meeting facilities, pool, kids theater, and business and fitness centers! Reminisce with M-I-C-K-E-Y M-O-U-S-E at the world-famous Walt Disney World resort in nearby Orlando. See the characters come alive at the Magic Kingdom. Travel to futuristic times at Epcot center. Witness pure movie magic at Disney's Hollywood Studios. Visit Osceola Heritage Park, a 120-acre multipurpose complex that offers exciting sports and entertainment shows. Catch a concert or event at the Silver Spurs Arena, or a baseball game at the Osceola County Stadium. Shop at the Loop, a large outdoor strip mall housing major department stores and smaller retail stores, casual restaurants, and a movie theater. Rev your engine and head to Old Town, a vibrant, family-friendly shopping, dining, and entertainment destination. Enjoy live entertainment each night and don't miss the Classic Car Cruises. Rejuvenate with a tasty hot breakfast at our Trattoria Cafe. Eat hearty from our Best-4-Breakfast menu. Enjoy a leisurely, peaceful vacation or comfortable working environment at our hotel, where Kids Stay Free and Kids Eat Free. Relax, it's Holiday Inn, Main Gate East. This hotel is committed to providing accessible facilities under the American Disabilities Act. If your accessibility needs are not met, please contact the Hotel Manager on Duty.
hotel.airportsDesc: Tampa International Airport, (TPA), 60.00, MI, E; Sanford International Airport, (SFB), 40.00, MI, SE; Orlando International Airport, (MCO), 20.37, MI, NE;

Enjoy a magical, family-fun vacation at our Kissimmee Hotel! Our Holiday Inn Main Gate East Hotel in Kissimmee , Florida, located right off U.S.Highway 192 East (the Irlo Bronson Memorial Highway), is an official Walt Disney Good Neighbor hotel . Our guests can enjoy the business and fitness centers while the children relish in our kid-friendly amenities including an outdoor pool, playground, and video game room. After a thrilling day at an amusement park, both parents and children will sleep soundly in one of our comfortable Guest Rooms. Rejuvenate each morning with a delicious Best-4-Breakfast menu item at our Trattoria Cafe. Sip cocktails poolside from our Chiantis Lounge while the kids gobble down a cheesy pizza from Pizza Hut Express. Our Holiday Inn in Kissimmee offers guests easy access to nearby Orlando attractions. Reminisce with Mickey Mouse at the Walt Disney World resort in Orlando. See the characters come alive at Magic Kingdom . Travel to futuristic times at Epcot Center. Witness pure movie magic at Disney's Hollywood Studios. Catch a concert or event at the Silver Spurs Arena or a baseball game at the Osceola County Stadium. Shop at the Loop, an outdoor strip mall housing major retail stores, casual restaurants and a movie theater. Rev your engine and head to Old Town, a vibrant, family-friendly shopping, dining, and entertainment destination right outside our Kissimmee Hotel.
Resort, resort

hotel.name: Oaktree Inn & Suites Oklahoma City
hotel.description: The Oaktree Inn & Suites is convenient to many of Oklahoma's most appealing sites such as Tinker Air Force Base, Oklahoma State University, White Water Bay Water Park, State Capitol Complex and the Frontier City Theme Park. This Magnuson Hotels affiliate offers free high speed wireless internet access, free parking with room for large vehicles, a seasonal outdoor pool, guest laundry, meeting/banquet space, elevator and safe deposit boxes. Pets are accepted with additional charges. Unfortunately, the pool is closed for the year due to renovations.

facility.title: 1 Queen Suite Nonsmoking
facility.desc: 1 Bedroom Suite, 1 Queen Bed, Sofa, Free Internet, Kitchenette. One bedroom suite features a queen bed, a separate living room with a sofa, a breakfast bar, and a kitchen equipped with a full-size refrigerator, a stove and range, a microwave, and a toaster. Each room comes equipped with free wireless Internet access, cable TV, coffee maker. and electronic door locks. The separate bedroom includes a bathroom with a hair dryer and a spacious, walk-in closet with iron and ironing board. Each guest will be able to make free local calls. Smoking rooms or rooms with wheel chair access are available upon request. This suite truly offers all the comforts of home while you are on the road.

facility.desc: 1 Bedroom Suite, 1 King Bed, Sofa, Free Internet, Kitchenette. One bedroom suite features a large king bed, a sofa in the living area, a breakfast bar, and a kitchen equipped with a full-size refrigerator, microwave, stove with range, toaster, and coffee maker. Each room comes with access to free wireless internet along with cable TV, air conditioning, hairdryer in the bathroom, and iron with ironing board. All rooms have electronic door locks and guests will be able to make free local calls. Smoking rooms or rooms with wheel chair access are available on request.

The room is equipped with free wireless internet , cable TV, and electronic door locks. The bedroom comes with alarm clocks and a spacious closet with iron and ironing board. This is the largest suite and offers plenty of room for an entire family. Smoking rooms and rooms with wheel chair access are available upon request.

The studio is perfect for the traveler seeking to save money but still wanting the comforts of home.

Each room comes with access to free wireless internet along with cable TV, air conditioning, coffee maker, hairdryer, iron with ironing board, refrigerator, and microwave. All rooms have electronic door locks and guests will be able to make free local calls. Smoking rooms or rooms with wheel chair access are available on request. This is the perfect room for those who are looking a place to stay at an affordable price.

hotel.name: Beachbreak by the Sea Resorts
hotel.description: While the Beachbreak by the Sea may be small- it stands only four stories in a sea of high-rises- the resort is big on warmth and charm. One of By the Sea Resorts three gulf-front Panama City Beach hotels, the Beachbreak offers 97 newly-renovated rooms and an array of room types including accommodations with private gulf-front balconies and fully-equipped kitchens as well as cabana-level rooms. Because all of the rooms are affordable, you can take a break without breaking your budget. Discounts at Gulf World Marine Park located across the street, at the nearby Pier Park shopping, dining and entertainment complex and at our beachfront bar and grill next door make your stay even more affordable. The Beachbreak is an official sponsor of Panama City and hottest special events in Panama City Beach including Spring Break, Thunder Beach, Emerald Coast Cruizin and several sporting events. Many Ironman Florida triathletes choose the Beachbreak. Minimum age at check-in is 21. USD 100.00 per person cash security deposit, refundable at check-out, is required at check-in when all guests occupying a room are under the age of 25. Rates are based on double occupancy and a USD 10.00 per night per person fee will be applied after 2 adults. The fee is for any person 18 and up, to be collected at check in.Reservations must be canceled more than 72 hours prior to the arrival date or the deposit is forfeited. All cancellations are subject to a USD 25.00 cancellation fee.

Discounts at Gulf World Marine Park located across the street, at the nearby Pier Park shopping, dining and entertainment complex and at our beachfront bar and grill next door make your stay even more affordable. The Beachbreak is an official sponsor of Panama City and hottest special events in Panama City Beach including Spring Break, Thunder Beach, Emerald Coast Cruizin and several sporting events. Many Ironman Florida triathletes choose the Beachbreak. Minimum age at check-in is 21. USD 100.00 per person cash security deposit, refundable at check-out, is required at check-in when all guests occupying a room are under the age of 25. Rates are based on double occupancy and a USD 10.00 per night per person fee will be applied after 2 adults. The fee is for any person 18 and up, to be collected at check in.Reservations must be canceled more than 72 hours prior to the arrival date or the deposit is forfeited. All cancellations are subject to a USD 25.00 cancellation fee.

hotel.name: Embassy Suites Valencia
hotel.description: Check in to the Embassy Suites Valencia hotel and you will be in an ideal position to make the most of your time in California's Santa Clarita Valley. Just off Freeway 5, minutes from Six Flags Magic Mountain theme park, and less than 45 minutes from downtown Los Angeles, this all-suite hotel in Valencia, CA offers contemporary comfort and excellent service.Expect plenty of space in your two-room suite to work or just relax. A private bedroom and a separate seating area with a sleeper sofa give you and the kids your own space. Watch a movie on one of the two flat-screen TVs, surf the web with WiFi access or make a snack in the kitchen. Every suite comes with a microwave, refrigerator and coffeemaker to help you feel at home.Get a bright start to the day when you choose your favorite foods at the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. The Evening Reception* gives you the chance to unwind over complimentary drinks and snacks served in the hotel's lush, open-air atrium. Keep up your exercise routine with a workout in the fitness center or a swim under the California sunshine in the outdoor pool. Soak away your cares in the whirlpool.Host a Santa Clarita business meeting at this Embassy Suites hotel in Valencia, CA and choose from a range of venues with capacity for up to 370 guests.* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

hotel.name: The Vendue
hotel.description: Imagine a place where the genteel comfort of a bygone era has been perfectly preserved. The style is more sophisticated, the service, more gracious. A place that exceeds every expectation. Youve found someplace very special at Charlestons Vendue Inn where comfort and Southern hospitality await. Accommodations at the Vendue Inn reflect the history of Charleston, from indulgent suites with fireplaces and whirlpool tubs to charming historic quarters in the inns original style. The Vendue Inn sits at the waterfront, adjacent to Waterfront Park, named by the American Planning Association as one of Americas Great Places. In the heart of the Historic District, just steps from unique boutiques, art galleries, fascinating museums, and attractions for which Charleston is known. Hotel's Rooftop Bar and Restaurant offers the finest harbor view in the city. Come for drinks and spectacular views and hotel's mouth watering menu will make you stay for dinner. Here exquisite comfort and attentive service are a way of life. Guests also enjoy an afternoon manager's guest reception with wine and hors d'oeuvres and evening milk and cookies as well as turn down service. A refreshing change from the anonymity of a large chain hotel. They pride on offering personal, friendly service that keeps hotel's guests coming back again and again. Its that balance of a down-to-earth staff, personalized attention and elegant surroundings that allows us to make hotel's guests feel so welcome.

facility.title: Meeting Info
facility.desc: The Vendue Inn features three beautifully appointed meeting venues as well as Hotel's restaurant, with over 2,000 square feet to accommodate all manner of corporate functions, downtown Charleston business meetings, wedding events and social gatherings. Located on the main floor of Hotel's boutique hotel, Hotel event spaces make it easy to host events for 15 to 30 guests. Perfect for small business gatherings and events, Charleston, South Carolina inn provides an alternative meeting place to chain hotels with gracious service, personalized arrangements and historic surroundings filled with authentic furnishings. For Private Dining events in Charleston, SC, groups of up to 100 people can be accommodated.

hotel.name: Hampton Inn & Suites Albany-Downtown
hotel.description: you'll have a capital time...welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites Albany-Downtown.The Hampton Inn & Suites® hotel in Albany-Downtown is a short walk from many of the most popular attractions here in New York's capital. You'll find the area around our hotel loaded with culture, shopping and restaurants. In fact, we are next door to the Palace Theatre and across the street from the Capital Repertory Theatre. From the Riverfront to the Egg Performing Arts Center, Albany's culture and recreation are worth exploring.Speaking of learning and exploring, the University at Albany is just a short drive from our hotel. In Albany, you'll find an amazing town history that dates back to the early 1600s and the founding of our country. Much of the city's architecture has been preserved, too. So come check into the Hampton Inn & Suites hotel in Albany. You'll have a capital time.services & amenitiesEven if you're in Albany to enjoy the great outdoors, we want you to enjoy our great indoors as well. That's why we offer a full range of services and amenities at our hotel to make your stay with us exceptional.Are you planning a meeting? Wedding? Family reunion? Little League game? Let us help you with our easy booking and rooming list management tools.* Meetings & Events* Local restaurant guide

The hotel is located less than 1 mile from Potomac Mills Mall and is 1 mile from I-95. USA Today available Monday-Friday. Only 23 miles from Ronald Reagan National Airport and 37 miles from Washington Dulles Airport.
Downtown, This hotel is located near downtown.

hotel.name: Chelsea Pines Inn
hotel.description: Chelsea Pines Inn is a newly renovated urban bed and breakfast located on the border of three of New York's most exciting areas - Chelsea, Greenwich Village and the historic Meatpacking District. Celebrating our 25th anniversary in 2010, the newly renovated Chelsea Pines welcomes everyone from every corner of the globe. Owner Jay Lesiger and his staff take great pride in providing a high level of personal service and comfort to each of our guests. Considered one of the best values in New York City the Inn is also one of the best reviewed hotels in Manhattan. The hotel is located 10 miles west of La Guardia Airport and 18 miles west of John F. Kennedy International Airport. It is a short taxi or subway ride to attractions such as Times Square, the Theater District, Rockefeller Center and the Statue of Liberty. The property's amenities include free wireless Internet access and free coffee, tea and cookies throughout the day in addition to the extensive continental breakfast included in the daily rates. The charming Breakfast Room includes a greenhouse and seasonal access to the outdoor patio. All rooms feature televisions with 30 satellite channels (including free HBO), Gilchrist & Soames bath products, refrigerators, telephones with voice mail, clock radios, irons and ironing boards. Hairdryers are also available for guest use. Chelsea Pines is a smoke-free facility with smoking only allowed in the outdoor garden area
hotel.airportsDesc: La Guardia Airport - 10 Miles John F. Kennedy International Airport - 18 Miles.

Fully equipped kitchens in each of our 115 spacious suites, free grab and go breakfast, and onsite laundry facilities offer guests freedom and ease, while free WiFi and flat screen TVs with premium channels allow both work and relaxation. Savvy business and leisure travelers alike find our hotel the convenient, affordable, smart choice.

hotel.name: Kendall Hotel
hotel.description: The Kendall Hotel in Boston offers 73 guest rooms and 4 luxury one-bedroom suites decorated in a classic American decor with reproduction furniture and luxurious bedding and bath amenities. Our rooms are inviting, spacious and decorated to bring comfort to our guests. Each guest room is unique in design but all have a bathroom with separate shower and tub, individual climate control for heat and air conditioning and windows that open. The entire hotel is designated non-smoking. Included in all room rates are some of the most comfortable beds in Boston, and a lavish breakfast buffet, featuring homemade scones, muffins, bagels, homemade granola, yogurt, as well as hot breakfast items including scrambled eggs, sausage and bacon as well as items that change regularly. Coffee, Decaffeinated Coffee, Hot Tea, and Assorted Juices are also included. High speed Internet access included with all room rates and is available in all rooms and lobby. Free use of near-by health club. Join us from 5:00pm to 6:00pm in our Rooftop Retreat for a hosted wine tasting Monday through Thursday. All rooms rates include a full American Breakfast buffet, high speed internet access; wired & Wi-Fi, complimentary pass to FITCORP & the hosted wine hour. Standard queen and deluxe king rooms allow a max of 2 adults; a roll away bed can be added to a king room at additional fees for extra person and bedding will be charged at check in. Standard queen rooms cannot accommodate roll away beds and no more than 2 adults can be accommodated in the queen room type.
hotel.airportsDesc: BOS - Logan International 4 miles
hotel.areaServed: Kendall Square is the Gateway to Boston and Cambridge.

facility.title: Location Info
facility.desc: The elegant Kendall Hotel, located where Cambridge meets Boston; steps from the Kendall/MIT Redline T stop, offers everything the weekend and business traveler could need, including a touch of history.

facility.title: Black Sheep Restaurant & Bar
facility.desc:
Situated in the lobby of the historic Kendall Hotel, the Black Sheep Restaurant is dedicated to the buildings past as a Victorian firehouse and to fine dining in Cambridge, Mass. The menu offers daily selections created by our chef using organic and locally grown produce. Our cozy dining room creates a welcoming atmosphere, with a menu offering both classic and innovative American home-style cooking. Our philosophy is simple: purchase the finest and freshest ingredients and let the food absorb them.
We offer a full bar and specialize in a selection of locally brewed beers and selected wines from wineries around the United States.
The Black Sheep is open daily for breakfast. We are open for lunch and dinner Monday through Friday. Saturday the Black Sheep is open for breakfast and dinner only. Both meat-eaters and vegetarians will find plenty to enjoy.

hotel.name: Naples Courtyard Inn
hotel.description: A delightful tropical Inn offering sparkling guest rooms wrapped in old Florida charm. These charming refurbished guest rooms are highlighted with new granite vanities, new king or double beds hosting crisp white linens and subtle colors that sooth and relax. Guests enjoy over sized sunkissed heated swimming pool surrounded by lush gardens and chickee area. Its a perfect place to recharge away from the daily routine. The Inn is centrally located in Naples just moments to the beach and downtown Naples. You will enjoy shopping, restaurants, Naples Philharmonic, Naples Museum of Art and Naples zoo all within minutes from the Inn. Plus, the many other attractions of Floridas Gulf Coast Paradise are awaiting. Theres fishing, boating, golf, tennis, canoeing, jet skiing, bird watching and just strolling that are all the more pleasant in paradise. Allow us to be your base for daytime excursions to neighboring cities and adventures: the Florida Everglades, Captiva and Sanibel Islands, Marco Island, Corkscrew Swamp and Sanctuary all within 1 and 1/2 hours from Naples, venture out to these remote natural sights and experiences and come back to the trendy and posh Naples nightlife if you choose or just take a plunge and stay barefoot for a while. Either way, you will know you are not in Kansas any more. Naples and the Naples Courtyard Inn are designed to delight. Please note: Front Desk hours are 7am-10pm. If arriving after 10pm please contact the property at 239-261-3870 24 hours prior to arrival to make arrangements.
hotel.airportsDesc: Naples Municipal Airport-12 minutes and SW Florida International Airport- 35 minutes.

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Express CHARLESTON DWTN - ASHLEY RIVER
hotel.description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Charleston Downtown - Ashley River We are perfectly located adjacent to the Medical University of South Carolina and in close proximity to Charleston's Historic District . The Holiday Inn Express features views of the Ashley River, a beautiful outdoor pool, Express Start hot breakfast and free high-speed wireless Internet. We are also just down the street from Brittlebank Park with its state-of-the-art playground and fishing pier and within walking distance to Joe Riley Baseball Field , home of the Charleston Riverdogs. Plus, we are convenient to the Charleston area's many historic plantations, golf courses, and pristine beaches.
hotel.airportsDesc: Charleston International Airport, (CHS), 12.00, KM, SW;
